MAT 16:13 Yesu paakahikiki ku muchi wa ku Kaisalia Filipi, akabhalaluki bhabhulwa bhaki, “Bho, bhandu bhapwagha kubha Mwana waka Mundu nde nane?”
MAT 16:14 Bhakamuyangiki, “Bhakumu bhapwagha kubha nde Yohana Mbatizaji, bhangi bhapwagha nde Eliya, na bhangi bhapwagha kubha nde Yelemia au jumu wabhu wa bhalota baka Chapanga.”
MAT 16:15 Akabhalalukile, “Na mwehapa, bho, mpwagha kubha nepani nde nane?”
MAT 16:16 Simoni Petulu akamuyangiki, “Wehapa nde Kristo, Mwana waka Chapanga joabhi mwome.”
MAT 16:17 Yesu akampwaghile, “Upengaliki, Simoni mwana waka Baliyona, maghambu nga mundu jokapi joakuhyekulile leniheli, nambu nde Atati wangu joabhi kunani kumahunde.
MAT 16:18 Nanenga nukupwaghila, wehapa nde Petulu, na panani ja lindalaghu lendenu, ananjenga likanisa langu, wala makili gha kuwawa ngaghawezi kulishinda.
MAT 16:19 Ananukupekya funguo ya Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde, na lokapi leanaulikongaje pundema, analibya likongakiki kunani kumahunde, na lokapi leanaulibhopulaje pundema, analibya libhopuliwi kunani kumahunde.”
MAT 16:20 Panihapa Yesu akabhakanakili ngamaa bhabhulwa bhaki ngabhampwaghi mundu jokapi kubha jombi nde Kristo.
MAT 16:21 Kutumbu chikahi chenihechi Yesu akatumbwi kubhalandila bhabhulwa bhaki hotuhotu, “Imbalika kujenda ku Yelusalemu, na kupata mang'ahiku ghamaheli kuhuma kwa bhazee, na bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, na bhabhola bha Shelia, na konihoku anangomakikaje na lichobha la katatu niyokaje.”
MAT 16:22 Petulu akandohiki Yesu punkeghi na kutumbu kundakalila, akapwagha, “Ngawipwagha bhenibhela Bambo! Lijambu leniheli ngalikupati ng'o!”
MAT 16:23 Nambu Yesu akang'anambwiki na kumpwaghi Petulu, “Bhoka palongi jangu, Shetani! Wehapa nde kihibhalakilu kwangu. Kwa ndandi maholalelu ghaku nga ghaka Chapanga, nambu gha bhandu.”
MAT 16:24 Panihapa Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Mundu jokapi anaapala kunyengalela, impalika alikana mwene, na autolaye msalaba waki, na anyengalyaje.
MAT 16:25 Kwa ndandi mundu anaapala kukengalela womi waki, anaauhobhihaje, nambu mundu joanaauhobhiha womi waki kwa ndandi jangu, anaaupata kabhete.
MAT 16:26 Bho, mundu anapata kiki ngati anaaupatiki ndema wokapi na kuhobheha womi wake? Au mundu anabhoha chindu bhole chibya pandu pa womi wake?
MAT 16:27 Kwa ndandi Mwana waka Mundu anahikaje mu ulumbalilu wa Atati waki papamu na bhatumika bhaki bha kunani kwaka Chapanga, na panihapa nde anaandepa kila mundu kulengana na matendu ghaki.
MAT 16:28 Numpwaghi chakaka, bhabhi bhakumu bhinu pambane ngabhapotele mangane ja kumbona Mwana waka Mundu akahikaje mu Ukolongwa waki.”
MAT 17:1 Paghapetiki machobha sita, Yesu akabhatoliki Petulu, Yakobo na Yohana ndongu waki, akapiti nabhu kanjika jabhu panani ja chitombi chilachu.
MAT 17:2 Konihoku, Yesu akang'anambwiki ubhonikanu waki palongi jabhu, pamihu jaki pakang'anyiki ngati lyobha, na ingobhu jaki jakabhi jihuhu ngati unang'anu.
MAT 17:3 Palapala Musa na Eliya bhakapitalili, na kulongela na Yesu.
MAT 17:4 Panihapa Petulu akumpwaghi Yesu, “Bambo, nde wichu tepani kubha pambane! Anaupala anachenga indamba itatu, chimu chaku wehapa, chengi chaka Musa, na chimu chaka Eliya.”
MAT 17:5 Petulu paakabhi ajendale kupwagha, palapala lihundi leling'anya lakabhayekalile, na sauti jakapitalile kuhuma mulihundi lela, jakapwagha, “Hajoju nde Mwana wangu mpalu, nyambakiki naku, munjowanya jombe!”
MAT 17:6 Bhabhulwa bhala pabhakajowini sauti jela, bhakajowipi namaa, bhakahawiki ukutama mbaka pahi.
MAT 17:7 Yesu akahikiki, akabhapapihi, na kupwagha, “Njemanyaje, ngamwijoghopa!”
MAT 17:8 Pabhakajinwihi mihu ghabhu ngachebhakumbweni mundu, nambu Yesu kanjika jake.
MAT 17:9 Pabhakabhi bhahelela pachitombi, Yesu akabhakanakili, “Ngamwampwaghi mundu mambu ghamughawene, mbaka Mwana waka Mundu paiyokaje kuhuma kwa bhakuwa.”
MAT 17:10 Bhabhulwa bhakandaluki Yesu, “Bho, mbona bhabhola bha Shelia bhapwagha ipalika hoti Eliya ahikaje?”
MAT 17:11 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Chakaka, Eliya anahika hoti, na kulenganakela mambu ghokapi wichu.
MAT 17:12 Nambu numpwaghila, Eliya ajomwi kuhika, na bhombi ngachebhakammanyi, nambu bhandu bhakamuhengili ntundu mobhakapalile. Bhela Mwana waka Mundu anaang'ahakika bhelabhela mu mawoku ghabhu.”
MAT 17:13 Panihapa bhabhulwa bhakamanyiki kubha akabhi abhapwaghi mambu ghaka Yohana Mbatizaji.
MAT 17:14 Pabhakaliheghalili kabheti lipogha la bhandu lela, mundu jumu akunjendi Yesu, na kunchikamila palongi jaki,
MAT 17:15 akapwaghaje, “Bambo, umbonila chiha mwana wangu kwa ndandi abhi na chitamu cha kuhinduka, kabheti ang'ahika namaa, mala pamaheli ahabhuka pamotu na mumachi.
MAT 17:16 Nakundetiki kwa bhabhulwa bhaku, nambu ngachebhakaweziki kundamiha.”
MAT 17:17 Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Mwenga chibheleku changakubha na uhobhalelu, na chechihobhike! Bho, anandama na mwehapa mbaka lile? Undeta pambane nkombu hoju.”
MAT 17:18 Yesu akalilakali lijobhi lela, na lombi lakumpitiki, na kutumbu chikahi chelachela nkombu jola akalamike.
MAT 17:19 Henu bhabhulwa bhakanjendi Yesu bhakabya kanjika jabhu, na kundalukila, “Bho, maghambu kiki tepani ngachetukaweziki kuliboha lijobhi lela?”
MAT 17:20 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Kwa ndandi ja uhobhalelu winu uchoku. Numpwaghi chakaka, anambi na uhobhalelu ngati imbeju njoku jejilowakeka haladali, anamuweza kuchipwaghi chitombi, ‘Ubhokaje pambane ujenda pala,’ na chombi anachibhokaje, na njeta chindu chokapi chechibya ngakuwezikana kwinu.
MAT 17:21 Nambu lijobhi la ntundu aghoghu ngaliwezi kubhohakeka nambu kwa malobhu na kukonga.”
MAT 17:22 Bhabhulwa bhaka Yesu pabhakabhi papamu ku Galilaya, Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mwana waka Mundu anaabhohakikaje mu mawoku gha bhandu,
MAT 17:23 anabhunkomaje, nambu lichobha la katatu anaayoka kabhete.” Bhabhulwa bhaki jakabhabhiniki namaa mitima jabhu.
MAT 17:24 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki pabhakahikiki ku Kapelenaumu, bhajopa kode bha Nyumba jaka Chapanga bhakanjendi Petulu na kundalukila, “Bho, mbola winu le alepa kode ja Nyumba jaka Chapanga?”
MAT 17:25 Petulu akabhayangiki, “Ena, alepa.” Petulu paakajingi mu nyumba, mangane ja kupwagha lilobhi, Yesu akandalukile, “Simoni, wehapa ubhona bhole? Bhakolongwa bha pundema bhabhongana ushulu au kode kuhuma kwa akanane? Bho, kuhuma kwa bhana bhabhu au kwa bhaghene?”
MAT 17:26 Petulu akamuyangiki, “Kuhuma kwa bhandu bhaghene.” Yesu akampwaghile, “Bhela, bhana inchi jabhu bhalekakiwi.
MAT 17:27 Nambu nahuli ngatubhang'aha, ujendaje kunhwanga ukajembalakya ndowana, ukatolaje homba ja kutumbula kutangila, hoghula mundomu waki, na mkati ja ndomu hoghu, anaujihimanya mbija ja kujaghanila ja kode. Jitolaje ukabhapekya jangu nepanu na jaku wehapa.”
MAT 18:1 Chikahi hechi bhabhulwa bhakanjendi Yesu, na kundalukila, “Bho, nde nane joabhi nkolongwa nakanopi mu Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde?”
MAT 18:2 Yesu akandohiki mwana jumu nchoku na kunjemeka pachilanda jabhu.
MAT 18:3 Yesu akapwaghike, “Numpwaghi chakaka, nangakung'anambuka, na kubha ngati bhana, ngamwijingili mu Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde ng'o.
MAT 18:4 Mundu jokapi joaliheleha ngati mwana ajoju, jonihoju nde joanaabya nkolongwa mu Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde.
MAT 18:5 Mundu jokapi joanjopalela mwana jumu ngati ajoju kwa lihina langu, anyopalela nepane.
MAT 18:6 “Nambu mundu jokapi joanaantenda jumu wa bhachoku abhabha bhabhanhobhalela nepanu kuhenga mahoku, ikabya mbaka kwaka mundu hoju kukongakeka liganga likolongwa la kuyaghila, na kujwihakika kulochi ja nhwanga.
MAT 18:7 Anamuchibhonaje bhandu bha pundema, kwa ndandi kubhi na hindu yamaheli yeyatenda bhandu kutenda mahoku, mambu ghanihagha ghapalika ghapitilaje! Nambu anaachibhona mundu jola joaghaleta.
MAT 18:8 “Ngati chiwoku chaku au chiwolu chaku anachikutehi kutenda mahoku, uhekataje na kulekela kutali na wehapa! Mbanga kwaku kujingila mu womi wa mileli panga chiwoku au chiwolu, kuliku kulekaleka mu moto wa mileli ukabya na mabhoku ghabheli na magholu ghaku ghabheli.
MAT 18:9 Lihu laku analikutehi kutenda mahoku, litupulaje na kulilekela kutali na wehapa! Mbanga kwaku kujingila mu womi wa mileli ukabya na lihu limu, kuliku kulekaleka mu Jehanamu ja moto ukabya na mihu ghaku ghokapi ghabheli.
MAT 18:10 “Mulilingalyaje ngamwanzalau jumu wa bhachoku abhabha. Numpwaghila, bhatumika bhabhu bha kunani kwaka Chapanga bhabhi machobha ghokapi palongi ja Atati wangu joabhi kunani kumahunde.
MAT 18:11 Maghambu Mwana waka Mundu ahikiki kubhakengalela bhala bhabhahobhike.
MAT 18:12 “Bho, mbona bhole? Mundu anabhi na mambeleli mia moja, na limu analihobhiki, bho, atenda kike? Aghaleka tisaini na tisa ghala kuchitombi, na kujenda kulilonda lelihobhiki lela.
MAT 18:13 Anaalipatiki, numpwaghi chakaka, anaahekalya nakanopi kwa ndandi ja limbeleli limu kupeta ghala tisaini na tisa ghaghahighalile.
MAT 18:14 Bhelabhela Atati winu wa kunani kumahunde, ngacheapala hata jumu wa bhachoku abhabha ahobhaje.
MAT 18:15 “Ngati ndongu waku anaakuhokihi, ujendaje kwaki ukumpwaghila lihoku laki koni mukabya mwabheli pena. Anaakujowanili, anaubya umpatiki kabheti ndongu waku.
MAT 18:16 Nambu ngati anaakaniki kukujowanela, ujendaje kwaki na mundu jongi jumu au bhabheli nahuli kwa ulandilu wa bhalandilu bhabheli au bhatatu kila litatizo lijomulikaje, ngati moghapwaghi Malembu gaka Chapanga.
MAT 18:17 Anaakaniki kubhajowanela bhandu bhanihabha, ulipwaghila likanisa. Ngati anaakaniki kubhajowanela bhandu habha, na abya kwaku ngati mundu wangakummanya Chapanga au njopa kode.
MAT 18:18 “Numpwaghi chakaka, ghokapi ghamwikongaje pani pundema anaghabya ghakongakiki kunani kumahunde, na ghokapi ghamwibhopulaje pani pundema anaghabya ghabhopuliwi kunani kumahunde.
MAT 18:19 “Kabheti numpwaghi kubha, bhandu bhabheli pabhijongana pundema kubhokana na lijambu lokapi lebhilobhaje kwaka Chapanga, anabhatendiwaje na Atati wangu joabhi kunani kumahunde.
MAT 18:20 Maghambu pokapi pala pabhahimangana bhandu bhabheli au bhatatu kwa lihina langu, nepani mili panihapa pachilanda jabhu.”
MAT 18:21 Panihapa Petulu akanjendi Yesu na kundalukila, “Bambo, bho, ndongu wangu anaanihoki mala palenga nyendalya kundekakela? Bho, nundekakya mala saba?”
MAT 18:22 Yesu akamuyangiki, “Ngachembwagha mala saba pena, nambu saba mala sabini.”
MAT 18:23 Kwa ndandi Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde ulengini na nkolongwa jumu joapalika kutenda mabhalangiku gha bhatumika bhaki.
MAT 18:24 Paakatumbwi kulonda mabhalangiku ghaki, mundu jumu joakabhi andahi mbija mamilioni gha ghamaheli, bhakampeliki kwake.
MAT 18:25 Mtumika jola ngacheakabhi na chindu cha kulepa lideni lela, nkolongwa akalaghalaki kubha ahemaliwaje ngati mtumwa, jombi na nhwanu waki, na bhana bhaki, na hindu yokapi yeakabhi nayu, nahuli ipatikanaye mbija ya kulepa lideni lake.
MAT 18:26 Bhela, mtumika jola akachikimi palongi jaka nkolongwa jola, na kupwagha, “Pepakoku Bambo, nukulobha unhinakalyaje, ananukulepa lideni laku lokapi.”
MAT 18:27 Nkolongwa jola akamboni chiha, akandekakili lideni lela, na kundeka ajendaje.
MAT 18:28 “Nambu mtumika jola paakabhokiki, akahimangini na mtumika njaki joakabhi andahi mbija ichokope. Akankamwili, na kunhinya pahingu, akapwagha, ‘Unepaje lideni langu!’
MAT 18:29 Mtumika njaki jola akanchikamili na kundobha, akapwagha, ‘Pepakoku, nukulobha unhinakalyaje, ananukulepa lideni laku lokapi!’
MAT 18:30 Jombi akakaniki, nambu akampeliki muchifungo mbaka paanalepa lideni lela.
MAT 18:31 Bhatumika bhajaki pabhakaweni mambu ghanihagha, bhakayomiki namaa. Bhakapiti kumpwaghila nkolongwa mambu ghala ghaghapitalile.
MAT 18:32 Panihapa nkolongwa jola akandohiki mtumika jola, akampwaghile, ‘Wehapa nde mtumika muhakau namaa! Ukanobhiki, na nepani nikakulekakile lideni laku lokapi.
MAT 18:33 Bho, ngacheikapalakiki na wehapa kumbone chiha mtumika njaku ngati nepani monakakubhoni chiha wehapa?’
MAT 18:34 Bhela, nkolongwa jola akayomiki namaa, akampeliki mtumika hoju muchifungo na kung'ahakika, mbaka paanajomula kulepa lideni laki lokapi.”
MAT 18:35 Yesu akajomulili kupwagha, “Anana nde Atati wangu wa kunani kumahunde moanaantendila mwehapa, ngati kila jumu winu ngacheandekakela ndongu waki kwa mtima waki wokapi.”
MAT 19:1 Yesu paakajomwi kupwagha malobhi ghanihagah, akabhokiki ku Galilaya, na akapiti ku inchi ja ku Yudea, kwihi ja Nkoka Yoludani.
MAT 19:2 Bhandu bhamaheli bhakanjengalili konihoku, na Yesu akabhalamihi hitamu yabhu.
MAT 19:3 Mafalisayo bhakumu bhakanjendi Yesu, bhakandalukili kwa kumpendakela, “Bho, wichu le nkambaku kumpekeha baluwa ja kundeka nhwanu waki kwa ndandi jokapi jela?”
MAT 19:4 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Bho, ngachemsomiki mu Malembu ghaka Chapanga kubha, Chapanga nde joambombiki mundu kutumbula pakutumbulila akuntendiki nkambaku na mbomba?
MAT 19:5 Chapanga apwagha, ‘Kwa ndandi jeniheji mwanalomi anaandeka atati waki na mabhu waki, na kulombana na nhwanu waki, na bhombi bhabheli habha anabhakubha hyegha jimu?’
MAT 19:6 Henu bhanihabha nga bhabheli kabheti, nambu nde hyegha jimu. Henu, cheachilombanishi Chapanga, mundu ngaachilombola.”
MAT 19:7 Nambu Mafalisayo bhakandaluki Yesu, “Bho, maghambu kiki, Musa akatulaghalaki kubha mundu aweza kumpekeha nhwanu waki baluwa ja kulekana na kundeka?”
MAT 19:8 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Musa akampwaghili kubhaleka akahanu bhinu kwa ndandi ja kunonopa kwa mitima jinu kubholakeka. Nambu kutumbula kubhombakeka kwa ndema ngachekukabhi bhenibhela.
MAT 19:9 Henu, nepani numpwaghi mwehapa, mundu jokapi joandeka nhwanu waki, nanga kubha kwa ndandi ja ugone, na kuntoghola mbomba jongi, ahenga ugone, bhelabhela mundu joantoghola mbomba joapekiwi baluwa ja kulekana jola, najombi atenda ugone.”
MAT 19:10 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakumpwaghile, “Ngati bhenibhela nde mokubheli mambu ghaka nkambaku na nhwanu waki, mbanga mundu kukotoka kutoghola.”
MAT 19:11 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Nga kila mundu joaweza kulijopalela lilobhi lenu lempwagha, nambu bhala pena Chapanga bhaahagwile.
MAT 19:12 Maghambu bhabhi bhandu bhangakuweza kutoghola kwa ndandi bhabhelakiki bhenibhela, na bhangi bhatendakiki ghanihagha na bhandu, na kabheti bhabhi bhangi ambabhu bhapaliki bheni ngabhitoghola kwa ndandi ja Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde. Joaweza kulijopalela lilobhi lenu na alijopalyaje.”
MAT 19:13 Bhandu bhakumu bhakandetili Yesu bhana nahuli abhabhekila mabhoku panani jabhu na abhalobhilaje. Nambu bhabhulwa bhaki bhakabhalakalile.
MAT 19:14 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mwaleka bhana bhahika kwangu, ngamwahibhalila, maghambu Ukolongwa wa kunane kumahunde nde wa bhandu bhabhabhi ngati bhana abhabha.”
MAT 19:15 Paakajomwili kubhabhekela mabhoku panani ja bhana bhanihabha nahuli kubhapengalela, Yesu akabhokiki pandu pala.
MAT 19:16 Mundu jumu akanhiki Yesu na kundalukila, “Mbola Wambone, bho, ndenda chindu bhole chambone nahuli niupataje womi wa mileli?”
MAT 19:17 Yesu akamuyangiki, “Bho, maghambu kiki unoha wambone?” “Kubhi na jumu pena joabhi wambone, yani Chapanga. Nambu ngati anaupala kujingila mu womi wa mileli, kamula amuli yaka Chapanga.”
MAT 19:18 Mundu jola akundalukile, “Bho, amuli bhole?” Yesu akamuyangiki, “Ngawikoma, ngawihenga ugone, ngawijibha, ngawilandila upuhi,
MAT 19:19 watopila atati waku na mabhu waku, na umpala njaku ngati moulipali wamwene.”
MAT 19:20 Nkombu jola akampwaghile, “Niikamwi amuli yeniheyi yokapi kutumbula uchoku wangu. Bho, ngepakiwi na chindu bhole kabheti?”
MAT 19:21 Yesu akampwaghile, “Ngati anaupala kubha mundu wambone chakaka, ujenda ukalombisa hindu yokapi yeubhi nayu, na mbija yeanaupataje ukabhapekya bhahochu, na wehapa anaubya ulibekili chikoku kunani kumahunde, na anaujomwili kutenda ghanihagha, uhika unyengalyaje.”
MAT 19:22 Nkombu jola paakajowini malobhi ghanihagha, akabhokiki kwa kung'ong'uteka, maghambu akabhi na hindu yamaheli namaa.
MAT 19:23 Panihapa Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Numpwaghi chakaka, anakunonupa namaa kwaka mundu joabhi na hindu yamaheli kujingila mu Ukolongwa wa kunane kumahunde.
MAT 19:24 Numpwaghi kabeti kubha, kupepwiki nakanopi kwa chinyama chechilowakeka ngamia kupeta mu limboghi la sindano, kuliku kwaka mundu joabhi na hindu yamaheli kujingila mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga.”
MAT 19:25 Bhabhulwa bhaka Yesu pabhakajowini ghanihagha bhakakangichi namaa, bhakandalukile, “Bho, nde nane henu joanaweza kukengaleka?”
MAT 19:26 Yesu akabhalingalili na kubhapwaghila, “Kwaka mundu lijambu lenu ngacheliwezikana, nambu kwaka Chapanga mambu ghokapi ghawezikana.”
MAT 19:27 Petulu akandalukile, “Lingalya! Tepani tuilekiki hindu yokapi na kukujengalela wehapa! Henu bho, na tepani anatupata kike?”
MAT 19:28 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Numpwaghi chakaka, Mwana waka Mundu paitamaje pa mpandu waki wa kikolongwa cha ulumbalilu mu Ndema Wahenu, mwehapa komi na bhebheli mwemnyengalile anamtamaje panani ja mipandu ja ukolongwa komi na jibheli, mkaghatemulaje makabila komi na ghabheli gha Izilaeli.
MAT 19:29 Kila mundu joajilekiki nyumba au ndongu au ndombu au atati au mabhu au bhana au mighonda kwa ndandi jangu nepani, anaajopalyaje mala mia, na kujopalela womi wa mileli.
MAT 19:30 Nambu bhamaheli bhabhabhii bhakutumbula, anabhabya bha kujomukela, na bhamaheli bhabhabhi bha kujomukela, anabhabya bha kutumbula.
MAT 20:1 “Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde ulengana na mundu joabhi na ngonda wa mizabibu joakabhokiki lukela pachibhombu kubhapeleka bhahengalihengu mungonda waki.
MAT 20:2 Akajongini nabhu kwa kubhalepa chipandi chimu cha madini gha feza kwa lichobha, na akabhapeliki kungonda wa mizabibu.
MAT 20:3 Pajahikiki saa tatu ja lukela, akabhokiki kabheti na akabhahimani bhandu bhangi bhajemiki paligulio bhanga na lihengu.
MAT 20:4 Akabhapwaghile, ‘Njendanyaje na mwenga mkahenga lihengu mungonda wangu wa mizabibu, na nepani ananundepa ngati mokupalakila.’ Na bhombi bhakapiti.
MAT 20:5 Pajahikiki saa sita ja muhi na saa tisa pakamihi, akabhokiki kabheti na kutenda bhelabhela.
MAT 20:6 Pajahikiki saa komi na moja pakamihi akabhokiki kabheti na akabhahimanili bhandu bhangi bhajemiki pandu paligulio pala. Akabhalalukile, ‘Bho, mbona njemiki pambane muhi jokapi panga na kuhenga lihengo?’
MAT 20:7 Bhakamuyangiki, ‘Maghambu njeta mundu joatupeki lihengo.’ Akabhapwaghile, ‘Na mwehapa nanamu njendanyaje mkahenga lihengo mu ngonda wangu wa mizabibu.’
MAT 20:8 “Pakwahikiki pakamihi, mweni ngonda jola akandohiki njemalela wa bhahengalihengo bhala, na kumpwaghila, ‘Ubhalohaje bhahengalihengo na ubhalepaye mbija yabhu, ukatumbula na bhakujomukela na kujomulela na bhakutumbula.’
MAT 20:9 Pabhakahikiki bhala bha saa kumi na moja, kila jumu wabhu akapatiki chipandi chimu cha madini gha feza.
MAT 20:10 Bhala bhabhakatumbwi kuhenga lihengo pabhakahikiki, bhahambukya anaabhalepa nakanopi, nambu kila jumu wabhu akapatiki chipandi chimu cha madini gha feza.
MAT 20:11 Bhandu bhala bhakajopiki mbiya yabhu, na bhakatumbwi kung'ong'utakela mweni ngonda,
MAT 20:12 bhakapwaghaje, ‘Bhandu bha kujomukela abhabha bhahengiki lihengu kwa lisaa limu pena, nambu bho, maghambu kiki wehapa wapeki malepu kulengana na tepani tetuhengiki lihengu lelinonwipi na kujochakeka na lyobha muhi jokapi?’
MAT 20:13 “Mweni ngonda jola akamuyangiki jumu waki, ‘Nkoche, ngachenukuponjiki chindo. Bho, ngachetukajongini kubha anauhenga lihengu kwa chipandi chimu cha madini gha feza?
MAT 20:14 Utola mbiya jaku ujendaje. Mbala kumpekeha wa kujomukela ajoju kulengana na wehapa.
MAT 20:15 Bho, ngacheniweza kuhenga chenichipala na hindu yangu namwete? Au bho, umonela wihu kwa ndandi nepani wambone?’ ”
MAT 20:16 Yesu akajomuli kwa kupwagha, “Bhelabhela wa kujomukela anaakubha wa kutumbula, na wa kutumbula, anaakubha wa kujomukela.”
MAT 20:17 Yesu paakabhi akwela kujenda ku Yelusalemu, akabhalohiki bhabhulwa bhaki komi na bhabheli bhala, na pabhakabhi bhajenda mwindela, akabhapwaghile,
MAT 20:18 “Njowanyaje, tujenda ku Yelusalemu, na konihoku Mwana waka Mundu anajeghalika mu mabhoku gha bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhabhola bha Shelia. Na bhombi anabhuntemula kupotela,
MAT 20:19 anabhumboha kwa bhandu bhangakubha Bhayahude, nahuli bhundongamaje, na kundapu iboku, na kumuwamba panani pa msalaba, nambu lichobha la katatu anahyokaje kabheti.”
MAT 20:20 Panihapa mabhu wabhu bhana bhaka Zebedayo akanjendi Yesu papamu na bhana bhaki, akachikimi palongi jaki, na kundobha anhengila chela cheachipala.
MAT 20:21 Yesu akandalukile, “Bho, upala kike?” Amabhu hoju akampwaghile, “Pepakoku, laghalakya kubha bhana bhangu bhabheli abhabha bhatama jumu upambala waku wa kumalelelu, na jumu upambala waku wa kumangeja, mu Ukolongwa waku.”
MAT 20:22 Yesu akamuyangiki, “Ngachemmanyi chemuchilobha. Bho, muweza kunywele chikombi cheananywelila nenga, na kubatizwa ubatizo ghonibatizwe?” Bhakamuyangiki, “Tuweza.”
MAT 20:23 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Chakaka ananywelilaje chikombi changu, na kubatizwa ubatizo ghonibatizwe, nambu kutama chiwoku changu cha kumalelelu na chiwoku changu cha kumangeja nga lihengu langu kumpekeha, nambu lijambu heli anabhapekiwa bhala bhabhabhekakiwi tayali na Atati wangu.”
MAT 20:24 Bhabhulwa bhangi komi bhala pabhakajowini ghanihagha, bhakabhayomile bhalongu bhabheli bhala.
MAT 20:25 Nambu Yesu akabhalohiki bhabhulwa bhaki papamu, na kubhapwaghila, “Mmanyi kubha bhatawala bha bhandu bhangakubha Bhayahude bhajemalela bhandu bhabhu kwa makili, na ihongozi habha bhahenga bhandu habha kubha bhabhu.
MAT 20:26 Nambu kwinu mwenga ngakwikubha bhenibhela, nambu mundu jokapi joapala kubha nkolongwa kwinu, impalika abya mtumika winu.
MAT 20:27 Joapala kubha wa kutumbula pachilanda jinu, ipalika abya mtumika winu,
MAT 20:28 maghambu Mwana waka Mundu ngacheahikiki nahuli kutumikiwa, nambu kutumika, na kuubhoha womi waki nahuli kubhakombola bhandu bhamaheli.”
MAT 20:29 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki pabhakabhi bhabhoka ku Yeliko, lipogha likolongwa la bhandu, bhakunjengalile.
MAT 20:30 Akangalola bhabheli bhabhakabhi bhatemi punkeghi ja indela, na pabhakajowini kubha Yesu apeta, bhakajamalili, “Bambo, Mwana waka Daude, utubhonila chiha!”
MAT 20:31 Lipogha la bhandu lela lakabhalakalili na kubhapwaghila mtumbalaje, nambu akangalola bhala bhakajonjuki kujamalila nakanopi, bhakapwaghaje, “Bambo, Mwana waka Daude, utubhonila chiha!”
MAT 20:32 Yesu akajemiki, na kubhaloha na kubhalalukila, “Bho, mpala nuntendila kike?”
MAT 20:33 Bhakamuyangiki, “Bambo, tupala kulola.”
MAT 20:34 Yesu akabhabhoni chiha, akaghapapihi mihu ghabhu, na palapala bhakapatiki kulola, na bhakanjengalile.
MAT 21:1 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki pabhaheghali ku Yelusalemu na kuhika ku Besifage pachitombi cha Mizeituni, akabhatumiki bhabhulwa bhaki bhabheli,
MAT 21:2 akabhapwaghile “Njendanya mpaka ku chijiji chechibhi palongi jinu na anamulihimanya liponda likongakiki na mwanaliponda papamu naku. Mkaghabhopula na mkaghaleta kwango.
MAT 21:3 Ngati mundu anandaluki chokapi, mumpwaghilaje, ‘Bambo alipala,’ najombi anaandekilaje.”
MAT 21:4 Lijambu haleli likahengakiki nahuli ghala ghaghakapwagakiki na mlota waka Chapanga ghatimilaje.
MAT 21:5 “Mubhapwagila bhandu bha muchi wa Sayuni. Lingalya, Nkolongwa waku ahika kwaku! Nde mpole, na akweliki paliponda. Ahika panani ja mwanaliponda.”
MAT 21:6 Bhela, bhabhulwa bhala bhakapiti, na kuhenga ngati Yesu moakabhalaghalakile.
MAT 21:7 Bhakaliletiki liponda lela, na mwana waki, bhakajaliki ingobhu yabhu panani ja liponda, na Yesu akatemi panani jaki.
MAT 21:8 Lipogha likolongwa la bhandu lakajaliki ingobhu yabhu mwindela, na bhandu bhangi bhakahekiki mambandi gha mikongu, na kughajala mwindela.
MAT 21:9 Lipogha la bhandu lelundongulile na lela lelunjengalyaje lakajamalili kwa sauti ngolongwa, “Alumbalikaje Mwana waka Daude! Apengalika hoju joahika kwa lihina laka Bambo! Ulumbalilu kwaka Chapanga kunani kumahunde!”
MAT 21:10 Yesu paakabhi ajingi ku Yelusalemu, muchi wokapi ukatweli kukenyamuka, na bhandu bhakabhi bhalalukila, “Bho, ajoju nde nane?”
MAT 21:11 Lipogha la bhandu lela lakapwaghike, “Ajoju nde mlota Yesu, kuhuma ku Nazaleti muchi wa ku Galilaya.”
MAT 21:12 Bhela, Yesu akajingili muliwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, akabhatopuli kunja bhandu bhabhatendika kulombesa na kuhemela hindu pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga pala, akaipendwi meza ya bhala bhabhakabhi bhang'anambu mbija, na hitehu ya bhabhabhi bhalombesa ngunda.
MAT 21:13 Akapwaghile, “Ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu, ‘Nyumba jangu jikemakeka nyumba ja malobhu.’ Nambu mwanganya mjitendiki kubha likolu la bhanyaghula.”
MAT 21:14 Akangalola na ilema bhangi bhakunjendili ku Nyumba jaka Chapanga hoku, na Yesu akabhalamihe.
MAT 21:15 Bhela, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhabhola bha Shelia pabhakaiweni hindu ya kukangacha yeakatehi Yesu, na kabhe bhana pabhajamalya pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga bhakapwaghaje, “Ulumbalilu kwaka Mwana waka Daude,” bhombi bhakayomiki namaa.
MAT 21:16 Bhela bhakampwaghile, “Bho, ngacheujowana chebhapwagha?” Yesu akabhayangiki, “Ena, nyowana! Bho, ngachendabhali kusoma lilembelu aleli, ‘Kwa milomu ja bhana na bhana bhang'eng'a anaulipatila ulumbalilu wa chakaka?’ ”
MAT 21:17 Bhela, Yesu akabhalekiki, na akabhokiki kunja ja muchi na kujenda ku Besania, na kughonela konihoku.
MAT 21:18 Yesu paakabhi akelebhuka kuhuma ku muchi ghonihoghu lukela pachibombu, jakumbiniki injala.
MAT 21:19 Akauweni nkongu ghumu wa mtini punkeghi ja indela, akaujendile nambu akauketanili ngacheubhi na lipambiku lokapi, nambu mahamba pela. Bhela, akaupwaghile, “Ngawipambika kabheti mapambiku mileli!” Palapala nkongu ghola ukajomike.
MAT 21:20 Bhabhulwa pabhuweni bhakakangichi namaa, bhakapwaghaje, “Bho, maghambu kiki nkongu wa mtini aghoghu ujomiki pe mala punkamo?”
MAT 21:21 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Numpwaghi chakaka, ngati anambi na uhobhalelu panga kubha na choghohi, muweza kuhenga nga la nkongu wa mtini aghoghu pela, nambu hata ngati anamuchipwaghi chitombi achechi, ‘Tupukaje, ukalilekala mubahali,’ analitendika bhenibhela.
MAT 21:22 Ngati anamuhobhalela, chokapi chemwilobhaje kwa malobhu, anampataje.”
MAT 21:23 Yesu akajingi paliwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na kubhola. Paakabhi akabholaje, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhazee bhakahiki kundalukila, “Bho, uhenga mambu aghagha kwa lujiniku bhole? Bho, nane joakupeki lujiniku loniholo?”
MAT 21:24 Yesu akabhayangike, “Na nenga ananundalukya lilaluki limu, anamuniyangiki, bhela nanatu ananumpwaghila nhenga aghagha kwa lujiniku bhole.
MAT 21:25 Bho, lujiniku lwaka Yohana lwa kubatiza lukahumiki kwaka nane? Bho, lukahumiki kunani kumahunde au lukahumiki kwa bhandu?” Nambu bhakaloghulani bheni kwa bheni ana, “Bho anatupwagha bhole? Anatupwagiki, ‘Lukahumiki kwaka Chapanga,’ anaatupwaghila, ‘Mbona henu ngachemunhobhalile?’
MAT 21:26 Ngati anatupwaghiki, ‘Lukahumiki kwa bhandu,’ tujoghopa lipogha la bhandu ndandi bhokapi bhahobhalela kubha Yohana akabhi mlota waka Chapanga.”
MAT 21:27 Bhela, bhakamuyangiki, “Ngachetumanya!” Na Yesu akabhayangike, Na nepanu nganumpwaghile ndenda mambu aghagha kwa lujiniku bhole.
MAT 21:28 “Mwanganya mbona bhole, mundu jumu akabhi na akakombu bhabheli. Akumpwaghi jola wa kutumbula, ‘Mwanango, lalenu ujenda ukahenga lihengu mu ngonda wa mizabibu.’
MAT 21:29 Nkombu jola akampwaghile, ‘Ngachembala!’ Nambu panakatahi akang'anambwiki liholalelu laki, akapiti kuhenga lihengo.
MAT 21:30 Atati jola akumpwaghi nkombu waki wa kabheli bhelabhela, najombi akamuyangiki, ‘Ena atati!’ Nambu ngacheakapiti kulihengo.
MAT 21:31 Bho, nane panihapa pachilanda ja bhanganya bhabheli habha joahengiki ghala ghaapalika atati wabhu?” Bhakamuyangike, “Mwana wa kutumbula jola.” Bhela, Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Numpwaghi chakaka, bhajopa kodi na bhakemi anabhundongulya mwehapa kujingila mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga.
MAT 21:32 Ndandi Yohana akahikiki kwinu na kundangiha indela jejipalika kutama, nambu mwehapa ngachemunhobhalile. Nambu bhajopa kode na bhakemi bhakunhobhalile. Papamu na kughabhona ghanihagha ghokapi, mwanganya ngacheng'anambwiki na kughaleka mahoku ghinu, na ngachemunhobhalile.”
MAT 21:33 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Njowana ulenganesu ghongi. Mundu jumu mweni ngonda, najombi akalemiki ngonda wa mizabibu, akauyongalwi lubheghu, akalenganaki pandu pa kuminyila divai, na kuchenga mnala. Akabhajahiki bhalemi ngonda ghola, na akabhokiki kujenda mbaka ku muchi wa kutale.
MAT 21:34 Chikahi cha mahunu pachahikite, akabhatumiki bhatumika bhaki kwa bhalemi bhala, nahuli bhakatola pandu pa lifungu laki la mahuno.
MAT 21:35 Bhalemi bhala bhakabhakamwi bhatumika bhala, jumu bhakundapwili, jongi bhakunkomiki, na jongi bhakundapwi maganga.
MAT 21:36 Mweni ngonda jola akabhatumiki kabheti bhatumika bhangi, bhamaheli kupeta bhatumika bha kutumbula. Bhalemi bhala bhabhakajahiki ngonda, bhakabhatendi bhelabhela.
MAT 21:37 Pakujomukela jaki akantumiki mwana waki koni akaholakya, ‘Anabhuntopalya mwana wangu.’
MAT 21:38 Nambu bhalemi bhala pabhakumbweni mwana waki bhakapwaghani bheni kwa bheni, ‘Ajoju nde mpwelelu waki, henu tunkomaje nahuli tuutola upwelelu waki!’
MAT 21:39 Bhela, bhakunkamwili, na bhakumbohiki kunja ja ngonda wa mizabibu ghola, na bhakunkomiki.
MAT 21:40 “Henu, mweni ngonda wa mizabibu jola paanahikaje, bho, anaabhatenda kiki bhalemi bhala?”
MAT 21:41 Bhombi bhakamuyangike, “Chakaka anaabhakoma bhandu bhahakau habha, na ngonda ghola anaabhapekya bhalemi bhangi bhaanabhumpekya lifungu laki mapambiku kwa chikahi chaki.”
MAT 21:42 Panihapa Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Bho, ngachemwasomiki lijambu haleli mu Malembu Mahuhu? ‘Liganga lebhalikaniki bhachenga sajenu libhi liganga lelipalika nakanopi la luhuli. Bambo nde joatehi lijambu haleli, na lombi nde la ukangachu namaa kwitu!’ ”
MAT 21:43 “Kwa bhela numpwaghila, Ukolongwa waka Chapanga anaubhohakika kwinu, na kubhapekeha bhandu bhangi bhabhahenga mahengu ghala ghaaghapala Chapanga.”
MAT 21:44 Joanahabuka panani ja liganga leniheli anatunyukana ipandi ipandi, na analunhabuki mundu jokapi, analuntimbaje nakanopi.
MAT 21:45 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na Mafalisayo pabhajowini malenganesu ghaki hagha, bhakamanyiki kubah abhapwaghika bhombe.
MAT 21:46 Bhela bhakabhi bhalonda indela ja kunkamula, nambu bhabhajoghupa bhandu, kwa ndandi bhombi bhakummanyi kubha Yesu nde mlota waka Chapanga.
MAT 22:1 Yesu akalongi nabhu kabheti kwa malenganesu,
MAT 22:2 “Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde ulengini na nkolongwa joakantendi mwana waki uwangalalu wa chilebhi cha ukwate.
MAT 22:3 Bhela akabhatumiki bhatumika bhaki kubhakema bhaakabhakokiki kuhika paukwate, nambu bhombi bhakakaniki kuhika.
MAT 22:4 Akabhatumiki kabheti bhatumika bhangi, akapwagha, ‘Mkabhapwaghila bhala bhanabhakokiki, kubha chilebhi chibhi tayale, njinjiki likambaku langu la ng'ombi, na ng'ombi yengi yeinenipe, na kila chindu chibhi tayale, muhikaye paukwati.’
MAT 22:5 Nambu bhombi ngachebhaholali ghanighala, bhakabohkiki, jongi akapiti kumighonda jaki, na jongi kumahengu ghaki,
MAT 22:6 na bhangi bhakabhakamwi bhatumika bhala na kubhalapula, na kubhakoma.
MAT 22:7 Nkolongwa jola akayomike, akabhatumiki manjolinjoli bhaki, bhakabhakoma bhala bhabhakomiki bhatumika bhaki, na kuuyonanga muchi wabho.
MAT 22:8 Kabhet akabhapwaghi bhatumika bhaki, ‘Uwangalalu wa chilebhi cha ukwati chibhi tayale, nambu bhabhakokakike ngechebhapalakikaje.
MAT 22:9 Bhela, njenda mwindela na bhokapi bhala bhamwabhonaje mubhakema bhahika paukwate.’
MAT 22:10 Bhala bhatumika bhakabhokike, bhakapiti mwindela, bhakabhaletiki bhandu bhokapi bhabahwene, bhahakau na bhambone. Nyumba ja ukwate jakatweli bhaghene.
MAT 22:11 “Nkolongwa paakajingi kwabhona bhaghene, akambweni mundu jumu jwangakuwata ingobhu ja ukwate.
MAT 22:12 Nkolongwa akundalukile, ‘Nkoche, bho, ujingi bholi pambane panga ingobhu ja ukwate?’ Nambu jombi akatemi chinunu.
MAT 22:13 Panihapa nkolongwa akabhapwagili bhatumika bhaki, ‘Munkonga magholu na mabhoku mukundekala kunja kulwihi. Konihoku analela na kuyagha mino.’ ”
MAT 22:14 Yesu akajomuli kwa kupwagha, “Bhamaheli bhabhakokakike, nambu bhahaghulika nde bhachokope.”
MAT 22:15 Bhela, Mafalisayo bhakapiti, na kupwaghanila ntundu wa kunkamu Yesu kwa malobhi ghake.
MAT 22:16 Bhela, bhakabhatumiki bhabhulwa bhabhu papamu na bhahemba bhaka Helode kwaka Yesu. Bhakundalukile, “Mbola, tumanyi kubha wenga wa mundu wambone, na kubha ubhola indela jaka Chapanga kwa chakaka, ngacheunjoghopa mundu jokapi jola, panga kuholalela kubha bhandu bhapwagha kike.
MAT 22:17 Henu, utupwaghilaje maholalelu ghako, bho, wichu le kwitu au nga wichu kwitu, kulepa kode kwaka Kaisali?”
MAT 22:18 Nambu Yesu akaumanyi uhakau wabho, akabhapwaghile, “Mwenga mwakandumi kubhele, bho, mbona mnenga?
MAT 22:19 Mnangihaje mbija ja kulepela kode.” Na bhombi bhakumpeki lingengalema la mbija.
MAT 22:20 Bhela, Yesu akabhalalukile, “Bho, sula ajeji na lihina aleli yaka nane?”
MAT 22:21 Bhakamuyangike, “Nde yaka Kaisali.” Panihapa Yesu akabhapwagile, “Bhela, mumpekya Kaisali yeibhi yaki Kaisali, na mumpekya Chapanga yeibhi yaki Chapanga.”
MAT 22:22 Pabhajowini bhenibhela bhakakangichi namaa, bhakundekiki, na bhakabhokanile.
MAT 22:23 Lichobha lelalela, Masadukayo bhakumu bhabhapwagha bhabhawili ngachebhahyoka, bhakunjendi Yesu,
MAT 22:24 na kumpwaghila, “Mbola, Musa akapwaghiki mundu joatowili anaapotile panga na kundeka mwana, ipalika ndongu waki ampwelila mbomba joaweliwi na ndomi hoju, nahuli ambelakya ndongu waki bhana.
MAT 22:25 Henu, pitu pani pakabhi na bhalongu saba. Wa kutumbula akatowi mbomba, na akapotile, na maghambu ngacheakabhi na bhana, akandeki ndongu waki mbomba joaweliwi na ndomi jola.
MAT 22:26 Ikabi bhelabhela kwa ndongu wa kabhele, na wa katatu, mbaka wa saba.
MAT 22:27 Pakujomukela mbomba hoju najombi akapotile.
MAT 22:28 Bho, lichobha bhakuwa pabhiyokaje, mbomba hoju anaabya nhwanu waka nane pachilanda ja bhalongu saba bhala? Kwa ndandi bhokapi saba bhakabhi bhuntogwile.”
MAT 22:29 Yesu akabhayangike, “Mwanganya muhobhike, kwa ndandi ngachemughamanyi Malembu ghaka Chapanga, wala makili ghaka Chapanga.
MAT 22:30 Ndandi bhakuwa pabhiyokaje ngabhitogholi wala kutoghuleka, nambu bhibya ngati bhatumika bhaka Chapanga bha kunani kumahunde.
MAT 22:31 Nambu kubhokana na kuyoka kwa bhakuwa, bho, ngachemsomiki ghala ghaampwaghi Chapanga? Akapwaghike,
MAT 22:32 ‘Nepani nde Chapanga waka Ibulahimu, Chapanga waka Isaka, na Chapnga waka Yakobo!’ Bhela, jombi nga Chapanga wa bhakuwa, nambu jombi nde Chapanga wa bhandu bhabhabhi bhome.”
MAT 22:33 Lipogha la bhandu lela palajowini ghanighala, bhakakangichi mabholu ghake.
MAT 22:34 Bhela Mafalisayo pabhajowini kubha Yesu akabhi bhatumbalishi Masadukayo, bhakaketangini papamo.
MAT 22:35 Jumu wabhu, bambo Shelia, akandaluki Yesu kwa kundenga,
MAT 22:36 “Mbola, bho, amuli bhole nde ngolongwa mu Shelia jokapi?”
MAT 22:37 Yesu akayangiki, “ ‘Umpala Bambo Chapanga waku kwa mtima waku wokapi, na kwa roho jaku jokapi, na kwa malangu ghaku ghokapi.’
MAT 22:38 Jeniheji nde amuli ngolongwa na ja kutumbula.
MAT 22:39 Na ja kabheli jejilengana na jeniheji nde jenjenu, ‘Umpala njaku, ngati moulipali wamwete.’
MAT 22:40 Shelia jokapi na mabholu ghokapi gha bhalota bhaka Chapanga, ghategamela amuli ibheli hayeyi.”
MAT 22:41 Mafalisayo pabhalibhongini papamu, Yesu akabhalalukile,
MAT 22:42 “Bho, mwanganya mbona bholi panani jaka Kristo? Bho, nde mwana waka nane?” Bhakamuyangike, “Mwana waka Daude.”
MAT 22:43 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Bhela, bho, iwezikana bholi kupwaga kwa makili ghaka Roho Mhuhu, Daude ankema jombi Bambo? Ndandi akapwaghike,
MAT 22:44 ‘Bambo akampwaghi Bambo wangu. Utama upambala wangu wa kumalelelu, mbaka nabhabheka maadui bhaku pahi ja magholu ghako.’
MAT 22:45 Bhela, ngati anakubhi Daude ankema Kristo, ‘Bambo,’ bho, aweza bholi henu kubha mwana waki?”
MAT 22:46 Nga mundu nga jumu joakaweziki kumuyanga lilobhe. Na kutumbu lichobha leniheli nga mundu hata jumu joakalengiki kundalukila lilalukilu kabheti.
MAT 23:1 Kabheti Yesu akalongi na lipogha la bhandu papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki,
MAT 23:2 “Bhabhola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo nde bhabhabhi na uwezu wa kuilongalela Shelia yaka Musa.
MAT 23:3 Bhela mkamulaje malaghalakilu na kuhenga ghokapi ghabhumpwaghila. Nambu ngamwijigha matendu ghabhu, maghambu ngachebhahenga ghala ghabhumpwaghila.
MAT 23:4 Bhakonga hibwahila yeitopiki na kubhatweka bhandu mumabhegha ghabhu, nambu bhombi bheni ngachebhapala kuhatambula hata lukonji nahuli kujangatila kutotola.
MAT 23:5 Kabheti bhahenga matendu ghabhu ghokapi nahuli bhandu bhabhonaje, kwa ndandi bhawata hindu ikolongwa yeilembakiki Shelia pachibongi, na mumabhoku, na kujonjukela mahundwa gha hunjihunji mukona ja ingobhu yabhu,
MAT 23:6 bhapala hitehu ya kulongi pa uwangalalu wa chilebhi, na kutama kulongi mu manyumba ya kuhimangani Bhayahude.
MAT 23:7 Bhapala kulamukiwa kwa kutopela paligulio, na kulowakeka na bhandu, ‘Mbola.’
MAT 23:8 Nambu mwanganya ngamwilowakeka, ‘Mbola,’ kwa ndandi Mbola winu nde jumu, wala Kristo, nanamu mabhokapi nde bhalongu.
MAT 23:9 Ngamwandowa mundu ‘Atati,’ pundema, kwa ndandi Atati winu jumu, joabhi wa kunani kumahunde.
MAT 23:10 Kabheti ngamwilowakeka chiongozi, kwa ndandi Chiongozi winu nde jumu, najombi nde Kristo.
MAT 23:11 Nambu jola joabhi nkolongwa winu anaabya ntumika winu.
MAT 23:12 Mundu jokapi joalikweha anahelakikaje, na mundu joaliheleha anakwehakikaje.”
MAT 23:13 “Anamuchibhonaje bhabhola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo, mwemulitenda kubha bhambone! Kwa ndandi mujighila ndyangu wa Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde palongi ja bhandu, na mwabheni ngachenjingila, wala bhabhajingila ngachemwaleka bhajingalaje.
MAT 23:14 Anamuchibhonaje bhabhola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo, mwemulibhona kubha bhambone! Kwa ndandi mwanyaghula akamabhu bhabhaweliwi na bhalomi bhabhu hindu yabhu, na kwa kulitenda mwamboni koni ndobha malobhu malachu, bhela anampata utemulo ghoubhi ukolongwa nakanope.”
MAT 23:15 “Anamuchibhonaje bhabhola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo, mwemulitenda kubha bhamboni! Kwa ndandi muyongolota munhwanga na mumaheku nahuli kumpata mundu jumu ahobhalya mabholu ghinu, na kabheti anamumpatike, muntenda abya na uwezu mala pabheli nakanopi ja kujenda mu Jehanamu ja moto kupeta mabhene.
MAT 23:16 “Anamuchibhonaje akachiongozi ngalola, mwembola, ‘Mundu anaalapike kwa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, kulapa hoku nga chindu. Nambu ngati analapiki kwa zahabu jejibhi mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga, kulapa hoku kunkamula.’
MAT 23:17 Mwanganya mwang'ang'a na akangalola, kwa ndandi nde jaku jejibhi ngolongwa, zahabu jela, au Nyumba jaka Chapanga jela jejitenda zahabu heji jibya jihuhu?
MAT 23:18 Bhelabhela mpwagha, ‘Mundu joalapa kwa chihanja cha nyambiku, nga chindu, nambu mundu jola joalapa kwa nyambiku jelibhi panani ja chihanja cha nyambiku, kulapa hoku kubhi na makili.’
MAT 23:19 Chakaka mwanganya nde mwakangalola! Kwa ndandi nde jaku jejibhi ngolongwa, nyambiku jela, au chihanja cha nyambiku chela chechigholola nyambiku?
MAT 23:20 Bhela, jombi joalapa kwa chihanja cha nyambiku, alapa kwa jeniheje, na kwa hindu yokapi yeibhi panani jake.
MAT 23:21 Jombi joalapa kwa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, alapa kwa jeniheli, na kwaka Chapanga joatama mkati jake.
MAT 23:22 Joalapa kwa kunani kumahunde, alapa kwa chitehu cha ukolongwa chaka Chapanga, na kwaka jombi joatama panani jake.
MAT 23:23 “Anamuchibhonaje bhabhola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo, mwemulitenda mwambone! Kwa ndandi mboha lifungu la komi kuhuma kwa hata mahamba ghaghanungi wichu, hiliki na mdalasini, na koni nkotwiki kuhenga mambu makolongwa gha Shelia, ngati bhela kuhenga ghaghunyambiha Chapanga, chiha, na uhobhalelu. Aghagha nde ghaghumpalika kuhenga, na kabheti panga na kughaleka ghangi hagha.
MAT 23:24 Mwenga akachiongozi akangalola! Mboha lunjenjema mu chindu cha kunywa, nambu mmila ngamia!
MAT 23:25 “Anamuchibhonaje bhabhola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo, mwemulitenda mwamboni! Kwa ndandi ngolola chikombi na mbale kwa kunja, na mkati jaki itweli hindu yemuipatiki kwa unyagula na wime.
MAT 23:26 Wenga wa Falisayo ngalola, ugholulaji hoti mkati ja chikombi, na kunja jaki anakubya wichu!
MAT 23:27 “Anamuchibhonaje bhabhola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo, mwemulitenda kubha mwambone! Kwa ndandi ndengini na matengeli ghaghapakakiki chokaa kwa kunja, ghabhonikana kubha manyahi, nambu mkati jaki ghatweli mahupa gha bhabhawile, na uchafu wokapi.
MAT 23:28 Bhelabhela na mwanganya nanamu, kwa kunja mbonikana na bhandu kubha mwambone, nambu mkati mtweli kukopungane mwamboni na uhakau.
MAT 23:29 “Anamuchibhonaje bhabhola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo, mwemulitenda kubha mwamboni! Kwa ndandi mghachengalela matengeli gha bhalota bhaka Chapanga, na kughapamba matengeli gha bhandu bhambone.
MAT 23:30 Kabheti mpwagha, ‘Ngati tepanu tukabhili mwandi wa akahokolu bhitu, ngatukajetanganili nabhu kubhakoma bhalota bhaka Chapanga!’
MAT 23:31 Bhela mlilandila hotuhotu kubha mwanganya nde mabhana wa bhala bhabhakomiki bhalota bhaka Chapanga!
MAT 23:32 Ena njomulyaje lihengu lela lebhakatumbwi akatati bhinu.
MAT 23:33 Mwenga chibheleku cha lijoka, na mabhana bha majoka! Bho, henu anantila bholi utemulu wa Jehanamu?
MAT 23:34 Kwa ndandi jeniheji, ndingalya, nepani nabhatuma kwinu bhalota bhaka Chapanga, na bhandu bhana mbulahu, na bhabhola. Mwehapa anamubhakomaje, na bhangi bhabhu kubhawamba punsalaba, na bhangi bhabhu kulapulika iboku mu manyumba ghinu gha kuhimangani Bhayahude, na bhangi kubhalonda pa kila muchi.
MAT 23:35 Bhela mwahi wokapi wa bhandu bhambone ghoujitiki panani ja pundema anaukubha panani ja mimutu jinu, kutumbu kujitika kwa mwahi waka Abeli, jola joakajetakaliwi palongi jaka Chapanga, mbaka mwahi waka Zakalia mwana waka Balakia, jomukankomiki pachilanda ja Nyumba jaka Chapanga na pachihanja cha nyambiku.
MAT 23:36 Numpwaghi chakaka, utemulo kwa ndandi ja bhandu bhabahkomakiki bhanihabha anauhika panani ja chibheleku chenjenu.
MAT 23:37 “Yelusalemu, Ee Yelusalemu! Weubhakoma bhalota bhaka Chapanga, na kubhalapula kwa maganga bhandu bhala bhabhatumakiki kwaku! Mala palenga nakapaliki kubhabhongana bhandu bhaku papamu, ngati bhela ingoku mojibhonganela ibhana yaki pahi ja mapapanila ghaki, nambu ngachemwapaile!
MAT 23:38 Ndingalyaje, Nyumba jaka Chapanga winu bhundeki mang'obha.
MAT 23:39 Bhela numpwaghila, ngamwimoni kabheti kutumbu sajeno, mbaka pamwipwaghaje, ‘Apengalika hoju joahika kwa lihina laka Bambo.’ ”
MAT 24:1 Yesu akabhokiki pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na paakabhi abhoka, bhabhulwa bhaki bhakanjendili kundangiha machengu gha Nyumba jaka Chapanga.
MAT 24:2 Yesu akabhayangiki, akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mughabhona ghokapi aghagha? Numpwaghi chakaka, ngalihighalili liganga panani ja liganga lelibya ngachelibombuliwe.”
MAT 24:3 Hata paakabhi atami pachitombi cha Mizeituni, bhabhulwa bhaki bhakanjendi kwa kulihiya, bhakapwaghaje, “Tupwaghilaje, bho, mambu ghanihagha ghibya lile? Na jombi nde kyani nginyulila jejilangiha kuhika kwaku, na ujomukelu wa ndema?”
MAT 24:4 Yesu akabhayangike, “Ndingalyaje, mundu ngaankolowa.
MAT 24:5 Kwa ndandi bhandu bhamaheli anabhahika kwa lihina langu, bhakapwaga, ‘Nepani nde Kristo!’ Na bhombi anabhakoluwa bhandu bhamaheli.
MAT 24:6 Nanamu mwijowana ngondu, na majojalanelu gha ngondu, ndingalya ngamwijoghopa, ndandi ghanihagha ghapalika kupitalila, nambu ujomukelu ghola wakona.
MAT 24:7 Kwa ndandi bhandu bha inchi jimu anabhabhoka kujenda kukomana na bhandu bha inchi jenge, na ukolongwa kukomana na ukolongwa ghongi, kwibya na injala, na hitamu ya kujambukila, na hinyukunyuku ya luhombe pandu patalipatali.
MAT 24:8 Ghanihagha ghokapi ghibya nde ngati utumbulilu wa mabinilu ghaka mabhu joabhi na chitumbu joapala kulibhopola mwana.”
MAT 24:9 “Chikahi chenihechi anabhung'anambukya mpata mang'ahiku na kukomakeka, nanamu mwibya bhandu bha kuhakaliwa na bhandu bha inchi yokapi kwa ndandi ja lihina langu.
MAT 24:10 Pa chikahi chenihechi bhandu bhamaheli anabhauleka uhobhalelu wabhu, na bhitenda kung'anambukana, na kuhakalilana bheni kwa bheni.
MAT 24:11 Bhalota bhamaheli bhicholi anabhapitalyaje, na kubhakolowa bhandu bhamaheli.
MAT 24:12 Kwa ndandi ja kujonjukeka mahakau, upalu wa bhandu bhamaheli anaupolaje.
MAT 24:13 Nambu joanahinakalya mbaka lichobha la kujomukela, jonihoju nde joanakengaliwaje.
MAT 24:14 Kabheti Malobhi Manyahi gha Ukolongwa waka Chapanga anaghatangazwa kwa bhandu bhokapi pundema, nahuli ubya ulandilu kwabhu, panihapa nde ujomukelu ghola pawihikaje.”
MAT 24:15 “Bhela, panihapa pamwalibhola, ‘Lihakalilu la uyonangeku,’ lela lelalongaliki na mlota Danieli, lijemiki pandu pahuhu mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga, joasoma na amanyaje!
MAT 24:16 Panihapa joabhi ku Yudea na atililaje ku hitombe.
MAT 24:17 Joabhi panani ja chihaghala cha nyumba jaki, ngaihuluka kutola chindu munyumba jake.
MAT 24:18 Joabhi kungonda na ngaikelabuka kunyuma kutola ingobhu jake.
MAT 24:19 Anabhang'ahikaje namaa akambomba bhabhabhi na hitumbu, na bhabhajongeha mu machobha ghanihagha!
MAT 24:20 Ndobhaje kwaka Chapanga, nahuli kutila kwinu ngakwikubha chikahi cha imbepu, wala Lichobha la Sabato.
MAT 24:21 Ndandi chikahi chenihechi kwibya na ulale ukolongwa, ngacheulabhali kubha kutumbu pa kubhombakeka kwa ndema mbaka lalenu, wala ngawipitalili kabheti.
MAT 24:22 Ngati Chapanga ngaakapungwizi machobha ghanihagha nga mundu jokapi joakakengaliki, nambu machobha ghanihagha ghatehi kupunguzwa kwa ndandi ja bhala bhabhahaghulike.”
MAT 24:23 “Bhela, mundu anaampwaghili, ‘Kristo abhi pambane’ au ‘Abhi pala,’ ngamwanhobhalela.
MAT 24:24 Kwa ndandi anabhapitalya aka ‘Kristo’ bha ichole na bhalota bha ichole, na bhitenda nginyulila ikolongwa na ngangachu yamaheli nahuli bhakoluwaje, anaiwezakini, hata kubhakolowa bhahaghulika bhaka Chapanga.
MAT 24:25 Njowanyaje, nyomwi kumpwaghila mangani ja chikahi kuhika mambu ghaghipitalyaje kulongi.”
MAT 24:26 “Bhela, anabhumpwaghili, ‘Ndingalyaje, Kristo abhi kulipololu,’ ngamwijenda konihoko, au ‘Ndingalyaje, alihiiki mkati,’ ngamwihobhalela.
MAT 24:27 Kwa ndandi, ngati bhela unang'anu wa chitobhi mochimulakila kuhuma kolipita lyobha mbaka kolijibhi lyobha, bhenibhela nde mokwibhelila kuhika kwaki Mwana waka Mundu.
MAT 24:28 “Pala paubhi ntuhi, panihapa nde payalibhongana ngwahe.”
MAT 24:29 “Palapala pakwijomuka kulagha kwa machobh ghanihagha, lyobha analijeghalika lwihi, lubhalamwehi ngalwinang'ani, ndondwa anaihabhukaje kuhuma kunani kumahunde, na makili gha hindu ya kunani kumahunde anaghanyuhakikaje.
MAT 24:30 Kabheti, nginyulila jaka Mwana waka Mundu anajibhonikanaje kunani kumahunde, na panihapa makabila ghokapi pundema ghitenda kuombuleza, na anabhumbona Mwana waka Mundu akahelala panani ja mahundi gha kunani kumahunde akabya na makili na ulumbalilu ukolongwa.
MAT 24:31 Sauti ngolongwa ja lipenga anajijowanikaje, najombi anaabhatuma bhatumika bhaki bha kunani kumahunde, na bhombi anabhabhongana bhandu bhahaghulika bhaki kuhuma ipambala yokapi nchechi ya ndema, kutumbula ujomukelu aghoghu wa ndema mbaka ujomukelu ghonge.”
MAT 24:32 “Kwa nkongu wa mtini mulibhola ulenganesu aghogho. Chikahi pela mahamba ghaki paghatumbu kutundulila na kupiha mahamba, mmanya kubha chikahi cha mahunu chiheghalile.
MAT 24:33 Bhelabhela nanamu pamwibhona mambu ghanihagha ghokapi ghahengakeka, mmanya kubha chikahi chibhi pambipi nakanope kuhika.
MAT 24:34 Numpwaghi chakaka, kibheleku chenjenu ngachipeti panga mambu aghagha kupitalila.
MAT 24:35 Kunani na pundema anaipetaje, nambu malobhi ghangu ngaghipeti ng'o.”
MAT 24:36 “Nambu, lichobha heli na lisaa heli, nga mundu joamanya libya lile, wala bhatumika bha kunani kumahunde, wala Mwana, nambu Atati kanjika jaki nde joamanya.
MAT 24:37 Kwa ndandi ngati mokwabheli chikahi chaka Nuhu, bhenibhela nde mokwibhelila kuhika kwaki Mwana waka Mundu.
MAT 24:38 Kwa ndandi chikahi chenichela mangani ja ndema kutwelakeka machi, bhandu bhakabhi bhakakulaje na kunywa, bhakatoghulaje na kutoghuleka, mbaka Nuhu paajingili mkati ja sitima ngolongwa jejilowakeka safina.
MAT 24:39 Ngachebhamanyi chibhi kyane mbaka machi paghatwelile pundema, na kubhajola bhokapi. Nde mokwibhelila chikahi cheanahika Mwana waka Mundu.
MAT 24:40 Chikahi chenihechi bhandu bhabheli bhibya kungonda, jumu anaatolikaji na jongi kuhighalila.
MAT 24:41 Akamabhu bhabheli bhibya bhayagha ulehi, jumu anaatolakikaje, na jongi kuhighalila.
MAT 24:42 “Bhela, mulilingalyaje na kubha tayale, kwa ndandi ngachemmanya lichobha leanahika Bambo winu.
MAT 24:43 Nambu nkombuka lijambu alele. Ngati mweni nyumba akamanyiki lichobha mwihi leanahikaje, akabya atemi mihu ikilu kelukelu, wala ngaakajilekiki nyumba jaki jibombulikaje.
MAT 24:44 Bhela, nanamu bhelabhela mbya tayale, kwa ndandi Mwana waka Mundu anahika chikahi changa kuchihobhalela.”
MAT 24:45 Yesu akajendali kupwagha, “Bho, nde nane mtumika ndongwana na mweni malangu, jola ambaju bambo waki anaambeka kubhajemalela bhandu bhaki, abhapekya chilebhi kwa chikahi chake?
MAT 24:46 Apengaliki mtumika jola, ambaju bambo waki paanahikaje anaanketanya akatenda bhenibhela.
MAT 24:47 Numpwaghi chakaka, anaambeka mtumika hoju ajemalya hindu yaki yokapi.
MAT 24:48 Nambu ngati mtumika muhakau anaalipwaghi muntima jaki, ‘Bambo wangu akabhakili kukelabhuka,’
MAT 24:49 kabheti na kutumbula kubhalapu bhatumika bhajake, akatumbula kula na kunywa papamu na bhabhalobhe uwembi,
MAT 24:50 bambo waki anahika lichobha langa kuliholalela, na lisaa langa kulimanya.
MAT 24:51 Panihapa nde anaantemula nakanopi mundu hoju, na kumbeka papamu na lipogha la akandumila kubheli, konihoku nde kwibya kulela na kuyagha mino.
MAT 25:1 “Chikahi hechi Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde anaulengana na akamwali komi, bhabhatoliki taa yabhu, na kujenda kunjopalela bambo ukwati.
MAT 25:2 Akamwali nhwanu pachilanda jabhu bhakabhi bhang'ang'a, na nhwanu bhakabhi bhabhabhi na malangu.
MAT 25:3 Bhala bhabhakabhi bhang'ang'a bhakaitoliki taa yabhu, nambu ngachebhakatoliki mahuta gha kujonjukela.
MAT 25:4 Nambu bhala bhabhabhi na malangu bhakaitoliki taa yabhu, papamu na mahuta ghangi gha kujonjukela mu makopu ghabhu.
MAT 25:5 Kwa ndandi bambo ukwati akatehi kukabhakila, akamwali bhokapi bhakatitili, na kughochela lughono.
MAT 25:6 “Nambu ikilu pamahiku, pakabhi na ngomela, ‘Njumukaje, bambo ukwati ahika, njendanya mukunjopalyaje!’
MAT 25:7 Panihapa bhakabhokiki akamwali bhokapi, na kuibheka wichu taa yabhu.
MAT 25:8 Bhang'ang'a bhala bhakabhapwaghi bhabhabhi na malangu bhala, ‘Mutupekya mahuta ghinu machokope, ndandi taa hitu ichuchuka.’
MAT 25:9 Nambu bhabhabhi na malangu bhala bhakabhayangiki, ‘Ngaghatujaghanile tepani na mwehapa. Mbanga njendanya kobhalombesa, na mkahemala ghinu.’
MAT 25:10 Bhela, pabhakabhi bhajenda kuhemela, bambo ukwati akahikiki, na akamwali bhabhakabhi tayali bhakajingili papamu naku mu ukwati, na ndyangu ukajighaliki.
MAT 25:11 “Palongi bhakahikiki akamwali bhangi bhala, na kupwagha, ‘Bambo, Bambo, utuhoghulyaje!’
MAT 25:12 Akabhayangiki, ‘Chakaka, numpwaghila, ngachenumanyi mwehapa.’ ”
MAT 25:13 Bhela Yesu akapwaghike, “Mulilingalyaje, maghambu ngachemmanyi lichobha wala lisaa leanahikaje Mwana waka Mundu.
MAT 25:14 “Chikahi chenihechi Ukolongwa wa kunani kumahunde wibya ngati ulenganesu waka mundu joapala kutenda mwanja. Akabhalohiki bhatumika bhaki, na kubhapekeha hindu yaki.
MAT 25:15 Akumpeki kila jumu kulengana na uwezu waki, jumu akumpeki mbija talanta unhwanu, jongi mbija talanta ibheli, jongi mbija talanta jimu, na mweni kubhoka.
MAT 25:16 Jola joakapatiki mbija talanta unhwanu akapiti, akaihengi lihengu, na kupata nyonjeka mbija talanta yengi unhwanu.
MAT 25:17 Jola joakapatiki mbija talanta ibeli najombi akahengiki bhelabhela, na kupata nyonjeka ibheli.
MAT 25:18 Nambu jola joakapatiki mbija talanta jimu jola akapiti kuhyelalela pahi, na kuhiya mbija jaka nkolongwa waki.
MAT 25:19 “Paghapetiki machobha ghamaheli bambo wa bhatumika jola akahikiki, na kuhenga mabhalanganilu nabhu.
MAT 25:20 Mtumika joakapatiki mbija talanta unhwanu jola akahikiki, na kuleta mbija talanta unhwanu nakanopi. Akapwaghiki, ‘Bambo, ukabhekiki kwangu mbija talanta unhwanu. Lingalya, pambani ibhi mbija talanta unhwanu nakanopi ja nyonjeka jembatike.’
MAT 25:21 Bambo waki akumpwaghile, ‘Uhengiki wichu namaa, mtumika wambone na undongwana. Ubhi undongwana kwa mambu machoku, ananukupekya lujiniku lwa kujemalela hindu yamaheli. Ujingalaje na uhekalya papamu na bambo waku.’
MAT 25:22 “Jola joakajopali mbija talanta ibeli najombi akahikiki, na kupwagha, ‘Bambo, ukabhekiki kwangu mbija talanta ibeli. Lingalya, pambani ibhi mbija talanta ibeli ya nyonjeka jembatike.’
MAT 25:23 Bambo waki akumpwaghile, ‘Uhengiki wichu namaa, mtumika wambone na undongwana. Ubhi undongwana kwa mambu machoku, ananukupekya lujiniku lwa kujemalela hindu yamaheli. Ujingalaje na uhekalya papamu na bambo waku!’
MAT 25:24 “Jola joakajopalile mbija talanta jimu akahikiki, na kupwagha, ‘Bambo, nakamanyiki kubha wehapa nde wa mundu weunonwipe, uhuna panga kupanda, na ubhongana panga kupechangana imbeju.
MAT 25:25 Bhela nakajowipi, na kujihiya mbija jaku pahi ja luhombi. Utolaje, jenjenu nde mbija jaku.’
MAT 25:26 “Bambo waki akayangiki, ‘Wehapa nde wa mtumika muhakau na unkata. Umanyi kubha nepani nihuna panga kupanda, na kubhongana panga kupechangana.
MAT 25:27 Bhela ikakupaliki ubheka mbija jangu kwa bhandu bhabhabhoha nyonjeka, nanatu panakahikaje nakapata jejibhi jangu na nyonjeka jaki.
MAT 25:28 Henu, munyaghula mbija heji, na mumpekya jola joabhi nayu mbija komi.
MAT 25:29 Kwa ndandi kila joabhi na chindu anaajonjukiwaje, na kujonjukewa nakanopi. Nambu jola jwangakubha na chindu, hata chela cheabhi nachu anaanyaghulikaje.
MAT 25:30 Mtumika jola jwanga na nyonjeka, mundekala kunja mu lwihi. Konihoku anakubya chilelu na kuyagha mino.’
MAT 25:31 “Chikahi Mwana waka Mundu paanahikaje ngati nkolongwa mu lujiniku lwaki, na bhatumika bhahuhu bhokapi bha kunani kumahunde, panihapa nde paitama pachitehu cha ukolongwa cha ulumbalilu waki.
MAT 25:32 Bhandu bha inchi yokapi bhalibongana palongi jaki, najombi anaabhalekanisha ngati mdima moalekanashe mambelele na imbuhi yaki.
MAT 25:33 Anaaghabheka mambelele ku chiwoku chaki cha kumalelelu, na imbuhi ku chiwoku chaki cha kumangeja.
MAT 25:34 Panihapa Nkolongwa anaabhapwaghila bhala bhabhabhi ku chiwoku chaki cha kumalelelu, ‘Muhikaje, mwehapa mwempengaliki na Atati wangu, mpwelila ukolongwa ghombekakiwi tayale kutumbu kubhombakeka kwa ndema.
MAT 25:35 Kwa ndandi nakabhi na injala, mkambeki chilebhe. Nakabhi na inywita, mkangengiki machi. Nakabhi nungeni, mkangalibishe.
MAT 25:36 Nakabhi heu, mkanhwatiki ingobhu. Nakabhi nuntamwa, mkahikiki kunilola. Nakabhi muchifungu, mkahikite.’
MAT 25:37 “Panihapa bhandu bhambone anabhumpwaghila, ‘Bambo, bho, lichobha bhole patukuweni ubhi na injala, tukakulehike, au ukabya na inywita, tukakukengiki machi?
MAT 25:38 Bho, kabheti lile patukuweni ukabya ungeni, tukakukalibishe, au ukabya heu, tukakuwatiki ingobhu?
MAT 25:39 Bho, lile kabheti patukuweni ukabya untamwa, au ukabya muchifungu, tukakuhikile kukubhona?’
MAT 25:40 Nkolongwa akayangiki, ‘Numpwaghila, chakaka, kila chindu chemukamhengi jumu wa bhalongu bhangu bhachoku abhabha, mkanihengi nepani!’
MAT 25:41 “Bhela akabhapwaghi bhala bhabhabhi ku chiwoku chaki cha kumangeja, ‘Mbokanya kwangu mwehapa mwempatiki masolu. Njendanya mu moto wa mileli ghoabhekakiwi Shetani papamu na bhatumika bhaki.
MAT 25:42 Kwa ndandi nakabhi na injala, ngachemwambeki chilebhe. Nakabhi na inywita, ngachemwangengiki machi.
MAT 25:43 Nakabhi nungeni, ngachemwangalibishe. Nakabhi heu, ngachemwanhwatiki ingobhu. Nakabhi nuntamwa, na muchifungo, ngachemwahikiki kunilola.’
MAT 25:44 “Panihapa na bhombi bhiyangaje, ‘Bambo, bho lichobha bhole patukuweni wehapa ukabya na injala, au ukabya na inywita, au ukabya ungeni, au ukabya heu, au ukabya umtamwa, au ukabya muchifungo, na tepanu ngachetukakujangatile?’
MAT 25:45 Nkolongwa akabhayangiki, ‘Chakaka numpwaghila, kila pankanika kumuhengela mambu aghagha jumu wabhu wa bhachoku abhabha, mkakaniki kunihengela nepani.’
MAT 25:46 Bhombi anabhajenda kujingila mu mang'ahiku gha mileli, nambu bhandu bhambone bhala anabhajenda mu womi wa mileli.”
MAT 26:1 Yesu paakajomwi kulonge mambu ghanihagha ghokapi, akabapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki,
MAT 26:2 “Mmanyi kubha machobha ghabheli ghaghahika kwibya na Uwangalalu wa Pasaka, na Mwana waka Mundu anaabhohakikaje nahuli awambakikaje punsalaba.”
MAT 26:3 Chikahi hechi bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, bhalemba, na bhazee bha bhandu, bhakalibhongini paliwangala laka mpenganyambiku nkolongwa, lihina laki Kayafa.
MAT 26:4 Bhakajetanganili papamu ntundu wa kunkamula Yesu kwa kulihiya, na bhunkomaje.
MAT 26:5 Nambu bhakapwaghiki, “Ngaikubha chikahi cha uwangalalu la pasaka, ngakwihika kupitalila fujo pachilanda ja bhandu.”
MAT 26:6 Chikahi Yesu paakabhi ku Besania, kunyumba jaka Simoni joakabhi na chitamu cha malohi,
MAT 26:7 akahikiki mbomba jumu akabya anyamwi libotolu lelalenganakiki kwa liganga la alabasta lelibhi na mahuta gha mbija jamaheli, na kughajitila pamutu jaka Yesu koni akabya atami pa chilebhe.
MAT 26:8 Bhabhulwa bhaka Yesu pabhaweni, bhakahakalili na kupwagha, “Bho, maghambu kiki kuhobheha manungilu aghagha waka?”
MAT 26:9 “Manungilu aghagha ghakabya ghalombasiki kwa mbija jamaheli, na kubhapekeha bhahochu mbija yene!”
MAT 26:10 Yesu akamanyi maholalelu ghabhu, akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mbona mung'aha mbomba ajoju? Anihengi lijambu lamboni namaa.
MAT 26:11 Kwa ndandi bhahochu mbi nabhu papamu machobha ghokapi, nambu nepanu ngangubhi papamu na mwehapa machobha ghokapi.
MAT 26:12 Kwa ndandi kwa kunyitalila hyegha jangu mahuta ghaghanungi wichu aghagha, ahengiki bhenibhela kwa kujilenganakela yegha jangu kwa kutaghakika kwangu.
MAT 26:13 Numpwaghi chakaka, pandu pokapi Malobhi Manyahi paghitangazwaje pundema wokapi, lihengu aleli leahengiki mbomba ajoju anabhaliloghulaje kwa kunkomboka jombi.”
MAT 26:14 Bhela Yuda Isikalioti, jumu wa bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli bhala, akapiti kwa bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa,
MAT 26:15 na kupwagha, “Bho, anambekya chindu bhole, ngati ananumpeki Yesu kwinu?” Bhakambalangili ipandi selasini ya madini gha feza.
MAT 26:16 Kutumbu chikahi chenihechi, Yuda akabhi alonda mbekenyu ja kung'anambuka Yesu.
MAT 26:17 Lichobha la kutumbula la Uwangalalu wa Mabumunda Gangakujegaleka Amila, bhabhulwa bhakapiti kwaka Yesu na kundalukila, “Bho, upala tukakuandalya kwaku chilebhi cha Pasaka?”
MAT 26:18 Yesu akayangiki, “Njendanya kumbwane kwaka mundu jumu, mukumpwaghilaje, ‘Mbola apwagha, chikahi changu chiheghalile, anangula Pasaka kwaku papamu na bhabhulwa bhangu kunyumba jako.’ ”
MAT 26:19 Bhabhulwa bhakahengiki ngati Yesu moakabhalagalakile, bhakaandi chilebhi cha Pasaka.
MAT 26:20 Pakukabhi pakamihi, Yesu akatami kula chilebhi papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki komi na bhabheli bhala.
MAT 26:21 Pabakabhi bhakula, Yesu akapwaghite, “Numpwaghi chakaka, jumu winu anaaning'anambukaje.”
MAT 26:22 Bhabhulwa bhala ukabhakabiniki ntima namaa, na bhakatumbwi kundalukila jumu jumu, “Bambo, bho, nepani lelo?”
MAT 26:23 Yesu akayangiki, “Jola joatobhalile libumunda papamu na nepani mu chikombe, jonihoju nde joaning'anambukaje.
MAT 26:24 Mwana waka Mundu ajenda ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, nambu anaachibhonaje mundu jola joang'anambuka Mwana waka Mundu! Ikabya mbanga kwaka mundu hoju ngati ngaakabhelakike.”
MAT 26:25 Yuda, jola joang'anambwiki, akundalukile, “Mbola, bho, nepani lelo?” Yesu akayangiki, “Wehapa ujomwi kupwagha.”
MAT 26:26 Pabhakabhi bhakula, Yesu akatoliki libumunda, akalipengalili, akalihekiki, na kubhapekeha bhabhulwa bhaki, akapwagha, “Mtolaje, mkulaje, jenjenu nde hyegha jangu.”
MAT 26:27 Akachitoliki chikombi, akunchengwi Chapanga, na kubhapekeha, akapwagha, “Mkunywaje mabhokapi mu chikombi chenjenu,
MAT 26:28 kwa ndandi ghongoni nde mwahi wangu wa Lulaghilu lwa chakaka, mwahi ghoujitika kwa ndandi ja kubhoha mahoku gha bhandu bhamaheli.
MAT 26:29 Nambu numpwaghila, ngangunywi kabheti divai ja zabibu, mbaka lichobha lela panikunywa divai jahenu papamu na mwehapa mu Ukolongwa wa Atati wangu.”
MAT 26:30 Pabhakajomwi kujemba nyembu ja kundumbali Chapanga, bhakapitiki kunja na kujenda ku Chitombi cha Mizeituni.
MAT 26:31 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Lalenu ikilu mwehapa mabhokapi anamndilaje, kwa ndandi Malembu Mahuhu ghapwagha, ‘Ananundapula mdima, na mambeleli gha lipogha ghitenda kupechangana.’
MAT 26:32 Nambu ananyomwi kuhyoka, ananundongulya kujenda ku Galilaya.”
MAT 26:33 Petulu akayangiki, “Hata ngati bhokapi anabhakulekiki, nepanu nganakuleki ng'o.”
MAT 26:34 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Nukupwaghi chakaka, wehapa, ikilu ja lalenu mangani ja kubheka likongobhe, wingana mala patatu.”
MAT 26:35 Petulu akayangiki, “Hata ngati imbalika kupotela papamu na wehapa, nganakuleki ng'o.” Na bhabhulwa bhokapi bhakapwaghiki bhelabhela.
MAT 26:36 Bhela Yesu akapiti papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki mbaka pandu papalowakeka Gethemane, na kubhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Mtamanya pambane, nepanu nyenda palongi nakanopi kundobha Chapanga.”
MAT 26:37 Akuntoliki Petulu papamu na bhana bhabheli bhaka Zebedayo, na akatumbwi kubha na mabhinilu na kungajika.
MAT 26:38 Panihapa akabhapwaghile, “Mi na mabhinilu makolongwa muntima jangu hata pambipi kupotela. Ntamanya pambani na mkeshaje papamu na nepani.”
MAT 26:39 Bhela akajendali palongi pachokopi, akaabwiki ukutama, na kundobha Chapanga, akapwagha, “Atati wangu, ngati anaiwezikana, chikombi chenjenu cha mang'ahiku chimbetaje. Nambu ngakwikubha ngati mombalila nepanu, nambu ngati moupali wehapa.”
MAT 26:40 Akakelawiki kwa bhabhulwa bhala, na kubhahimani bhaghochile. Akumpwaghi Petulu, “Bho, ngachemwaweziki kutama mihu na nepanu hata lisaa limu?
MAT 26:41 Mtama mihu, na mlobhaje ngamwihika kujingi mu malengakeku. Roho jipala nambu hyegha ngachejibhi na makili.”
MAT 26:42 Yesu akapiti kabheti pakabheli kundobha Chapanga, “Atati wangu, anangati ngacheiwezikana chikombi achechi cha mang'ahiku chimbetaje pangakunywelela, mapalu ghaku ghapitalyaje.”
MAT 26:43 Akakelabwiki kabheti, na kubhahimani bhaghochile, kwa ndandi mihu ghabhu ghakatweli lughono.
MAT 26:44 Akabhalekiki kabheti, na kujenda kundobha Chapanga pakatatu, koni akapwagha malobhi ghalaghala.
MAT 26:45 Bhela akakelabwiki kabheti kwa bhabhulwa bhaki, na kubhapwaghila, “Bho, mwakali kughochela na kupomulela? Mlingalya, chikahi chihikite, na Mwana waka Mundu anaajeghalika mu mabhoku gha bhabhabhi na mahoku.
MAT 26:46 Njumukaje, na tumbokanyaje. Ndingalya, jola joaying'anambukaje ahika!”
MAT 26:47 Bhela, Yesu paakabhi akali kulongela nabhu, palapala akahikiki Yuda, jumu wa bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli bhala. Papamu naku lakabhi lipogha likolongwa bhanyamwi mapanga na indonga, bhakabya bhahumiki kwa bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhazee bha bhandu.
MAT 26:48 Jola joapalika kung'anambuka Yesu jola akajomwi kubhapekeha nginyulila kubha, “Jola jonambuswaje, jonihoju nde jombi, munkamulaje!”
MAT 26:49 Bhela, Yuda akamuheghali Yesu, na kupwagha, “Monile, Mbola!” Na kumbusu.
MAT 26:50 Yesu akamuyangiki, “Nkoche, uhenga lela leuhiki kulihenga.” Panihapa bhandu bhala bhakapiti, na kuhatambula mabhoku ghabhu, na kunkamula na kunkonga.
MAT 26:51 Lingalya, jumu wa bhala bhabhakabhi papamu na Yesu akaholapwi lipanga laki, na kundapula mtumika waka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa, na kuncheku likutu.
MAT 26:52 Panihapa Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ukelabhuha lipanga laku pandu paki. Kwa ndandi jokapi joatumi lipanga, anaapotila kwa lipanga.
MAT 26:53 Bho, uholake kubha nepanu ngachenhweza kundobha Atati wangu, najombi akabya anetile sajenu manjolinjoli mapogha komi na ghabheli nakanopi gha bhatumika bha kunani kwaka Chapanga?
MAT 26:54 Nambu ngati ananhengiki bhenibhela, bho, anaghapitalya bhole Malembu Mahuhu ghala ghaghapwagha kubha ipalika mambu aghagha ghapitalyaje?”
MAT 26:55 Chikahi hechi Yesu akabhapwaghi lipogha la bhandu bhabhakahikiki kunkamula, “Bho, muhikiki kungamula kwa mapanga na indonga ngati nepani nde mnyaghula? Machobha ghokapi ndamika mu liwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga koni nakabholaje, na ngachemwangamwile.
MAT 26:56 Nambu mambu aghagha ghokapi ghahengakiki, nahuli Malembu Mahuhu gha bhalota bhaka Chapanga ghapitalyaje.” Panihapa bhabhulwa bhokapi bhakundekiki, na kutila.
MAT 26:57 Bhela, bhabhunkamwi Yesu bhakumpeliki kunyumba jaka Kayafa, joakabhi Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa, kobhakabhii bhalibhongini bhalemba na bhazee bha bhandu.
MAT 26:58 Nambu Petulu akunjengalili cha kutali mbaka pa liwangala laka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa, akajingi mkati, na kutama papamu na bhalonda, nahuli alola mambu moghijomukyaje.
MAT 26:59 Bhela, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, papamu na chengu chokapi, bhakalondiki ulandilu wa icholi panani jaka Yesu, nahuli bhapata kunkoma,
MAT 26:60 nambu ngachebhakuweni ulandilu wokapi, hata koni bhakahikiki bhalandilu bhamaheli bha icholi. Pakujomukela bhakahikiki bhalandila bhabheli,
MAT 26:61 na kupwagha, “Mundu ajoju akapwaghiki, ‘Nhweza kujibombo Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na kujichenga kabheti kwa machobha ghatatu.’ ”
MAT 26:62 Henu Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa akajemiki, na kundaluki Yesu, “Bho, ngacheuyanga lilobhi? Bho, bhandu abhabha bhukutaki kyani panani jaku?”
MAT 26:63 Nambu Yesu akatumbi chinunu. Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa akumpwaghile, “Nukulapisha kwaka Chapanga joabhi mwome, utupwaghilaje ngati wehapa nde wa Kristo, Mwana waka Chapanga.”
MAT 26:64 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Wehapa upwaghite. Nambu numpwaghila, kutumbu sajenu anamumbona Mwana waka Mundu atemi ku chiwoku cha kumalelelu chaka Chapanga mwene makili, na akahika panani ja mahundi gha kunani kumahunde.”
MAT 26:65 Panihapa Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa akakachwili ingobhu yaki, koni akapwagha, “Atehi kutondola! Bho, tupala kabheti ulandilu ghongi wa kyane? Sajenu njowini kutondoka kwaki.
MAT 26:66 Bho, mwanganya muholale bhole?” Bhombi bhakayangiki, “Impalika kupotela.”
MAT 26:67 Panihapa bhakamuhuni imata kumihu, bhakundapwi ngumi, na bhangi bhakumbangwi maghanja,
MAT 26:68 koni bhakapwaghaje, “We Kristo, ulotilaje, bho, nane joakulapwile?”
MAT 26:69 Petulu akabhi atemi kunja kuliwangala. Mtumika jumu wa chimbomba akunjendili, na kupwagha, “Wehapa nanau ukabhi papamu na Yesu wa ku Galilaya.”
MAT 26:70 Petulu akakaniki palongi ja bhandu bhokapi, koni akapwagha, “Ngachenimanyi cheulongela.”
MAT 26:71 Paakabhi apita pundyangu, mtumika jongi wa chimbomba akumbweni, na akabhapwaghi bhandu bhabhakabhi panihapa, “Mundu ajoju akabhi papamu na Yesu wa ku Nazaleti.”
MAT 26:72 Petulu akakaniki kabheti kwa kulapa, “Ngachenummanyi mundu ajoju.”
MAT 26:73 Palongi pachokopi, bhandu bhabhakabhi panipala bhakunjendi Petulu, na kumpwaghila, “Chakaka, wehapa nde jumu wabhu, kwa ndandi hata kulongela kwaku kukulangiha.”
MAT 26:74 Panihapa Petulu akatumbwi kusola na kulapa, koni akapwagha, “Ngachenummanyi mundu hoju.” Palapala likongobhi likabekite.
MAT 26:75 Petulu akalikombwiki lilobhi lela leakalongi Yesu, “Mangani ja likongobhi kubheka, wingana mala patatu.” Bhela akapitiki kunja, na kulela kwa mabhinilu.
MAT 27:1 Pakwahiki lukela, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, na bhazee bha bhandu bhakahimangini kulongela nahuli bhapata kunkoma Yesu.
MAT 27:2 Bhakunkongiki minyololu, bhakuntoliki na kumpeleka kwaka Pilato, nkolongwa wa Kiloma.
MAT 27:3 Panihapa Yuda, jola joakang'anambwike, paakaweni kubha bhajomwi kuntemula Yesu, ukambiniki mtima namaa, akabhakelabhuki bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhazee ipandi selasini ya madini gha feza yela,
MAT 27:4 koni akapwagha, “Ndehi mahoku kwa kung'anambuka mundu jwanga na lihakau.” Nambu bhombi bhakayangike, “Bho, tepani tutenda kike? Leniheli umanya wamwete.”
MAT 27:5 Yuda akaileki ipandi ya madini gha feza yela pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, akabokiki, na kujenda kulikongela.
MAT 27:6 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa bhakaitoliki ipandi ya mbjija yela, na kupwagha, “Ngacheipalika kuibheka mu chikoku cha nyambiku, kwa ndandi nde mbija yeipatakini kwa kukoma.”
MAT 27:7 Bhela bhakajetanganili, na bhakaitumi kwa kuhemela ngonda wa lutopi, lubya pandu pa kubhataghi bhaghene.
MAT 27:8 Nde ndandi mbaka lalenu ngonda hoghu ulowakeka, “Ngonda wa mwahi.”
MAT 27:9 Panihapa nde ghakapitali malobhi ghaka mlota Yelemia, “Bhakaitoliki ipandi selasini ya mbija, malepu ghaka jola ambaju Bhaizilaeli bhakajetakili kulepa,
MAT 27:10 na kuitumila kwa kuhemela ngonda wa lutopi, ngati Bambo moakalaghalakile.”
MAT 27:11 Yesu akajemiki palongi jaka nkolongwa wa ku Loma joakabhi nkolongwa wa mkoa. Bhela nkolongwa hoju akundalukile, “Bho, wehapa le unkolongwa wa Bhayahude?” Yesu akamuyangiki, “Wehapa upwaghike.”
MAT 27:12 Nambu bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa papamu na bhazee, pabhakuntakile ngacheakayangiki lilobhi.
MAT 27:13 Panihapa Pilato akumpwaghile, “Bho, ngacheujowana mambu ghanihagha ghokapi ghabhukutaki nagho?”
MAT 27:14 Nambu Yesu ngacheakayangiki lilobhi hata limu, na nkolongwa wa ku Loma hoju akakangichi namaa.
MAT 27:15 Bhela kila chikahi cha Uwangalalu wa Pasaka, nkolongwa wa Kiloma akabhi na ntetu wa kumbopulela mkongeka jumu jobhumpala bhandu.
MAT 27:16 Chikahi hechi akabhi mkongeka jumu joakamanyakini namaa, lihina laki Balaba.
MAT 27:17 Bhela pabhakalibhongini, Pilato akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mpala numbopulya nane? Numbopulya Balaba, au Yesu joalowakeka Kristo?”
MAT 27:18 Kwa ndandi akamanyiki kubha bhakundetiki Yesu kwaki kwa ndandi ja wihu wa bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude.
MAT 27:19 Chikahi Pilato paakatemi pachitehu chaki cha utemulu, nhwanu waki akumpelaki ubholu, na kumpwaghila, “Ngawikubha na lilobhi lokapi lela na mundu wambone. Kwa ndandi lalenu ng'ahakiki namaa mu ndoto kwa ndandi jaki.”
MAT 27:20 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa papamu na bhazee bhakabhapwaghi lipogha la bhandu nahuli bhunjopa Balaba abhopuliwaje, na bhunkoma Yesu.
MAT 27:21 Pilato akabhalalukile, “Bho, mpala numbopulya nane pachilanda ja bhabheli abhabha?” Bhakayangiki, “Balaba.”
MAT 27:22 Pilato akabhalalukile, “Bho, henu nhenga kiki na Yesu joalowakeka Kristo?” Bhokapi bhakayangiki, “Unhwambaje punsalaba!”
MAT 27:23 Nambu Pilato akabhalalukile, “Bho, kwa ndandi ja kike? Bho, ahengiki lihoku bhole?” Nambu bhombi bhakajendali kujamalila, koni bhakapwaghaje, “Unhwambaje punsalaba!”
MAT 27:24 Bhela Pilato paakaweni kubha njeta chindu chengi cheaweza kutenda, na njobhela ijonjukeka, akatoliki machi, na kuchamba mabhoku ghaki palongi ja lipogha lokapi, koni akapwaghaje, “Nepani ngachemi na lihoku panani ja mwahi waka mundu ajoju wambone, mmanya mabhete!”
MAT 27:25 Bhandu bhokapi bhakayangiki, bhakapwaghaje, “Mwahi waki na ubya panani jitu, na panani ja bhana bhitu!”
MAT 27:26 Panihapa akabhabhopuli Balaba, na paakalaghalaki Yesu bhundapula iboku, akumbohiki nahuli awambakikaje punsalaba.
MAT 27:27 Panihapa manjolinjoli bhaka Pilato bhakumpeliki Yesu mu nyumba ja kikolongwa jaka Pilato, na kulibhongana manjolinjoli bhokapi kumuyongolota Yesu.
MAT 27:28 Bhakamuhuliki ingobhu yaki, na kumuwatika ingobhu jikeli ngati nkolongwa.
MAT 27:29 Bhakalokiki litaji la miha, bhakunhwatiki pamutu jaki, na kumbekela ndahi mu chiwoku chaki cha kumalelelu. Bhakachikimi palongi jaki, bhakundongimi, bhakapwaghaje, “Monile, Unkolongwa wa Bhayahude!”
MAT 27:30 Bhakunhuni imata, bhakautoliki ndahi ghola, na kundapula naghu pamutu.
MAT 27:31 Pabhakajomwi kundongama, bhakajihuliki ingobhu jela, bhakamuwatiki ingobhu jaki, na kumpeleka kumuwamba punsalaba.
MAT 27:32 Pabhakabhi bhajenda, bhakumbweni mundu jumu Mkilene, lihina laki Simoni. Jonihoju bhakuntwekiki msalaba waka Yesu kwa makili.
MAT 27:33 Pabhakahikiki pandu papalowakeka Goligota, ndandi jaki, Lifuvu la Mmutu,
MAT 27:34 bhakumpeki Yesu kunywa divai jejihangaghini na chindu chibhabha. Nambu jombi paakajionjiki, akakaniki kunywa.
MAT 27:35 Pabhakajomwi kunhwamba punsalaba, bhakaghabhini ingobhu yaki, kwa kuilapulila kula. Nahuli ghapitalya malobhi ghaakapwaghiki mlota waka Chapanga, “Bhakaghabhini ingobhu yangu ya kunja, na kanzu jangu ja mkati bhakajilapuli kula.”
MAT 27:36 Bhela bhakatemi pahi, koni bhakabya bhundenda.
MAT 27:37 Panani ja mmutu waki, punsalaba, bhakalembiki litakilu laki, “Ajoju nde Yesu, Nkolongwa wa Bhayahude.”
MAT 27:38 Chikahi chenihechi bhakongeka bhabheli bhanyaghula bhakawambakiki papamu na Yesu, jumu ku chiwoku chaki cha kumalelelu, na jongi ku chiwoku chaki cha kumangeja.
MAT 27:39 Bhandu bhabhakabhi bhapeta mwindela bhakuntondwile, koni bhakanyuha mimutu jabhu, na kupwagha.
MAT 27:40 “Wehapa, weupwaghika uweza kujiyonanga Nyumba jaka Chapanga na kuchenga kwa machobha ghatatu, ulikengalya wamwete. Ana ngati wehapa wa Mwana waka Chapanga, uhuluka punsalaba hapa!”
MAT 27:41 Bhelabhela, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa papamu na bhalemba bha Shelia na bhazee, bhakundongimi bhakapwaghaje,
MAT 27:42 “Akabhakengali bhangi, nambu ngacheaweza kulikengalela mweni. Ana ngati jombi nde Nkolongwa wa Izilaeli, ahuluka punsalaba, na tepanu anatunhobhalyaje!
MAT 27:43 Anhobhale Chapanga, na kupwagha eti jombi nde Mwana waka Chapanga, bhela Chapanga ankengalya sajenu, ngati anaampala.”
MAT 27:44 Bhanyaghula bhabhawambakiki papamu naku bhala, bhakuntondwi kwa indela jejeji.
MAT 27:45 Kutumbu chikahi cha saa sita mbaka saa tisa, inchi jokapi jakabhi lwihi.
MAT 27:46 Ngati saa tisa, Yesu akajamalili sauti jaki kwa makili, akapwagha, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” Ndandi jaki, “Chapanga wangu, Chapanga wangu, mbona unehile?”
MAT 27:47 Nambu bhandu bhakumu bhala bhabhakabhi bhajemani panihapa, pabhakajowini ghanihagha, bhakapwaghite, “Andoha Eliya!”
MAT 27:48 Jumu wabhu akakembili imbelu, akatoliki siponji, na kujitwelakela divai jejilolike, na kujibheka pandahi na kumpekeha akunywaje.
MAT 27:49 Bhandu bhangi bhakapwaghiki, “Lendalya, tulolaje ana ngati Eliya ahika kunkengalela!”
MAT 27:50 Yesu paakajamalili kabheti kwa sauti ngolongwa, akahekiti roho jaki.
MAT 27:51 Palapala lipazia la Nyumba jaka Chapanga likakachwiki ipandi ibhele, kutumbu kunani mbaka pahi. Ndema ukanyukike, na maganga ghakakajwike,
MAT 27:52 matengeli ghakahogwike, na hyegha yamaheli ya bhandu bhaka Chapanga bhabhakapotile bhakahyokite.
MAT 27:53 Bhabhakapitiki mumatengeli, paakajomwi Yesu kuhyoka, bhakapiti kujingila mu Muchi Uhuhu, na kubhonikana na bhandu bhamaheli.
MAT 27:54 Bhela nkolongwa wa manjolinjoli na bhala bhabhakabhi bhundenda Yesu, pabhakaweni kunyukanyuka kwa ndema, na mambu ghaghahengakike, bhakajowipi namaa, bhakapwaghaje, “Chakaka, mundu ajoju akabhi Mwana waka Chapanga!”
MAT 27:55 Pakabhi na akambomba bhamaheli panipala bhakalingalya cha kutali. Bhanihabha nde bhala bhabhunjengalya Yesu kuhuma ku Galilaya, na kuntumakila.
MAT 27:56 Papu akabhi Malia Magidalena, Malia mabhu waka Yakobo na Yusufu, na nhwanu waka Zebedayo.
MAT 27:57 Pakwahiki pakamihi, akahikiki mundu jumu mwana hindu yamaheli mwenei wa ku Alimataya, lihina laki Yusufu. Jonihoju najombi akabhi mbulwa waka Yesu.
MAT 27:58 Yusufu akapiti kwaka Pilato, na kunjopa ampekya hyegha jaka Yesu. Bhela Pilato akalaghalaki antolaje.
MAT 27:59 Yusufu akajitoliki hyegha jaka Yesu, na kujiyongalowa ingobhu jinyahi jihuhu,
MAT 27:60 na kujibheka hyegha mulitengeli laki Yusufu lahenu, leakabhi alilenganaki paliganga. Akahingali liganga likolongwa pandyangu wa litengeli, na mweni kubhoka.
MAT 27:61 Panipala akabhi Malia Magidalena, na Malia jongi jola, bhakabhi bhatemi palongi ja litengeli.
MAT 27:62 Chilabhu jaki, yani lichobha la kabheli baada ja Lichobha la Maandaliu gha Lichobha la Sabato, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, na Mafalisayo bhakunjendi Pilato,
MAT 27:63 bhakapwaghike, “Nkolongwa, tukombwiki kubha mpuhi jola akapwaghike, ‘Paghipeta machobha ghatatu anahyokaje.’
MAT 27:64 Bhela ulaghalakya litengeli lilendakika wichu mbaka lichobha la katatu, ngabhihika bhabhulwa bhaki kunjibha, na kubhapwaghi bhandu kubha ahyokiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa. Upuhi wa kujomukela anaupeta ghola wa kutumbula.”
MAT 27:65 Pilato akabhapwaghile, “Mbi na bhalenda, njendanya mkalilenda wichu ngati mommanyila.”
MAT 27:66 Bhakapiti, bhakalilendiki litengeli wichu, kwa kulijeghela liganga la pundyangu lela alama, na kubhabheka manjolinjoli bhalendaje.
MAT 28:1 18 Palapetiki Lichobha la Sabato, lukela pachiwombu lichobha lela la Jumapile, Malia Magidalena, na Malia jongi jola bhakapiti kulibhona litengeli.
MAT 28:2 Palapala pakapitali chinyukunyuku chikolongwa cha ndema, kwa ndandi mtumika wa kunani waka Bambo akahelile kuhuma kunani kumahunde, akalihingali liganga la pundyangu lela, na kulitamila panani.
MAT 28:3 Sula jaki jakabhi ngati unang'anu wa chitobhi, na ingobhu yaki ihuhu kupukupu.
MAT 28:4 Bhalonda bha litengeli bhala pabhakumbweni bhakabhaghiji kwa choghohi, na kubha ngati bhabhapotile.
MAT 28:5 Mtumika wa kunani kwaka Chapanga jola akabhapwaghi akambomba bhala, “Mwehapa ngamwijogopa! Kwa ndandi manyi kubha mundonda Yesu, joakawambakike punsalaba.
MAT 28:6 Ngacheabhi pambane, kwa ndandi ahyokike ngati moakapwaghile. Muhikaje pambani mupabhona pandu pabhakungoniki Bambo.
MAT 28:7 Bhela njendanya manyata, mkabhapwaghila bhabhulwa bhaki, ‘Ahyokiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa. Lingalyaje, sajenu andongulela kujenda ku Galilaya, konihoku nde komwakumbonaje.’ Haya, nyomwi kumpwaghila.”
MAT 28:8 Bhakabhokiki manyata kuhuma palitengeli, kwa choghohi na chiheku chamaheli, na kubhutuka imbelu kubhapwaghila bhabhulwa bhaki.
MAT 28:9 Palapala Yesu akahimangini nabhu, akapwaghaje, “Lukwali lubya na mwehapa!” Akambomba bhala bhakunheghalili, bhakachikimi na kunkamula magholu, na kunjojabhela.
MAT 28:10 Panihapa Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ngamwijoghopa, njendanya mkabhapwaghila bhalongu bhangu bhajenda ku Galilaya, konihoku nde kobhakamonaje.”
MAT 28:11 Akambomba bhala pabhakabhi bhajenda, lingalyaje, bhalonda bha litengeli bhakumu bhakajingi mumbwane, na kubhapwaghi bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa mambu ghokapi ghaghahengakike.
MAT 28:12 Bhela, bhakalibhongini papamu na bhazee, na pabhakalongalanile, bhakabhapeki manjolinjoli bhala mbija yamaheli,
MAT 28:13 bhakapwaghaje, “Mabhanganya mpwagha kubha, ‘Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakahikiki ikilu, na kunjibha chikahi tepani patwaghochile.’
MAT 28:14 Ngati nkolongwa anaajowini malobhi ghangane, tepani anatulongila naku, na mwehapa ngamwipati mang'ahiku ghokapi ghala.”
MAT 28:15 Bhela bhakaitoliki mbija hyela, na kuhenga ngati mobhabholakike. Lilobhi leniheli lakajaghani pachilanda ja Bhayahude mbaka lalenu.
MAT 28:16 Bhabhulwa komi na jumu bhala bhakapiti ku Galilaya, mbaka ku chitombi chela cheakabhalaghalaki Yesu.
MAT 28:17 Pabhakumbweni bhakunjojabhile. Nambu bhakumu bhabhu bhakabhili na choghoi.
MAT 28:18 Yesu akabhaheghalili na kubhapwaghila, “Mbekiwi lujiniku lwokapi kunani kumahunde na pundema.
MAT 28:19 Bhela, njendanya mkabhabhola bhandu bha pundema wokapi bhakubha bhabhulwa bhangu, koni mkabhabatizaje kwa lihina la Atati, na laka Mwana, na laka Roho Mhuhu.
MAT 28:20 Mubhabhola kukamula mambu ghokapi ghanundaghalaki mwehapa. Na lingalyaje, nepani mili papamu na mwehapa machobha ghokapi, mbaka ujomukelu wa chikahi.”
MAR 1:1 Aghagha nde Malobhi Manyahi ghaka Yesu Kristo, Mwana waka Chapanga.
MAR 1:2 Itumbwi ngati moghalembakike na mlota Isaya: “Chapanga akapwaghiki ‘Ananuntuma mbolu wangu akulongulyaje, jombe anaakulenganakya indela jako.’
MAR 1:3 Mundu ajamali kulipololu akapwaghaje, ‘Ndenganakya indela jaka Bambo, ndenganakya payipetaje!’ ”
MAR 1:4 Yohana Mbatizaji atamika kulipololu, na konihoku abhabatiza bhandu. Akabhatangazya bhandu, “Ng'anambukaje na kughaleka mahoku ghinu na mbatizwaje nahuli Chapanga andekakya mahoku ghinu.”
MAR 1:5 Bhandu bhamaheli kuhuma ku Yudea na ku muchi wa ku Yelusalemu bhakapitiki kunja kunjowane Yohana. Bhakunjendi na kundandi mahoku ghabhu, na Yohana akabhabatizi mu Nkoka Yoludani.
MAR 1:6 Yohana akawatiki ingobhu yeyalenganakiki kwa mangoma gha chinyama chechilowakeka ngamia, na akakongiki ulamba wa chingokolu muchibhunu chaki. Chilebhi chaki chakabhi nzige na busi.
MAR 1:7 Yohana akabhatangazi bhandu, “Punyuma jangu nepani ahika mundu joabhi na makili kumbeta nenga. Ambaju hata nepani ngachembalika kujinama pahi na kumbopo mighoji ja magubasi ghaki.
MAR 1:8 Nepani nakumbatizi mwehapa kwa machi, nambu jombi anaambatiza kwa Roho Mhuhu.”
MAR 1:9 Machobha ghanihagha Yesu akahikiki kuhuma ku muchi wa ku Nazaleti inchi ja ku Galilaya, bhela akabatiziki na Yohana mu Nkoka Yoludani.
MAR 1:10 Yesu pahoghuka pela kuhuma mu machi, kunani kumahunde kukahowiki na Roho waka Chapanga akanhelali panani jaki ngati ngunda.
MAR 1:11 Na sauti jaka Chapanga jakajowaniki kuhuma kunani kumahunde jakapwaga, “Wehapa nde wa Mwanangu wenukupaliki. Nepani nyambakiki na wehapa.”
MAR 1:12 Palapala Roho waka Chapanga akundongwi Yesu kujenda kulipololu.
MAR 1:13 Konihoku akatemi machobha alobaini akalengakika na Shetani. Na hinyama ya muchitengu akatami nayu konihoku, na bhatumika bha kunani kwaka Chapanga bhakabhi bhuntumakila.
MAR 1:14 Yohana paakabhi mu chifungo, Yesu akapiti ku Galilaya kutangaza Malobhi Manyahi ghaka Chapanga.
MAR 1:15 Akapwagha, “Chikahi chihikite,” na Ukolongwa waka Chapanga uheghalile. Ng'anambukaje na kughaleka mahoku na mughahobhalya Malobhi Manyahi.
