MAR 1:16 Yesu paakabhi apeta mumaheku ja bahali ja ku Galilaya, akabhaweni bhalohi bhabheli. Simoni na mbeli waki Andulea bhakalobha homba kwa nkwabho. Kwa ndandi bhakabhi bhalohe.
MAR 1:17 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Muhika nyengalyaje, na nepani ananuntenda kubha bhalohi bha bhandu.”
MAR 1:18 Na palapala bhakajilekiki mikwabhu jabhu na bhakunjengali Yesu.
MAR 1:19 Yesu paakapiti palongi pachokopi, akabhaweni Yakobo na Yohana, bhana bhaka Zebedayo. Na bhombi bhakabhi mkati mu ngalawa jabhu bhakalenganakya mikwabhu jabhu.
MAR 1:20 Yesu akabhalohiki, na bhombi bhakundei atati wabhu Zebedayo mu ngalawa papamu na bhahenga lihengu, bhakunjengali Yesu.
MAR 1:21 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakapiti mbaka ku muchi wa ku Kapelenaumu, na palahika Lichobha la Sabato Yesu akajingi munyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude, na kutumbu kubhola.
MAR 1:22 Bhandu bhokapi bhabhunjowanili bhakakangichi namaa kubhola kwaki, maghambu ngachebholika ngati bhabhola bhabhu bha Shelia, nambu akalongi ngati mundu joabhi na lujiniku.
MAR 1:23 Palapala mundu joakamuliki na lijobhi, joakabhi mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude jela, lakatumbwi kujamalila,
MAR 1:24 lakapwagha, “Wehapa wa Yesu wa ku Nazaleti, bho, upala kike kwitu tepani? Bho, upala kutukoma tepani? Tenga tukumanye wehapa wa nane, wehapa nde Mhuhu waka Chapanga!”
MAR 1:25 Yesu akandakali lijobhi jola akapwagha, “Tumbalaje chinunu! Umpita mundu hoju.”
MAR 1:26 Bhela palapala, lijobhi lela likanjeghi chihinduhindu mundu jola na mundu jola akajamali kwa sauti ngolongwa na kumpita.
MAR 1:27 Bhandu bhokapi bhabhabhi panipala bhakakangichi na kulalukanila, “Bho, aghagha henu mambu bhole? Bho, mabholu ghahenu? Mundu ajoju abhi na uwezu wa kughakanaki majobhi, na ghombi kunjowanela!”
MAR 1:28 Bhela malobhi ghaka Yesu ghakajaghani manyata ku inchi yokapi ya munkeghi ja Galilaya.
MAR 1:29 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakapitiki mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude, na bhakalongini kujenda ku nyumba jaka Simoni na Andulea, najombi Yakobo na Yohana bhakapiti papamu nabhu.
MAR 1:30 Bhela, nkowanu wa chimbomba waka Simoni, akaghoni pachitanda akabhi na chitamu. Paakahikiki Yesu pela bhakumpwaghi lilobhi lenihele.
MAR 1:31 Yesu akanjendi mabhu jola, akankamwi chiwoku, na kunjangati kujema. Na chitamu hechi chikandekakili, na kutumbu kubhatumakila.
MAR 1:32 Pakamihi lyobha palajibhala, bhandu bhakundeti Yesu bhatamwa bhokapi na bhandu bhaghakamwi majobhi.
MAR 1:33 Bhandu bhokapi bha muchi ghonighola bhakalibhongini palubhanja palongi ja nyumba jela.
MAR 1:34 Yesu akabhalamihi bhandu bhamaheli bhabhabhi na hitamu yamaheli, akaghatopwi majobhi ghamaheli ghaghabhi nkati ja bhandu, kabheti ngacheaghalekiki majobhi kupwagha chindu maghambu ghakummanyiki kubha jombi nde nane.
MAR 1:35 Chilabhu jaki, pachibhombu Yesu akapiti pandu panga na bhandu kundobha Chapanga.
MAR 1:36 Simoni na bhajaki bhakapiti kumpalapala.
MAR 1:37 Pabhakumbweni, bhakampwaghile, “Kila mundu akupalapala wehapa.”
MAR 1:38 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Tumboka ku michi jengi ja pambipi nakatangaza na konihoku, maghambu nhikiki kwa lihengu leniheli.”
MAR 1:39 Yesu akapiti kila pandu ku Galilaya hoku, akatangaza mu nyumba ya kuhimangani Bhayahude na kughatopo majobhi.
MAR 1:40 Lichobha limu mundu jumu joakabhi na malohi akunjendi Yesu, na kunchikamila na kundobha. “Anaupai, uweza kung'olola.”
MAR 1:41 Yesu akumboni chiha, akahatambwi chiwoku chaki, akankamwi na kumpwaghila, “Mbala! Ugholulikaje!”
MAR 1:42 Palapala chitamu cha malohi chikandekaki mundu jola, na akagholulike.
MAR 1:43 Bhela Yesu akumpwaghi ujendaje na kunkanakila,
MAR 1:44 “Ulingalya, koujenda hoku ngawampwaghi mundu jokapi jola chindu ache chenukutendi wehapa. Nambu ujenda ukalilangiha kwaka mpenganyambiku na ukabhoha nyambiku kwa ndandi ja kulama kwaku ngati moakalaghalaki Musa nahuli kulilangi kubha ulamike.”
MAR 1:45 Bhela, mundu jola akabhokiki na kutumbu kutangaza malobhi ghala pandu pokapi, na kutangaza mambu ghamaheli mbaka ikantendiki Yesu ngayijingi hotuhotu ku muchi wokapi ghola. Ikampaliki kutama kunja, pandu pa kanjika. Papamu na ghanihagha bhandu bhakunjendi kuhuma ipambala yokapi.
MAR 2:1 Machobha nga ghinge Yesu akakelewiki kabheti ku Kapelenaumu, bhandu bhakamanyiki kubha akabhi kunyumba.
MAR 2:2 Bhela, bhakahikiki bhandu bhamaheli namaa mbaka jakahobhiki mbekenyu mkati mbaka na kunja ja pundyangu. Yesu akabhi akabhatangazya malobhi ghaki.
MAR 2:3 Chikahi chenihechi bhandu ncheche bhakundetiki mundu joatengwiki kwaka Yesu.
MAR 2:4 Maghambu gha kutwele kwa bhandu, ngachebhaweziki kumpeleka mbaka paakabhi Yesu. Bhela bhakahotwi kunani ja nhwagala wa nyumba pandu pala paakajemiki Yesu. Pabhakapatiki mbekenyu bhakunheli ntamwa jola koni aghoni panani ja ulele, palongi jaka Yesu.
MAR 2:5 Yesu paakaweni uhobhalelu wabhu, akumpwaghi mundu joatengwiki jola, “Mwanango, ulekakiwi mahoku ghaku.”
MAR 2:6 Bhabhola bhakumu bha Shelia, bhabhakabhi panipala bhakaholali mu mitima jabhu,
MAR 2:7 “Bho, aweza bhole kulonge bhenibhela? Antondola Chapanga! Bho, nde nane joaweza kulekake mahoku nambu jumu pela, yani Chapanga?”
MAR 2:8 Palapala Yesu akamanyiki maholalelu ghaghabhi mkati ja mitima jabhu, akabhapwaghile, “Bho, maghambu kiki muholale ghanihagha mu mitima jino?
MAR 2:9 Henu lelipepwiki nakanopi lako, kumpwaghi mundu joatengwiki ajoju, ‘Ulekakiwi mahoku ghaku,’ au kumpwaghi, ‘Jujmukaje! Utola uleli waku ujendaje’?
MAR 2:10 Nambu mbala mmanya kubha Mwana waka Mundu abhi na lujiniku lwa kubhalekake bhandu mahoku ghabho pani pundema.” Panihapa akumpwaghi mundu joatengwiki jola,
MAR 2:11 “Nukupwaghi, ujemaje, utola uleli waku na ujendaje kunyumba jaku!”
MAR 2:12 Bhandu bhokapi bhakabya bhalingalila, mundu jola akajemiki na kutola uleli waki na kujenda. Bhandu bhala bhakakangichi na kundumbali Chapanga, bhakapwaghaje, “Ngachetulabhali kubhona chindu ngati cheniheche!”
MAR 2:13 Yesu akapiti kabheti mu maheku ja Bahali ja Galilaya. Bhandu bhamaheli bhakanjengalile, najombi akatumbwi kubhabhola.
MAR 2:14 Yesu papetikaje, akumbweni Lawi mwana waka Alufayo, atami mu nyumba ya kujope kode. Yesu akumpwaghi, “Unyengalyaje!” Lawi akajemiki na kunjengalela.
MAR 2:15 Panakatai, Yesu akatami mu nyumba jaka Lawi, kula chilebhe. Bhajopa kode bbhamaheli na bhana mahoku bhamaheli bhakabhi bhujengali Yesu. Na bhamaheli bhabh bhakatami papamu na Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakakula chilebhe.
MAR 2:16 Bhela, bhabhola bhangi bha Shelia bhabhabhi Mafalisayo bhabhakabhi panipala pabhumbonika Yesu akula chilebhi papamu na bhajopa kode na bhandu bhana mahoku, bhakabhalaluki bhabhulwa bhaki, “Bho, maghambu kiki akula papamu na bhajopa kode na bhana mahoku?”
MAR 2:17 Yesu paakajowini, akabhapwaghile, “Bhandu bhangakulwala ngachebhumpala sing'anga, bhandu bhabhumpala sing'anga bhabhalwala. Ngachenhikiki kubhaloha bhandu bhambone, nambu nhikiki kubhaloha bhandu bhana mahoku.”
MAR 2:18 Bhabhulwa bhaka Yohana Mbatizaji na Mafalisayo bhatendika kukonga. Bhela, bhandu bhakahikiki kundaluki Yesu, “Bho, maghambu kiki bhabhulwa bhaka Yohana Mbatizaji na bhabhulwa bha Mafalisayo bhakonga, nambu bhabhulwa bhaku ngachebhakonga?”
MAR 2:19 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Bho, bhabhakokakiki paukwate bhapalakika le kukonga koni bambo ukwate abhi papamu nabho? Chikahi chokapi chebhakubha na bambo ukwati ngachebhapalika kukonga.
MAR 2:20 Nambu chikahi anachihika ambapu bambo ukwate anaabhohakika kwabho, chikahi chenihechi nde pabhikongaje.
MAR 2:21 “Nga mundu joaloka chilaka cha ingobhu jahenu mu ingobhu ja mwande. Ngati anabhatehi bhenibhela, chilaka chikachuka kuhuma mu ingobhu ja mwandi jela, na ingobhu heji anajikachuka nakanopi.
MAR 2:22 Kabheti nga mundu joaweza kujeghe divai jahenu mu mifuku jejilenganakiki na chingokolu cha mwande. Ngati anabhatehi bhenibhela, divai jela jitenda kututumuka na kukachula mifuku jela na divai je kujitika. Divai jahenu bhajeghe mu mifuku jahenu!”
MAR 2:23 Lichobha limu la Sabato, Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhapetika mu mighonda ja ingano. Pabhakabhi bhajenda mwindela, bhabhulwa bhaki bhakatumbwi kuheketa mapukutu gha ingano.
MAR 2:24 Bhela, Mafalisayo bhakundaluki Yesu bhakapwaghaje, “Ulingalyaje! Bho, mbona bhabhulwa bhaku bhahenga lijambu ambalu ngachelipalika kuhenga mu Lichobha la Sabato?”
MAR 2:25 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Bho, ngachemsomiki moakatendi Daude, papamu ja bhajaki chikahi pabhakabhi na injala?
MAR 2:26 Daude akajingi mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na kula mabumunda jejabhekakiki kwa ndandi ja nyambiku kwaka Chapanga. Lilobhi leniheli lakahengakiki chikahi Abisali paakabhi Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa. Na bhapenganyambiku kanjika jabhu nde bhabhakabhi bhapalakika kula mikati jela. Nambu Daudi akakuliki na kubhapeke bhajake.”
MAR 2:27 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Lichobha la Sabato libhekakiki kwa ndandi ja bhandu, nga bhandu kwa ndandi ja Lichobha la Sabato.
MAR 2:28 Bhela, Mwana waka Mundu nde Bambo wa Lichobha la Sabato.”
MAR 3:1 Yesu akajingi kabheti mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude, na mkati mola akabhi mundu joatengwiki chiwoku.
MAR 3:2 Monimola, bhandu bhangi bhundingalya Yesu ngati andamiha mundu jola mu Lichobha la Sabato, nahuli bhapata ndandi ja kuntakila.
MAR 3:3 Yesu akumpwaghi mundu joatengwiki chiwoku jola, “Uhika pachilanda pambano.”
MAR 3:4 Bhela, akabhalaluki anana, “Bho, wichu le kwa Lichobha la Sabato kuhenga ghambone au kuhenga mahakau, kujilamiha roho au kujikoma?” Nambu bhombi bhakatumbi chinunu.
MAR 3:5 Yesu akabhalingali bhandu bhokapi kwa inyela na kuhakalila kwa ndandi ja kunonopa mitima jabhu. Bhela akampwaghi joakatengwiki chiwoku jola, “Uhatambula chiwoku chako!” Na jombi akahatambwi chiwoku chaki na akalamike.
MAR 3:6 Palapala Mafalisayo bhakapitiki kunja, bhakahimangini na bhahemba bhaka Helode, bhajetanganya kulonda indela ja kunkoma Yesu.
MAR 3:7 Yesu akabhokiki panipala papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki, akajenda mumaheku ja Nhwanga Galilaya na bhandu bhamaheli bhakunjengalili kuhuma ku Galilaya, ku Yudea,
MAR 3:8 ku Yelusalemu, ku Idumea na kwihi ja Nkoka Yoludani, ku Tilo na ku Sidoni. Bhandu bhanihabha bhokapi bhunjendila Yesu ndandi bhakajowini mambu ghamaheli ghaakahengiki Yesu.
MAR 3:9 Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki bhumbekila ngalawa jimu, nahuli lipogha la bhandu ngalwanhinya.
MAR 3:10 Ndandi akabhi alabhalamihi bhandu bhamaheli, na bhatamwa bhokapi bhatendika kukangana nahuli bhunkamulaje.
MAR 3:11 Na bhandu bhabhabhi na majobhi pabhumbweni, bhakalihawi pahi palongi jaki na kujamalila, “Wehapa nde wa Mwana waka Chapanga!”
MAR 3:12 Nambu Yesu akaghalakali kwa makili majobhi ngaghabhapwaghi bhandu kubha jombi nane.
MAR 3:13 Yesu akakweliki ku chitombi, na akabhalohiki bhandu bhaakabhapaliki mwene. Na bhombi bhakunjengalile,
MAR 3:14 najombi akabhahawi bhandu komi na bhabheli bhaakalohiki mitumi. Akabhapwaghi anana, “Nunhaghwi mabhanganya mbya papamu na nepani. Ananuntuma mwakatangazya bhandu Malobhi Manyahi.
MAR 3:15 Na mwiweza kughatopo majobhi.”
MAR 3:16 Bhela, bhandu bhaakahaghwi komi na bhabheli bhakabhi abha, Simoni joapata lihina la Petulu kuhuma kwaka Yesu,
MAR 3:17 Yakobo na Yohana, bhana bhaka Zebedayo Yesu akabhapeki bhalongu bhabheli habha lihina la Boanelige, ndandi jaki “Bhana bha Kulundamila,”
MAR 3:18 Andulea na Filipo, Batolomayo na Matayo, Tomaso na Yakobo mwana waka Alufayo, Tadayo na Simoni joalowakika Zelote ndandi jaki mundu wa kukomanela inchi jake.
MAR 3:19 Na Yuda Isikalioti ambaju nde joang'anambuka Yesu.
MAR 3:20 Bhela Yesu akapiti kunyumba. Bhandu bhakalibhongini kabheti, mbaka Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki ngapabhapatiki mbekenyu ja kula chilebhe.
MAR 3:21 Bhela, bhalongu bhaki pabhajowana malobhi ghanihagha bhakabhokiki kujenda kuntola maghambu bhandu bhakabhi bhapwagha, “Ajoju mwanamangongo.”
MAR 3:22 Na bhabhola bha Shelia bhabhahumila ku Yelusalemu bhakapwaghiki, “Ajoju abhi na Beelizebuli ndandi jaki Nkolongwa wa majobhi! Kabheti aghatopo majobhi kwa makili ghaka nkolongwa wa majobhi.”
MAR 3:23 Panihapa Yesu akabhalohiki, na akabhapwaghi kwa malenganesu, “Bho, Shetani aweza bhole kuntopo Shetani njake?
MAR 3:24 Ngati ukolongwa ghumu ulekangini mapogha ghaghakomana, ukolongwa hoghu ngautamakile.
MAR 3:25 Kabheti ngati bhalongu bha nyumba jimu bhaghabhaniki mapogha ghaghakomana ulongu hoghu ngautamakile.
MAR 3:26 Na bhela, ngati Shetani na majobhi ghaki anabhatumbwi kukomana bheni kwa bheni, ngabhatamakile nambu ujomukelu wabhu uheghalile.
MAR 3:27 “Nga mundu joaweza kujingila mu nyumba jaka joabhi na makili na kunyaghu hindu yaki. Mbaka ankonga hoti mighoji mundu joabhi na makili jola. Panihapa nde aweza kunyaghu hindu yaki.
MAR 3:28 “Numpwaghi chakaka, bhandu anabhalekakiwa mahoku ghabhu na matondu ghabhu kwa kuntondola Chapanga.
MAR 3:29 Nambu mundu jokapi joantondola Roho Mhuhu, Chapanga ngaandekake mahoku ghaki mileli, ndandi akubha na lihoku la mileli.”
MAR 3:30 Yesu akalongi bhenibhela maghambu bhandu bhumpwaghila, “Abhi na lijobhi.”
MAR 3:31 Amabhu waka Yesu na bhalongu bhaki bhakahikiki panipala, na kujema kunja, bhakumpelaki ubholu wa kundoha.
MAR 3:32 Lipogha la bhandu lakatami panipala kumuyongolota Yesu. Bhela mundu jumu wabhu akumpwaghi Yesu, “Amabhu waku na bhalongu bhaku na bhalombu bhaku bhabhi kunja, bhukulonda.”
MAR 3:33 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mabhu wangu nepani na bhalongu bhangu nde akanane?”
MAR 3:34 Panihapa akabhalingali bhandu bhabhatami kumuyongolota na kupwagha, “Ndingalya! Bhanganya abhabha nde akamabhu bhangu na bhalongu bhangu.
MAR 3:35 Mundu jokapi joatenda mapalu ghaka Chapanga, jonihoju nde mbeli wangu, ndombu wangu na mabhu wangu.”
MAR 4:1 Yesu atumbwi kabheti kubhola mumaheku ja bahali ja Galilaya. Lipogha la bhandu lakatehi kumuyongolota hata bhela ikampaliki ajingala mu ngalawa na kutama monihomu. Bhandu bhokapi bhakatamani mumaheku ja bahali.
MAR 4:2 Yesu akatumbwi kubhola mabholu ghaki ghamaheli kwa malenganesu, na mu mabholu ghaki akapwaghiki:
MAR 4:3 “Njowanyaje! Mundu jumu akapiti kukweta imbeju.
MAR 4:4 Pakwetika imbeju, imbeju jengi jakaabhuki pindela, ijuni yakahikiki na yakakuliki.
MAR 4:5 Jengi jakaabhuki pa maganga panga na luhombi lwamaheli. Ndandi luhombi ngapalwabhi lwamaheli jakabhonakini kumela manyata.
MAR 4:6 Lyobha palabhaliki, jakanyaliki na kujoma, ndandi mikegha jaki ngachejabhi na makili, najombi jakanyaliki na kujoma.
MAR 4:7 Jengi yakahabhuki mu mikongu ja miha, na miha yela yakakoliki na kuyihinya najombi ngachejapambiki mapambiku.
MAR 4:8 Jengi jakahabhuki pa luhombi lunyahi, jakameliki, jakakoliki na jakapambiki. Jimu selasini, jimu sitini, na jengi mia moja.”
MAR 4:9 Hela akabhapwaghi, “Joabi na makutu na ajogwanaje!”
MAR 4:10 Yesu paakabhi kanjika jaki, bhandu bhangi bhabhunjowini bhakunjendi papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki komi na bhabheli, na kumpwaghi abhayekulya malengenesu ghala.
MAR 4:11 Na jombi akabhapwaghi, “Mwabhanganya mpatiki kumanya ghaghilihiiki gha Ukolongwa waka Chapanga, nambu bhabhabhi kunja bhalibhola yeniheyi kwa malengenesu pela,
MAR 4:12 nahuli, ‘Bhalingaje chakaka, nambu ngabhibhona. Bhajowanaje chakaka, nambu ngabhimanya. Nanga bhela, bhakabya bhung'anambuki Chapanga, najombi akabya abhalekakile.’ ”
MAR 4:13 Bhela Yesu akabhalalukile, “Bho, mwanganya le ngachemmanyi ndandi ja malengenesu aghagha? Bho, mwimanya bhoo henu ndandi ja malenganesu ghange?
MAR 4:14 Mpanda alipanda Lilobhi laka Chapanga.
MAR 4:15 Bhandu bhangi bhabhi ngati bhandu bhabhabhi mwindela molapandakiki Lilobhi. Nambu pabhalijowana pela Shetani ahika kulitola Lilobhi lelipandakiki mu mitima jabhu.
MAR 4:16 Bhandu bhangi bhabhi ngati imbeju yeyapandakiki pa maganga. Pabhalijowana pela Lilobhi laka Chapanga bhalijopa kwa chiheku.
MAR 4:17 Nambu ngapalajingi na kumela mikyegha mu mitima jabhu. Bhalikamulaki kwa chikahi kichokope, anaghapitali mang'ahiku, na kubhatende mahakau kwa ndandi ja Lilobhi lela bhalileka.
MAR 4:18 Bhandu bhangi bhabhi ngati imbeju yeyahabwiki pa mikongu ja miha. Bhombi bhalenganeswa na bhandu bhabhalijowana Lilobhi heli,
MAR 4:19 nambu kubhokana na choghohi cha pundema panu, kupala hindu yamaheli na kutokulela hindu yamaheli ya hyegha bhapata bhombi na kulihinya Lilobhi heli, na bhombi ngachebhahenga ngati Lilobhi molipalila.
MAR 4:20 Nambu bhandu bhangi bhabhi ngati imbeju yeyapandakiki mu luhombi lunyahi. Bhombi bhalijowane Lilobhi heli na kulijopalela, na kubheleka mapambiku: Jimu selasini, jengi sitini na jengi mia moja.”
MAR 4:21 Yesu akajendali kubhapwagila, “Bho, bhandu le bhaweza kujipambaki taa na kujibheka nkati ja nyumba na kujiyekale mu lidebi au kwihi ku chitanda? Ngabhela! Bbajibheka pa kinala.
MAR 4:22 Bhela, kila chechihiyakiki anachiyekuliwaje, na kila chekiyekaliwi anachibhonikana palanga.
MAR 4:23 Joabhi na makutu na ajowanaje!”
MAR 4:24 Akabhapwaghi kabheti, “Njowanakya wichu ghamughajowana! Chipemu chelachela chemwapeme bhandu bhangi, chenihechi nde cheanampemiwa mwehapa nanamu, na kujonjukewa nakanopi.
MAR 4:25 Maghambu joabhi na chindu anaajonjukiwa nakanopi, na jwangakubha na chindu, hata chela cheabhi nachu anachinyaghuliwaje.”
MAR 4:26 Yesu akajendali kupwagha, “Ukolongwa waka Chapanga ulengana na mundu joapanda imbeju mungonda.
MAR 4:27 Ikilu aghonela, muhi akubha mihu na chikahi cheniheche imbeju jimela na kukola. Jombi ngachemanya chechihengakeka.
MAR 4:28 Mimea jeni jitundu muluhombi jikola na kubheleka. Itumbu kutunduli mahamba machoku machoku, mapukutu na ujomukelu weni mapambiku na imbeki mkati jaki.
MAR 4:29 Imbeju payikoma, ndemi jola atola chisenga na atumbu kuhuna maghambu chikahi cha mahuno chihikike.”
MAR 4:30 Yesu akapwaghiki kabhete, “Bho, Ukolongwa waka Chapanga ulengana na kyane? Bho, tulandila kwa indela bhole?
MAR 4:31 Ulengana na imbeju jejilowakeka haladali, jejibhi njoku kupeta imbeju yokapi yebhakweta bhandu mu mighonda.
MAR 4:32 Nambu anaukwetiki umela na kubha mmea ukolongwa kupeta mimea jokapi ja mungonda. Mambandi ghaki ghakubha makolongwa hata ijuni iweza kuchenga mihui momu jene.”
MAR 4:33 Yesu akapwaghi malobhi ghaki kupete malenganesu ghangi ghamaheli. Ngati mobhamanyilaje nde moajendalya kubhapwaghi Ukolongwa waka Chapanga.
MAR 4:34 Ngachealongila nabhu chokapi panga kutumi malenganesu. Nambu pabhila na bhabhulwa bhaki kanjika abhapwaghila ndandi ja kila ulenganesu.
MAR 4:35 Pakamihi ja lichobha leniheli, Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Tulombuka nhwanga, tujenda kwihe.”
MAR 4:36 Bhela bhabhulwa bhaki bhakalitawiki lipogha la bhandu, bhakajingi mu liboti moakabhi Yesu na kubhoka papamu. Na kabheti bhandu bhangi bhakunjengali kwa ngalawa yengi.
MAR 4:37 Bhela, chanangunga chakatumbwi kubuluma, na mbelu ukatumbwi kujilapu ngalawa jela, na ngalawa jakatumbwi kutwele machi.
MAR 4:38 Yesu akabhi kunyuma ja ngalawa, aghoni panani ja pilo. Bhela bhabhulwa bhaki bhakunjumwi na kumpwaghila, “Mbola, ngacheukubhina mtima kubha tepani tupotela!”
MAR 4:39 Akajumwiki na kukenjuki mpongu ghola, na majegha gha munhwanga ghala, “Tumbalaje!” Palapala mpongu ukatondiki, na kupola nakanopi.
MAR 4:40 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Bho, maghambu kiki njoghopa? Bho, mwakona ngachembi na uhobhalelu?”
MAR 4:41 Na bhombi bhakajowipi namaa, koni bhakalalukanya, “Bho, ajoju henu nane? Mbaka mpongu na majegha yuntii!”
MAR 5:1 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakahiki ku inchi ja Bhagelasi, kwihi ja bahali ja Galilaya.
MAR 5:2 Chikahi Yesu pahuluka mu ngalawa, akahimangini na mundu jumu joakabhi na majobhi akahumila mumatengele.
MAR 5:3 Mundu jonihojo atamika mumatengele. Wala ngacheakabhi mundu jowezika kunkonga kabheti hata kwa minyololo.
MAR 5:4 Machobha ghamaheli bhunkongika kwa pengu na minyololo nambu chikahi chokapi awezika kuheketa minyololo na kutunyu pengu yene. Wala njeta mundu joakabhili na makili gha kuweza kunkamula.
MAR 5:5 Ikilu na muhi atamika mumatengele na mwitombi, koni akalapula njobhela na kulicheku chekula kwa maganga.
MAR 5:6 Paakumbweni Yesu cha kutali, akunkembalili na kunchikamila palongi jake,
MAR 5:7 akalehi kwa sauti ngolongwa, “Ne nukutehi kyane! Bho, wehapa le wa Yesu, Mwana waka Chapanga, joabhi kunani kumahunde? Kwa lihina laka Chapanga, nukulobha ngawing'aha!”
MAR 5:8 Akapwaghiki hhenhihela ndandi Yesu akabhi ampwaghi, “Lijobi, umboka mundu hojo.”
MAR 5:9 Panihapa, Yesu akundalukile, “Bho, lihina laku wa nane?” Na jombi akamuyangiki, “Lihina langu ‘Legioni,’ maghambu tubhi bhamaheli.”
MAR 5:10 Panipala lijobhi jola akumpembalaki Yesu ngaantopola pa inchi jenijela.
MAR 5:11 Kukabhi lipogha likolongwa lwa magholobhe pambipi ja punhelelo wa pachitombi bhakadimaje.
MAR 5:12 Bhela majobhi ghala ghumpembali Yesu, “Utulaghalakya tukajingala mu magholobhi ghala.”
MAR 5:13 Yesu akajetakili. Bhela majobhi ghakumpitiki mundu jola, na kughajingi magholobhi ghala. Lipogha lokapi la magholobhi ngati elufu ibheli ghakahelalaje punhelelo kujenda kunhwanga na kujingi mu bahali na kuwa.
MAR 5:14 Bhadima bha magholobhi bhala bhakatiliki, bhakakembili kumbwane na kwijiji kubhatangazi bhandu mambu ghanihagha. Na bhandu bhakahikiki kulinga chechipitalile.
MAR 5:15 Pabhahika kwaka Yesu, bhakumbweni mundu joakabhi na lipogha la majobhi, atami pahi, awati ingobhu abhi na malangu ghaki wichu, bhakajowipe.
MAR 5:16 Bhandu bhabhaghabhona mambu ghaghapitalile bhakabhapwaghi bhandu bhangi ghaghahengakiki kwaka mundu joakabhi na majobhi jola, na ghaghapitali kwa magholobhi ghala.
MAR 5:17 Bhela bhakatumbwi kundobha Yesu abhokaje pa inchi jabho.
MAR 5:18 Yesu pajingala mu ngalawa, mundu joampiha majobhi akunjopiki anjetakya kujenda nako.
MAR 5:19 Nambu Yesu akunkanili. Akumpwaghila, “Ujenda kunyumba kwa bhalongu bhaku, ukabhapwaghila mambu ghokapi Bambo ghaakuhengile na ntundu moakubhoni chiha.”
MAR 5:20 Bhela, mundu jola akapiti na kutumbu kutangaza ku Dekapoli kwoha, mambu ghokapi Yesu ghaakunhengile. Bhandu bhokapi bhabhajowini bhakakangiche.
MAR 5:21 Yesu akalombwiki kabheti upambala wa kabheli wa bahali kwa ngalawa. Pahika pe kwihi lipogha la bhandu lakalibhongini palongi jaki, najombi akajemiki munkeghi ja bahali.
MAR 5:22 Panihapa akahikiki mundu jumu joalowakika Yailo, joakabhi nkolongwa wa nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude. Paakumbweni Yesu, akaheghali na kuchikama pamagholu ghake,
MAR 5:23 akumpembali namaa akapwaghaje, “Kamwali wangu nchoku nde mtamwa pambipi kupotela. Chondi kambokaje, ukumbekila mabhoku ghaku nahuli apata kulama.”
MAR 5:24 Bhela, Yesu akabhokiki papamu nako. Bhandu bhamaheli bhakunhinyiki kila upambala.
MAR 5:25 Papuje akabhi mbomba jumu joakabhi na chitamu cha kupita mwahi kwa chikahi cha hyaka komi na ibheli.
MAR 5:26 Mbomba jonihojo akabhi ang'ahakiki kwa akasing'anga bhamahele. Koni akabya atumili hindu yaki yokapi, ngacheapepukile na hali jaki jakajendali kubha nga wichu.
MAR 5:27 Mbomba hoju paakajowini Yesu abhalamiha bhandu, akapekalaki pa lipogha la bhandu kuhuma kunyuma, na kukamula ingobhu jaka Yesu.
MAR 5:28 Akatendiki bhenibhela, maghambu akalipwaghi mweni muntima waki, “Anangamwi ingobhu jaki pela, ananamaje.”
MAR 5:29 Pakamula pe ingobhu jaka Yesu na mwahi ukakotwike, na palapala akaliweni hyegha jaki jilamike.
MAR 5:30 Palapala Yesu akamanyiki kubha makili ghaki ghumbokiki. Akaling'anambuki lipogha la bhandu lela na kubhalalukila, “Bho, nde nane joakamwi ingobhu jango?”
MAR 5:31 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakayangike, “Ubhona bhandu mobhakuhinyila. Bho, mbona ulaluki nane joakukamwile?”
MAR 5:32 Nambu Yesu akajendali kulingalila ipambala yokapi nahuli ambona mundu joahengiki ghanihagha.
MAR 5:33 Panihapa mbomba jola, koni akabya amanyi ghaghumpatiki, akapitali palongi koni abhaghaja kwa choghohi, akalihawi pahi palongi jaka Yesu, na kulanda uchakaka wokapi.
MAR 5:34 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Kamwali wangu, uhobhalelu waku ukulamihe. Ujenda kwa lukwale, ulama nakanopi chitamu chaku heche.”
MAR 5:35 Yesu paakabhi akona kulongela, bhakahikiki bhandu kuhuma kunyumba jaka Yailo nkolongwa wa nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude, na kumpwaghi Yailo, “Kamwali waku apotile. Bho, maghambu kiki ujendale kung'aha Mbola?”
MAR 5:36 Nambu Yesu paakajowini malobhi ghabhalongila bhandu, akumpwaghi nkolongwa wa nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude jola, “Ngawijoghopa, uhobhalya pela.”
MAR 5:37 Yesu ngacheapahi mundu jongi jokapi jola ejenda naku nakanopi jaka Petulu, Yakobo na Yohana ndongu waka Yakobo.
MAR 5:38 Ebhahika kunyumba jaka Yailo, Yesu akajowini njobhela na bhandu bhakalelaje na kuombuleza kwa sauti ngolongwa.
MAR 5:39 Pajingala mkati, akabhapwaghi, “Bho, maghambu kiki njobhela na ilelo? Kamwali ngacheapotile, nambu atehi kughone pela.”
MAR 5:40 Nambu bhombi bhakunhekiki namaa. Akabhapihiki bhokapi kunja, akabhatohi tati waki na mabhu waki na bhabhulwa bhaki bhatatu, bhakajingi kuchumba koakabhi kamwali jola.
MAR 5:41 Bhela akunkamwi chiwoku na kumpwaghi, “Talita komi,” ndandi jaki, “Kamwali, nukupwaghi ujumukaje!”
MAR 5:42 Palapala mwali jola akajemiki na kutumbu kujenda. Kamwali hoju akabhi na hyaka komi na ibheli. Panihapa bhandu bhakakangichi nakanopi.
MAR 5:43 Yesu akabhakanaki ngabhampwaghi mundu jokapi jola lilobhi lenihele. Bhela akabhapwaghi bhumpekya chilebhi mwali jola.
MAR 6:1 Yesu akabhokiki panihapa na kujenda ku chijiji chaki, koni bhabhulwa bhaki bhakunjengalyaje.
MAR 6:2 Palahika Lichobha la Sabato Yesu akajingi mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude na kutumbu kubhola. Bhandu bhamahele bhabhunjowini bhakakangachi, bhakapwaghaje, “Bho, aghapatiki kwaku mambu hagha ghalongela? Lingalyaje, nde mbulau bholi ajeji jeapekiwi mundu ajojo? Kabheti ahenga bholi ngangachu ayeyi ikolongwa kwa mabhoku ghake?
MAR 6:3 Bho, hajo le nga selemala jola, mwana waka Malia, na ndongu wabhu aka Yakobo, Yusufu, Yuda na Simoni? Akalombu bhaki si bhatamani papitu pane?” Bhela bhakatehi kunkana.
MAR 6:4 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mlota waka Chapanga ajetakalewa pandu pokapi, nambu nga mu inchi jaki mweni, kwa bhalongu bhaki na bhandu bha munyumba jaki.”
MAR 6:5 Yesu ngacheaweziki kutenda ngangachu panihapa, nambu akabhabheki mabhoku bhatamwa bhachokopi, na kubhalamiha.
MAR 6:6 Yesu akakangichi namaa, kwa kulepalela kuhobhale kwabho. Na panihapa Yesu akaijendili ijiji ya pambipi jaki na kubhabhola bhandu.
MAR 6:7 Akabhalohiki bhabhulwa bhaki komi na bhabheli, na kutumbula kubhatuma bhabheli bhabheli. Akabhapeki amuli ja kutopo majobhi.
MAR 6:8 Akabhalaghalaki, “Ngamwitogho chindu chokapi kwa ndandi ja mwanja winu nambu nyamula imbeu pela. Ngamwitogho chilebhi, wala nkoba, wala mbija mu chibhuno.
MAR 6:9 Muwata magubasi, nambu ngamwitogho ingobhu ja kung'anambula.”
MAR 6:10 Kabheti akabhapwaghi, “Pandu pokapi bhandu pabhanjopalya panyumba, mwakatamanya pandu panihapa mbaka pamwibhokaje.
MAR 6:11 Pandu pokapi pabhikana kunjopalela au kunjowanela, mkabhokanyaje na kukung'unda luhombi mu magholu ghinu, nahuli kubhalangi kubha bhakaniki ubholu waka Chapanga!”
MAR 6:12 Bhela bhakabhokiki, na kubhatangazi bhandu bhang'anambukaje na kughaleka mahoku.
MAR 6:13 Bhakaghatopwi majobhi ghamaheli. Na bhakabhapakiki mahuta bhatamwa bhamaheli, na bhatamwa bhakalamike.
MAR 6:14 Panihapa Nkolongwa Helode akajowini malobhi ghanihagha, ndandi bhandu bhamahele bhalongalya ngangachu yaka Yesu pandu pokapi. Bhandu bhangi bhakapwaghiki, “Ajoju Yohana Mbatizaji ahyokiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa! Nde ndandi abhi na makili gha kuhenga hindu ya kukangacha.”
MAR 6:15 Bhangi bhakapwaghiki, “Mundu ajoju nde Eliya.” Bhangi bhakapwaghiki, “Ajoju nde mlota au nde ngati jumu wa bhalota bhaka Chapanga bha mwande.”
MAR 6:16 Nambu Helode paakajowini malobhi ghanihagha akapwaghiki, “Jonihoju nde Yohana. Nakunhekiti mmutu, nambu ahyokike!”
MAR 6:17 Akaholali bhenibhela ndandi pa machobha gha kunyuma Helode akabhohiki amuli Yohana Mbatizaji akamulikaje, na kunkonga muchifungo. Helode akahengiki bhenibhela kwa ndandi jaka Helodia joakabhi nhwanu waka Filipo ndongu waki. Papamu na ghanihagha Helode akaamwi kuntoghola Helodia.
MAR 6:18 Yohana akabhi ampwaghi Helode, “Ngacheutahi wichu kuntogho nhwanu waka ndongu wako.”
MAR 6:19 Bhela Helodia, nhwanu waka nkolongwa akunhakali namaa Yohana, akapaliki kunkoma, nambu ngacheawezike.
MAR 6:20 Helode akunjowipi Yohana ndandi akamanyiki kubha Yohana mundu wamboni na mhuhu, na bhela akundendiki. Helode akapaliki kunjowane Yohana, na hata baada ja kujomo kunjowanela, ngacheakamanyi cha kutenda.
MAR 6:21 Lichobha limu Helodia akapatiki mbekenyu, palahika lichobha la uwangalalu wa kubhelekeka kwaka Helode. Lichobha leniheli Helode akabhakokiki, ihongozi bhakolongwa bha pa inchi jaki na manjolinjoli na ihongozi bhakolongwa bhokapi bha ku Galilaya.
MAR 6:22 Bhela kamwali waka Helodia akajingi na kukina, akabhahekihi namaa bhagheni bhaka Helode. Nkolongwa akumpwaghi mwali jola, “Unyopa chokapi cheuchipala nanatu ananukupekyaje.”
MAR 6:23 Kabheti na kundapila, “Chokapi chewinyopaje ananukupekyaje, hata anajibhi nusu ja ukolongwa wango.”
MAR 6:24 Panihapa kamwali jola akapitiki, na kundaluki mabhu waki, “Bho, nyopa kike?” Na jombi akayangike, “Mmutu waka Yohana Mbatizaji.”
MAR 6:25 Kamwali akakelawiki kabheti kwaka nkolongwa koni akakembala imbelu na kunjopa, “Mbala sajenu, umbekya mmutu waka Yohana Mbatizaji mu chipalo.”
MAR 6:26 Nkolongwa akayomiki namaa, nambu kwa ndandi ja kulapa kwaki, na kwa ndandi ja bhagheni bhaakakokiki, ngacheapaliki kunkanila.
MAR 6:27 Bhela Nkolongwa akuntumiki linjolinjoli akaleta mmutu waka Yohana. Linjolinjoli, akapiti na kucheku mmutu waka Yohana muchifungo,
MAR 6:28 akaletiki mmutu ghola mu chipalo na kumpeke kamwali jola, najombi mwali akumpeki mabhu waki.
MAR 6:29 Bhabhulwa bhaka Yohana pabhakajowini malobhi ghanihagha, bhakapiti kujitola hyegha jaki na kujenda kujitagha mulitengeli.
MAR 6:30 Mitumi bhaki bhala bhakakelawiki kuhuma ku mwanja wabhu, bhakalibhongini palongi jaka Yesu, na kumpwaghila mambu ghokapi ghabhahengiki na kubhola.
MAR 6:31 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Tambokanya tujenda kanjika jitu pandu pangakubha na bhandu mwakapomulya pachokope.” Akapwaghiki bhenibhela ndandi bhakabhi bhandu bhamaheli namaa bhakahika na kubhoka, hata Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki ngachebhaweziki kupata mbekenyu ja kula chilebhe.
MAR 6:32 Bhela bhakabhokani kanjika jabhu mu ngalawa bhakajendanya pandu pangakubha na bhandu.
MAR 6:33 Nambu bhandu bhamahele bhakabhaweni bhakajendaje, na bhakamanyike. Bhela bhandu bhangi bhakahumiki ku kila muchi, bhakakembalya koapita Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki, na bhakabhalonguli kuhika.
MAR 6:34 Yesu paakabhi ahuluka mu ngalawa, akaliweni lipogha la bhandu, na akabhabhoni chiha mumtima waki, maghambu bhakabhi ngati mambelele ghangakubha na ndima. Akatumbwi kubhabhola malobhi ghamahele.
MAR 6:35 Pakamihi pakwahikaje, bhabhulwa bhakunjendi Yesu, na kumpwaghila, “Pandu pani pachingwenje, na sajeno kupilile.
MAR 6:36 Mbanga ubhatabhukaje bhandu habha bhajenda ku mighonda jabhu na kwijiji yabhu ya pambipe, bhakahemala chilebhi.”
MAR 6:37 Nambu Yesu akabhapwaghi, “Mwapekya mabhanganya chilebhi.” Na bhombi bhakundalukile, “Bho, tubhaleha kike? Bho tujenda lelu tukahemala mabumunda kwa ipandi mia ibheli ya madini gha feza, na kubhapekeha bhakulaje?”
MAR 6:38 Yesu akabhalalukile, “Bho, mbi naghu mabumunda ghalenga? Njendanya mkalingaje.” Pabhalingiki, bhakumpwaghile, “Ghabhi mabumunda nhwanu, na homba ibheli.”
MAR 6:39 Bhela Yesu akabhalaghalaki bhabhulwa bhaki bhabhatamika bhandu mu mapogha mapogha pa manyonyoli mabhei.
MAR 6:40 Na bhombi bhakatemi mapogha gha bhandu mia jimu na pangi hamsini.
MAR 6:41 Bhela Yesu akatoliki mabumunda nhwanu na homba ibheli yela, akalingali kunani kumahunde, akunchengwi Chapanga, na kuheketa mabumunda, akabhapeki bhabhulwa bhaki bhaghabhila bhandu. Na homba yela bhakabhaghabhi bhandu bhokapi.
MAR 6:42 Bhandu bhokapi bhakakuliki na kutupila.
MAR 6:43 Bhakatondwi mahighalilu gha mabumunda na homba, na kutwelakela itonga komi na ibheli.
MAR 6:44 Na bhombi bhabhakuliki mabumunda ghala bhakabhi ngati akanalomi elufu nhwano.
MAR 6:45 Palapala Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki bhakwela mu ngalawa, bhalongulya kujenda ku Betisaida kwihi ja bahali. Jombi chikahi chenihechi akabhi ajendalela kubhatabhuka lipogha la bhandu.
MAR 6:46 Pajomula kubhatabhuka akapiti ku chitombi kundobha Chapanga.
MAR 6:47 Pakwahika pakamihi, ngalawa jela jakabhi pachilanda ja bahali, najombi akabhi kanjika jaki kuluwanga.
MAR 6:48 Yesu akabhaweni bhabhulwa bhaki bhang'ahika kuhugha ingaye, maghambu mpongu ukabhi wahibhalakilka. Pakwahiki pachibombu, Yesu akabhajendi bhabhulwa bhaki, koni akajendaje panani ja machi, akapala ngati kubhapeta.
MAR 6:49 Nambu pabhumbweni ajenda panani ja machi, bhaambukya lihoka, bhakajamalile.
MAR 6:50 Kwa ndandi bhokapi pabhumbweni bhakajowipi namaa. Palapala Yesu akalongi nabhu, “Mlipekya mtima, ngamwijoghopa, nde nepani!”
MAR 6:51 Na jombi akakweliki mu ngalawa mobhakabhile, na mpongu ukakotwiki. Panihapa bhakakangichi namaa mumitima jabhu,
MAR 6:52 ndandi bhakabhi bhakona ngakumanya cheakahengiki Yesu panani ja mabumunda ghala. Nambu mitima jabhu jakabhi jinonwipe.
MAR 6:53 Bhakalombwiki bahali na kuhika ku inchi ja ku Genesaleti, bhakajemiki ngimo ngalawa jabhu.
MAR 6:54 Pabhahuluka mu ngalawa jela, palapala bhandu bhakamanyiki kubha jolajo Yesu.
MAR 6:55 Bhela, kwa kujombateka bhakayongalwiti inchi jokapi, bhakatumbwi kwatotola bhatamwa bhabhaghoni panani ja mileli jabhu, bhakabhapeliki kila pandu pabhajowana kubha Yesu abhile.
MAR 6:56 Kila pandu Yesu paakapiti, mwijiji, mu mbwane au mu mighonda, bhandu bhabhekika bhatamwa panja, bhakunjopiki bhajetakya bhatamwa bhunkamula pe hata nkungi wa ingobhu jake. Na bhokapi bhabhunkamwili bhakalamike.
MAR 7:1 Lichobha limu Mafalisayo na bhabhola bhangi bha Shelia bhabhahumila ku Yelusalemu bhakapiti kumbona Yesu.
MAR 7:2 Bhakabhaweni bhabhulwa bhangi bhaka Yesu bhakakula chilebhi kwa mabhoku ghabhu panga kuchamba ngati moipalakila.
MAR 7:3 Ndandi Mafalisayo na Bhayahude bhokapi bhakamulaki namaa mabholu ghabhajopali kwa akahokolu bhabhu, ngachebhakula chindu panga kuchambaki ngati mokupalakila.
MAR 7:4 Kabheti ngachebhakula chindu chokapi kuhuma paligulio panga kugholo hoti ngati mokupalakila na mitetu jabho. Jikabhi kabheti mitetu jengi jebhajopali kutumbu pamwandi ngati ntundu wa kugholo ikombi, sufulia na yombu ya shaba.
MAR 7:5 Bhela Mafalisayo na bhabhola bhangi bha Shelia bhakandaluki Yesu, “Bho, maghambu kiki bhabhulwa bhaku ngachebhajengale mitetu ja akahokolu bhito, nambu bhakula chilebhi kwa mabhoku ghanga kuchambaki ngati mokupalakila?”
MAR 7:6 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Mwanganya mulibhona mbi wichu na koni ngachembi wichu! Mlota Isaya akapwaghiki chakaka panani jinu mabhanganya paakalembiki, ‘Chapanga apwagha, bhandu abhabha, bhanumbali kwa malobhi pela, nambu mu mitima jabhu, bhabhi kutali na nepani.
MAR 7:7 Kunyojabhe kwabhu nde waka, maghambu bhaghabhola malaghalaki ghaghahuma kwa bhandu, ngati amuli yaka Chapanga.’
MAR 7:8 “Mwanganya mwileka amuli yaka Chapanga na kukamuliki malaghalaki gha bhandu.”
MAR 7:9 Yesu akajendali kupwagha, “Mwanganya kwa malangu ghinu mjikana amuli jaka Chapanga nahuli mpata kujengale majopale ghinu!
MAR 7:10 Ndandi Musa akapwaghiki, ‘Untopila atati waku na mabhu waku,’ na ‘Mundu jokapi joantondo atati waki na mabhu waki, apalika akomakikaje.’
MAR 7:11 Nambu mwanganya mbola, ‘Ngati mundu abhi na chindu cheaweza kunjangati atati waki au mabhu waki, nambu apwagha kubha, chindu che hechi nde Kolubani,’ yani cha kumpeke nhupu Chapanga,
MAR 7:12 bhela ngacheapalika kabheti kunjangati atati waki au mabhu waki.
MAR 7:13 Bhenibhela nde momulikani Lilobhi laka Chapanga kwa ndandi ja mabholu ghamulibhekile. Kabheti muhenga mambu ghamahele ngati ganihaga.”
MAR 7:14 Yesu akalilohiki kabheti lipogha la bhandu lela, na kubhapwaghila, “Nyowanyaje mabhokape, na mmanyaje.
MAR 7:15 Nga chindu cheakula mundu chechiweza kuntenda mundu abya nhwakau. Nambu chechipita mumtima jaka mundu nde chechuntenda mundu abya nhwakau.
MAR 7:16 Joabhi na makutu gha kujowanela, na ajowanaje!”
MAR 7:17 Paalilekiki lipogha la bhandu na kujingi munyumba, bhabhulwa bhaki bhakundaluki ndandi ja mabholu gha ulenganesu ghonighola.
MAR 7:18 Na jombi akabhapwaghile, “Bho, hata mwanganya le ngachemmanye? Bho, ngachemmanyi kubha chindu chechunjingi mundu kuhuma kunja ngachechiweza kuntenda mundu abya muhakau,
MAR 7:19 maghambu ngachechunjingi mumtima, nambu mulutumbo, na ujomukelu waki kupita kunja kulikelo?” Kwa kupwagha bhenibhela Yesu akaigholwi ilebhi yokapi.
MAR 7:20 Akajendali kupwagha, “Mambu ghaghapita nkati jaka mundu, nde ghaghuntenda mundu abya muhakau.
MAR 7:21 Kwa ndandi kuhuma nkati, mumtima waka mundu, ghapita maholalelu ghaliyaha, ukemi,
MAR 7:22 wihi, kukoma, ugone, utokulelu uhakau, milomu, wime, kukoloha, malobhi gha utane na wihu, matondu, ing'omu na ung'ang'a.
MAR 7:23 Mahakau ghanihagha ghokapi ghahuma mumtima waka mundu, na ghombi nde ghaghuntenda mundu abya muhakau.”
MAR 7:24 Bhela Yesu akabhokiki panipala, akapiti ku inchi ja ku Tilo. Konihoku akajingi mu nyumba jimu na ngachepai mundu amanyaje, nambu ngacheaweziki kulihiya.
MAR 7:25 Nambu mbomba jumu joakabhi na mwali waki joakabhi na lijobhi, akajowini malobhi ghaka Yesu, akahikiki na kulileke palongi ja magholu ghaki.
MAR 7:26 Mbomba hoju akabhi Mgiliki, mwenei wa ku Silofainike. Akundobhiki Yesu amboha kamwali waki lijobhi.
MAR 7:27 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ubhalekaje bhana bhatupila hoti, kwa ndandi nga wichu kutola chilebhi cha bhana na kujenda kuipeke nakawa.”
MAR 7:28 Nambu mabhu jola akapwaghike, “Chakaka, Bambo, hata nakawa yeibhi pahi ja meza ikula mahighalilu gha ilebhi ya bhana.”
MAR 7:29 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Kwa ndandi ja lilobhi leniheli, ubhujaje kunyumba jaku. Lijobhi lumbokiki mwali waku!”
MAR 7:30 Bhela akapiti kunyumba jaki, akunketani mwana aghoni pachitanda na lijobhi lumbokike.
MAR 7:31 Yesu akabhokiki ku inchi ja ku Tilo, akapetili ku Sidoni, akahikiki ku bahali ja Galilaya kwa kupetela inchi ja ku Dekapoli.
MAR 7:32 Bhela bhakundeti mpuli, najombi akabhi ngajowa, bhakunjopiki ambekila mabhoku nahuli andamihaje.
MAR 7:33 Yesu akumbohiki mundu jola pa lipogha la bhandu na akunjingi ngonji mu makutu ghaka mundu jola, akahuni imata mu ngonji yaki na kunkamu mundu jola pa lulimi.
MAR 7:34 Panihapa Yesu akalingali kunani kumahunde kwaka Chapanga, akapomwi kwa makili, na kumpwaghila, “Efata,” ndandi jaki, “Uhoghukaje.”
MAR 7:35 Palapala mundu jola akatumbwi kujowana wichu, na chifungu cha lulimi lwaki chakabhopwiki, na kulonge wichu.
MAR 7:36 Yesu akabhakanaki ngabhampwaghi mundu jokapi jola lilobhi lenihele. Nambu ngati moakabhakanakili, nde mobhajendalili kutangaza lilobhi lenihele.
MAR 7:37 Bhandu bhakakangichi namaa na kupwagha, “Atehi ghokapi wichu. Abhatenda hata akangajowa kujowana, na akabhapuli kulongela!”
MAR 8:1 Chikahi hechi, lipogha likolongwa la bhandu bhakalibhongini kabheti, na ngachebhabhi na chilebhe. Yesu akabhalohiki kabheti bhabhulwa bhaki, na kubhapwaghila,
MAR 8:2 “Nabhabhone chiha bhandu abhabha ndandi bhabhi na nepani kwa machobha ghatatu, wala ngachebhabhi na chilebhe.
MAR 8:3 Ananalekiki bhajenda kunyumba koni bhabhi na injala anabhang'anduka mwindela, ndandi bhangi bhahumiki kutale.”
MAR 8:4 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakundaluki, “Pandu pani pachingwenje, bho, anaghapatikana kwaku mabumunda gha kubhajaghanila bhandu abhabha bhokape?”
MAR 8:5 Yesu akabhalalukile, “Bho, mbinaghu mabumunda ghalenga?” Bhakayangiki, “Tubhi na mabumunda saba.”
MAR 8:6 Bhela akabhalaghalaki bhandu bhatama pahi. Akatohi mabumunda saba ghala, na kunchengu Chapanga, na kujiheketa, na kubhapeke bhabhulwa bhaki bhaghabhila bhandu, na bhombi bhakabhaghabhile.
MAR 8:7 Bhakabhi kabheti na tuhomba tuchokope. Yesu akaipengalili, na kubhalaghalaki bhabhulwa bhaki bhabhaghabhila bhandu bhelabhela.
MAR 8:8 Bhandu bhakakuliki, na kutupila. Bhakabhongini mahighalilu na kutwelakela hitonga saba.
MAR 8:9 Na bhandu bhabhakuliki bhakabhi ngati elufu ncheche. Bhela Yesu akabhatawiki,
MAR 8:10 na palapala akakwehi mu ngalawa papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki, akapiti ku Dalimanuta.
MAR 8:11 Mafalisayo bhakahikiki na kutumbu kulongalane na Yesu. Kwa kumpendakela, bhakumpaliki ahenga nginyulila nahuli kulangi ngati ahuma kunani kwaka Chapanga.
MAR 8:12 Yesu akayomiki muroho, “Bho, mbona kibheleku chenjenu chipala nginyulila? Numpwaghi chakaka! Chibheleku chenjenu ngachipati nginyuli jokapi jela.”
MAR 8:13 Bhela akabhalekiki, akajingi mungalawa, na kutumbu mwanja kulomboka kwihi ja nhwanga.
MAR 8:14 Bhabhulwa bhakabhi bhajewiki kutotola mabumunda ghamahele, nambu bhakabhi na libumuda limu pela mu ngalawa jela.
MAR 8:15 Yesu akabhakanakile, “Ntama kutali na mlilingalya wichu na amila ja Mafalisayo na amila jaka Helode.”
MAR 8:16 Bhabhulwa bhakatumbwi kulonge bheni kwa bheni, “Apwagha bhenibhela ndandi ngachetubhi na mabumunda.”
MAR 8:17 Yesu akaghamanyi ghanihagha, akabhapwaghile, “Bho, ndongalane bhenibhela maghambu ngachembi na mabumunda? Bho, mwakali nga kumanya? Bho, maghambu kiki mitima jinu jitopike?
MAR 8:18 Mbi na mihu, nambu ngachendinga? Mbi na makutu, nambu ngachenjowana? Bho, ngachenkomboka?
MAR 8:19 Chikahi panahekiti mabumunda nhwanu na kubhapeke bhandu elufu nhwano, mkabhongini itonga ilenga ya mahighalilu?” Bhakamuyangiki, “Itonga komi na ibheli.”
MAR 8:20 Akabhalaluki kabheti, “Na panahekiti mabumunda saba na kubhapeke bhandu elufu ncheche, mwakabhongini mahighalilu itonga ilenga?” Bhakamuyangiki, “Itonga saba.”
MAR 8:21 Bhela akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mwakali le ngakumanya?”
MAR 8:22 Yesu akahiki ku Betisaida papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki. Bhandu bhakundeti ngalola, bhakunjopiki ankamula nahuli andamihaje.
MAR 8:23 Yesu akunkamwi ngalola jola chiwoku akumpeliki kunja ja chijiji. Akunhuni imata mumihu, akumbeki mabhoku, na kundalukila, “Bho, uchibhona chindu?”
MAR 8:24 Ngalola jola akalingiki kunani, na kupwagha, “Nabhabhona bhandu bhabhonikana ngati mikongu jejijenda.”
MAR 8:25 Bhela Yesu akumbeki kabheti mabhoku mumihu. Na jombi akatupiki mihu na uwezu waki wa kulola ukunkelabhukili na akaweni kila chindu wichu.
MAR 8:26 Yesu akumpwaghi abhuja kunyumba jaki na kundakalila, “Ngawikelabhuka kuchijiji, wala kumpwaghila mundu jokapi jola.”
MAR 8:27 Bhela Yesu na bhabhulwa bhapita kuijiji ya ku Kaisalia Filipi. Pabhakabhi mwindela, Yesu akabhalaluki bhabhulwa bhaki, “Bho, bhandu bhapwagha kubha nepani nde nane?”
MAR 8:28 Bhakamuyangiki, “Bhangi bhapwagha wehapa wa Yohana Mbatizaji, bhangi Eliya na jumu wa bhalota bhaka Chapanga.”
MAR 8:29 Na jombi akabhalalukile, “Mwanganya bho, mpwagha nepani nde nane?” Petulu akayangiki, “Wehapa nde Kristo.”
MAR 8:30 Panihapa Yesu akabhakanaki ngabhampwaghi mundu jokapi jola malobhi ghaki.
MAR 8:31 Yesu akatumbwi kwabhola bhabhulwa bhaki, “Impalika Mwana waka Mundu ang'ahikaje pamaheli na kukanakika na bhazee na bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhabhola bha Shelia. Bhela anakomakikaji, na baada ja machobha ghatatu anahyokaje.”
MAR 8:32 Yesu akabhapwaghi lilobhi heli hotuhotu. Bhela Petulu akundohiki Yesu punkeghi, na kunkanaki ngaipwagha mambu ghanihagha.
MAR 8:33 Nambu Yesu akang'anambwiki, akabhalingali bhabhulwa bhaki, akunkenjuki Petulu, akapwaghaje, “Shetani, bhokaje palongi jango! Maholalelu ghaku nga ghaka Chapanga, nambu gha bhandu.”
MAR 8:34 Kabheti akalilohiki lipogha la bhandu papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki na kubhapwaghila, “Ngati mundu jokapi apala kunyengalela nepani, impalika alikana mwene, autola nsalaba waki na anyengalyaje.
MAR 8:35 Ndandi mundu joapala kukengalela womi waki mweni, anauhoaje, nambu mundu joahoa womi waki kwa ndandi jangu nepani na kwa ndandi ja Malobhi Manyahi, anaukengalyaje.
MAR 8:36 Bho, anakunjangatya kiki mundu kuupata ndema wokapi, na kughahoa matamu ghaki mweni?
MAR 8:37 Kabheti mundu anabhoha chindu bholi nahuli aghapata kabheti matamu ghaki mweni?
MAR 8:38 Mundu jokapi muchibheleku chenjenu chihakau na changakubha na ulongwana kwaka Chapanga, joamone iyoni nepani na mabholu ghangu, Mwana waka Mundu anambonila iyoni mundu hoju, chikahi paanahikaje mu ulumbalilu wa Atati waki papamu na bhatumika bhahuhu bha kunani kwaka Chapanga.”
MAR 9:1 Yesu akajendali kubhapwaghila, “Numpwaghi chakaka, bhabhi bhandu bhangi bhabhajemiki pambani, ambabhu ngabhipoteli ng'o, mbaka pabhaubhona Ukolongwa waka Chapanga ukahikaje kwa makili.”
MAR 9:2 Paghapetiki machobha sita, Yesu akabhatoliki Petulu, Yakobo na Yohana na kujenda nabhu kunani ja chitombi chikolongwa kanjika jabhu. Konihoku bhakumbweni akang'anambuka pamihu palongi jabhu,
MAR 9:3 ingobhu yaki ikang'anyiki, ikang'anyiki kupukupu nga mundu pundema joakaweza kwing'anyiha ngati bhenibhela.
MAR 9:4 Bhabhulwa bhatatu bhala bhakabhaweni Eliya na Musa bhakalongilaje na Yesu.
MAR 9:5 Petulu akumpwaghi Yesu, “Mbola, nde wichu tepani tubya pambane! Tuchengaje indamba itatu, chimu chaku, chimu chaka Musa na chengi chaka Eliya.”
MAR 9:6 Petulu na bhajaki bhakajowipi namaa, hata ngacheamanyi cha kulongela.
MAR 9:7 Bhela likapitali lihundi na kubhayeka, na sauti jakajowaniki kuhuma mu lihundi hele, “Hajoju nde Mwana wangu mpalu, munjowanya jombe!”
MAR 9:8 Palapala bhabhulwa bhaki bhakalingali kabheti, nambu ngachebhumbweni mundu jonge nambu Yesu kanjika jaki papamu na bheni pela.
MAR 9:9 Bhela pabhabhila bhahele pachitombi, Yesu akabhakanaki, “Ngabhumpwaghi mundu jokapi jola mambu ghabhaghaweni, mbaka Mwana waka Mundu paibya ayokiki kabheti.”
MAR 9:10 Bhela bhakalikamwi lilaghalaki hele, bhakatumbwi kulaluwana bheni kwa bheni, “Bho, kuyoka kwa bhabhapotile nde kike?”
MAR 9:11 Bhakundaluki Yesu, “Bho, mbona bhabhola bha Shelia bhapwagha Eliya anatumbula kuhika?”
MAR 9:12 Na jombi akabhayangiki, “Ena, Eliya anahika hoti kulenganake ghokapi. Hata bhela bho, maghambu ki ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu kubha Mwana waka Mundu ahipata mang'ahiku ghamaheli na kuntondola?
MAR 9:13 Nambu numpwaghila, Eliya ajomwi kuhika na bhombi bhakuntendi ngati mobhapalila bheni ngati mokwalembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu panani jaki.”
MAR 9:14 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhangi bhatatu bhala, bhakakelawiki mbaka pabhakabhi bhabhulwa bhangi, bhakaliweni lipogha likolongwa la bhandu papo. Na bhabhola bhangi bha Shelia bhakabhi bhalochana nabhu.
MAR 9:15 Palapala lipogha la bhandu pabhakumbweni Yesu, bhakakangichi namaa, bhakunkembali nahuli bhundamukyaje.
MAR 9:16 Yesu akabhalaluki bhabhulwa, “Bho, ndochana nabhu kike?”
MAR 9:17 Panihapa mundu jumu pa lipogha la bhandu akayangike, “Mbola, nundetiki mwana wangu kwako, abhi na lijobhi leluntei abya mpuli.
MAR 9:18 Kila paghuntukalila, ghunhabhu pahi na kuntenda ghumpita mahuluhulu mundomu, koni akayagha minu ghaki na kujomangana hyegha joha. Nakabhajopiki bhabhulwa bhaku bhumboha lijobhi, nambu ngachebhawezike.”
MAR 9:19 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mwanganya chibheleku changakubha na uhobhalelu! Bho, ananunhinakya mbaka lile? Mundeta nkombu wehoju kwangu nepani!”
MAR 9:20 Bhakumpeliki kwaka Yesu. Palapala lijobhi paakumbweni Yesu, akunjeghi mwana jola chihinduhindu, na mwana akaawiki pahi, akaghalawiki na kumpita mahuluhulu mundomu.
MAR 9:21 Yesu akundaluki tati waka mwana jola, “Hindu heyi yumpatiki kutumbu lile? Na jombi akamuyangiki, “Kutumbu umwana waki.
MAR 9:22 Na pamaheli lijobhi hoju angalawi nkombu hoju pamoto na mumachi, nahuli ankomaje. Henu, anauweza kuhenga lijambu lokapi lela, utubhonila chiha na utujangatyaje!”
MAR 9:23 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Bho, maghambu ki upwagha ngati anauweza? Mambu ghokape ghaweza kuhengakeka kwaka mundu joahobhalela.”
MAR 9:24 Palapala, tati jola akaleliki kwa makili, “Nenga nhobhalela! Nambu uhobhalelu wangu nde kuchoko, unyangatya kuhobhalela nakanope.”
MAR 9:25 Yesu paakaliweni lipogha la bhandu lijonjukeka palongi jaki, akundakali lijobhi jola, “Lijobhi weuntenda mwana ajoju abya mpuli na ngajogwa, nukulaghalakila umboka mwana ajoju, na wala ngawanjingi kabhete!”
MAR 9:26 Palapala lijobhi lela lakajamalili, lakungalawi mwana jola pahi na lakumpitike. Mwana akabhonakini ngati joapotile na bhela bhandu bhangi bhakapwaghiki, “Apotile!”
MAR 9:27 Nambu Yesu akunkamwi chiwoku, akunjangati kujema, najombi akajemiki.
MAR 9:28 Bhela, Yesu paakajingi mu nyumba, bhabhulwa bhaki bhakundalukile, “Bho, maghambu ki tepani ngachetaweziki kulibhoha lijobhi lela?”
MAR 9:29 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Majobhi gha bhenibhela ngacheghaweza kubhoka, nambu kwa indela ja kundobha Chapanga.”
MAR 9:30 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakabhokiki panihapa, bhakajendali na mwanja kupete ku Galilaya. Yesu ngachepaliki bhandu bhamanya ngati abhi ku inchi jaki hoku,
MAR 9:31 maghambu akabhi abhabhola bhabhulwa bhaki. Akabhapwaghile, “Mwana waka Mundu anabhumpelaka kwa bhandu na bhombi anabhunkomaje, nambu lichobha la katatu anahyokaje.”
MAR 9:32 Nambu bhabhulwa bhaki ngachebhamanyi malobhi ghalongela, na bhakajowipi kundalukila.
MAR 9:33 Bhela, bhakahiki ku Kapelenaumu. Na paakabhi mu nyumba akabhalaluki, “bho, ndongalanya ki mwindela?”
MAR 9:34 Nambu bhombi ngachebhumpwaghile, ndandi pabhakabhi mwindela bhakalochini kubha nde nane nkolongwa pachilanda jabhu.
MAR 9:35 Yesu akatemi pahi, akabhalohiki komi na bhabheli, na kubhapwaghila, “Mundu anapahi kubha wa kutumbula, impalika akubhaje wa kujomukela na akubhaje mtumika wa bhokapi.”
MAR 9:36 Kabheti Yesu akuntohi mwana nchokuchoku, akunjemiki pachilanda jabhu, akunjobhatili na kubhapwaghila,
MAR 9:37 “Joanjopale mwana ngati jonjo kwa lihina langu, anyopale nepani, na joanyopale nepani, ngacheanyopale nepani pela, nambu anjopale jola joandumike.”
MAR 9:38 Yohana akumpwaghi Yesu, “Mbola, tumbweni mundu jumu aghabhoha majobhi kwa lihina laku. Na tepani tukalengiki kunkanakila ndandi jombi ngacheabhi papamu na tepani.”
MAR 9:39 Nambu Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ngamwankanakila, ndandi nga mundu joaweza kutenda ngangachu kwa lihina langu, na palapala kunongale mahakau.
MAR 9:40 Ndandi jwangakutupenga tepani abhi upambala wito.
MAR 9:41 Mundu jokapi jola joampekya chikombi cha machi gha kunywa, kwa kubha mabhanganya mabhandu bhaka Kristo, chakaka ngailepi kupata nhupu waki.
MAR 9:42 “Mundu jokapi joanaantenda jumu wa bhachoku abhabha bhabhanhobhale nepani kuhenga mahoku, ikabya mbaka kwaka mundu hoju kukongakeka liganga likolongwa la kuyaghila na kulekaleka mubahali.
MAR 9:43 Chiwoku chaku anachikutendiki utendaje mahoku, hekataje! Mbanga kujingi mu womi panga chiwoku chimu, kuliku kubha na mabhoku ghabheli na kujenda ku Jehanamu, mu moto wangakuchuchuka.
MAR 9:44 Momuje, tundu twaki ngachetukuwa, wala moto waki ngacheuchuchuka.
MAR 9:45 Na chigholu chaku anachikutendiki utendaje mahoku, hekataje! Mbanga kujingi mu womi panga chigholu chimu, kuliku kubha na magholu ghokapi na kukujeghe ku Jehanamu, mu moto wangakuchuchuka.
MAR 9:46 Momuje, tundu twaki ngachetukuwa, wala moto waki ngacheuchuchuka.
MAR 9:47 Na lihu laku analukutendiki utendaje mahoku, litupulaje! Mbanga kujingi mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga ukabya na lihu limu pela, kuliku kubha na mihu ghaku ghokapi ghabheli na kulekaleka mu moto wa Jehanamu.
MAR 9:48 Momuje tumbeku twaki ngachetukuwa, wala moto waki ngacheuchuchuka.
MAR 9:49 “Ndandi kila mundu anagholulikaji kwa mwinyu, ngati nyambiku mojigholulakela kwa moto.
MAR 9:50 “Mwinyu nde wamboni, nambu anauhoiki kunogha kwaki, bho, anaukolakika na kyane? “Mbya na mwinyu wa ukochi nkati jinu, na mkamulakyaje kutama kwa lukwale mabheti kwa mabheti.”
MAR 10:1 Yesu akabhokiki panihapa na kujenda ku Yudea, mbaka kwihi ja Nkoka Yoludani. Lipogha likolongwa la bhandu lakunjendi kabheti, najombi akabhabholiki ngati mowabheli ntetu waki.
MAR 10:2 Panihapa Mafalisayo bhakunjendili, na kwa kundenga bhakundalukile, “Bho, Amuli jaka Chapanga le jijetakela mwanalomi kundeka nhwanu wake?”
MAR 10:3 Yesu akabhayangike, “Bho, Musa akundaghalaki bhole?”
MAR 10:4 Na bhombi bhakamuyangike, “Musa akalaghalaki mwanalomi ngaandeka nhwanu waki mbaka ampekya baluwa ja kulekana na kundeka.”
MAR 10:5 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Musa akundembi amuli jeniheji kwa ndandi ja kunonopa kwa mitima jinu.
MAR 10:6 Nambu kutumbu kubhombakeka ndema, Chapanga akumbombiki mwanalomi na mbomba.
MAR 10:7 Bhela mwanalomi anaandeka tati waki na mabhu waki, na kulombana papamu na nhwanu waki machobha ghokape,
MAR 10:8 na bhombi bhabheli habha anabhakubhaje hyegha jimu. Bhela, bhombi nga bhabheli kabhete, nambu hyegha jimu.
MAR 10:9 Bhela, chealombanishi Chapanga, mundu ngayilombola.”
MAR 10:10 Pabhakajingi kabheti mu nyumba, bhabhulwa bhaki bhakundaluki panani ja libholu lenihele.
MAR 10:11 Na jombi akabhapwaghile, “Joandeka nhwanu waki na kuntoghola jongi, antende ugoni nhwanu waki.
MAR 10:12 Bhelabhela na mbomba joandeka ndomi waki na kutoghuleka na jongi, atenda ugone.”
MAR 10:13 Bhandu bhakundeti Yesu bhana bhachoku bhachoku nahuli abhapengalyaje, nambu bhabhulwa bhaki bhakabhalakalile.
MAR 10:14 Yesu paakaweni bhenibhela, akahakalili namaa, akabhapwaghile, “Mwabhaleka bhana abhabha bhahika kwangu nepani, wala ngamwahibhalila, maghambu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga ubhi kwa ndandi ja bhandu bhabhabhi ngati bhana abhabha.
MAR 10:15 Numpwaghi chakaka, mundu jokapi jwangakupala kujopalela Ukolongwa waka Chapanga ngati mwana nchoku ngaijingi monihomu ng'o.”
MAR 10:16 Bhela akabhajopiki bhana habha, akabhabheki mabhoku na kubhapengalela.
MAR 10:17 Yesu patumbula kabheti mwanja waki, mundu jumu akunkembalili, akunchikamili palongi jaki, na kundalukila, “Mbola wambone, bho, ndenda bhole nahuli mbata kuupwelela womi wa mileli?”
MAR 10:18 Yesu akamuyangike, “Bho, mbona unoha wambone? Njeta joabhi wambone nambu jumu pela, yani Chapanga kanjika jaki.
MAR 10:19 Wimanyi le amuli, ‘Ngawihenga ugoni, ngawikoma, ngawijibha, ngawilonge upuhe, ngawikolowa, untopilaje tati waku na mabhu waku.’ ”
MAR 10:20 Na jombi akayangike, “Mbola, ghanihagha ghokapi naghakamwili kutumbu umwana wangu.”
MAR 10:21 Yesu akundingali, na kumpala, akumpwaghile, “Chihighali chindu chimu. Ujendaje ukalombisaje kila chindu cheubhi nachu, ukabhapekya bhahochu mbija yene, na wenga walibhekila chikoku kunani kumahunde. Anautehi bhenibhela, utola msalaba waku, na uhika unyengalyaje.”
MAR 10:22 Paakajowini ghanihagha, akatondike, akabhokiki koni mtima umbina, ndandi akabhi na hindu yamahele na ngacheakapaliki kuighabha hindu yaki.
MAR 10:23 Yesu akalingali ipambala yokapi, akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Kunonwipi namaa kwa bhanahindu yamahele kujingi mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga!”
MAR 10:24 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakakangichi kwa malobhi ghaki. Yesu akabhapwaghi kabhete, “Bhana bhangu, kunonwipi namaa kwa bhandu bhabhahobhalela hindu yamaheli, kujingila mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga!
MAR 10:25 Kupepwiki namaa kwa chinyama chechilowakeka ngamia kuholota mu limboghi la sindano, kuliku mwanahindu yamaheli kujingi mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga!”
MAR 10:26 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakakangichi namaa, bhakalaluhine, “Bho, nane henu, joanawezaje kukengaleka?”
MAR 10:27 Yesu akabhalingalili, na kubhapwaghila, “Kwa bhandu ngakuwezikana, nambu kwaka Chapanga ngabhela, ndandi kwaka Chapanga kila chindu chiwezikana.”
MAR 10:28 Kabheti Petulu akumpwaghile, “Lingalyaje! Na tepani bhole? Tughalekiki ghokapi, na kukujengalela wehapa!”
MAR 10:29 Yesu akapwaghike, “Chakaka numpwaghila, kila mundu joajilehi nyumba, au bhalongu, au bhalombu, au mabhu, au atati, au bhana, au mighonda kwa ndandi jangu na kwa ndandi ja Malobhi Manyahi,
MAR 10:30 anaajopalyaje mala mia jimu nakanope chikahi cha sajenu. Nyumba, ndongu, ndombu, mabhu, bhana na mighonda papamu na mang'ahiku, na mu ndema ghouhika anaajopalyaje womi wa mileli.
MAR 10:31 Nambu bhamaheli bhabhahobhaleka kubha bhakutumbula sajenu bhibya bhakujomukela, na bhabhabhi bha kujomukela sajenu bhibya bhakutumbula.”
MAR 10:32 Bhela, bhakabhi mwindela kukwela ku Yelusalemu, na Yesu akabhi abhalongulile. Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakabhi na lujoghopo, na bhandu bhabhajengalyaje bhakajowipi. Yesu akabhatohi kabheti punkeghi komi na bhabheli bhala, na kutumbula kubhapwaghila mambu ghaghumpataje.
MAR 10:33 Akabhapwaghile, “Ndingalyaje, tukwela kujenda ku Yelusalemu. Na konihoku Mwana waka Mundu anabhumpelaka mu mabhoku gha bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhabhola bha Shelia, na bhombi anabhuntemula apotilaje na kubhapeke bhandu bha mataifa ghange.
MAR 10:34 Na bhombi anabhundongamaje, anabhunhunila imata, bhandapula chiboku cha ndomondo na kunkoma. Nambu lichobha la katatu anahyokaje.”
MAR 10:35 Yakobo na Yohana bhana bhaka Zebedayo, bhakunjendi Yesu na kumpwaghila, “Mbola, tupala utuhengila chindu chetakulobhaje.”
MAR 10:36 Yesu akabhalalukile, “Bho, mpala nunhengila kike?”
MAR 10:37 Bhakamuyangike, “Utujetakalyaje kutama jumu upambala wa kumalelelu jaku, na jumu upambala wa kumangeja jaku, mu ulumbalilu waku.”
MAR 10:38 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ngachemmanyi lendobha! Bho, muweza kunywele chikombi cha mang'ahiku ngati moning'ahikya nepani, na kubatizwa mu ubatizu ngati ghonibatizwaje?”
MAR 10:39 Bhakamuyangike, “Tuweza.” Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Chakaka mwinywelila mu chikombi cha mang'ahiku chenikunywa nepani, na mwibatizwa ngati monibatizwaje.
MAR 10:40 Kwa bhala bhabhitama kumalelelu au kumangeja jangu nga lihengu langu kupanga. Nambu mbekanyu jeniheji bhipata bhabhabhekakiki na Chapanga.”
MAR 10:41 Bhabhulwa bhangi komi bhala pabhakajowini ghanihagha, bhakatumbwi kubhahakali Yakobo na Yohana.
MAR 10:42 Bhela, Yesu akabhalohiki, na kubhapwaghila, “Bhandu bhabhamanyikana kubha bhatawala bha bhandu bhangakubha Bhayahude bhabhatawala bhandu bhabhu kwa makili, na kabheti bhatawala bhe habha bhabhahengela ngati mobhapalila.
MAR 10:43 Nambu kwinu mabhanganya ngakwikubha bhenibhela, nambu joapala kubha nkolongwa pachilanda jinu, apalika abya ntumika winu.
MAR 10:44 Joapala kubha wa kutumbula, apalika abya mtumika wa bhokape.
MAR 10:45 Ndandi Mwana waka Mundu ngachehiki kutumikiwa, nambu kutumikila, na kuubhoha womi waki nahuli kubhalepela bhandu bhamahele.”
MAR 10:46 Bhela, bhakahiki ku Yeliko, najombi Yesu paapitika mu muchi hoghu akabya na bhabhulwa bhaki papamu na lipogha likolongwa la bhandu. Mundu jumu ngalola joalowakeka Batilomayo, mwana waka Timayo, akabhi atami punkeghi ja indela akajopa bhunjangatyaje.
MAR 10:47 Paakajowini kubha Yesu wa ku Nazaleti akabhili apeta pandu panihapa, akatumbwi kujamalila, “Yesu, Mwana wa Daude, umonila chiha!”
MAR 10:48 Bhandu bhamahele bhakundakalile nahuli atumbalaje, nambu jombi akajonjuki kujamalila, “Mwana waka Daude, umonila chiha!”
MAR 10:49 Yesu akajemiki, na kupwagha, “Mundohaje.” Bhela, bhakundohiki ngalola jola, bhakumpwaghili, “Ulipekya mtima! Jemaje, akuloha.”
MAR 10:50 Na jombi akaleki kutali ingobhu jaki, akahombiki, na kunjende Yesu.
MAR 10:51 Yesu akundalukile, “Bho, upala nukuhengila kike?” Ngalola jola akayangike, “Mbola, nyopa mbata kulola.”
MAR 10:52 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Jendaje, uhobhalelu waku ukulamihe.” Palapala ngalola jola akaweziki kulola, na akunjengali Yesu mwindela.
MAR 11:1 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki pabhakaheghali muchi wa Yelusalemu, upambala cha Besifage na Besania, pambipi na Chitombi cha Mizeituni. Yesu akabhatumiki bhabhulwa bhaki bhabhele,
MAR 11:2 akabhapwaghile, “Njendanya ku chijiji chechibhi palongi jinu. Pamwibya njingi monihomu, anamulihimanya liponda likongakiki, liponda heli ngachejendi mundu. Mkabhopula na mkaletaje.
MAR 11:3 Ngati mundu anandalukile, ‘Ndandi kiki mulibhopo liponda heli? Mumpwaghila, Bambo alipala na anakelebhua kabheti pambani esajeno.’ ”
MAR 11:4 Bhela bhakapiti na bhakalihimani liponda lela likongakiki pundyangu wa nyumba punkeghi ja indela. Pabhakabhi bhabhopola,
MAR 11:5 bhandu bhabhakabhi panipala bhakabhalalukile, “Ndandi kiki mbopo liponda heli?”
MAR 11:6 Bhabhulwa bhakayangiki ngati moakapwaghi Yesu, na bhandu bhala bhakajetaki bhajenda nalo.
MAR 11:7 Bhakumpelaki Yesu liponda lela, na kutandika ingobhu yabhu panani ja liponda, na Yesu akatami panani jaki.
MAR 11:8 Bhandu bhamahele bhakatandiki ingobhu yabhu mwindela, na bhangi bhakajaliki matutu ghabhaghahekiti mumighonda.
MAR 11:9 Bhandu bhokapi bhabhalongulili na bhabhajengalyaji bhakatumbwi kujamalila, “Chapanga Alumbalikaje! Apengalika jonihoju joahika kwa lihina laka Bambo!
MAR 11:10 Upengalika ukolongwa ghouhika waka hokolu witu Daude! Ulumbalilu kwaka Chapanga kunani kumahunde!”
MAR 11:11 Yesu akahiki ku Yelusalemu na kujenda palubhanja lwa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, akalingali kila chindu wichu. Nambu ndandi kukabhi pakamihi, akapiti ku Besania papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki komi na bhabhele bhala.
MAR 11:12 Chilabhu jaki, pabhakabhi bhakelabhuka kuhuma ku Besania, Yesu akabhi na injala.
MAR 11:13 Bhela akauweni cha kutali nkongu wa mtini ukabya na mahamba ghamahele. Akauheghali nahuli kulinga ngati aweza kughabhona mapambiku. Nambu paakauheghalili, ngacheaghaweni mapambiku nambu mahamba matopo, ndandi ngachechabhi chikahi cha kupambika mapambiku.
MAR 11:14 Yesu akaupwaghi nkongu wa mtini ghola, “Kutumbu lalenu mbaka mileli nga mundu joanakulaje mapambiku ghaku kabheti!” Na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakajowini malobhi ghanihagha.
MAR 11:15 Bhela pabhahiki ku Yelusalemu, Yesu akapiti ku Nyumba jaka Chapanga na kutumbu kubhatopo bhandu bhabhakabhi bhalombesa na kulomba hindu. Akang'anambwi meza ya bhabhabhi bhang'anambulana mbija na hitehu ya bhabhabhi bhalombesa ngunda,
MAR 11:16 na ngacheandekiki mundu jokapi kupeta na chindu chokapi chela palubhanja lwa Nyumba jaka Chapanga.
MAR 11:17 Bhela akabhabholiki bhandu, “Bho, ngacheyalembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu, ‘Nyumba jangu anajibya Nyumba ja malobhu kwa mataifa ghokapi?’ Nambu mabhanganya mjitehi kubha likolu la bhihe!”
MAR 11:18 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhabhola bha Shelia pabhakajowini malobhi ghanihagha, bhakatumbwi kulonda indela ja kunkoma Yesu. Nambu bhakunjowipi, ndandi lipogha lokapi la bhandu lakakangichi mabholu ghaki.
MAR 11:19 Chimihi pachahikaje, Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakabhokiki pamuchi ghonighola.
MAR 11:20 Chilabhu jaki palukela, pabhapetika mwindela, bhakauweni nkongu wa mtini ghola ujomiki kaghajo wokapi kutumbu kumikegha mbaka kunani.
MAR 11:21 Petulu akakombwiki chechatendakiki na akumpwaghi Yesu, “Mbola, lingalyaje! Nkongu wa mtini ghoupeki masolu ghola ujomike!”
MAR 11:22 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Munhobhalya Chapanga.
MAR 11:23 Numpwaghi chakaka, mundu anaachipwaghi chitombi chenje, ‘Jighukaje na ukalilekala mubahali,’ panga kubhona choghohi muntima waki, nambu anahobhale malobhi ghokapi ghalonge anaghahengakikaje, chakaka analihengakika kwake.
MAR 11:24 Bhela numpwaghila, pansalila na kulobha chindu, muhobhalya kubha njopalile, nanamu anampataje.
MAR 11:25 Panjema na kundobha Chapanga, mundekakya kila mundu joanhoki chokapi, nahuli Atati winu joabhi kunani kumahunde andekakya na mwenga mahoku ghinu.
MAR 11:26 Nambu nangakubhalekake bhajinu, hata Atati winu joabhi kunani kumahunde ngaandekakeli mwanganya mahoku ghinu.”
MAR 11:27 Bhela bhakahiki kabheti ku Yelusalemu. Yesu paakabhi ajenda pa liwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, bhabhola bha Shelia na bhazee bhakunjendili,
MAR 11:28 na bhakundalukile, “Bho, uhenga mambu ghangane kwa lujiniku lwaka nane? Bho, nde nane joakupeki wehapa lujiniku lwa kuhenga mambu ghangane?”
MAR 11:29 Nambu Yesu akabhayangike, “Ananundalukya lilaluki limu. Anamniyangiki, nanatu ananumpwaghila kubha nhenga mambu ghangani kwa lujiniku lwaka nane.
MAR 11:30 Mbwaghilaje, bho, lujiniku lwaka Yohana Mbatizaji lukahumiki kunani kwaka Chapanga au kwa bhandu? Mniyangaje.”
MAR 11:31 Bhakatumbwi kulongalanela, “Anatupwaghiki, ‘Ghakahumiki kwaka Chapanga,’ anaatulalukya, ‘Bho, mbona ngachemunhobhali Yohana?’
MAR 11:32 Kabheti anatupwaghiki, ‘Ghakahumiki kwa bhandu,’ kwibya bhole?” Bhakajowipi lipogha la bhandu, maghambu bhandu bhokapi bhakahobhali kubha Yohana akabhi chakaka mlota waka Chapanga.
MAR 11:33 Bhela bhakamuyangiki Yesu, “Tepani ngachetumanye.” Na jombi Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Na nepani nganumpwaghi nhenga mambu ghangani kwa lujiniku bhole.”
MAR 12:1 Yesu akatumbwi kulonge nabhu kwa malenganesu akapwaghaje, “Mundu jumu akalemiki ngonda wa mizabibu, akauyongalwi lumatu, na pachilanda jaki akalenganaki libhomba la kuminyi divai, na kuchenga mnala. Akabhajahiki bhalemi ngonda ghola, na akatumbwi mwanja wa kujenda ku inchi ja kutali.
MAR 12:2 Chikahi cha kuhuna mapambiku pachahikiki, akuntumiki ntumika waki kwa bhalemi bhala nahuli akundetila pandu pa mapambiku gha ngonda waki wa mizabibu.
MAR 12:3 Bhalemi bhala bhakunkamwi ntumika jola, bhakundapwili, na kunkelebhu mabhoku matopu.
MAR 12:4 Akuntumiki kabheti ntumika jongi. Jonihoju kabheti bhakundapwi kumutu na kumpoa lihamo.
MAR 12:5 Mweni ngonda jola akuntumiki kabheti ntumika jongi. Na bhombi bhalemi bhala bhakunkomiki. Bhakalapuliki kabheti bhangi bhamahele bhabhakatumakiki na bhangi kubhakoma.
MAR 12:6 Bhela akahighali na mundu jumu, yani mwana waki mpalu. Pakujomukela akuntumiki jonihoju akapwaghaje, ‘Anabhuntopilaje mwana wango.’
MAR 12:7 Nambu bhalemi bhala bhakapwaghanile, ‘Jonjo nde mpwelelu, bhela tunkomaje, nahuli upwelelu waki ubya wito!’
MAR 12:8 Bhela bhakunkamwili na kunkoma, na kujenda kujileke hyegha jaki kunja ja ngonda wa mizabibu ghola.”
MAR 12:9 Yesu akabhalalukile, “Bho, mweni ngonda wa mizabibu anahenga kike?” “Anahikaje kubhakoma bhalemi habha, na kubhajahika ngonda hoghu bhandu bhangi.
MAR 12:10 Bho, ngachensomiki Malembu aghagha? ‘Liganga lebhalikaniki bhachenga, sajenu libhi liganga likolongwa la punkeghi.
MAR 12:11 Bambo nde joatehi lijambu lenihele, nalombi nde la kukangacha kwitu!’ ”
MAR 12:12 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, bhabhola bha Shelia na akahokolu bhakamanyiki kubha ulenganesu hoghu ubhapwagha bhombe. Bhela bhakalengiki kunkamu Yesu, nambu bhakajowipi lipogha la bhandu. Panihapa bhakundehili na bhakabhokike.
MAR 12:13 Bhela Mafalisayo bhangi na bhahemba bha lipogha laka Helode, bhakatumakiki kwaka Yesu nahuli bhajenda bhakundalukyaje kwa kundenga.
MAR 12:14 Bhakunjendili na kumpwaghila, “Mbola, tumanyi kubha wehapa ulonge chakaka, panga kujoghopa maholalelu gha bhandu. Wala ngacheulingali sula jaka mundu, nambu ubhola chakaka kubhokana na indela jaka Chapanga. Tupwaghilaje, bho, wichu le kwitu tepani kulepa kodi kwaka Kaisali?
MAR 12:15 Bho, tulepaji au ngatwilepa?” Nambu Yesu akamanyiki icholi yabhu, akabahpwaghile, “Bho, mbona ntenda kunenga? Nnetila mbija heje.”
MAR 12:16 Bhakundeti mbija, najombi akabhalalukile, “Bho, sula na lihina lendenu yaka nane?” Bhakamuyangiki, “Yaka Kaisali.”
MAR 12:17 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mumpekya Kaisali yeibhi yaki Kaisali, na yeibhi yaka Chapanga mumpekya Chapanga.” Panihapa bhakunkangichi namaa Yesu.
MAR 12:18 Bhela, Masadukayo bhabhapwagha kubha ngachekubhi kuhyoka bhakunjendi Yesu, na kundalukila,
MAR 12:19 “Mbola, Musa akatulaghalakili, ‘Ngati mwanalomi anapotili na kundeka nhwanu waki panga mwana, ndongu waki apalika antola mbomba joaweliwi na ndomi jola nahuli ambelakya bhana ndongu waki joapoti jola.’
MAR 12:20 Kwa ulenganesu, kukabhi na bhalongu saba, wa kutumbula akatowili na kupotela panga kupata bhana.
MAR 12:21 Ndongu wa kabheli akuntowili joaweliwi na ndomi jola, najombi akapotili panga kupata bhana, na ndongu wa katatu najombi bhelabhela,
MAR 12:22 na bhalongu bhokapi saba bhabhuntowili mbomba jola bhakapotili panga kubhaleka bhana. Machobha paghapetiki, najombi mbomba jola akapotile.
MAR 12:23 Bhela, lichobha la kuhyoka bhandu, bho, mabhu hoju ayibya nhwanu waka nane? Maghambu akanalomi bhokapi saba bhakuntowile.”
MAR 12:24 Yesu akabhayangike, “Bho, mwanganya ngachemuhokiye, maghambu ngachemughamanyi Malembu Mahuhu na uweza waka Chapanga?
MAR 12:25 Kwa ndandi bhabhawili pabhiyokaje ngabhitoghuleki, bhibya ngati bhatumika bha kunani kwaka Chapanga.
MAR 12:26 Bhela, kuhyoka kwa bhabhawili, bho, ngachensomiki mu Chitabu chaka Musa pandu papalongale chitutu chechibhelala moto? Chapanga akumpwaghi Musa, ‘Nepani Chapanga waka Ibulahimu, Chapanga waka Isaka na Chapanga waka Yakobo.’
MAR 12:27 Bhela jombi nde Chapanga wa bhandu bhabhabhi bhomi, nambu nga wa bhandu bhabhawile. Mwanganya muhobhiki namaa!”
MAR 12:28 Mbola jumu wa Shelia akahikiki na kujowane kulochana kwabho. Paakaweni kubha Yesu akabhayangiki Masadukayo wichu, akunjendi Yesu na kundalukila, “Bho, mu amuli yokapi, nde jaleko jejibhi ngolongwa kupeta yokape?”
MAR 12:29 Yesu akamuyangike, “Amuli nkolongwa nde jenjenu, ‘Njowanyaje, mabhandu bha Izilaeli! Bambo Chapanga witu nde Bambo jumu.
MAR 12:30 Umpalaje Bambo Chapanga waku kwa mtima waku wokapi, kwa roho jaku jokapi, kwa malangu ghaku ghokapi na kwa makili ghaku ghokapi.’
MAR 12:31 Amuli ngolongwa ja kabheli nde jenjenu, ‘Umpalaje njaku ngati moulipali wamwete.’ Nga amuli jengi ngolongwa ja kuipeta ibheli heye.”
MAR 12:32 Mbola wa Shelia jola akumpwaghi Yesu, “Mbola ulongi wichu! Ulongi chakaka kubha, Chapanga nde jumu pela, wala njeta jongi nambu jombi.
MAR 12:33 Impalika mundu kumpala Chapanga kwa mtima wokapi, kwa malangu ghokapi, kwa makili ghokapi na kumpala njaki ngati moalipali mwene, kupalika nakanopi kuliku kubhoha hinyama ya kujochakeka na nyambiku yokapi.”
MAR 12:34 Yesu paakaweni kubha mundu hoju akayangiki kwa malangu, akumpwaghile, “Wehapa ngacheubhi kutali na Ukolongwa waka Chapanga.” Kutumbu panihapa nga mundu joakajendali kabheti kundaluki Yesu lilalukilo.
MAR 12:35 Chikahi Yesu paakabhi abhola mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga, akalalukile, “Bho, mbona bhabhola bha Shelia bhapwagha kubha Kristo nde mwana Daude?
MAR 12:36 Roho Mhuhu akundongwi Daude kupwagha, ‘Bambo akumpwaghi Bambo wango, Utamaje upambala wangu wa kumalelelu, mbaka panabhabhekaje maadui bhaku pahi ja magholu ghaku.’
MAR 12:37 Daude mweni andoha Kristo ‘Bambo,’ henu Kristo ayibya bho mwana waka Daude?” Lipogha la bhandu lakabhi lunjowane Yesu kwa chiheku.
MAR 12:38 Mu mabholu ghaki, Yesu akapwaghike, “Mulilingalyaje na bhabhola bha Shelia, bhabhapala kupetapeta bhawati ingobhu ilachu na bhandu kubhalamuki kwa kutopela paligulio.
MAR 12:39 Kabheti bhahaghu itehu ya kulongolu munyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude na pandu pa kutopela pa uwangalalu wa chilebhe.
MAR 12:40 Kwa kubhakolowa bhabhatole bhabhaweliwi na bhalomi bhabhu nyumba yabhu na hindu yabhu koni bhakoponganela kulobha malobhu malachu! Bhanihabha utemuliku wabhu anaukubhaje ukolongwa namaa!”
MAR 12:41 Yesu akabhi atami pambipi na lisanduku la chikoku cha mbija, akabhalingali bhandu bhamaheli mobhajeghale mbija yabho. Bhanahindu bhamaheli bhabhohiki mbija yamahele,
MAR 12:42 panihapa akahikiki mabhu jumu kahochu, akajeghi sendi ibheli ya mbija.
MAR 12:43 Yesu akabhalohiki bhabhulwa bhaki papamu na kubhapwaghila, “Chakaka numpwaghila, mabhu ajoju kahochu ajeghi mu lisanduku la chikoku mbija yamaheli kupeta chebhajeghi bhandu bhangi bhokape.
MAR 12:44 Ndandi bhangi bhokape bhakabhohiki kubhokana na kujoloka kwa hindu yabhu, nambu mabhu ajoju, koni abhi kahochu, abhohiki yokapi yeakabhi naku, abhohiki hindu yokapi yeyunjangatyaje kwa matamu ghaki.”
MAR 13:1 Yesu paakabhi apita mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga, jumu wa bhabhulwa bhaki akumpwaghile, “Mbola, lingalyaje ntundu maganga aghagha na machengu aghagha moghabheli gha kukangacha!”
MAR 13:2 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Bho, mughabhona machengu aghagha moghakolile? Njeta hata liganga limu lelihighalya panani ja lenge, kila chindu anachihabhukaje.”
MAR 13:3 Yesu paakabhi atemi panani ja Chitombi cha Mizeituni akalingali upambala wa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, Petulu, Yakobo, Yohana na Andulea bhakundaluki pakanjika jabho,
MAR 13:4 “Tupwaghilaje, bho, mambu ghanihagha ghibya lile? Bho, nginyuli bholi yeilangiaje kubha mambu ghanihagha ghaheghali kupitalila?”
MAR 13:5 Yesu akatumbwi kubhapwaghila, “Mlilingalyaje mundu ngaankolowa.
MAR 13:6 Maghambu bhandu bhamaheli anabhahikaje kwa lihina langu, kila jumu wabhu anaapwaghaje, ‘Nepani nde jombi!’ Na bhombi anabhakoluwaje bhandu bhamahele.
MAR 13:7 Pamwijowana panani ja ngondo na majojalanelu gha ngondo, ngamwijoghopa. Mambu ghanihagha anaghatumbula kupitalila, nambu ujomukelu weni wibya wakali.
MAR 13:8 Likabila limu analikomana na likabila lenge, ukolongwa ghumu anaukomana na ukolongwa ghonge. Pandu patalipatali anakukubhaje na minyukunyuku ja luhombi na injala. Mambu ghanihagha nde ngati mabhinilu gha kutumbula gha kulibhopo mwana.
MAR 13:9 “Nambu mwenga mulilingalyaje. Maghambu bhandu anabhumpelaka pachengu, na kundapu iboku mu nyumba ya kuhimangani Bhayahude. Anabhumpelaka palongi ja bhatawala na bhakolongwa kwa ndandi jangu, nahuli kubha ulandilu kwabho.
MAR 13:10 Nambu anaghatumbula hoti Malobhi Manyahi kutangazwa kwa bhandu bha mataifa ghokapi.
MAR 13:11 Na bhombi pabhunkamulaje na kumpeleka pachengu, ngamwihola panani ja malobhi ghamwilongilaje. Pachihikaje chikahi chenihechi, ndongila chokapi chemwipekiwaje. Ndandi nga mwanganya mwemwilongilaje, nambu Roho Mhuhu.
MAR 13:12 Mbeli anaang'anambuka nnung'una waki akomakikaje, na tati anahenga bhelabhela kwa bhana bhaki, na bhana anabhang'anambukaje kubhalapula bhabheleka bhabhu na kubhakoma.
MAR 13:13 Bhandu bhamaheli anabhunhakalya mwenga kwa ndandi ja lihina langu. Nambu joanahinakyaje mbaka pakujomukela nde joanakengaliwaje.
MAR 13:14 “Pamwibhona, ‘Lihakalilu la Uyonangeku,’ ngati molalembakike na mlota Danieli, lijemiki pandu nga paki.” Joasoma na amanya ndandi jake. “Panihapa, bhabhabhi ku Yudea bhatililaje kwitombi.
MAR 13:15 Mundu jokapi jola joabhi panani ja nhwaghala wa nyumba jaki ngayihuluka, na kujingila mkati ja nyumba jaki na kutola chindu!
MAR 13:16 Bhelabhela joabhi kungonda ngaikelabhuka kunyumba jaki na kutola ingobhu jaki.
MAR 13:17 Anabhachibhona akamabhu bhabhikubhaje na hitumbu, na bhabhajongeha mu machobha ghanihagha!
MAR 13:18 Ndobhaje nahuli mambu ghanihagha ngaghipitalila chikahi cha imbepu.
MAR 13:19 Ndandi chikahi hechi anakubya na kulagha kwanga kubhonikana kutumbu Chapanga paakabhombiki ndema mbaka lalenu, na wala ngaghipitali kabheti.
MAR 13:20 Ngati Bambo ngaakakepishi machobha ghanihagha nga mundu joakakengaliwaje. Nambu kwa ndandi ja bhandu bhaki bhahaghulika, Bambo akepishi machobha ghanihagha.
MAR 13:21 “Henu mundu anampwaghi, ‘Lingalyaje, Kristo abhi apa,’ au ‘Abhi pala,’ ngamwihobhalela.
MAR 13:22 Kwa ndandi anabhapitalyaje maklisto bha upuhe na bhalota bha upuhe, anabhatenda nginyulila na mambu gha kukangacha, nahuli kubhakolowa, ngati anaiwezakini, hata bhahaghulika bhaka Chapanga.
MAR 13:23 Nambu mwenga mulilingalyaje! Nepani numpwaghi mambu ghanihagha ghokapi koni ghakona ngakupitalila.
MAR 13:24 “Bhela paghipetaje machobha ghanihagha gha kulagha, lyobha analiyeghalika lwihi na mwehi ngawinang'ane.
MAR 13:25 Ndondwa anaihabhukaje kuhuma kunani kumahunde, na hindu yokapi ya kunani anainyuhakikaje.
MAR 13:26 Panihapa mwimona nepani, Mwana waka Mundu, nhika mu mahundi kwa makili makolongwa na ulumbalilu.
MAR 13:27 Kabheti ananabhalaghalakya bhatumika bhangu bha kunani kumahunde bhabhonganaje bhahaghulika bhaka Chapanga kuhuma ipambala yokapi nchechi ya ndema. Hata kuhuma kutali nakanopi ja pundema.
MAR 13:28 “Kwa nkongu wa mtini mulibhola libholu lendenu. Chikahi mambandi ghaki paghatumbu kutunduli mahamba na kuneng'anela, mmanya chikahi cha mahunu chiheghalile.
MAR 13:29 Bhelabhela, na mwenga pamughabhona mambu ghanihagha ghahengakeka, mmanyaje kubha Mwana waka Mundu abhi pambipi kuhika.
MAR 13:30 Numpwaghi chakaka, chibheleku chenjenu ngachipeti, mbaka mambu ghanihagha ghokapi ghapitalile.
MAR 13:31 Kunani na pundema anaipetaje, nambu malobhi ghangu ngaghipeti ng'o.
MAR 13:32 “Nambu panani ja lichobha la kujomukela, na lisaa lela, nga mundu joamanyi analihika lile, wala bhatumika bha kunani kwaka Chapanga, wala Mwana. Nambu Atati kanjika jaki nde joamanya.
MAR 13:33 Muliandiaje na mkubhaje mihu, ndandi ngachemmanyi chikahi hechi anachihika lile.
MAR 13:34 Kwibya ngati mundu joabhoka panyumba kutumbu mwanja akabhalekila bhatumika bhaki kujilingalila, kila mundu na lihengu laki na kumpwaghi mlonda wa ndyangu akubha mihu.
MAR 13:35 Mkubhaje mihu, ndandi ngachemmanyi mweni nyumba anahika lile. Pangi kwibya pakamihi, au ikilu pamahiku, au pachibhombu au palukela.
MAR 13:36 Muliandiaje, nahuli anahiki kwa kupwitukila, ngaanhimani ngochile.
MAR 13:37 Malobhi ghanumpwaghi mabhanganya, numpwaghi mabhokapi. Mkubhaje mihu!”
MAR 14:1 Ghakahighali machobha ghabheli kuhika lichobha la Kiyahude la kula Pasaka na lichobha la kula Mikati Jangakujegaleka Amila. Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhabhola bha Shelia bhakabhili bhalonda indela ja kunkamu Yesu kwa kulihiya nahuli bhunkomaje.
MAR 14:2 Nambu bhakapwaghike, “Ngatwihenga bhenibhela chikahi cha kula uwangalalu, nahuli bhandu ngabhileta fujo.”
MAR 14:3 Yesu akabhi ku Besania kunyumba jaka Simoni, Yesu joandamihi chitamu cha malohi. Yesu paakabhi akula chilebhe, akahiki mbomba jumu joakabhi na libotolu lelalenganakiki kwa liganga la alabasta la mbija yamaheli na mkati jaki kukabhi na mahuta gha kunungi wichu ghaghalowakeka nalido na gha mbija yamaheli. Akalibhopwi libotolu lela na kunjeghale Yesu mahuta ghala kumutu.
MAR 14:4 Bhandu bhangi bhabhakabhi panipala bhakayomiki na kupwaghanila, “Bho, maghambu kiki kughahowa mahuta aghagha?
MAR 14:5 Ndandi mahuta hagha tukabya tulombisi kwa mbija yamahele, na kubhapeke bhahocho!” Na bhakunkenjuki namaa mabhu jola.
MAR 14:6 Nambu Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mundekaje! Bho, maghambu kiki mung'aha? Anhengi lihengu lambone.
MAR 14:7 Bhahochu mbi nabhu machobha ghokape, na chikahi chokapi chempala muweza kubhajangatila. Nambu nepani ngangubhi na mwanganya machobha ghokape.
MAR 14:8 Jombi ahengiki ngati moawezile. Anyeghali hyegha jangu mahuta gha kunungila nahuli kunhandaa kwa ndandi ja kutaghakika kwangu.
MAR 14:9 Numpwaghi chakaka, pundema pokapi Malobhi Manyahi paghitangazwaje, bhandu anabhakombukaje na kuliloghola lihina laka mabhu hoju kwa ndandi ja kunkomboka jombi.”
MAR 14:10 Bhela Yuda Isikalioti, jumu wa bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli, akapiti kwa bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa nahuli kung'anambuka Yesu.
MAR 14:11 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa pabhajowini malobhi ghanihagha bhakahekalile, bhakumpwaghi anabhumpekya mbija. Bhela Yuda akatumbwi kulonda mbekenyu ja kung'anambuka Yesu.
MAR 14:12 Lichobha la kutumbula la Kula Mabumunda Ghangakujeghaleka Amila, chikahi cha kuchinjakika mwanambelele wa Pasaka, bhabhulwa bhaki bhakundaluki Yesu, “Bho, upala tujenda tukakuhandalya kwaku nahuli ukulaje chilebhi cha Pasaka?”
MAR 14:13 Panihapa Yesu akabhatumiki bhabhulwa bhaki bhabheli na kubhapwaghila, “Njendanya kumbwane, na konihoku mwakahimangana na mwanalomi jumu joatotwi chihulu cha machi. Mukunjengalyaje,
MAR 14:14 mbaka mu nyumba jeakajingalaje, na mukumpwaghila mweni nyumba, ‘Mbola apwagha, chibhi kwaku chumba changu monikula chilebhi cha Pasaka papamu na bhabhulwa bhango?’
MAR 14:15 Na jombi anaandangia chumba chikolongwa cha kugholofa chechiandaliwi na kuchipamba. Mkatuandalya monihomo.”
MAR 14:16 Bhabhulwa bhakabhokiki, bhakapiti kumbwane, na bhakahimani kila chindu chibhi wichu ngati Yesu moakapwaghile, na bhakaandi chilebhi cha Pasaka.
MAR 14:17 Pakwahiki pakamihi, Yesu akahikiki panihapa papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki komi na bhabheli.
MAR 14:18 Pabhakabhi papamu bhatami kwa kula chilebhe, Yesu akapwaghike, “Chakaka numpwaghila, jumu winu joakula papamu na nepani, anaang'anambukaje.”
MAR 14:19 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakatumbwi kuhyoma na kundaluki jumu jumu, “Bho, nepani lelo?”
MAR 14:20 Yesu akabhayangike, “Jumu winu komi na bhabheli mwenga, joatobhale libumunda mu chikombi chimu na nepani.
MAR 14:21 Chakaka Mwana waka Mundu anaapotilaje ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu panani jake, nambu anaachibhona mundu jola joang'anambuka Mwana waka Mundu! Ikabya mbanga kwaka mundu hoju akabya akotwiki kubhelakeka!”
MAR 14:22 Pabhakabhi bhakula, Yesu akatoliki libumunda, akalipengalili, akalihekiki na kubhapekeha bhabhulwa bhaki, akapwaghaje, “Ntolanya nkulaje, jenjenu nde hyegha jango.”
MAR 14:23 Kabheti akatoliki chikombi cha divai, akanchengwi Chapanga, na kubhapekeha bhabhulwa bhaki, bhokapi bhakakunywiki divai kuhuma mu chikombi chela.
MAR 14:24 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ghongoni nde mwahi wango wa Lulaghilu lwaka Chapanga, ghoujitika kwa ndandi ja kubhalekakela mahoku gha bhandu bhamahele.
MAR 14:25 Chakaka numpwaghila, ngangunywi kabheti divai mbaka lichobha lela panikunywaje divai jahenu mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga.”
MAR 14:26 Panihapa bhakajembiki nyembu ya kunchengu Chapanga, na bhakabhokiki kujenda ku Chitombi cha Mizeituni.
MAR 14:27 Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Mabhanganya mabhokapi mwindilaji na kuneka, ndandi mu Malembu Mahuhu Chapanga apwagha, ‘Ananunkoma mdima, na mambelele ghitenda kupechangana.’
MAR 14:28 Nambu panihyokaje, ananundongulya kujenda ku Galilaya.”
MAR 14:29 Petulu akamuyangike, “Hata ngati bhokapi anabhukutiliki na kukuleka, nambu nepani nganakuleki ng'o!”
MAR 14:30 Yesu akumpwaghi Petulu, “Chakaka nukupwaghila, ikilu ja lalenu mangane ja likongobhi kubheka mala pabhele, anaunganaje mala patatu kubha ngacheumanye.”
MAR 14:31 Nambu Petulu akajendali kulongela, “Hata ngati imbalika kupotela papamu na wehapa nganakuleki ng'o.” Na bhabhulwa bhaki bhokapi na bhombi bhakalongi bhelabhela.
