MAR 14:32 Bhela bhakahikiki ku chijongu chechilowakeka Gesemane, na Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Ntamanya pambane chikahi nepani panundobha Chapanga.”
MAR 14:33 Panihapa akabhatoliki Petulu, Yakobo na Yohana. Akatumbwi Kuholalela na kuhangajika,
MAR 14:34 na akabhapwaghile, “Mili na mabhinilu makolongwa muntima wangu hata pambipi kupotela. Ntamanya pambani na mkubhaje mihu.”
MAR 14:35 Akapiti palongi pachokopi, akalihawi pahi, na kundobha Chapanga kubha, ngati anaiwezikana, ngaipetela mu lisaa la mang'ahiku hele.
MAR 14:36 Akapwaghike, “Atati wangu! Hindu yokapi kwaku wehapa iwezikana. Umokihaje chikombi chenjenu. Nambu ngakwikubha ngati mombali nepani, nambu ngati moupali wehapa.”
MAR 14:37 Akakelawiki kabheti kwa bhabhulwa bhatatu bhala akabhahimani bhagochili lughono. Bhela akundaluki Petulu, “Simoni, bho, ughochile? Ngachewaweziki kutama mihu hata lisaa limu na nepane?”
MAR 14:38 Na akabhapwaghi kabheti, “Mkubhaje mihu na kulobha nahuli ngamwijingi mu malengakeku, roho jipala, nambu hyegha ngachejibhi na makili.”
MAR 14:39 Akapiti kabheti kulobha pakabheli akakelabhuki malobhi ghalaghala.
MAR 14:40 Bhela akakelawiki kabheti na akabhahimani bhaghochile, ndandi mihu ghabhu ghakabhi ghatopike. Nabhombi ngachebhamanyi la kumuyanga.
MAR 14:41 Paakelawiki mala ja katatu, akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mwakali kughochela na kupomulela? Henu kuyaghanile! Lisaa lihikike! Lingalyaje, Mwana waka Mundu bhunjeghe mu mabhoku gha bhandu bhana mahoku.
MAR 14:42 Njumukaje, tumbokanyaje. Lingalyaje, jola joaning'anambukaje aheghalile.”
MAR 14:43 Yesu paakabhi akali kulongela, Yuda joakabhi jumu wa bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli bhala, akahikiki papamu na lipogha la bhandu bhabhabhi na mapanga na indonga. Bhandu bhanihabha bhakatumakiki na bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, bhabhola bha Shelia na bhazee.
MAR 14:44 Mng'anambuka Yuda akajomwi kubhapeke nginyulila kubha, “Jonambuswaje nde joju. Munkamulaje na kumpeleka pahi ja ulingalilu.”
MAR 14:45 Palapala Yuda pahikiki pela, akunjendi Yesu na kumpwaghila, “Mbola!” Panihapa akandamuki kwa kumbusu.
MAR 14:46 Bhela bhandu bhanihabha bhakunkamwi Yesu na kumbeka pahi ja ulingalilu.
MAR 14:47 Nambu jumu wa bhabhabhi bhajemani papamu na Yesu, akaholapwi lipanga laki, na kundapu mtumika waka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa, na kunheketa likutu.
MAR 14:48 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Bho, unhiki na mapanga na indonga kungamula ngati kubha nepani nde mwihi?
MAR 14:49 Kila lichobha nakabhi papamu na mwehapa ku Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na ngachemwangamwile. Nambu aghagha ghahengakeka sajenu nahuli Malembu Mahuhu ghatimilaje.”
MAR 14:50 Panihapa bhabhulwa bhokapi bhakundekiki na kutilanila.
MAR 14:51 Kukabhi na nkombu jumu joakabhi anjengale Yesu koni akongiki lishuka pela. Bhakalengiki kunkamula,
MAR 14:52 nambu jombi akabhatilike, akalilekiki lishuka lela na kutila panga ingobhu.
MAR 14:53 Bhela bhakumpeliki Yesu kwa bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, kwa bhazee na bhabhola bha Shelia bhakabya bhalibhongini kunyumba jaka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa.
MAR 14:54 Petulu akunjengali Yesu cha kutali, akajingi mu liwangala laka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa. Akatami papamu na bhalonda akanyatukya moto.
MAR 14:55 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na pachengu pokapi bhakalondiki ulandilu wa kuntaki Yesu nahuli bhunkomaje, nambu ngachebhapatike.
MAR 14:56 Bhandu bhamaheli bhakabhohiki ulandilu wa upuhe panani jaka Yesu, nambu ulandilu wabhu wa upuhe ngachewalengine.
MAR 14:57 Bhandu bhangi bhakajemiki na kulonge malobhi gha upuhe kwaka Yesu, bhakapwaghaje,
MAR 14:58 “Tunjowini mundu hoju akapwaghaje, ‘Anamombula Nyumba jaka Chapanga jebhachengiki bhandu, na kwa machobha ghatatu ananjenga najenge jangakuchengakeka na bhandu.’ ”
MAR 14:59 Nambu hata bhela, ghala ghabhalandile ngacheghalengine.
MAR 14:60 Bhela Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa akajemiki pachilanda jabhu na kundaluki Yesu, “Bho, ngacheuyanga lilobhi kubhokana na malobhi ghabhalandila kwako?”
MAR 14:61 Nambu Yesu akatami chinunu na ngacheakayangiki lilobhi hata limu. Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa akundaluki kabhete, “Bho, wehapa le wa Kristo, Mwana waka Chapanga Mpengaleka?”
MAR 14:62 Yesu akayangike, “Nepani nde jombi. Kabheti anamumbonaje Mwana waka Mundu akabya atami ku upambala wa chiwoku cha kumalelelu waka Chapanga Joabhi na Makili, na koni akahikaje na mahundi gha kunani kumahunde!”
MAR 14:63 Panihapa Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa akakachwi ingobhu yaki na kupwagha, “Ngachetupala kabheti mundu jongi alongilaje panani jaka mundu ajoju!
MAR 14:64 Njowini moantondule Chapanga. Bho, mbona bhole?” Bhokapi bhukuntemwili kubha impalika kupotela.
MAR 14:65 Bhela bhangi bhabhu bhakatumbwi kunhuni imata, kumuyeka ingobhu kumihu, kundapula na kumpwaghila, “Lotilaje, nane joakulapwi wehapa!” Na bhalonda bhakuntoliki na kundapu ighanja.
MAR 14:66 Petulu paakabhi akali pahi kuliwangala, mtumika jumu wa chimbomba waka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa akunhikile.
MAR 14:67 Paakumbweni Petulu anyatuki moto akundingalili, na kumpwaghila, “Hata wehapa ukabhi papamu na Yesu wa ku Nazaleti.”
MAR 14:68 Nambu Petulu akakanike, “Ngachenummanyi, wala ngachemanyi cheulongela.” Panihapa Petulu akapitiki kunja ja liwangala. Na likongobhi lakabhekike.
MAR 14:69 Mtumika wa chimbomba jola paakumbweni Petulu akatumbwi kubhapwaghi bhandu bhabhakajemiki panihapa, “Mundu jonjoni nde jumu wabho!”
MAR 14:70 Petulu akakaniki kabhete. Chikahi chocho, bhandu bhabhakajemiki panipala bhakumpwaghi Petulu, “Chakaka wehapa nde jumu wabho, maghambu hata wehapa uhumi ku Galilaya.”
MAR 14:71 Nambu Petulu akatumbwi kulipeke masolu na kulapa akapwaghaje, mbata masolu ngati ananonge upuhe, “Napa ngachenummanyi mundu hoju jomundongalela malobhi ghaki!”
MAR 14:72 Panihapa likongobhi lakabhekiki mala ja kabhele, na Petulu akakombwiki Yesu moakumpwaghile, “Mangane likongobhi kubheka mala pabhele, wingana mala patatu.” Na Petulu paakakombwiki, akalihawi pahi na akaleliki namaa.
MAR 15:1 Palukela pakwachaje, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa bhakahimangini papamu na bhazee, bhabhola bha Shelia na bhabholu bha pachengu pokapi, bhakunkongiki Yesu, na bhakumpeliki kwaka Pilato.
MAR 15:2 Pilato akundaluki Yesu, “Bho, wehapa le Unkolongwa wa Bhayahude?” Yesu akayangike, “Wehapa upwaghike.”
MAR 15:3 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa bhakuntaki Yesu kwa malobhi ghamaheli.
MAR 15:4 Pilato akundaluki kabheti Yesu, “Bho, ngacheuyanga lilobhi? Lingalyaje ntundu mobhaletela matakilu ghamaheli panani jako!”
MAR 15:5 Nambu Yesu ngacheakayangiki lilobhi, mbaka Pilato akakangiche.
MAR 15:6 Pilato akabhi na ntetu chikahi cha Uwangalalu wa Pasaka kumbopulela mkongeka jumu, jobhundobha bhandu.
MAR 15:7 Chikahi hechi mundu jumu joalowakika Balaba, akakongakiki pandu pabhakongeka bhandu kwa ndandi ja kutumbuli ngondo na kubhakoma bhandu bhangi.
MAR 15:8 Lipogha la bhandu lakunjendi Pilato, na kundobha abhahengila ngati mowabheli ntetu wake.
MAR 15:9 Pilato akabhalalukile, “Bho, mpala numbopulya Nkolongwa wa Bhayahude?”
MAR 15:10 Ndandi jombi akamanyiki kubha bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa bhakunkamwi Yesu kwa ndandi ja wihu.
MAR 15:11 Nambu bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa bhakabhaswekaki bhandu nahuli bhundobha abhabhopulya Balaba bhunkonga Yesu.
MAR 15:12 Pilato akabhalaluki kabheti bhandu, “Bho, mpala nepani ndenda kyani na mundu jonjoni jomundoa Nkolongwa wa Bhayahude?”
MAR 15:13 Bhandu bhokapi bhakajamali bhakapwaghaje, “Unhwamba punsalaba!”
MAR 15:14 Nambu Pilato akabhalalukile, “Bho, maghambu kike? Bho, ahengiki lihakau bhole?” Nambu bhombi bhakajendali kujamalila, “Unhwamba punsalaba!”
MAR 15:15 Pilato akapaliki kubhahekeha bhandu bhala, bhela akumbopuli Balaba. Akalaghalaki Yesu alapulika iboku, na kumboha nahuli awambakikaje punsalaba.
MAR 15:16 Manjolinjoli bhakumpeliki Yesu mu liwangala la mkati la nyumba jaka Pilato, yani Pulaitolio, na kubhaloha lipogha lokapi la manjolinjoli.
MAR 15:17 Bhakamuwatiki ingobhu ja zambalau ngati Nkolongwa, bhakalokiki litaji la miha na kunhwatika kumutu.
MAR 15:18 Bhakatumbwi kundamukila kwa kundongama, “Monili ote, Unkolongwa wa Bhayahude!”
MAR 15:19 Bhakundapwi kwa ndahi kumuto, na kunhuni imata. Bhakachikimi na kunjojabhela.
MAR 15:20 Pabhajomwi kundongama, bhakunhuliki ingobhu ja zambalau jela, na kunhwatika ingobhu yaki mweni yela. Bhakumpihiki kunja nahuli kumpeleka kunhwamba punsalaba.
MAR 15:21 Pabhakabhi mwindela bhakahimangini na mundu jumu joalowakika Simoni, akabhi ahika kuhuma ku Kilene, jombi akabhi atati waka Alekizanda na Lufo. Na chikahi hechi akabhi ahuma kunja ja muchi, na manjolinjoli bhakumpwaghi kwa amuli atotulaje nsalaba ghoakabhi naku Yesu.
MAR 15:22 Bhela bhakumpeliki Yesu mbaka pa Goligota, yani “Lifuvu la Mmutu.”
MAR 15:23 Panihapa bhakumpeki divai jebhahangaghini na mitela jejilowakeka manemane, nambu Yesu ngacheanywile.
MAR 15:24 Bhela bhakunhwambiki na kughabhana ingobhu yaki kwa kuilapuli kula nahuli kumanya ngati ingobhu bhole jeapalika mundu kupata.
MAR 15:25 Jakabhi saa tatu ja lukela pabhunhwambikaje.
MAR 15:26 Na panani ja nsalaba bhakalembiki litakilu ale, “NKOLONGWA WA BHAYAHUDE.”
MAR 15:27 Bhela bhakunhwambiki Yesu punsalaba papamu na bhanyaghula bhangi bhabhele, jumu upambala wa kumalelelu na jongi upambala wa kumangeja.
MAR 15:28 Bhela Malembu Mahuhu ghakatimiye ghaghapwagha, “Akabhalangiki papamu na bhandu bhahakau.”
MAR 15:29 Bhandu bhabhapetika pandu panihapa bhakundongali matondo, bhakanyuanyua mimutu jabhu kwa kundongama, bhakapwaghaje, “Aha! Wehapa upwaghika wibhombula Nyumba jaka Chapanga na kuchenga kwa machobha ghatatu!
MAR 15:30 Henu, uhuluka punsalaba na ulikengalya wamwete!”
MAR 15:31 Na bhombi bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa papamu na bhabhola bha Shelia bhakundongimi pachilanda jabhu, bhakapwaghaje, “Akabhalamihi bhangi, nambu ngacheaweza kulikengale mwene!
MAR 15:32 Eti jombi nde Kristo, Nkolongwa wa ku Izilaeli! Henu ahuluka kuhuma pansalaba nahuli tubhonaje na kuhobhalela.” Hata bhandu bhabhawambakiki pambipi na Yesu bhala bhakundongali matondo.
MAR 15:33 Kutumbu saa sita, mbaka saa tisa ja muhi, lubhendu lukayekiki inchi jokapi.
MAR 15:34 Saa tisa ja muhi Yesu akajamalili, akapwaghaje, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani,” ndandi jaki, “Chapanga wangu, Chapanga wangu, mbona unehile?”
MAR 15:35 Bhandu bhangi bhabhajemani panipala pabhakajowini ghanihagha, bhakapwaghike, “Jowanyaje! Andoha Eliya!”
MAR 15:36 Mundu jumu akakembili, akatobhali siponji mkati ja divai jejilolike, na kukongale kumwishu ja ndahi. Akumbeki pundomu akapwaghaje, “Mundeka tulolaje ngati Eliya anahika kunheleha kuhuma punsalaba hapa!”
MAR 15:37 Yesu akajamalili kwa sauti nkolongwa, na kuheketa roho.
MAR 15:38 Chikahi hechi lipanzia lelabhi mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga lakakachwiki ipambala ibheli kutumbu kunani mbaka pahi.
MAR 15:39 Nkolongwa jumu wa manjolinjoli joakajemiki palongi jaki paakaweni kubha Yesu apotela ngati bhenibhela, akapwaghike, “Chakaka mundu ajoju akabhi Mwana waka Chapanga!”
MAR 15:40 Bhakabhi kabheti akambomba bhangi cha kutali bhakalingalyaje, papuje akabhi Malia Magidalena, na Malia mabhu waka Yakobo na Yose, na Salome.
MAR 15:41 Akamabhu bhanihabha bhakunjengali Yesu ku Galilaya na kunjangatila. Akamabhu bhangi bhamaheli bhabhunjengali Yesu mbaka ku Yelusalemu na bhombi bhakabhi palapala.
MAR 15:42 Pakwahiki pakamihi, lichobha heli lakabhi Lichobha la Maandaliu, yani lichobha lelilongulela mangani ja Lichobha la Sabato.
MAR 15:43 Panihapa akahiki Yusufu mundu wa ku Alimataya, mbolu wa Pachengu Pakolongwa joakamanyakini namaa. Na jombi akabhi alendalela kuhika kwa Ukolongwa waka Chapanga. Akunjendi Pilato panga choghohi na kunjopa ampekya hyegha jaka Yesu.
MAR 15:44 Pilato akakangichi kujowana kubha Yesu akabhi apotile. Bhela akunkemiki nkolongwa wa manjolinjoli, na kundalukila ngati Yesu akapoti chikahi chilacho.
MAR 15:45 Pilato paakunjowini linjolinjoli jola kubha Yesu apotile, akunjetaki Yusufu atola hyegha jaka Yesu.
MAR 15:46 Panihapa Yusufu wa ku Alimataya akahemi sanda, akajiheli hyegha jaka Yesu, akajiyongalwi sanda. Akajibhehi mulitengele lelalenganakiki pa liganga. Kabheti akahingali liganga likolongwa na kuhibhali pundyangu wa litengele.
MAR 15:47 Na jombi Malia Magidalena na Malia mabhu waka Yose bhakabhi bhalingalila na kupabhona pandu pabhaghoniki hyegha jaka Yesu.
MAR 16:1 Palapetiki Lichobha la Sabato, Malia Magidalena, na Malia mabhu waka Yakobo, na Salome bhakahemi manungilu nahuli bhakapakiya hyegha jaka Yesu.
MAR 16:2 Bhela pachibhombu lichobha la Jumapile, lyobha palitumbula kupita, bhakapiti kulitengele.
MAR 16:3 Mwindela bhalongalanya bheni kwa bheni, “Bho, nde nane joakatukangila liganga lela pundyangu wa litengeli lela?”
MAR 16:4 Nambu pabhakalingalili bhakaweni liganga lela likangakiki kunkeghe. Liganga heli lakabhi likolongwa.
MAR 16:5 Bhela pabhakajingi mkati mulitengele, bhakumbweni nkombu jumu awati ingobhu ihuhu atami upambala wa kumalelelu, na bhombi bhakakangichi namaa.
MAR 16:6 Nambu nkombu jola akabhapwaghile, “Ngamwikangacha. Manyi mumpala Yesu wa ku Nazaleti, joakawambakike. Ayokike, ngacheabhi pambane! Ndingalyaje pandu pambani pabhakumbekike.
MAR 16:7 Henu njendanya mwakabhapwaghila bhabhulwa bhaki papamu na Petulu kubha, ‘Jombi anaandongulyaje kujenda ku Galilaya, konihoku bhakumbona ngati moakumpwaghile.’ ”
MAR 16:8 Bhela bhakabhokiki palitengeli pala imbelu, ndandi bhakabhaghiji kwa lujoghopu na kukangacha. Ngachebhumpwaghi mundu jokapi chindu, maghambu bhakajowipi namaa.
MAR 16:9 Yesu paakahyokiki lukela pachibhombu lichobha la Jumapili, akatumbwi kumpitali Malia Magidalena, mabhu jola Yesu joakumpihiki majobhi saba.
MAR 16:10 Malia Magidalena akapiti kubhapwaghi bhabhabhi papamu na Yesu. Na chikahi hechi bhabhulwa bhala bhakabhi bhaombuleza na kulela.
MAR 16:11 Nambu pabhakajowini kubha Yesu abhi mwomi na Malia Magidalena ambweni, ngachebhahobhalile.
MAR 16:12 Palongi jaki akabhapitali bhabhulwa bhabheli akabya na sula najenge. Bhabhulwa habha bhakabhi bhajenda kungonda.
MAR 16:13 Na bhombi kabheti bhakapiti kubhapwaghi bhajabho, nambu papamu na bhela ngachebhahobhalile.
MAR 16:14 Pakujomukela Yesu akabhapitali bhabhulwa bhaki komi na jumu bhabhabhi pamu pabhakulikaje. Akabhalakali namaa ndandi bhakakaniki kubhahobhalela bhabhumbweni Yesu paakahyokike.
MAR 16:15 Bhela akabhapwaghile, “Njendanya kundema wokapi mkatangazaje Malobhi Manyahi kwaka kila mundu.
MAR 16:16 Mundu jokapi joahobhalela na kubatizwa anakengaliwaje. Nambu jwangakuhobhalela, anatemuliwaje.
MAR 16:17 Na bhokapi bhabhinhobhalyaje bhimanyikana kwa hindu haye, kwa lihina langu anabhabhohaje majobhi na bhilongilaje kwa lugha nayeghe.
MAR 16:18 Anabhakamwi lijoka au kunywa chindu cha kukoma ngayapoteke. Anabhabhekila bhatamwa mabhoku, na Chapanga anaabhalamihaje.”
MAR 16:19 Bhela, Bambo Yesu paakajomwi kulonge nabhu, akatolakiki kujenda kunani kumahunde, atami ku upambala wa kumalelelu wa chiwoku chaka Chapanga.
MAR 16:20 Bhabhulwa bhakapiti kutangaza Malobhi Manyahi pandu pokapi. Bambo akahengiki lihengu papamu nabhu, na kuhenga nginyulila yamahele nahuli kulangi uchakaka wa ubholu hoghu kwa nginyulila yeyahengakike.
LUK 1:1 Unkolongwa Teofile: Bhandu bhamaheli bhakatumbwi kulemba ngati mobhawezi panani ja mambu ghaghatendakiki pa chilanda jitu.
LUK 1:2 Bhakalembiki ngati ghabhakatupwaghili na bhandu bhabhakaghaweni mambu ghanighala kutumbu pakutumbula na bhandu bhalabhala bhabhatangizi ubholu ghonighola.
LUK 1:3 Wenga Unkolongwa, nenga nanatu panakalingalaki wichu kutumbu paghatumbulaje, nakaamwi kukulembela malobhi ghanihagha kwa kulongana.
LUK 1:4 Nihenga bhenibhela nahuli na wehapa uweza kumanya uchakaka wokapi wa mambu ghabhakakubholiki.
LUK 1:5 Chikahi Helode paakabhi nkolongwa wa ku Yudea, kukabhi na mpenganyambiku jumu lihina laki Zakalia, akahumi mu lukolu lwa kibheleku chaka Abiya. Nhwanu waki alowakika Elizabeti, najombi akahumiki mu lukolu lwaka mpenganyambiku Aroni.
LUK 1:6 Zakalia na nhwanu waki Elizabeti bhakabhi bhandu bhambone palongi jaka Chapanga, koni bhakakamulakya wichu amuli na malaghalakilu ghokapi ghaka Bambo.
LUK 1:7 Nambu bhombi bhakabhi panga na bhana, maghambu Elizabeti akabhi ngulumba, na bhokapi bhakabhi bhaseja nakanopi.
LUK 1:8 Lichobha limu, Zakalia jakabhi zamu jaki ja kuhenga lihengu la upenganyambiku mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga,
LUK 1:9 Zakalia akahaghuliki kwa gudugudu ngati mowabheli ntetu wa upenganyambiku. Henu akajingi mu Nyumba jaka Bambo nahuli kuhuwa ubane.
LUK 1:10 Chikahi cha kuhuwa ubane pachaheghalili, bhandu bhokapi bhakabhi kunja bhakundobha Chapanga.
LUK 1:11 Bhela mtumika wa kunani waka Bambo akumpitalili, akabya ajemi upambala wa kumalelelu wa meza ja kuhuwi ubane.
LUK 1:12 Zakalia paakambweni mtumika wa kunani waka Chapanga jola, akakangichi namaa na akatwelili choghohi.
LUK 1:13 Nambu, mtumika wa kunani akumpwaghili, “Zakalia, ngawijoghopa! Chapanga ajowini kulobha kwaku. Elizabeti nhwanu waku anaakubhelakya mwana wa chikambaku, na wenga wandoha lihina laki Yohana.
LUK 1:14 Wenga anauhekalya nakanopi na kululuta, na bhandu bhamaheli anabhahekalya kwa kubhelakeka kwaki.
LUK 1:15 Maghambu Yohana anaabya mtumika nkolongwa palongi jaka Bambo. Ngaikunywi divai wala uwembi. Na jombi anaatwelakika Roho Mhuhu hata mangane ja kubhelakeka kwaki.
LUK 1:16 Jombi anabhakelabhua bhandu bhamaheli bha ku Izilaeli bhakelabhuka kwaka Bambo Chapanga wabhu.
LUK 1:17 Anaalongulya palongi jaka Bambo, anaakubha na makili na roho ngati jaka mlota Eliya. Anabhakelabhua akatati bhajongana na bhana bhabhu, anabhakelabhua bhandu bhangakutii bhabya bhandu bhabhuntii Chapanga, na kubhabheka bhandu bhaliandiya kunjopale Bambo.”
LUK 1:18 Zakalia akundaluki mtumika wa kunani kwaka Chapanga, “Bho, anamanya bhole ngati chindu hechi anachibya bhenibhela? Nepani nuncheya, na nhwanu wangu bhelabhela akongapile.”
LUK 1:19 Mtumika wa kunani kwaka Chapanga jola akayangiki, “Nepani nde Gabilieli. Nenyema palongi jaka Chapanga, ndumakiki nongila na wehapa na nukupwaghila malobhi manyahi ghani.
LUK 1:20 Jowanya, anaubya umpuli maghambu ngacheuhobhali malobhi ghangu ghaghihengakika kwa chikahi chaki, ngawiwezi kulongela mbaka ghangani ghanukupwaghili paghipitilaje chakaka.”
LUK 1:21 Chikahi hechi bhandu bhakabhi bhundendale Zakalia kunja koni bhakakangacha kwa kukabhakila kwaki mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga mola.
LUK 1:22 Panihapa papitiki kunja, ngacheaweziki kulonge nabhu, bhela bhombi bhakamanyi kubha aweni mabhono mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga mola. Akajendali kulonge nabhu kwa nginyulila ya mabhoku ghaki, maghambu akabhi mpuli.
LUK 1:23 Machobha ghaki gha kuhenga lihengu mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga paghajomwiki, Zakalia akabujiki kunyumba jake.
LUK 1:24 Paghapetiki machobha machokope nhwanu wake Elizabeti akapatiki chitumbu. Akalihiiki munyumba kwa chikahi cha myehi nhwanu.
LUK 1:25 Elizabeti akapwaghike, “Lendenu nde leandendi Bambo, aningalili na kumokela hiyoni pamihu ja bhandu!”
LUK 1:26 Pamwehi wa sita Chapanga akantumiki mtumika waki Gabilieli kujenda mbaka ku muchi wa Nazaleti, ku inchi ja Galilaya.
LUK 1:27 Akuntumiki kwaka mwali jumu bikila joalowakika Malia, joakabhowakiki hweku na nkambaku joalowakika Yusufu, joakahumi mu lukolu lwaka Nkolongwa Daude.
LUK 1:28 Mtumika wa kunani kwaka Chapanga akunhiki mwali jola na kumpwaghila, “Monile! Bambo abhi papamu na wehapa, najombi atehi kukupengalela!”
LUK 1:29 Malia paakajowini malobhi ghanighala, akaholali nakanopi muntima waki, panihapa akakangichi, akapwaghaje, “Ulamukilu hoghu ndandi jaki kike?”
LUK 1:30 Mtumika wa kunani kwaka Chapanga jola akumpwaghile, “Malia, ngawijoghopa! Maghambu upatiki chihomu palongi jaka Chapanga.
LUK 1:31 Lingalyaje, anaupata chitumbu na anaumbelaka mwana nkambaku, na wandoha lihina laki Yesu.
LUK 1:32 Jombi anaabya nkolongwa analowakika Mwana waka Chapanga Nkolongwa joabhi Kunani Nakanopi. Na Bambo Chapanga anaampekya chiteu cha ukolongwa chaka hokolu waki Daude.
LUK 1:33 Jombi anaabya nkolongwa wa lubheleku lwaka Yakobo mileli, na ukolongwa waki ngawijomoke!”
LUK 1:34 Malia akamuyangiki mtumika waka Chapanga jola, “Nepani nde mwali bikila. Henu, bho, lijambu heli analiwezikana bhole?”
LUK 1:35 Mtumika waka Chapanga akamuyangiki, “Roho Mhuhu anaakuhelalya panani jaku, na makili ghaka Chapanga anaghakuyekaje. Henu mwana Mhuhu anaabhelakikaje, analowakika Mwana waka Chapanga.
LUK 1:36 Ukombuka kabheti ndongu waku Elizabeti, apatiki chitumbu koni akabya ncheya, na sajenu abhi na chitumbu cha myehi sita, jombi joalowakika ngulumba.
LUK 1:37 Maghambu nga chindu chechilepa kuhengakeka kwaka Chapanga.”
LUK 1:38 Malia akapwaghike, “Nepani mtumika waka Bambo, ibya kwangu ngati moupwaghile.” Panihapa mtumika wa kunani jola akabhokike.
LUK 1:39 Machobha gha palongi, Malia akajombatiki kujenda ku muchi ghumu ghoukabhi ku inchi ja itombi ja ku Yudea.
LUK 1:40 Konihoku akajingi mu nyumba jaka Zakalia na kundamuki Elizabeti.
LUK 1:41 Elizabeti paajowana Malia andamukila, mwana joakabhi mulutumbu jaki akatehi kuhomba. Elizabeti akatwelakiki Roho Mhuhu,
LUK 1:42 akajamalili kwa kupwagha, “Upengaliki wehapa pachilanda ja akambomba, na mwana jowambelakaje apengalike!
LUK 1:43 Bho, maghambu kiki lijambu likolongwa heli limbitali nepane, mbaka mabhu waka Bambo wangu anihiki nepane?
LUK 1:44 Panyowana ulamukilu waku, mwana joabhi mulutumbu lwangu akahombiki kwa chiheku.
LUK 1:45 Upengaliki wehapa maghambu uhobhalili kubha analipitalya lijambu leakupwaghi Bambo!”
LUK 1:46 Malia akapwaghike, “Mtima wangu undumbali Bambo,
LUK 1:47 roho jangu junhekalela Chapanga Mkengalela wangu,
LUK 1:48 maghambu angombwiki nepani nuntumika waki nenilihelea! Kutumbu sajenu na kujendalela ibheleku yokapi anabhanoa mpengaleka.
LUK 1:49 Maghambu Chapanga Mweni Makili andendi mambu makolongwa. Na lihina laki nde lihuhu.
LUK 1:50 Chiha chaki chabhajendela bhandu bhabhunjojabhela, kutumbu chibheleku mbaka chibheleku chenge.
LUK 1:51 Atendiki mambu makolongu kwa chiwoku chaki. Abhalekanishi bhandu bhabhabhi na ing'omu, mu maholalelu gha mintima jabhu.
LUK 1:52 Abhaheli bhakolongwa kuhuma pa hiteu yabhu ya ukolongwa, abhakwehiki akakahochu.
LUK 1:53 Abhatupalishi bhabhabhi na injala kwa hindu yambone, na bhanamali abhatopwi mabhoku matopu.
LUK 1:54 Anjangati mtumika waki Izilaeli, na ngacheajewiki kundangi chiha chaki.
LUK 1:55 Ngati mobhalaghali akatati bhitu, Ibulahimu na lubheleku lwaki, mbaka mileli!”
LUK 1:56 Malia akatemi na Elizabeti kwa chikahi cha myehi jitatu, na akakelawiki kunyumba jake.
LUK 1:57 Chikahi cha kulibhopola kwaki Elizabeti ukahikiki, akalibhopwi mwana wa chikambaku.
LUK 1:58 Bhandu bha pambipi jaki na bhalongu bhaki bhakajowini Bambo amboni chiha nakanopi, bhokapi bhakahekali papamu naku.
LUK 1:59 Mwana paahiki machobha nane bhakahiki kunheketa jando. Bhakapaliki kumpeke lihina Zakalia, lihina la atati waki.
LUK 1:60 Nambu mabhu waki akapwaghiki, “Ngabhela! Lihina laki analowakika Yohana.”
LUK 1:61 Bhandu bhakumpwaghile, “Bho, mbona njeta mundu jokapi mu lukolu lwaki joabhi na lihina lenihele?”
LUK 1:62 Bhela bhakalongi naku kwa nginyulila ya mabhoku atati waki nahuli bhapata kumanya apalika mwana waki andoha lihina bhole.
LUK 1:63 Zakalia akalobhiki chibau cha kulembela, akalembiki ana, “Lihina laki Yohana.” Bhandu bhokapi bhakakangiche!
LUK 1:64 Palapala Zakalia akaweziki kulonge kabhete, akatumbwili kulonge kabete, na kundumbalila Chapanga.
LUK 1:65 Bhandu bha pambipi jaki bhakajowipi, na malobhi hagha ghakajaghani ku inchi jokapi ja hitombi ja ku Yudea.
LUK 1:66 Kila mundu joakajowini malobhi hagha akaholalili na kulilalukila, “Bho, mwana jonjo anaabya wa ntundu bhole?” Maghambu makili ghaka Bambo ghabhi papamu naku.
LUK 1:67 Zakalia, atati waka Yohana akatwelakiki Roho Mhuhu, na kupwagha ulota agho,
LUK 1:68 “Leka tundumbalya Bambo, Chapanga wa Izilaeli! Maghambu abhahikili bhandu bhaki na kubhakombola.
LUK 1:69 Atupeki tepani Mkengalela mwana makile, nchokolu waka mtumika waki Daude.
LUK 1:70 Ngati moakalongali kutumbu pamwandi kupete bhalota bhaki bhahuhu,
LUK 1:71 kubha anaatukengalya kuhuma mu mabhoku gha maadui bhitu, na kuhuma mu makili gha bhokapi bhabhatuhakalila.
LUK 1:72 Akapwaghiki anaabhonila chiha bhazee bhitu, na kulukomboka Lulaghilu lwaki luhuhu.
LUK 1:73 Akundapi Ibulahimu atati witu,
LUK 1:74 kubha anaatukengalyaje kuhuma kwa maadui bhitu. Na kunjojabhe Chapanga panga choghohi,
LUK 1:75 henu tupalika tubya twabhahuhu na tubya bhandu tetujetakalewa palongi jaki, machobha ghokapi gha womi witu.”
LUK 1:76 “Wenga wa mwanangu, anaulowakika mlota waka Chapanga joabhi Kunani Nakanope. Anaundongulya Bambo kundenganakela indela jaki,
LUK 1:77 kubhatangazi bhandu bhaki anabhakengaliwaje kwa kulekakewa mahoku ghabhu.
LUK 1:78 Chapanga witu abhi na chiha na mtima wambone. Anaatumulakya unang'anu kuhuma kunani,
LUK 1:79 nahuli kubhamulakila bhokapi bhabhabhi mu lubhendu na mu chihilu cha kupotela, na kutulongo magholu ghitu mwindela ja lukwale.”
LUK 1:80 Mwana akakoliki na kujonjukeka makili mu roho, akatami kuchingwenji mbaka lichobha lela paalilangia palanga kwa bhandu bha Izilaeli.
LUK 2:1 Machobha ghala Kaisali Agusto, akalaghalaki bhandu bhokapi bha pundema bhabhalangikaje.
LUK 2:2 Akoku kukabhi kubhalangika kwa kutumbula, Kilenio paakabhi chiongozi wa ku inchi ja ku Silia.
LUK 2:3 Kila mundu akapiti ku muchi waki ghoabhelakike kulemba lihina laki.
LUK 2:4 Yusufu akabhokiki kuhuma ku muchi wa Nazaleti ghoubhi ku inchi ja ku Galilaya, akapiti ku Beselehemu ghoukabhi ku muchi wa Yudea, pandu paakabhelakiki Nkolongwa Daude. Yusufu akapiti konihoku ndandi akahumi mu lubheleku lwaka Daude.
LUK 2:5 Akapiti kulembakeka konihoku papamu na Malia, joakumboki hweku na akabhi na chitumbu.
LUK 2:6 Bhakabya ku Beselehemu, lichobha laki Malia la kulibhopola lakahikike.
LUK 2:7 Akalibhopwi mwana waki wa kutumbula wa chikambaku, akamuwatiki indenga. Na kungoneka mu libheghi la kulekeha hinyama, maghambu ngachebhapatiki mbekenyu ja kutama mu nyumba ja kuhiki bhaghene.
LUK 2:8 Pa inchi jela bhakabhi bhadima bhabhakabhi bhatami mu mighonda, bhakalenda mapogha gha hinyama yabhu ikilu.
LUK 2:9 Bhela mtumika wa kunani waka Bambo akabhapitalili, na ulumbalilu waka Bambo ukabhamulakile. Na bhombi bhakajowipi namaa,
LUK 2:10 nambu mtumika waka Chapanga jola akabhapwaghile, “Ngamwijoghopa! Maghambu nhiki kundete malobhi manyahi gha chiheku chekibya kwa bhandu bhokape.
LUK 2:11 Lalenu ku muchi waka Nkolongwa Daude abhelakiki Mkengalela winu, jombi nde Kristo, Bambo!
LUK 2:12 Jenje nde anajibya nginyulila kwinu, anamunhimanya mwana nchoku bhunhwatiki indenga, na bhungoniki mu libheghi la kulekeha hinyama.”
LUK 2:13 Palapala bhatumika bhaka Chapanga bhamaheli bhakahikiki na kuhimangana na mtumika njabhu, bhakunjembili Chapanga bhakapwaghaje:
LUK 2:14 “Ulumbalilu kwaka Chapanga Kunani Nakanope, na lukwali kwa bhandu bhabhabhi pundema pokapi bhabhapalakiki naku!”
LUK 2:15 Bhatumika bhaka Chapanga bhala pabhakelawiki kunani kumahunde, bhadima bhakapwaghanile, “Tumbokanyaje ku Beselehemu tukalolaje chenihechi chechipitalile, ghaatupwaghi Bambo.”
LUK 2:16 Henu bhakakembili ku Beselehemu, bhakabhahimani Malia na Yusufu na mwana nkeki jola akabya aghoni pandu pa kulekeha hinyama.
LUK 2:17 Bhadima bhala pabhakumbweni mwana jola, bhakabhapwaghi malobhi kubhokana na mwana ghaakalongili mtumika wa kunani kwaka Chapanga.
LUK 2:18 Bhandu bhokapi bhabhajowini malobhi ghanihagha, bhakakangichi kubhokana na malobhi hagha gha bhadima.
LUK 2:19 Nambu Malia akaghabhehi malobhi ghokapi hagha muntima jaki na kughaholalela nakanopi.
LUK 2:20 Bhadima bhala bhakakelawiki kabheti kuchingwenji, koni bhakunjembila na kundumbali Chapanga kwa ghokapi ghabhajowini na kughabhona, ghokapi ghakahengakiki ngati mtumika wa kunani kwaka Chapanga moakapwaghile.
LUK 2:21 Mu lichobha la nane, lichobha la kuncheku mwana jando palahikaji, akalowakiki lihina laki Yesu. Lihina leniheli akapatiki kuhuma kwaka mtumika wa kunani waka Chapanga pala mabhu waki paakabhi akona ngakutogho chitumbu.
LUK 2:22 Machobha ghakahikite ghaka Malia na Yusufu kutenda ntetu wa kugholuleka nahuli kujetakalewa na Chapanga ngati Shelia jaka Musa mojilaghalakila. Bhela bhakuntoliki mwana, bhakapiti naku ku muchi wa ku Yelusalemu na kumbeka palongi jaka Bambo.
LUK 2:23 Ngati moilembakike mu Shelia jaka Bambo: “Kila mbelakeka wa kutumbula wa chikambaku abhohakika kwaka Bambo.”
LUK 2:24 Kabheti bhakapiti nahuli kubhoha nyambiku kwaka Chapanga, na bhakapalakiki kubhoha injebha ibheli au ibhana ibheli ya ngunda, ngati mojilongale Shelia jaka Bambo.
LUK 2:25 Ku Yelusalemu kola kukabhi na mundu jumu joalowakika Simeoni. Mundu jonihoju akabhi wambone na joanjojabhe Chapanga. Jombi alendalya kuhika kwa ukombola wa Izilaeli, na Roho Mhuhu akabhi papamu naku.
LUK 2:26 Roho Mhuhu akunhekuli kubha ngayipoteli mangane ja kumbona Kristo, jombi nde Bambo.
LUK 2:27 Bhela Roho Mhuhu akundongwi Simeoni na kujenda mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga. Pala bhabheleka pabhakundetiki mwana Yesu mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga nahuli kunhenge ngati moipalakya na ntetu wa Shelia,
LUK 2:28 Simeoni akanjopali mwana Yesu mu mabhoku ghaki koni akunchengula Chapanga, akapwagha,
LUK 2:29 “Henu Bambo, utimizi chilanga chaku, undekakya mtumika waku apotilaje kwa lukwale, ngati mowapwaghile.
LUK 2:30 Maghambu kwa mihu ghangu ghauweni ukengalelu waku,
LUK 2:31 ghoutendiki ubhonikana kwa bhandu bhokape.
LUK 2:32 Unang'anu ghowamulakya bhandu bha mataifa ghokapi, na kuleta ulumbalilu kwa bhandu bhaku bha Izilaeli.”
LUK 2:33 Yusufu na mabhu waka Yesu bhakabhi bhakangacha malobhi ghokapi ghaakalongi Simeoni panani jaka mwana jola.
LUK 2:34 Panihapa Simeoni akabhapengalili, na kumpwaghi Malia, mabhu waka Yesu, “Mwana jonjoni ahaghuliki na Chapanga kwa ndandi ja kuhabhuka na kujema kwa bhandu bhamaheli bha ku inchi ja ku Izilaeli. Kabheti anaabya nginyulila kuhuma kwaka Chapanga, jejikanakika na bhandu bhamahele,
LUK 2:35 nahuli maholalelu gha bhandu bhamaheli ghiyekulikaje palanga. Na kwaku wamweti, lipanga analijingala muntima waku, nahuli ghayekuliwa maholalelu gha mtima waku.”
LUK 2:36 Kabheti mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga mola kukabhi na mlota waka Chapanga jumu mbujamundu, lihina laki Ana, mwali waka Fanueli, wa likabila laka Asheli. Mbomba hoju akatami na ndomi waki kwa hyaka saba kutumbu paatoghulike.
LUK 2:37 Bhela akabhi mbomba joaweliwi na ndomi waki mbaka machobha ghala paakabhi na hyaka semanini na nne. Na machobha ghokapi hagha atamika mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga, ikilu na muhi akunjojabya Chapanga kwa kukonga na kulobha.
LUK 2:38 Chikahi chechechi, Ana akabhajendili koni akunchengula Chapanga, na kupwagha malobhi panani jaka mwana jola kwa bhandu bhokapi bhabhalendalya ukombola wa Yelusalemu.
LUK 2:39 Henu Malia na Yusufu pabhajomwi kuhenga ghokapi ghaghapalika na Shelia jaka Bambo, bhakakelabwiki kunyumba jabhu ku Nazaleti ku muchi wa ku Galilaya.
LUK 2:40 Mwana akakoliki, akajonjukiki makili akabya atweli malangu, na chihomu chaka Chapanga chakabhi papamu naku.
LUK 2:41 Kila chaka mu Uwangalalu wa Pasaka bhabheleka bhaki bhakabhi na ntetu wa kujenda ku Yelusalemu.
LUK 2:42 Yesu paakabhi na hyaka komi na ibheli, bhakapiti naku ku Uwangalalu ngati mowabheli ntetu.
LUK 2:43 Pawajomwiki Uwangalalu ghola, na bhabheleka pabhabhila bhabhuja kunyumba jabhu, Yesu akahighali kunyuma ku Yelusalemu, koni bhabheleka bhaki ngachebhamanye.
LUK 2:44 Bhahambukya kubha akabhi papamu nabhu mulipogha la bhandu bhabhakabhi mu mwanja ghola, bhakajendiki muhi jokapi. Bhela bhakatumbwi kundonda mwalongu bhaki na mwakochi bhaki.
LUK 2:45 Kwa kubha ngachebhumbweni, bhakakelawiki kabhete ku Yelusalemu nahuli kundonda.
LUK 2:46 Pa lichobha la katatu, bhakunhimani pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, akabya atami pachilanda ja bhabhola bha Kiyahude, koni abhajowanela na kubhalaluki malalukilu.
LUK 2:47 Bhokapi bhabhajowini malobhi ghaki bhakakangichi kwa malangu na kuyanga kwaki.
LUK 2:48 Malia mabhu waki na Yusufu pabhumbweni bhakakangichi nakanopi, na mabhu waki akundalukili, “Mwanango, bho, maghambu ki utuhengi bhenibhela? Lingalya, nepani na atati waku tukabhi tukulonda kwa kubhina mtima.”
LUK 2:49 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Bho, mnonde kyane? Ngachemmanyi kubha imbalika kubha mu Nyumba ja Atati wangu?”
LUK 2:50 Nambu bhombi ngachebhamanyi ndandi ja lilobhi leakapwaghile.
LUK 2:51 Henu Yesu akakelawiki ku Nazaleti papamu nabhu, akajendalya kubhatii. Amabhu waki akabhekiki mambu ghanihagha ghokapi muntima.
LUK 2:52 Yesu akajendali kukola mu mbulau na ulacho, na kujendalela kunyambiha Chapanga na bhandu.
LUK 3:1 Chaka cha komi na unhwanu cha utawala waka Kaisali Tibelio, Pontio Pilato akabhi chiongozi wa ku Yudea. Helode akabhi nkolongwa wa ku Galilaya, na Filipo ndongu waki akabhi chiongozi wa Itulea na inchi ja Tilakoniti. Lisania akabhi nkolongwa wa ku Abilene.
LUK 3:2 Anasi na Kayafa bhakabhi bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, chikahi hechi Lilobhi laka Chapanga lakunhiki Yohana mwana waka Zakalia kuchingwenji kola.
LUK 3:3 Henu Yohana akapiti ku inchi yokapi yeilindakanila na nkoka Yoludani. Akabhatangazi bhandu, “Mng'anambukaje na kughaleka mahoku ghinu na mbatizwaje nahuli Chapanga andekakya mahoku ghinu.”
LUK 3:4 Ngati moilembakike mu chitabhu chaka mlota Isaya, “Mundu ajamali kuchilipololu, ‘Mundenganakya Bambo indela jaki, ndenganakya paanapetaje!
LUK 3:5 Kila likemba lipalika liyelalikaje, kila chitombi na katombi ipalika ilenganakikaje. Papapendiki papalika pahatambuliwaje, indela ihakau ipalika ilenganakikaji na kubha wichu.
LUK 3:6 Bhandu bhokapi anabhubhona ukengalelu waka Chapanga!’ ”
LUK 3:7 Bhela bhandu bhakunjendi Yohana nahuli abhabatizaje, najombi akabhapwaghile, “Mwehapa kibheleku cha lijoka! Bho, nane joandakali mabhanganya ntila utemulu waka Chapanga ghouhika?
LUK 3:8 Ndangia kwa matendu kubha mng'anambwiki na kughaleka mahoku ghinu. Kabheti ngamwitumbu kulonge mu mitima jinu, ‘Atati witu nde Ibulahimu!’ Chakaka numpwaghila, Chapanga aweza kughang'anambu maganga aghagha kubha bhana bhaka Ibulahimu.
LUK 3:9 Bhela, libhaghu libhekakiki wichu punhina wa kila nkongu, kila nkongu wangakubheleka mapambiku manyahi anauhekatwaje na kulekaleka pamoto.”
LUK 3:10 Lipogha la bhandu lakundalukile, “Bho, henu tutenda bhole?”
LUK 3:11 Yohana akabhayangiki, “Mundu joabhi na ingobhu ibheli angabhila jwangakubha na ingobhu, na joabhi na chilebhi angabhila jwanga na chilebhi.”
LUK 3:12 Bhajopa kode bhakahikiki nahuli bhabatizwaje, bhakundalukile, “Mbola, bho, na tepani tuhenga kike?”
LUK 3:13 Jombi akabhapwaghile, “Ngamwijopa kode kupetale mobhundaghalakile.”
LUK 3:14 Manjolinjoli na bhombi bhakundalukile, “Bho, na tepani tuhenga kike?” Jombi akabhayangiki, “Ngamwanyaghu mundu jokapi jola hindu yaki kwa makili, kabheti ngamwantakila mundu jokapi kwa upuhe. Mtoshikaje na malepu ghinu.”
LUK 3:15 Bhandu bhalendalya kuhika kwaka Mkombola. Bhakabhi bhalilalukila mumitima jabhu kubha pangi Yohana nde Kristo.
LUK 3:16 Panihapa Yohana akabhapwaghi bhokape, “Nepani numbatiza mwanganya kwa machi, nambu ahika joabhi na makili kumbeta nenga, na nepani ngachembalika kumbopo mighoji ja maghubasi ghake. Jombi anaambatiza kwa Roho Mhuhu na kwa moto.
LUK 3:17 Jombi abhi na chipalu mumabhoku ghaki, nahuli apeta inganu yaki, abhongana ingano mu chikoku chaki, na mambojwa anaaghajocha kwa moto wangakuchuchuka.”
LUK 3:18 Henu kwa malobhi ghangi ghamaheli Yohana akabhi abhatangazi bhandu Malobhi Manyahi na kubhalakalila bhaileka indela yabhu.
LUK 3:19 Nambu Yohana akundakali Helode Nkolongwa wa ku Galilaya, maghambu akuntowi Helodia, joakabhi nhwanu waka ndongu waki, na mahakau ghangi ghamaheli ghaakabhi aghahengike.
LUK 3:20 Panihapa Helode akajonjukili uhakau waki, kwa kumbeka Yohana muchifungo.
LUK 3:21 Bhandu bhokapi pabhajomula kubatizwa, Yesu najombi akabatizwi. Paakabhi andobha Chapanga, kunani kumahunde kukahowiki,
LUK 3:22 na Roho Mhuhu akanhelali panani jaki kwa ulenganesu ngati wa ngunda. Sauti jakajowaniki kuhuma kunani kumahunde jakapwagha, “Wenga wa Mwanangu wenukupaliki. Nenga nyambakiki na wenga.”
LUK 3:23 Yesu paakabhili atumbula lihengu laki akabhi na umuli wa hyaka selasini, na bhandu bhahambukya mwana waka Yusufu, joakabhi mwana waka Heli.
LUK 3:24 Heli akabhi mwana waka Masati, joakabhi mwana waka Lawi, Lawi akabhi mwana waka Meliki, Meliki akabhi mwana waka Yana, Yana akabhi mwana waka Yusufu.
LUK 3:25 Yusufu akabhi mwana waka Matasia, Matasia akabhi mwana waka Amosi, Amosi akabhi mwana waka Nahumu, Nahumu akabhi mwana waka Esili, Esili akabhi mwana waka Nagai.
LUK 3:26 Nagai akabhi mwana waka Maati, Maati akabhi mwana waka Matatia, Matatia akabhi mwana waka Semeni, Semeni akabhi mwana waka Yoseki, Yoseki akabhi mwana waka Yuda.
LUK 3:27 Yuda akabhi mwana waka Yoanani, Yoanani akabhi mwana waka Lesa, Lesa akabhi mwana waka Zelubabeli, Zelubabeli akabhi mwana waka Shealitieli, Shealitieli akabhi mwana waka Neli.
LUK 3:28 Neli akabhi mwana waka Meliki, Meliki akabhi mwana waka Adi, Adi akabhi mwana waka Kosamu, Kosamu akabhi mwana waka Elimadamu, Elimadamu akabhi mwana waka Eli.
LUK 3:29 Eli akabhi mwana waka Yoshua, Yoshua akabhi mwana waka Eliezeli, Eliezeli akabhi mwana waka Yolimu, Yolimu akabhi mwana waka Masati, Matati akabhi mwana waka Lawi.
LUK 3:30 Lawi akabhi mwana waka Simoni, Simoni akabhi mwana waka Yuda, Yuda akabhi mwana waka Yusufu, Yusufu akabhi mwana waka Yonamu, Yonamu akabhi mwana waka Eliakimu.
LUK 3:31 Eliakimu akabhi mwana waka Melea, Melea akabhi mwana waka Mena, Mena akabhi mwana waka Matata, Matata akabhi mwana waka Nasani, Nasani akabhi mwana waka Daude.
LUK 3:32 Daude akabhi mwana waka Yese, Yese akabhi mwana waka Obedi, Obedi akabhi mwana waka Boazi, Boazi akabhi mwana waka Solomoni, Solomoni akabhi mwana waka Nashoni.
LUK 3:33 Nashoni akabhi mwana waka Aminadabu, Aminadabu akabhi mwana waka Adimini, Adimini akabhi mwana waka Hesiloni, Hesiloni akabhi mwana waka Pelesi, Pelesi akabhi mwana waka Yuda.
LUK 3:34 Yuda akabhi mwana waka Yakobo, Yakobo akabhi mwana waka Isaka, Isaka akabhi mwana waka Ibulahimu, Ibulahimu akabhi mwana waka Tela, Tela akabhi mwana waka Naholi.
LUK 3:35 Naholi akabhi mwana waka Selugi, Selugi akabhi mwana waka Leu, Leu akabhi mwana waka Pelegi, Pelegi akabhi mwana waka Ebeli, Ebeli akabhi mwana waka Sala,
LUK 3:36 Sala akabhi mwana waka Kenani, Kenani akabhi mwana waka Alifakisadi, Alifakisadi akabhi mwana waka Shemu, Shemu akabhi mwana waka Nuhu, Noha akabhi mwana waka Lameki.
LUK 3:37 Lameki akabhi mwana waka Metusela, Metusela akabhi mwana waka Enoki, Enoki akabhi mwana waka Yaledi, Yaledi akabhi mwana waka Mahalaleli, Mahalaleli akabhi mwana waka Kenani.
LUK 3:38 Kenani akabhi mwana waka Enoshi, Enoshi akabhi mwana waka Seti, Seti akabhi mwana waka Adamu, Adamu akabhi mwana waka Chapanga.
LUK 4:1 Yesu akakelawiki kuhuma ku Nkoka Yoludani koni atweli Roho Mhuhu, na Roho hoju akundongwi mbaka kulipololu.
LUK 4:2 Konihoku akalengakiki na Shetani kwa machobha alobaini. Mu machobha ghokapi hagha ngacheakakuliki chindu chokapi, na paghapetiki machobha ghanihagha akaweni injala.
LUK 4:3 Shetani akampwaghi Yesu, “Ngati wehapa nde wa Mwana waka Chapanga, lipwaghila lighanga aleli libya libumunda.”
LUK 4:4 Nambu Yesu akayangiki, “Ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu, ‘Mundu ngacheatama kwa kula libumunda pena, nambu kwa kila Lilobhi laka Chapanga.’ ”
LUK 4:5 Palapala Shetani akundongwi Yesu mbaka panani ja chitombi chilachu, na kwa chikahi chijipi akandangi ukolongwa wokapi wa pundema pokapi.
LUK 4:6 Shetani akumpwaghile, “Ananukupekya ukolongwa wokapi na ulumbalilu waki wokapi, maghambu yokapi heyi mbekiwi nepani, na nepani nhweza kumpeke mundu jonumpala.
LUK 4:7 Bhela anaunjikamili na kunyojabhela, yokapi ananukupekyaje wehapa.”
LUK 4:8 Yesu akayangiki, “Ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu, ‘Unjojabya Bambo Chapanga waku na untumakya jombi kanjika jaki!’ ”
LUK 4:9 Kabheti Shetani akundongwi Yesu mbaka ku Yelusalemu, akumbei kunani kunhaghala wa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na kumpwaghila, “Ngati wehapa nde wa Mwana waka Chapanga, ulilekala pahi kuhuma pambane.
LUK 4:10 Maghambu ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu, ‘Chapanga anaakulaghalakya bhatumika bhaki bha kunani kumahunde bhakulendaje.
LUK 4:11 Bhombi anabhukutola mumabhoku ghabhu nahuli ngawalikobhandola chiwolu chaku paliganga.’ ”
LUK 4:12 Nambu Yesu akayangike, “Ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu, ‘Ngawandenga Bambo Chapanga waku.’ ”
LUK 4:13 Shetani paajomula kundenga Yesu kwa indela yokapi, akundekiki kwa chikahi.
LUK 4:14 Bhela Yesu akakelawiki kujenda ku Galilaya akabya atwelili makili ghaka Roho Mhuhu. Na malobhi ghaki ghakayaghani pandu pokapi pa inchi ya pambipi.
LUK 4:15 Yesu akabhi abhola mu nyumba yabhu ya kuhimangani Bhayahude na bhandu bhokapi bhakundumbalile.
LUK 4:16 Henu Yesu akapiti ku Nazaleti, pandu paakakolile, na Lichobha la Sabato akapiti mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayaude ngati mowabheli ntetu waki. Akajemiki na kusoma Malembu Mahuhu kwa saute.
LUK 4:17 Bhakumpeki chitabu chaka mlota Isaya, akakibhopwili na kupahimani pandu papalembakiki,
LUK 4:18 “Roho waka Bambo abhi panani jangu, maghambu anjawi nabhatangazya bhahochu Malobhi Manyahi. Andumiki kubhatangazi bhabhakongakiki kubhopulewa kwabhu na akangalola kulola kabhete kubhalekakela bhandu bhabhabhonewa.
LUK 4:19 Kutangaza kubha machobha ghahikiki ghaka Bambo kubhakengalela bhandu bhaki.”
LUK 4:20 Yesu paakajomwi kusoma, akakikongiki chitabu chela, akankelabhuki mtumika na akatami pahi. Bhandu bhokapi bhabhabhi mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude bhakundingali nakanopi.
LUK 4:21 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Lilembu lendenu lipitali kubha chakaka lalenu pamukabhi njowanela.”
LUK 4:22 Bhandu bhokapi bhakundandili na kukangacha malobhi gha chihomu ghaakalongile. Bhakalaluwine, “Bho, hojo le nga mwana waka Yusufu?”
LUK 4:23 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Manyi muweza kumbwaghi lilobhi lendenu, ‘Sing'anga, ulilamiha wamwene!’ Na kabheti muweza kumbwaghila, ‘Mambu ghokapi ghatujowini kubha ukaghahengiki ku Kapelenaumu, ughahenga bhelabhela na pani pa muchi waku.’ ”
LUK 4:24 Yesu akajendali kupwagha, “Chakaka numpwaghila, njeta mlota joajetakalewa pa muchi waki mweni.”
LUK 4:25 “Nambu nyowanyaje! Chakaka nupwaghila kukabhi na akambomba bhabhaweliwi na bhalomi bhamaheli ku inchi ja Izilaeli chikahi chaka mlota Eliya. Machobha ghanihagha iyula ngachejatonyike kwa hyaka hitatu na myehi sita, kukabhi na injala ngolongwa ku inchi jokape.
LUK 4:26 Hata bhela, Eliya ngacheatumakiki hata kwaka jumu wabhu ku Izilaeli, nambu akatumakiki ku Salepata kwaka mabhu jumu joaweliwi na ndomi, ku inchi ja ku Sidoni.
LUK 4:27 Kabheti, mu machobha ghaka mlota Elisha, kukabhi na bhandu bhamahele bhabhabhi na chitamu cha malohi ku Izilaeli. Nga mundu joakalamiki, nambu Naamani kanjika mundu wa ku inchi ja ku Silia.”
LUK 4:28 Bhandu bhokapi bhabhabhi mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude mola pabhajowini malobhi ghanihagha, bhakahakali namaa.
LUK 4:29 Bhakajemanile, bhakumpihiki Yesu kunja ja muchi kwa makili, na bhakumpeliki ku chitombi kunani pandu pabhachengiki muchi wabhu. Bhakapaliki bhundekala pahi kulikemba lilachu,
LUK 4:30 nambu Yesu akapetiki palapala pachilanda ja lipogha, na kubhoka.
LUK 4:31 Bhela Yesu akaheli ku Kapelenaumu, muchi wa ku Galilaya. Na Lichobha la Sabato akabhi abhabhola bhandu.
LUK 4:32 Bhakakangichi namaa kwa mabholu ghaki, maghambu mabholu ghaki ghakabhi na makili.
LUK 4:33 Mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude, kukabhi na mundu joabhi na majobhi, akajamalili, akapwagha,
LUK 4:34 “Bho, upala kututenda kiki, wa Yesu wa ku Nazaleti? Bho, uhikiki kutukoma? Nukumanyi kubha wehapa nde wa Mhuhu waka Chapanga!”
LUK 4:35 Yesu akandakali lijobhi jola, akapwagha, “Tumbalaje! Umpita mundu hoju!” Palapala lijobhi jola akunhawi mundu jola pahi palongi jabhu bhokapi, na kumpita panga kumpoteka.
LUK 4:36 Bhandu bhokapi bhakakangichi namaa, bhakabhi bhapwaghanila, “Bho, aghagha henu mabholu bhole? Maghambu mundu joni abhi na uwezu na makili wa kughatopo majobhi, na ghombi ghabhoka!”
LUK 4:37 Bhela malobhi ghaka Yesu ghakayaghani pandu pokapi pa muchi wa Galilaya.
LUK 4:38 Yesu akapitiki mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude jela na kujenda kunyumba jaka Simoni. Henu konihoku akunhimani nkowanu waka Simoni alwala chitamu chikolongwa namaa, bhakundobhiki Yesu andamiha mabhu jola.
LUK 4:39 Yesu akapiti kujema pambipi na mabhu jola, akajinimi na kuchikenjuki chitamu chela. Na chitamu chela chakundekakile. Palapala akajemiki, na kutumbu kubhateleke chilebhe.
LUK 4:40 Lyobha palakabhi lijibhila, bhandu bhakundeti Yesu bhandu bhabhalwalika kila chitamu, najombi akabhabheki mabhoku ghaki panani ja kila mtamwa, na kubhalamiha bhokapi.
LUK 4:41 Majobhi ghakabhapitiki bhandu bhamahele, na kujamalila koni ghakapwagha, “Wehapa wa Mwana waka Chapanga!” Nambu Yesu akaghakenjukili na kughahibhali kupwagha, maghambu ghakummanyi kubha jombi nde Kristo.
LUK 4:42 Chilabhu jaki lukela, Yesu akapitiki kunja ja muchi pandu panga kubha na bhandu. Bhandu bhakatumbwi kundonda, na pabhakumbweni bhakalengiki kunhibhali nahuli ngaibhoka.
LUK 4:43 Nambu Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Imbalika kabheti kutangaza Malobhi Manyahi gha Ukolongwa waka Chapanga ku michi jenge, maghambu chenihechi nde Chapanga cheandumiki kukihenga.”
LUK 4:44 Henu Yesu akajendali kutangaza mu nyumba ya kuhimangani Bhayahude ya ku Yudea.
LUK 5:1 Lichobha limu Yesu akajemiki pamaheku ja Nhwanga wa Genesaleti, na panihapa bhandu bhamaheli bhakatwelile na kutumbu kukangana, koni bhakajowanya Malobhi ghaka Chapanga.
LUK 5:2 Akaiweni ngalawa ibheli mumaheku ja nhwanga, yeyalekakiki na bhalohi habha bhakabhi bhajigholo mikwabhu jabho.
LUK 5:3 Yesu akajingi mu ngalawa jimu jejikabhi jaka Simoni, bhela akandobhiki Simoni akolula ngalawa jela mumachi, patali pachokopi kuhuma pamaheku ja nhwanga. Bhela akatami monimola koni akabya abhabhola lipogha la bhandu.
LUK 5:4 Pajomwi kubhabhola, akampwaghi Simoni, “Uhugha ngalawa mbaka kulochi kokunyoliki na ukapendakya nkwabhu waku nahuli ulobha homba.”
LUK 5:5 Simoni akamuyangike, “Bambo, tutyalini kulobha homba ikilu jokapi panga kupata chindu, nambu kwa kubha upwaghiki wehapa, anambendakya nkwabho.”
LUK 5:6 Pabhakapendaki nkwabhu wabhu, bhakalobhiki homba yamahele nakanope mbaka nkwabhu wabhu utumbuka kukachuka.
LUK 5:7 Bhela bhakabhalohiki bhajabu bhabhakabhi mu ngalawa najengi bhahika kubhajangatila. Bhakahikiki, bhakatwelaki homba ngalawa yokapi ibheli mbaka ipalika kujibhila.
LUK 5:8 Simoni Petulu paaweni chela chechipitalile, akanchikimili Yesu na kupwagha, “Bambo, ubhoka palongi jangu, maghambu nepani nde mundu mwana mahoku!”
LUK 5:9 Simoni papamu na bhajaki bhakakangichi kwa homba yamahele yebhalobhike.
LUK 5:10 Bhelabhela Yakobo na Yohana bhana bhaka Zebedayo, bhabhakabhi bhakochi bhaka Simoni na bhombi bhakakangiche. Yesu akumpwaghi Simoni, “Ngawijoghopa kutumbu sajenu na kujendalela anaubya undohi wa bhandu.”
LUK 5:11 Bhakahughiki ngalawa yela mbaka kumaheku, bhakahilekiki hindu yokapi na kunjengale Yesu.
LUK 5:12 Yesu paakabhi mu muchi ghumu wa Galilaya, akahikiki mundu joabhi na malohi hyegha jokapi. Ntamwa hoju paakambweni Yesu, akalihawi pahi, akalobhiki, “Bambo, ngati anaupala, uweza kung'olola!”
LUK 5:13 Yesu akahatambwi chiwoku chaki, akankamwi na kumpwaghila, “Mbala! Ugholulikaje!” Palapala malohi ghakumbokike.
LUK 5:14 Yesu akunkanakili, akumpwaghile, “Ngawampwaghi mundu jokapi lilobhi lenu, nambu ujenda ukalilangiya kwaka mpenganyambiku kubha ulamiki na ukabhoha nyambiku ngati moalaghalaki Musa, nahuli ubya ulandilu kwa bhandu bhokapi kubha wenga ulamike.”
LUK 5:15 Nambu malobhi panani jaka Yesu ghakajaghani manyata pandu pokapi, na bhandu bhamahele bhakahikiki kunjowanela na bhakapaliki abhalamiha hitamwa yabhu.
LUK 5:16 Nambu Yesu mala pamaheli akapiti pandu panga bhandu, na kundobha Chapanga.
LUK 5:17 Lichobha limu Yesu paakabhi abhola, Mafalisayo bhakumu na bhabhola bha Shelia kuhuma ku kila chijiji cha ku Galilaya, ku Yudea na ku Yelusalemu, bhakabhi bhatemi panihapa. Makili ghaka Bambo ghakabhi papamu naku kwa kubhalamiha bhatamwa.
LUK 5:18 Panihapa bhandu bhakahikiki, bhuntandaini mundu jumu joatengwiki pa uleli, bhakalengiki kunjingia mkati, nahuli bhumbeka palongi jaka Yesu.
LUK 5:19 Nambu, ngachebhaweziki kujingi mkati, kwa ndandi ja bhandu bhamaheli. Bhela bhakuntotwili bhakankwehiki panani ja nhwaghala, bhakapekanywi, na bhakunheli pa uleli mpaka pachilanda ja bhandu bhala palongi jaka Yesu.
LUK 5:20 Yesu paakaweni uhobhalelu wabhu, akumpwaghi mundu joatengwiki, “Nkochi wangu, mahoku ghaku ghalekakiwi.”
LUK 5:21 Bhabola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo bhakatumbwi kulilaluha, “Bho, hajo mundu bholi joantondo Chapanga? Bho, nane joaweza kulekake mahoku? Chapanga kanjika jaki nde joaweza kulekake mahoku!”
LUK 5:22 Yesu akaghamanyi maholalelu ghabhu, akabhalalukile, “Bho, muholale kiki mu mitima jinu?
LUK 5:23 Bho, lelipepwiki nakanopi lako, kupwagha, ‘Ulekakiwi mahoku ghaku,’ au kupwagha, ‘Jemaje na ujendaje?’
LUK 5:24 Nambu mbala mmanya kubha Mwana waka Mundu abhi na amule pundema ja kulekakela bhandu mahoku ghabhu.” Bhela akampwaghi mundu jola joatengwiki, “Nukupwaghila, jemaje, utola uleli waku, na ujendaje kunyumba jaku.”
LUK 5:25 Palapala, mundu joatengwiki jola akajemiki palongi jabhu, akatoliki uleli waki na kujenda kunyumba jaki koni akabya andumbali Chapanga.
LUK 5:26 Bhandu bhokapi bhakakangichi nakanope. Bhakajowipi na bhakundumbali Chapanga, bhakapwaghaje, “Lalenu tuweni mambu gha ngangachu!”
LUK 5:27 Paghajomwiki ghanihagha, Yesu akapiti kunja akumbweni mundu njopa kode joalowakika Lawi, atami padowoku mu chindamba cha kulepe kode. Yesu akampwaghile, “Unyengalyaje!”
LUK 5:28 Lawi akajemiki, akailekiki hindu yokapi, na akunjengali Yesu.
LUK 5:29 Lawi akantendi Yesu uwangalalu ukolongwa kunyumba jaki, na lipogha likolongwa la bhandu bhajopa kode na bhandu bhangi bhakabhi bhatemi papamu nabhu.
LUK 5:30 Nambu Mafalisayo bhakumu na bhabhola bhangi bha Shelia bhakabhang'ong'ataki bhabhulwa bhaka Yesu, bhakapwaghaje, “Bho, maghambu kiki mkula na kunywa papamu na bhandu bhajopa kode na bhana mahoku?”
LUK 5:31 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Bhandu bhangakulwala ngapabhumpala sing'anga, nambu bhatamwa nde bhabhumpala sing'anga.
LUK 5:32 Ngachenhikiki kubhaloha bhandu bhamboni, nambu nhikiki kubhaloha bhandu bhana mahoku bhapata kung'anambuka na kughaleka mahoku ghabhu.”
LUK 5:33 Bhandu bhangi bhakampwaghile, “Bhabulwa bhaka Yohana Mbatizaji bhakonga kula chilebhi chikahi kwa chikahi na kulobha, na bhabhulwa bha Mafalisayo bhatenda bhelabhela. Nambu bhabhulwa bhaku bhakula na kunywa.”
LUK 5:34 Yesu akabhayangati, “Bho, bhabhakokakiki kuukwati bhapalika le kukonga koni bambo ukwati abhi papamu nabhu? Ngabhela!
LUK 5:35 Nambu lichobha analihikaje bambo ukwati anaabhohakika kwabhu, na panihapa nde pabhikonga kula chilebhe.”
LUK 5:36 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghi ulenganesu ghongo, “Nga mundu joakachu chilaka kuhuma mu ingobhu jahenu na kuloke mu ingobhu ja mwande. Ngati anatendiki bhenibhela, anaakachula ingobhu jahenu, na chilaka kuhuma mu ingobhu jahenu ngachilengani na ingobhu ja mwande.
LUK 5:37 Kabheti nga mundu joaweza kujeghe divai jahenu mu mifuku jejilenganakiki na chingokolu cha mwande, ngati anaatehi bhenibhela, divai anajikachula mifuku ja chingokolu na kujitika, na mifuku ja chingokolu jitenda kukachuka.
LUK 5:38 Nambu divai jahenu jijeghaleka mu mifuku ja ingokolu jahenu.
LUK 5:39 Nga mundu joakunywa divai jahenu na kutokule kunywa divai ja mwande, maghambu bhapwagha, ‘Jamwandi nde jinyahi.’ ”
LUK 6:1 Lichobha limu la Sabato Yesu akabhi apeta mu mighonda ja ingano. Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakatumbwi kupanyu mapukutu gha ingano, bhakapulwii mu mabhoku ghabhu na kula.
LUK 6:2 Mafalisayo bhakumu bhakabhalalukile, “Bho, maghambu ki muhenga lihengu lebhakanakili kuhenga Lichobha la Sabato?”
LUK 6:3 Yesu akabhayangike, “Bho, ngachemsomiki moakatendi Daude, na bhajaki chikahi pabhakabhi na injala?
LUK 6:4 Daude akajingi mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga, akatoliki mabumunda ghaghabhowakiki kwaka Chapanga akakulike. Bhelabhela akabhapeki na bhajake. Shelia junkanaki mundu jokapi jola kula mabumunda ghanihagha nambu bhapenganyambiku pela nde bhabhapalika kula mabumunda ghanihagha.”
LUK 6:5 Henu Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mwana waka Mundu nde Bambo wa Sabato.”
LUK 6:6 Mu lichobha lengi la Sabato, Yesu akapiti kubhola mu nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude. Mkati ja nyumba ja kuhingani Bhayahude jela kukabhi na mundu joatengwiki chiwoku cha kumalelelu.
LUK 6:7 Bhabhola bhakumu bha Shelia na Mafalisayo bhakumu bhapalika bhapata ndandi ja kuntaki Yesu na bhela bhalendalya bhabhona ngati anaandamiha mundu mu Lichobha la Sabato.
LUK 6:8 Nambu Yesu akaghamanyiki maholalelu ghabhu, akumpwaghi mundu joatengwiki chiwoku jola, “Ujema, uwika palongi pambane.” Mundu jola akajemiki pachilanda jabhu.
LUK 6:9 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Nundaluki mwanganya, bho, wichu le mu Lichobha la Sabato kuhenga manyahi au kuhenga mahakau? Kukengale womi waka mundu au kuukoma?”
LUK 6:10 Akabhalingalili bhandu bhokapi bhabhabhi panipala, na akumpwaghi mundu jola, “Uhatambula chiwoku chaku.” Akatendiki ngati Yesu moakampwaghile na chiwoku chaki chakalamike.
LUK 6:11 Nambu bhombi bhakahakali namaa, bhakajetanganili kubha chindu bhole cheanabhuntendila Yesu.
LUK 6:12 Lichobha limu Yesu akapiti kuchitombi kundobha Chapanga, akatemi konihoku ikilu jokapi koni akundobha Chapanga.
LUK 6:13 Lukela pakwachile, Yesu akabhalohiki bhabhulwa bhaki. Akabhahawi bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli kuhuma pachilanda jabhu, akabhalohiki mitumi.
LUK 6:14 Simoni, Yesu akumpeki lihina la kabheli Petulu, na Andulea ndongu waki, na Yakobo na Yohana na Filipo na Batolomayo.
LUK 6:15 Matayo na Tomaso na Yakobo mwana waka Alufayo na Simoni joalowakika Zelote, ndandi jaki mundu wa kukomanela inchi jaki.
LUK 6:16 Yuda mwana waka Yakobo na Yuda Isikalioti, joang'anambwiki Yesu.
LUK 6:17 Yesu paakaheli kuhuma kuchitombi papamu na mitumi bhaki, akajemiki pandu papakabhili na uwanda. Pandu panihapa pakabhili na lipogha likolongwa la bhabhulwa bhaki na mapogha makolongwa gha bhandu kuhuma ku inchi ja Yudea, ku Yelusalemu na bhabhakahumiki kumaheku ja ipambala yokapi ya michi ja ku Tilo na ku Sidoni.
LUK 6:18 Bhandu habha bhakahikiki kunjowane Yesu na kulamishwa itamwa yabhu. Bhelabhela bhandu bhala bhabhang'ahakika na majobhi bhakahikiki na bhakalamiswe.
LUK 6:19 Bhandu bhokapi bhakapaliki kunkamu Yesu, kwa ndandi makili ghakapitiki mkati jaki na kubhalamiha bhandu bhokapi.
LUK 6:20 Yesu akabhang'anambuki bhabhulwa bhaki na kupwagha, “Mpengaliki mwanganya mwabhahochu, maghambu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga nde winu!
LUK 6:21 Mpengaliki mwanganya mwembi na injala sajeno, maghambu anantupilaje! Mpengaliki mwanganya mwendela sajeno, maghambu anamuhekaje!
LUK 6:22 “Mpengaliki mwehapa ngati bhandu pabhunhakalila, pabhuntenga, pabhuntondola na kumpwaghi mahakau, kwa ndandi jaka Mwana waka Mundu!
LUK 6:23 Muhekalyaji na kukina kwa chiheku paghipitalya ghanihagha, maghambu chakaka nhupu winu nde ukolongwa kunani kumahunde. Kwa ndandi bhenibhela nde bhazee bhabhu mobhakabhatendi bhalota bhaka Chapanga.
LUK 6:24 Nambu anamuchibhonaje mwembi na hindu yamaheli, maghambu njomwi kupata chiheku chinu!
LUK 6:25 Anamuchibhonaje mwentupi sajenu, maghambu mwibhona injala! Anamuchibhonaje mwemuheka sajenu, maghambu anamuombulizaje na kulela!
LUK 6:26 “Anamuchibhonaje mwenga mwebhundumbali bhandu, maghambu bhazee bhabhu bhakabhahengi bhalota bha icholi bhelabhela.
LUK 6:27 “Nambu numpwaghi mwanganya mwenyowanela, mwapala maadui bhinu, mubhahengila manyahi bhabhunhakalila.
LUK 6:28 Mwapengalya bhala bhabhumpeke masolo, mwalobhila bhandu bhabhunhenge mahakau.
LUK 6:29 Ngati mundu anaakulapwi litukwa lakumu ung'anambulya na la kabheli. Na ngati mundu anakunyawili likoti laku undekila kabheti na lishati laku.
LUK 6:30 Ngati mundu anakujopiki chindu umpekyaje, na ngati mundu jokapi anaakunyawi hindu yaku, ngawanjopa akukelabhukyaje.
LUK 6:31 Mwabhahengila bhandu bhangi chela chempala mwehapa bhunhengilaje.
LUK 6:32 “Ngati anamwapaliki pela bhabhumpala, bho, anampata nyonjeka bhole? Njeta! Maghambu hata bhandu bhana mahoku bhelabhela bhabhapala bhandu bhala bhabhapala.
LUK 6:33 Kabheti ngati anamwahengi manyahi bhala pela bhabhunhenge manyahi mwehapa, bho, anampata nyonjeka bhole? Maghambu hata bhana mahoku bhatenda bhelabhela!
LUK 6:34 Ngati anamwajahika pela bhala bhamuhobhalela anabhundepaje, bho, anandangiha chiha bhole? Bhelabhela hata bhana mahoku bhabhajahika bhana mahoku bhajabhu, nahuli bhabhakelabhukya nyonjeka jelajela.
LUK 6:35 Nambu mwanganya mwapala maadui bhino, na mwahengila manyahi, na mwajahika, panga na kuhobhalela kunkelabhukila. Panihapa nhupu winu anaubya ukolongwa, na mwibya mwabhana bhaka Chapanga joabhi Kunani Nakanopi. Maghambu jombi nde wamboni kwa bhokapi bhanga na uchengulu na bhahakau.
LUK 6:36 Mbya na chiha, ngati Atati winu moabheli na chiha.
LUK 6:37 “Ngamwatemu bhandu bhange, na Chapanga ngaantemuli mwenga. Ngamwalaumu bhandu bhange, na Chapanga ngaandaumu mwenga. Mwabhalekakya bhandu bhange, na Chapanga anaandekakya mwenga.
LUK 6:38 Mwapekya bhandu bhange hindu, na Chapanga anaampekya mwenga. Nanamu mwijopalya mumabhoku ghinu chipemu chechitweli mbaka kujitika. Maghambu chipemu chentumi kubhapeme bhandu bhange, Chapanga anaatumila chipemu chocho kumpeme mwenga.”
LUK 6:39 Kabheti Yesu akabhapwaghi ulenganesu ghongo, “Bho, ngalola aweza le kundongo ngalola njake? Bho, bhokapi bhabheli le ngabhijibhi mulibhomba?
LUK 6:40 Nga mbulwa joampeta mbola waki, numbu kila mbulwa anajomwi mabholu ghaki, anakubha ngati mbola waki.
LUK 6:41 “Bho, maghambu kiki ulolake likanju lelibhi mu lihu laka ndongu wako, nambu ngacheubhona luboliti lolubhi mu lihu lako?
LUK 6:42 Bho, uweza bholi kumpwaghi ndongu waku, ‘Ndongu wango, lendalya nukubhoa likanju lelibhi mu lihu lako,’ na koni ngacheubhona luboliti lolubhi mu lihu laku wamwene? Wenga wandumila kubhele! Utumbula hoti kubhoha luboliti lolubhi mu lihu laku, na panihapa nde wibhona wichu na wiweza kubhoha likanju lelibhili mlihu laka ndongu wako.
LUK 6:43 “Nkongu unyahi ngacheupambika mapambiku mahakau, bhelabhela njeta nkongu uhakau ghoupambika mapambiku manyahi.
LUK 6:44 Ndandi kila nkongu umanyikana kwa mapambiku ghaki ghaghapambika. Ndandi bhandu ngachebhatongola mapambiku gha nkongu ghoulowakeka mtini kuhuma mu miha, wala zabibu kuhuma mu mingwando.
LUK 6:45 Mundu mnyahi alongela malobhi manyahi kuhuma mu chikoku cha mtima wake, na mundu muhakau alonge malobhi mahakau kuhuma mu chikoku cha mtima wake. Maghambu mundu ulonge mambu ghala ghaghatweli mkati ja mtima wake.
LUK 6:46 “Bho, maghambu kiki munoha, ‘Bambo, Bambo,’ na koni ngachemughahenga ghala ghanumpwaghi mughahengaje?
LUK 6:47 Ananundangia ulenganesu waka mundu joanyengalela, joajowanela malobhi ghangu na kughakamula.
LUK 6:48 Jombi alenganeswa na mundu joachenga nyumba, joakemba luhuli pa liganga, na kuchenga nyumba heji panihapa. Iyula ngolongwa pajakatonyiki mafuliku ghakajilapwi nyumba jela, nambu ngacheghaweziki kujinyuha, maghambu jikachengakiki wichu.
LUK 6:49 Nambu joajowanela malobhi ghangu panga na kughakamula, alenganeswa na mundu joachengiki nyumba panani ja luhombi na panga na kukemba luhuli. Iyula ngolongwa pajakatonyiki mafuliku ghakajilapwili nyumba jela, na punkamu jakahawiki na kubhombukana nakanopi!”
LUK 7:1 Yesu paakajomwili kulonge mambu ghanihagha kwa bhandu, akapiti ku Kapelenaumu.
LUK 7:2 Konihoku kukabhi na nkolongwa jumu wa manjolinjoli mia moja wa ku Loma, joakabhi na mtumika waki joakampaliki namaa. Mtumika hoju atendika kulwala pambipi na kupotela.
LUK 7:3 Nkolongwa hoju paakajowini malobhi panani jaka Yesu, akabhatumiki bhazee bhakumu Bhayahude bhajenda bhakundobha Yesu ahika andamiha mtumika waki.
LUK 7:4 Pabhahikiki kwaka Yesu, bhakumpembali namaa, bhakapwaghiki, “Unjangatya mundu ajoju,
LUK 7:5 maghambu abhapala bhandu bha inchi jitu, na nde joatuchengi nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude.”
LUK 7:6 Bhela, Yesu akapiti papamu nabhu. Paakaheghali kuhika pa nyumba jaka nkolongwa hoju, nkolongwa hoju akabhatumiki bhakochi bhaki bhumpwaghila Yesu, “Bambo, ngawaling'aha kuhika kone. Ndandi nenga ngachembalika kukujopale wenga ujingala mu nyumba jangu.
LUK 7:7 Nde ndandi nilibhoniki ngachembalika kuhika kwako. Henu ulongila pe lilobhi, na mtumika wangu anaalamaje.
LUK 7:8 Ndandi nepani nanatu nde na mundu nemi pahi ja ujemelelu wa bhakolongwa, na mi na manjolinjoli pahi jangu. Numpwaghi jumu, ‘Ujendaje!’ Na jombi ajenda, na numpwaghi jongi, ‘Uhika!’ Na jombi ahika. Na ananumpwaghi mtumika wangu, ‘Uhenga anana!’ Na jombi ahenga.”
LUK 7:9 Yesu paakajowini malobhi ghanihagha, akakangichi namaa, na akaling'anambuki lipogha la bhandu lelabhi lunjengalela na kupwagha, “Chakaka numpwaghila ngachenabhali kumbona mundu joabhi na uhobhalelu ngati ghongone, njeta hata ku Izilaeli!”
LUK 7:10 Bhela bhandu bhala pabhahikiki kunyumba jaka Nkolongwa wa ku Loma jola bhakumketanili mtumika jola alamike.
LUK 7:11 Palongi pachokopi, Yesu akapiti ku muchi ghoulowakeka Naini papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki, koni akalongana na lipogha la bhandu.
LUK 7:12 Henu, paakabhi aheghale ndyangu ukolongwa wa muchi, bhakapitali bhandu bhabhatowi ntuwi waka nkombu jumu, mwana kanjika waka mabhu joaweliwi na ndomi. Bhandu bhamaheli bha muchi ghola bhakabhi papamu na mabhu jola.
LUK 7:13 Bambo paakambweni mabhu jola, akamboni chiha, na akampwaghi, “Ngawilela.”
LUK 7:14 Bhela, Yesu akapiti palongi na kukamu chitanda, na bhabhatowi chitanda bhakajemiki. Yesu akapwaghiki, “Nkombo! Nukupwaghi ujumukaje!”
LUK 7:15 Nkombu joakapotili jola akajinwiki na kutumbu kulongela, na Yesu akampeki mabhu waki.
LUK 7:16 Bhandu bhokapi bhakatweliwi na choghohi na bhakundumbali Chapanga bhakapwaghaje, “Mlota nkolongwa waka Chapanga apitali kwitu, Chapanga ahikiki kubhakengale bhandu bhake.”
LUK 7:17 Malobhi ghanihagha Yesu ghahengiki ghakajaghani ku ndema wokapi wa ku Yudea na inchi yokapi ya pambipi.
LUK 7:18 Bhabholu bhaka Yohana Mbatizaji bhakampwaghi Yohana mambu ghala ghokapi ghaghapitalile, bhela Yohana akabhakemiki bhabhulwa bhaki bhabheli.
LUK 7:19 Na kubhatuma kwaka Bambo kundalukila, “Bho, wehapa le nde jola joakapwaghiki Yohana ahika, au tundendalya jonge?”
LUK 7:20 Bhandu bhala pabhahikiki kwaka Yesu bhakumpwaghile, “Yohana Mbatizaji atutumiki tukulalukyaje, ‘Bho, wehapa le nde jola joahika au tundendalya jonge?’ ”
LUK 7:21 Chikahi chelachela, Yesu akabhalamihi bhandu bhangi bhamaheli namaa, bhabhakabhi na itamwa na bhabhakamuliki na majobhi, na kubhatenda akangalola kuweza kulola.
LUK 7:22 Yesu akabhayangiki bhabholu bhaka Yohana akapwagha, “Njenda mkumpwaghila ghokapi ghamughaweni na kughajowana, akangalola bhalola, iwete bhajenda, bhabhabhi na malohi banyambiswa, akangajowa bhajowana, bhakuwa bhayohakeka, na Malobhi Manyahi ghatangwazwa kwa bhahochu.
LUK 7:23 Apengaliki mundu jwangakubha na makangachu na nepani!”
LUK 7:24 Bhabholu bhaka Yohana pabhakabhokiki, Yesu akatumbwi kubhapwaghi mapogha gha bhandu panani jaka Yohana, “Bho, mkapiti kulipololu, kulinga kyane? Bho, mpalika kubhona litete lelinyuhakika na mpongo?
LUK 7:25 Ngati ngabhela, bho, henu mkapiti kulinga kyane? Bho mkapiti kumbona mundu joawati ingobhu inyahi? Bhabhawata ingobhu inyahi na kutama matamu gha kulihekeha bheni nakanopi, bhatama mu manyumba gha kikolongwa!
LUK 7:26 Henu mbwaghilaje, bho, mwakapiti kulingali kike? Bho, mkapiti kundinga mlota waka Chapanga? Hena, nambu mumbweni nkolongwa kupeta mlota waka Chapanga.
LUK 7:27 Hajoju nde Yohana joalongaleka mu Malembu Mahuhu, ‘Chapanga akapwaghiki, ananuntuma mbolu wangu akulongulyaje nahuli akulenganakya indela.’ ”
LUK 7:28 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Pachilanda ja bhandu bhokapi bhabhabhelakiki na mbomba Yohana Mbatizaji nde nkolongwa. Nambu joabhi nchokuchoku nakanopi mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga nde nkolongwa kupeta Yohana.”
LUK 7:29 Bhandu bhokapi, papamu na bhajopa kode pabhakajowini ghahihagha bhakajetakili kubha indela jaka Chapanga nde jambone, na bhandu bhanihabha nde bhala bhabhakabatizwi na Yohana.
LUK 7:30 Nambu Mafalisayo na bhabhola bha Shelia bhakakaniki indela jaka Chapanga kwabhu, kwa kukana kubatizwa na Yohana.
LUK 7:31 Yesu akajendali kupwagha, “Bho, ananabhalenganisha bhandu bha kibheleku chenjenu na kike? Bho, bhandu abhabha bhalengana na kike?
LUK 7:32 Bhalengana na bhana bhabhatemi palighulio. Lipogha limu lakabhapwaghila lipogha lengi, ‘Tunhoni filimbe, nambu ngachenkinike! Tujembili nyembu ya maombulezu, nambu ngachendelike!’
LUK 7:33 Kwa ndandi Yohana Mbatizaji akahikiki, akakongiki kula chilebhi na kunywa divai, nanamu mkapwaghiki, ‘Abhi na majobhi!’
LUK 7:34 Mwana waka Mundu akahikike, na akulikaji na kunywa, nanamu mkapwaghiki, ‘Mundingalya mundu ajoju! Ndou na ndobhela, nkochi wa bhajopa kode na bhana mahoku!’
LUK 7:35 Nambu mbulau jaka Chapanga jimanyakini kubha jamboni kwa bhandu bhokapi bhabhajijetakela.”
LUK 7:36 Mfalisayo jumu akankokiki Yesu kula chilebhi cha pakamihi kunyumba jaki. Na Yesu akapiti kunyumba jaka Mfalisayo jola akatamiki na kula chilebhi.
LUK 7:37 Mu muchi ghola kukabhi na mbomba jumu joakabhi na mahoku. Paakajowini kubha Yesu akulika chilebhi mu nyumba jaka Mfalisayo hoju, akaletiki libotolu lelalenganakiki kwa liganga la alabhasta na mkati jaki kukabhi na mahuta gha kunungi wichu.
LUK 7:38 Akahiki kujema pambipi ja magholu ghaka Yesu, akaleliki na maholi ghaki ghakahabhuki pa magholu ghaka Yesu. Mbomba jola akaghahungwi magholu ghaka Yesu kwa majunju ghaki, na kughabusu magholu na kughapaka mahuta gha kunungi wichu.
LUK 7:39 Mfalisayo joakankokiki Yesu paaghaweni ghanighala, akaliholali muntima waki, “Ngati mundu ajoju akabhi chakaka mlota waka Chapanga, akabya amanyi mbomba joankamu ajo wa ntundu bhole, kubha nde mwana mahoku!”
LUK 7:40 Yesu akampwaghi Mfalisayu jola, “Simoni, mili na lilobhi la kukupwaghila.” Simoni akamyangiki, “Ena Mbola, umbwaghilaje.”
LUK 7:41 Yesu akatumbwi kulongela, “Kukabhi na mundu jumu mwana mbija joakabhajahiki bhandu bhabheli mbija, mundu jumu akunjahiki ipandi mia nhwanu ya madini gha feza, na jongi ipandi hamsini ya madini gha feza.
LUK 7:42 Bhokapi bhabheli njeta joakaweziki kukelabhuha mbija, bhela mwana mbija hoju akabhalekakili bhokapi bhabheli. Bho, jwaku panihapa kwa bhabheli habha joanaampala nakanope mwana mbija?”
LUK 7:43 Simoni akayangike, “Nholake kubha mundu jola joalekakiwi mbija yamaheli.” Yesu akumpwaghile, “Uyangiki chakaka.”
LUK 7:44 Panihapa Yesu akung'anambuki mbomba jola, na kumpwaghi Simoni, “Bho, umbona mbomba ajojo? Nyingi munyumba jaku, ngacheumbeki machi gha kugholola magholu ghangu, nambu mbomba ajoju ang'olwi magholu ghangu kwa maholi ghaki na kunhungu kwa majunju ghaki.
LUK 7:45 Ngacheunamukili kwa kunibusu, nambu mbomba ajoju kutumbu paajingala pambani, ngacheakotwiki kunibusu magholu ghangu.
LUK 7:46 Ngacheumbakiki mahuta pamutu jangu, nambu mbomba ajoju ambakiki mahuta gha kunungi wichu mu magholu ghangu.
LUK 7:47 Bhela nukupwaghila, ndandi alekakiwi mahoku ghaki ghamaheli, bhela ambaliki nakanope. Nambu mundu joalekakiwi pachokope, apala pachokope.”
LUK 7:48 Bhela Yesu akumpwaghi mbomba jola, “Ulekakiwi mahoku ghaku.”
LUK 7:49 Nambu bhokapi bhabhabhi papamu naku koni bhakakula chilebhe bhakatumbwi kulaluwana, “Bho, ajo nane joaweza kubhalekake bhandu mahoku?”
LUK 7:50 Nambu Yesu akumpwaghi mbomba jola, “Uhobhalelu waku ukukengalili wenga, ujenda kwa lukwale.”
LUK 8:1 Paghapetiki ghanighala Yesu akapetiki ku michi na mwijije, koni akatangaza Malobhi Manyahi gha Ukolongwa waka Chapanga. Bhabulwa bhaki komi na bhabheli bhakabhi papamu naku,
LUK 8:2 kabhete bhakabhi akambomba bhakumu Yesu bhaakabhohiki majobhi na kubhalamiha itamu. Pachilanda jabhu akabhi Malia Magidalena, joakambohiki majobhi saba,
LUK 8:3 na Yoana nhwanu waka Kuza, mtumika nkolongwa waka Helode, na Susana na akambomba bhangi bhamaheli. Akambomba habha bhakabhohiki hindu yabhu kwa kunjangati Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki.
LUK 8:4 Bhandu bhakunjendi Yesu kuhuma ku michi jengi jamaheli, na lipogha likolongwa la bhandu palakalibhongini papamu, Yesu akabhapwaghi ulenganesu hagho:
LUK 8:5 “Pakabhi na mpanda jumu joakapiti kukweta imbeju. Paakabhi akweta imbeju mu ngonda waki, yengi ikaawiki mu indela, bhandu bhakahikanyiti na ijuni ikakuliki.
LUK 8:6 Yengi ikaawiki pa luhombi lolwabhi panani ja maganga, na payameliki, ikanyaliki maghambu ngacheyapatiki machi pa luhombi.
LUK 8:7 Imbeju yengi ikaawiki pa mikongu ja miha, na ikakoliki papamu naku na mikongu ja miha ikajihinyiki mimea heji.
LUK 8:8 Imbeju yengi ikaawiki pa luhombi lunyahi, na yombi ikameliki na kupambika mapambiku, kila jimu mia moja.” Na Yesu paakalongi bhenibhela akajamalili na kupwagha, “Mundu joabhi na makutu na ajowanaje!”
LUK 8:9 Bhabulwa bhaki bhakundaluki Yesu, ulenganesu ghongone ndandi jaki kike?
LUK 8:10 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Mwanganya muyekuliwi kumanya sili ja Ukolongwa waka Chapanga, nambu kwa bhandu bhange, nonge nabhu kwa milenganesu, nahuli bhalingaje nambu ngabhibhona, na bhajowanyaje nambu ngabhimanya.”
LUK 8:11 “Jenjenu nde ndandi ja ulenganesu hoghu, imbeju nde lilobhi laka Chapanga.
LUK 8:12 Imbeju yeyaawiki mwindela ilangi bhandu bhala bhabhajowana lilobhi, nambu Shetani ahika na kulibhoha lilobhi lela mu mitima jabhu nahuli ngabhihika kuhobhalela na kukengaleka.
LUK 8:13 Imbeju yeyaawiki pa luhombi lolwabhi pa maganga ilangi bhandu bhala bhabhalijowana lilobhi na kulijopale kwa chiheku, nambu ngachelibhi na mikegha na ngachelajingile mkati nakanopi mu mitima jabhu. Bhalihobhale kwa chikahi chijipi pela, na pabhalengakeka bhuuleka uhobhalelu wabho.
LUK 8:14 Imbeju yeyaawiki pa mikongu ja miha ilangi bhandu bhala bhabhajowana lilobhi laka Chapanga, nambu pabhajendalela bhahinyakika na mang'ahiku, kupala hindu yamaheli na mahakau gha pani pundema, na bhombi ngachebhapambika mapambiku.
LUK 8:15 Imbeju yeyaawiki pa luhombi lunyahi ilangi bhandu bhala bhabhalijowana lilobhi laka Chapanga, na kulijopalela kwa mtima unyahi na kulijengalela, bhanganya habha nde bhandu bhala bhabhalikamulaki lilobhi na kuhinakalila kwamaheli na kuhenga ngati moapali Chapanga.
LUK 8:16 “Nga mundu joapambaki taa na kukupaki chihulu au kujibheka kwihi ku chitanda. Nambu bhajibheka panani ja chinala, nahuli bhandu pabhajingila munyumba bhaubhona unang'anu.
LUK 8:17 “Ndandi chindu chokapi chechihiyakiki chitenda kuyekulika, na chokapi chechikupakiki chimanyikana na kubhekakeka palanga.
LUK 8:18 “Bhela mlilendaje monjowane malobhi, ndandi joabhi na chindu anajonjukiwa nakanope, nambu jwanga na chindu, hata chela chichoku cheaholake abhi nachu anachitolakikaje.”
LUK 8:19 Amabhu waka Yesu na bhalongu bhaka Yesu bhakahikiki kumbona, nambu ngachebhaweziki kunhikila pambipi kwa ndandi ja lipogha la bhandu.
LUK 8:20 Mundu jumu akumpwaghi Yesu, “Amabhu waku na bhalongu bhaku bhajemiki kunja na bhapala kukubhona.”
LUK 8:21 Yesu akabhayangiki bhokapi, “Amabhu wangu na bhalongu bhangu nde bhala bhokapi bhabhalijowana Lilobhi laka Chapanga na kulitii.”
LUK 8:22 Lichobha limu Yesu akajingi mu ngalawa papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki, na akabhapwaghile, “Tumboka tulombuka mbaka kwihi ja nhwanga.” Panihapa bhakatumbwi mwanja.
LUK 8:23 Pabhakabhi bhalomboka kwa ngalawa, Yesu akaghochi lughono. Palapala mbelu ukolongwa ukatumbwi kupogha mu nhwanga, na machi ghakatumbwi kutwelela mu ngalawa, bhokapi bhakabhi pambipi kujibhila.
LUK 8:24 Bhabhulwa bhakunjendi Yesu na kunjumuwa, bhakapwaghaje, “Bambo, Bambo! Tupotela!” Yesu akajumwiki na kuulakalila mpongu na majegha makolongwa, na kukatondiki na kubha wichu.
LUK 8:25 Panihapa Yesu akabhalaluki bhabhulwa bhaki, “Bho, uhobhalelu winu ubhi kwako?” Nambu bhombi bhakakangichi, na kujoghopa koni bhakapwaghanya, “Bho, hajo mundu bhole? Aulakali mpongu na majegha nayombi yuntii!”
LUK 8:26 Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakajendali na mwanja mbaka ku inchi ja Bhagelasi, jejibhi kwihi ja nhwanga Galilaya.
LUK 8:27 Yesu paakabhi ahuluka mungalawa, akahimangini na mundu jumu joakabhi na majobhi kuhuma kumbwane akunhikile. Kwa chikahi chilachu mundu hoju ajendika panga kuwata ingobhu na ngacheatamika panyumba, nambu atamika kumatengele.
LUK 8:28 Paambweni Yesu, akaleliki na kulilekela pamagholu ghaki, na kujamalila akapwagha, “Yesu, Mwana waka Chapanga Joabhi Kunani Nakanopi! Bho, upala kundenda kyane? Nukulobha, ngawing'aha!”
LUK 8:29 Mundu ajoju akapwaghiki bhenibhela maghambu Yesu akalipwaghi lijobhi lela limbokaje. Lijobhi lela likankamwili mundu jola pamaheli, na hata ngati bhandu bhunkongika mabhoku na magholu kwa minyololu na pengu, nambu ahekata minyololu na pengu na majobhi ghundonguwa kujenda kulipololo.
LUK 8:30 Yesu akundalukile, “Bho, lihina laku wa nane?” Na jombi akamuyangiki, “Lihina langu ‘Lipogha,’ ” maghambu akabhi na majobhi ghamahele.
LUK 8:31 Majobhi ghala ghakumpembali Yesu ngabhapeleka kuwawa.
LUK 8:32 Pandu pala pakabhi na lipogha likolongwa la magholobhi, bhakalimila mwitombi. Bhela majobhi ghakunjopiki Yesu abhajetakalya bhakajingala mu magholobhi, najombi akaghalekiki ghajendaje.
LUK 8:33 Majobhi ghakumpitiki mundu jola na kujingi mu magholobhi. Lipogha lokapi la magholobhi lakaheli pa likemba na kujibhi mu nhwanga, na ghokapi ghakapotile mumachi.
LUK 8:34 Bhadima bhala pabhaliweni lijambu lelapitalili, bhakakembili na kujenda kupwagha mambu ghanihagha kumbwane na kwijije.
LUK 8:35 Bhandu bhakahiki kulinga lelipitalile, na pabhahiki kwaka Yesu, bhakunhimani mundu joghumpitiki majobhi atami pambipi na Yesu, awati ingobhu na malangu ghaki ghunkelabhukile, na bhandu bhokapi bhakajowipe.
LUK 8:36 Bhala bhabhaghaweni ghaghahengakiki bhakabhapwaghi bhandu ntundu mundu jola moakalamile.
LUK 8:37 Bhela bhandu bhokapi bha inchi ja Bhagelasi bhakunjopiki Yesu abhoka kwabhu, maghambu bhakabhi na choghohi namaa. Panihapa Yesu akajingi mu ngalawa na kubhoka.
LUK 8:38 Mundu joghumpitiki majobhi akunjopiki Yesu, “Unyetakya nyenda na wenga.” Nambu Yesu ngacheajetakili kujenda naku, na akumpwaghile,
LUK 8:39 “Ubhuja kunyumba ukabhalandila bhandu mambu ghokapi makolongwa ghaakutendi Chapanga.” Bhela mundu jola akapetiki ku muchi wokapi, akatangaza mambu ghokapi Yesu ghaakantendile.
LUK 8:40 Yesu paakakelawiki upambala ghongi wa nhwanga, lipogha la bhandu bhakunjopali kwa chiheku, maghambu bhokapi bhundendalya jombi.
LUK 8:41 Panihapa akahikiki mundu jumu joalowakika Yailo, joakabhi nkolongwa wa nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude, akahikiki na kulihabhu pambipi ja magholu ghaka Yesu, akundobha ajenda kunyumba jaki,
LUK 8:42 ndandi mwali waki wa kanjika, joakabhi na hyaka komi na ibheli, akabhi pambipi kupotela. Yesu paajendikaje, lipogha la bhandu lakunhinyiki ipambala yokapi.
LUK 8:43 Pa chilanda jabhu kukabhi na mbomba jumu joakang'ahakiki na chitamu cha kupita mwahi kwa hyaka komi na ibheli, papamu na kutumi hindu yaki yokapi kwa akasing'anga, nambu nga jumu joaweziki kundamiha.
LUK 8:44 Mbomba hoju akanjengali Yesu cha kunyuma na kukamu nkungilu wa ingobhu jaki. Palapala chitamu chaki cha kupita mwahi chakalamike.
LUK 8:45 Yesu akalalukile, “Bho, nde nane joangamwile?” Bhandu bhokapi bhakakaniki, Petulu akapwaghike, “Bambo, lipogha la bhandu likuyongalwiti na kukuhinya.”
LUK 8:46 Nambu Yesu akapwaghike, “Kubhi mundu joangamwile, ndandi niliweni makili ghamokite.”
LUK 8:47 Mbomba jola paamanyiti kubha ngaawezi kulihiya, akahikiki koni abhaghaja kwa choghohi na kulileke palongi jaka Yesu. Panihapa akundandi Yesu palongi ja bhandu bhokapi bhabhakabhi panipala ndandi ja kunkamu Yesu na ntundu moawezi kulamishwa palapala.
LUK 8:48 Yesu akumpwaghi mwali jola, “Kamwali, uhobhalelu waku ukulamihe. Ujenda kwa lukwale.”
LUK 8:49 Yesu paakabhi ajendale kupwagha, mbolu akahikiki kuhuma kunyumba jaka Yairo. Na kumpwaghi Yairo, “Mwali waku apotile. Ngawijendale kung'aha Mbola.”
LUK 8:50 Nambu Yesu paakajowini malobhi ghanihagha, akumpwaghi Yairo, “Ngawijoghopa, uhobhalya pela, na mwali waku analamiswaje.”
LUK 8:51 Yesu paakahikiki kunyumba jaka Yairo, ngacheanjetakali mundu jokapi kujingi naku munyumba, nambu Petulu na Yohana na Yakobo na mabhu na atati bhaka mwali joapotili jola.
LUK 8:52 Bhandu bhokapi bhakabhi bhundelela na kuombuleza kwa ndandi ja kupotela kwaka mwana. Nambu Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ngamwilela, maghambu mwana ngacheapotile, nambu aghochili lughonu pela!”
LUK 8:53 Bhokapi bhakundongimi Yesu, maghambu bhakamanyiki kubha mwali apotile.
LUK 8:54 Nambu Yesu akamkamwi chibhoku na kundoha, “Kamwali, jumukaje!”
LUK 8:55 Mwali joakapotili jola womi waki ukankelabhukile, na palapala akajemiki. Na Yesu akabhalaghalakili bhumpekya mwali chilebhi.
LUK 8:56 Bhabheleka bhaki bhakakangichi namaa, nambu Yesu akabhalaghalaki ngabhumpwaghi mundu ghaghahengakike.
LUK 9:1 Yesu akabhalohiki bhabhulwa bhaki komi na bhabheli, akabhapeki makili na uwezu wa kughatopo majobhi na kulamiha bhatamwa.
LUK 9:2 Bhela akabhatumiki bhajenda kubhatangazi bhandu ubholu wa Ukolongwa waka Chapanga na kubhalamiha bhatamwa.
LUK 9:3 Akapwagha, “Ngamwitogho chindu chokapi chela pa mwanja winu, ngamwitogho nkongochu, wala nkoba, wala chilebhi, wala mbija, wala ingobhu ibhele.
LUK 9:4 Nyumba jokapi jemwijingalaji na kujopalewa, mtamaje monihomu mbaka pamwibhoka mu muchi ghonihoghu.
LUK 9:5 Ana ngati bhandu bhikana kunjopalela, mboka muchi ghonihoghu na nkung'undaje luhombi mu magholu ghinu ngati ulandilu kubha bhombi bhakaniki kunjowanela.”
LUK 9:6 Panihapa bhabhulwa bhakabhokiki na kujenda kwijiji, koni bhakatangaza Malobhi Manyahi na kubhalamiha bhandu pandu pokapi.
LUK 9:7 Helode mtawala wa ku Galilaya, akajowini malobhi ghokapi ghaghatendakiki na Yesu. Na jombi akabhi na choghohi, maghambu bhandu bhapwaghika kubha Yohana Mbatizaji ayokiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa.
LUK 9:8 Bhangi bhapwaghika Eliya atehi kupitalila, na bhangi bhapwaghika kubha jumu wa bhalota bhaka Chapanga bha mwandi atehi kuyoka.
LUK 9:9 Helode akapwaghike, “Yohana nukunhekiti mmutu, bho, henu ajoju nde nane ambaju nyowana malobhi ghaki?” Na jombi akatokuli kumbona Yesu.
LUK 9:10 Mitumi bhaka Yesu pabhakelawiki bhakumpwaghi Yesu ghokapi ghabhahengiki. Na jombi akabhatoliki bhabhulwa bhaki na kujenda nabhu kanjika jabhu ku muchi wa ku Betisaida.
LUK 9:11 Nambu lipogha la bhandu palamanyiki koajenda, bhakunjengalile. Yesu akabhajopalili, na kubhapwaghila panani ja Ukolongwa waka Chapanga, na kubhalamiha bhandu bhabhakabhi bhapala kulamishwa.
LUK 9:12 Pakwahiki pakamihi, bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli bhala bhakunjendi Yesu na kumpwaghila, “Wapwaghila bhandu bhajenda kwijiji na mu manyumba yeibhi pambipi na mighonda nahuli bhakalinga chilebhi na pandu pa kughonela, maghambu pandu pani pachingwenje.”
LUK 9:13 Nambu Yesu akabhayangiki, “Mwanganya mwabhete mwapekya chilebhe.” Bhombi bhakapwaghike, “Tubhinaghu pela mabumunda nhwanu na homba ibheli. Bho, upala le tujenda kuheme chilebhi cha kubhaleha bhandu bhokapi abhabha?”
LUK 9:14 Pandu panipala pakabhi na akanalomi ngati elfu nhwano. Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Mwatamika bhandu mu mapogha na kila lipogha likubhaje na bhandu hamsini.”
LUK 9:15 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakatei bhenibhela, na kubhatamika pahi.
LUK 9:16 Yesu akatohi mabumunda nhwanu ghala na homba ibheli, akalingali kunani kumahunde, akaipengalile. Bhela akahekiti mabumunda na homba, na kubhapeke bhabhulwa bhaki bhaghabhila bhandu.
LUK 9:17 Bhandu bhokapi bhakakuliki na bhakatupile. Na bhabhulwa bhakabhongini mahighalilu gha mabumunda na homba itonga komi na ibheli.
LUK 9:18 Lichobha limu Yesu paakabhi andobha Chapanga pandu pa kanjika. Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakunjendile, najombi akabhalalukili, “Bho, bhandu bhapwagha kubha nepani nde nane?”
LUK 9:19 Bhakanjangiki, “Bhandu bhangi bhapwagha wehapa wa Yohana Mbatizaji, na bhangi bhapwagha wehapa wa Eliya, na bhangi bhapwagha, wehapa nde jumu wa bhalota bhaka Chapanga bhamwande weuyokike.”
LUK 9:20 Na jombi akabhalalukile, “Bho, mwanganya mpwagha nepani na nane?” Petulu akayangaki, “Wehapa nde wa Kristo waka Chapanga.”
LUK 9:21 Bhela Yesu akabhakanaki ngabhampwaghi mundu lijambu leniheli.
LUK 9:22 Yesu akapwaghiki kabheti, “Impalika Mwana waka Mundu kupata mang'ahiku na kukanakika na bhazee, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, na bhabhola bha Shelia. Na jombi anabhunkomaje, nambu lichobha la katatu anayokaje.”
LUK 9:23 Kabheti akabhapwaghi bhokapi, “Mundu jokapi jopala kubha mbulwa wangu, impalika alikana mweni, autola msalaba waki machobha ghokapi, na anyengalyaje.
LUK 9:24 Ndandi mundu jokapi joapala kukengalela womi waki anauhoaje, nambu joahoa womi waki kwa ndandi jangu, anaukengalyaje.
LUK 9:25 Bho, anakunjangatya kiki mundu kupata kila chindu chekibhi pani pundema koni auhoa womi waki au kuliyonanga mweni?
LUK 9:26 Anangati mundu amonela iyoni nepani na mabholu ghangu, Mwana waka Mundu anambonila iyoni mundu hoju paanahika mu ulumbalilu waki, na ulumbalilu wa Atati waki, na ulumbalilu wa bhatumika bhahuhu bha kunani bhaka Chapanga.
