LUK 21:35 Kwa ndandi lichobha heli analibhahikila ghafula bhandu bhokapi bhabhatama pani pundema wokapi.
LUK 21:36 Bhela mbya mihu chikahi chokapi, mkalobhaje, nahuli mpata makili gha kujepangana na mambu ghanihagha ghokapi ghaghipitalyaje, nanamu mpata kuweza kujema palongi jaka Mwana waka Mundu.”
LUK 21:37 Machobha ghokapi hagha muhi, Yesu akabhi abhola pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na ikilu akabhi ajenda ku Chitombi cha Mizeituni na kutama konihoku.
LUK 21:38 Bhandu bhokapi bhakabhi bhajumuka palukela na kujenda kunjowanela Yesu pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga.
LUK 22:1 Chikahi cha uwangalalu wa kula mabumunda ghangakujeghaleka amila, jejilowakeka Uwangalalu wa Pasaka, ukabhi uheghalile.
LUK 22:2 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhabhola bha Shelia bhakabhi bhalonda indela ja kunkoma Yesu, nambu bhakabhajowipi bhandu.
LUK 22:3 Bhela Shetani akunjingi Yuda, joalowakika Isikalioti, joakabhi jumu wa bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli.
LUK 22:4 Bhela Yuda akapiti kulongela nabhu bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhalonda bha Nyumba jaka Chapanga ntundu moang'anambukya Yesu kwabhu.
LUK 22:5 Bhakahekalili namaa na bhakajongini na Yuda kubha anabhumpekya mbija.
LUK 22:6 Yuda akajetakili na kutumbu kulonda mbekenyu jinyahi ja kung'anambuka Yesu kwabho, pandu ambapu njeta lipogha la bhandu.
LUK 22:7 Bhela lichobha la uwangalalu wa Mabumunda Ghangakujeghaleka Amila lakahikike, leniheli nde lichobha lelipalika mwanambeleli wa Pasaka kuchinjakika.
LUK 22:8 Bhela Yesu akabhatumiki Petulu na Yohana na kubhapwaghila, “Njendanya mkatuandalya chilebhi nahuli tukula Pasaka.”
LUK 22:9 Bhombi bhakundalukile, “Bho, upala tukakuandalya kwako?”
LUK 22:10 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Pamkajingala ku muchi, mkahimangana na mwanalomi joanyamwi chihulu cha machi. Mukunjengalyaje mbaka mu nyumba jeakajingalaje.
LUK 22:11 Mukumpwaghila mweni nyumba, ‘Mbola akulalukila, bho, kibhi kwa chumba cha bhagheni chenikula chilebhi cha Pasaka papamu na bhabhulwa bhango?’
LUK 22:12 Jombi anandangiya chumba chikolongwa cha kugholofa chekijomwi kubhekakeka wichu. Monihomu nde mkatuandalya chilebhe.”
LUK 22:13 Bhakapiti na kukihimani kila chindu kibhi wichu ngati Yesu moakapwaghile, na bhombi bhakaandi chilebhi cha Pasaka.
LUK 22:14 Chikahi pachahikaje, Yesu akatemi pahi, na kula chilebhi papamu na mitumi bhaki.
LUK 22:15 Akabhapwaghile, “Ndokuli namaa kula chilebhi chenu cha Pasaka papamu na mwenga mangane ja kung'ahika kwangu.
LUK 22:16 Chakaka numpwaghila, nganikuli kabheti chilebhi chenu cha Pasaka mbaka pajipitalya mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga.”
LUK 22:17 Bhela Yesu akachitoi chikombi cha divai, na kuchipengalela akapwagha, “Mtola chenjenu na ngabhana mabhokapi.
LUK 22:18 Maghambu numpwaghila kutumbu sajenu ngangunywi kabheti divai jenu mbaka Ukolongwa waka Chapanga pawihikaje.”
LUK 22:19 Kabheti akatohi libumunda, akunchengwi Chapanga, akalihekiti, na kubhapekeha, akapwaghaje, “Jenjenu nde hyegha jangu, jempatiki mwenga. Ntenda anana kwa kungomboka nepani.”
LUK 22:20 Bhelabhela paakajomwi kula chilebhi cha pakamihi akachitoi chikombi cha divai na kupwagha, “Chikombi chenjenu nde lulaghilu lwahenu lwaka Chapanga lolusibitishwa kwa mwahi wangu, ghoujitika kwa ndandi jinu.
LUK 22:21 “Nambu, ndingalyaje! Jola joaying'anambukaje akula chilebhi papamu na nepani.
LUK 22:22 Maghambu Mwana waka Mundu anaapotilaje ngati moapangi Chapanga, nambu anaachibhonaje mundu jola joang'anambukaje!”
LUK 22:23 Bhela bhakatumbwi kulaluhana bheni kwa bheni kubha nde nane pachilanda jabhu joanahenga lijambu leniheli.
LUK 22:24 Kukapitali kulochana kwa bhabhulwa kubhokana na nde nane joaholaleka kubha anaabya nkolongwa pachilanda jabhu kupeta bhangi bhokapi.
LUK 22:25 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Bhakolongwa bha bhandu bhanga Bhayahude bhabhajemale bhandu bhabhu kwa makile, na bhala bhabhabhi na lujiniku panani jabhu bhaliloha, ‘Bhakochi bha bhandu.’
LUK 22:26 Nambu ngakwikubha bhenibhela kwinu mabhanganya. Nambu jola joabhi nkolongwa pachilanda jinu, impalika abya ngati nchoku wa bhokapi, na joabhi chiongozi impalika abya ngati mtumika.
LUK 22:27 Bho, nane joabhi nkolongwa? Bho, jola joatama kula chilebhhi, au jola joabhatumakila? Chakaka nde jola joatama kula chilebhi. Nambu nepani mili pambane pachilanda jinu ngati mtumika.
LUK 22:28 “Mwenga nde mwemwahighali na nepani chikahi chokapi cha kulengakeka kwangu,
LUK 22:29 nepani numpekihi mwehapa ukolongwa, ngati Atati wangu moambeki nepani kubha nunkolongwa.
LUK 22:30 Nahuli mpata kula na kunywa pa meza jangu mu Ukolongwa wangu na kutama mu itehu ya kikolongwa kughatemula makabila komi na ghabheli gha Izilaeli.”
LUK 22:31 Yesu akapwaghiki, “Simoni, Simoni! Ujowanyaje! Shetani apala kumpeta mwehapa ngati ingano.
LUK 22:32 Nambu nepani nukulobhi wehapa wa Simoni, nahuli uhobhalelu waku ngawikepa, na wenga pawikelebhuka kwangu kabheti, wajangatya bhalongu bhaku.”
LUK 22:33 Petulu akamuyangiki, “Bambo, nepani nyetaki kujenda papamu na wehapa muchifungo, na hata kupotela!”
LUK 22:34 Yesu akamuyangiki, “Nukumpwaghi wehapa wa Petulu, lalenu mangane ja likongobhi kubheka wibya unganiki mala patatu kubha ngacheunimanye.”
LUK 22:35 Bhela Yesu akabhalaluki bhabhulwa bhaki, “Panuntumiki panga mbija, wala nkoba, na wala magubasi, bho, mkakepakiwi na chindu bhole?” Bhakayangiki, “Ngachetwakepakiwi na chindu.”
LUK 22:36 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Nambu henu, jola joabhi na mfuku wa mbija autolaje, na joabhi na nkoba autola bhelabhela. Na jokapi jwanga lipanga, alombisa ingobhu jaki na ahemala limu.
LUK 22:37 Maghambu numpwaghila, ipalika malobhi aghagha ghapitalya kwangu ngati moghalembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, ‘Jombi akabhalangiki papamu na bhahenga mahakau.’ Chakaka ghala ghaghapalika kwangu ghapalika ghapitalyaje.”
LUK 22:38 Bhabhulwa bhakapwaghike, “Bambo! Lingalyaje, pambani ghabhi mapanga ghabhele!” Jombi akayangike, “Base iyaghanila.”
LUK 22:39 Yesu akabhokiki na kujenda ku Chitombi cha Mizeituni ngati mowabheli ntetu waki, na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakapiti papamu naku.
LUK 22:40 Paakahiki pandu panipala, akabhapwaghile, “Ndobhaje nahuli ngamwijingi mu malengakeku.”
LUK 22:41 Bhela mweni akabhokiki na kujenda pandu pa kuweza mundu kuleke liganga. Akachikimi, na kulobha,
LUK 22:42 akapwagha, “Atati, ngati anaupaliki, nukujopa umokiya kutali chikombi cha mang'ahiku. Ngakwikubha ngati mombali nepani, nambu kubya ngati moupali wehapa.”
LUK 22:43 Panihapa mtumika kuhuma kunani kwaka Chapanga akampitalili na kunjeghe makili.
LUK 22:44 Yesu akabhi mu mabhinilu makolongwa, akajonjuki kulobha nakanopi, na lihoghatela laki lakabhi ngati mandonyi gha mwahi, lelikaheli mbaka paluhombi.
LUK 22:45 Paakajomwi kulobha akakelawiki kwa bhabhulwa bhaki, akabhahimani bhaghochile, maghambu bhakabhi na huzune.
LUK 22:46 Akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mbona ngochile? Njumukaje na ndobhaje, nahuli ngamwijingi mu malengakeku.”
LUK 22:47 Yesu paakabhi akali kulongela, lipogha la bhandu lakahikiki koni akalilonguwa Yuda, jumu wa bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli. Yuda akunjendi Yesu na kumbusu.
LUK 22:48 Nambu Yesu akundalukile, “Yuda! Bho, ung'anambuka Mwana waka Mundu kwa kumbusu?”
LUK 22:49 Bhabhulwa bhaka Yesu pabhaghaweni mambu ghaghipitalyaje bhakapwaghike, “Bambo, bho, twahekata le kwa mapanga?”
LUK 22:50 Jumu wabhu akundapwi lipanga mtumika waka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa, na kunchekula likutu laki la kumalelelu.
LUK 22:51 Nambu Yesu akapwaghike, “Nkotukaje, ngamwihenga kabhete!” Akalikamwi likutu laka mundu jola na kundamiha.
LUK 22:52 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghi bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, na bhalonda bhakolongwa bha Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na bhazee bhabhahiki kunkamula, “Bho, muhikiki na mapanga na indonga kungamula ngati nepani nde mnyaghula?
LUK 22:53 Machobha ghokapi nakabhi na mwehapa pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na ngachemwangamwile. Nambu sajenu nde chikahi chinu, cha makili gha lubhendu kutawala.”
LUK 22:54 Bhela bhakunkamwi Yesu, na kumpeleka kunyumba jaka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa. Nambu Petulu akabhi anjengale cha kutali.
LUK 22:55 Bhandu bhangi bhakapuliki motu pachilanda ja liwangala na kutama, na Petulu akahiki kunyatuki motu papamu nabhu.
LUK 22:56 Mtumika jumu wa chimbomba paambweni Petulu atami pambipi na motu, akundingalaki namaa na kupwagha, “Mundu ajoju najombi akabhi papamu na Yesu!”
LUK 22:57 Nambu Petulu akakaniki, akapwagha, “Mbomba, nepani ngachenummanyi!”
LUK 22:58 Palongi pachokope, mundu jongi akumbweni Petulu na kumpwaghila, “Wehapa nanau wa jumu wabho!” Nambu Petulu akayangike, “We mundu, nepani nga jumu wabho!”
LUK 22:59 Palapetiki lisaa limu, mundu jongi akajomalaki kwa kupwagha, “Chakaka mundu ajoju akabhi papamu naku, maghambu najombi nde mwenei wa ku Galilaya!”
LUK 22:60 Nambu Petulu akapwaghike, “We mundu, ngachemanyi malobhi ghaulongela.” Palapala paakabhi akali kulongela, likongobhi lakabhekike.
LUK 22:61 Bambo akang'anambwiki na kundingali Petulu. Na jombi Petulu akakombwiki malobhi ghala Bambo ghaampwagi, kubha, “Lalenu mangani ja kubheka likongobhe, wingana mala patatu kubha ngacheunimanyi.”
LUK 22:62 Petulu akapitiki kunja na kulela kwa kumbina mtima.
LUK 22:63 Bhandu bhala bhabhabhi bhundenda Yesu, bhakatumbwi kundongama na kundapula.
LUK 22:64 Bhakunhibhiki mihu kwa ingobhu na kundalukila, “Ulotilaje! Bho, akulapwi nane?”
LUK 22:65 Na bhombi bhakundongali malobhi ghangi ghamahele gha kuntondola.
LUK 22:66 Palukela, bhazee, bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhabhola bha Shelia bhakahimangini, na bhakumpeliki Yesu palongi ja pachengu jabhu.
LUK 22:67 Na bhombi bhakapwaghike, “Tupwaghilaje! Bho, wehapa le wa Kristo?” Nambu Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Hata ngati ananumpwaghile, ngamwihobhalele,
LUK 22:68 na hata ngati ananundaluki lilalukilu, ngamuniyange.
LUK 22:69 Nambu kutumbu sajenu, Mwana waka Mundu ayibya atami upambala wa kumalelelu waka Chapanga Mweni Makili.”
LUK 22:70 Bhela bhokapi bhakundalukile, “Bho, nde kupwagha kubha wehapa le wa Mwana waka Chapanga?” Na jombi akabhayangike, “Mwenga mpwagha chakaka kubha nepani nde jombi.”
LUK 22:71 Na bhombi bhakapwaghike, “Bho, tupala le mundu jongi ahikaje na atupwaghila ulandilu wake? Maghambu tepani tabhete tujowini akapwagha kwa ndomu waki mweni!”
LUK 23:1 Bhela bhandu bhokapi bha pachengo pakolongwa bhakajemiki na kumpeleka Yesu kwaka Pilato.
LUK 23:2 Bhakatumbwi kuntakila, bhakapwaghaje, “Tunketani mundu ajoju akabhakoluwa bhandu bhitu. Apenga kulepa kode kwaka Kaisali, na kulilowa kubha jombi nde Kristo, Nkolongwa.”
LUK 23:3 Pilato akundaluki Yesu, “Bho, wehapa le unkolongwa wa Bhayahude?” Yesu akayangike, “Wehapa upwaghike.”
LUK 23:4 Bhela Pilato akabhapwaghi bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na lipogha la bhandu kubha, “Nepani ngachemona lihakau lokapi lela la kuntaki mundu ajoju.”
LUK 23:5 Nambu bhombi bhakajomalaki nakanopi, bhakapwaghaje, “Kwa mabholu ghaki abhachochake bhandu bhabhabhi ku Yudea jokapi. Akatumbwi ku Galilaya na sajenu abhi pitu pani.”
LUK 23:6 Pilato paajowini malobhi ghanihagha, akalalukile, “Bho, mundu ajo le mwenei wa ku Galilaya?”
LUK 23:7 Paakamanyi kubha Yesu akahumi ku inchi jeatawala Helode, akumpeliki kwaka Helode, maghambu akabhi ku Yelusalemu chikahi chela.
LUK 23:8 Helode paakambweni Yesu, akahekali namaa maghambu kwa machobha ghamahele akabhi atokule kumbona. Maghambu akajowini malobhi panani jaki, najombi akapaliki kubhona nginyulila kuhuma kwaka Yesu.
LUK 23:9 Bhela Helode akundaluki Yesu malalukilu ghamahele, nambu Yesu ngacheayangiki lilobhi.
LUK 23:10 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhabhola bha Shelia bhakajemiki panipala, bhakabhoha matakilu ghabhu kwa makili panani jaka Yesu.
LUK 23:11 Bhela Helode papamu na manjolinjoli bhaki bhakunhekiki Yesu na kundongama. Bhakunhwatiki ingobhu jinyahi ngati nkolongwa na kunkelabhu kwaka Pilato.
LUK 23:12 Kutumbu lichobha heli Helode akabhi nkochi waka Pilato, maghambu pamwandi bhakabhi maadui.
LUK 23:13 Bhela Pilato akalohiki uhimanganu wa bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa, ihongozi bha bhandu na bhandu bhabhu,
LUK 23:14 na kubhapwaghila, “Mundetiki mundu ajo kwangu mkapwagha kubha abhachochake bhandu. Henu nepani nundaluki malobhi ghaki palongi jinu, nambu ngachenumbweni na lihakau lokapi lela lemuntaki mabhanganya.
LUK 23:15 Hata Helode ngacheambweni na lihakau, na kwa ndandi jeniheji ankelawi kwitu. Chakaka kubha mundu ajoju ngacheahengiki lihakau lokapi lela lelumpalika kupotela.
LUK 23:16 Bhela ananaghalakya alapulika iboku, na kundekakela.”
LUK 23:17 Bhela kila lichobha la Uwangalalu wa Pasaka, Pilato ikampaliki kubhabhopule bhandu nkongeka jumu.
LUK 23:18 Nambu bhokapi kwa papamu bhakajamali, bhakapwaghaje, “Umboha mundu hoju! Utubhopulya Balaba!”
LUK 23:19 Balaba bhakunkongiki kwa kutumbuli fujo yeyatendakiki ku muchi na kwa ndandi ja kukoma.
LUK 23:20 Pilato akapaliki kundekake Yesu, bhela akalongi nabhu kabhete.
LUK 23:21 Nambu bhombi bhakajamali kabhete, “Unhwamba punsalaba! Unhwamba punsalaba!”
LUK 23:22 Pilato akabhapwaghi kabheti mala ja katatu, “Bho, maghambu ja kyane? Bho, ahengiki lihakau bhole? Ngachemweni lihakau lokapi kwaki lelumpalika kukomakeka. Bhela ananundapula iboku ya ndomondo na kundekakela.”
LUK 23:23 Nambu bhombi bhakajendali kujamali nakanopi, bhakajopa Yesu awambakika punsalaba. Na kwa kujamalila kwabhu kukantendiki Pilato ajetakyaje.
LUK 23:24 Bhela Pilato akaamwi kubhahenge ngati mobhapalilaje.
LUK 23:25 Akumbopuli mundu jobhumpalika jola, joakongakiki muchifungu kwa kuchokake fujo na kukoma, na kumboha Yesu kwabhu nahuli bhunhengila ngati mobhapalilaje.
LUK 23:26 Pabhakabhi bhumpeleka, bhakahimangini na mundu jumu joalowakika Simoni, mwenei wa ku Kilene, joakabhi ahuma kungonda kuhika kumuchi. Bhela bhakunkamwili, na kuntweka aunyamula nsalaba punyuma jaka Yesu.
LUK 23:27 Lipogha likolongwa la bhandu lakabhi lunjengalela, pachilanda jabhu bhakabhi akambomba bhakabya bhundelela na kumuombulezela.
LUK 23:28 Yesu akabhang'anambukili na kubhapwaghila, “Mwenga akambomba bha Yelusalemu, ngamwinele nepani, nambu mulilelila mabhete papamu na bhana bhinu.
LUK 23:29 Kwa ndandi machobha ghahika ambapu bhandu pabhipwagha, ‘Mbanga kwabhu akambomba ngulumba, bhangakubheleka bhana, na bhangakujongeha!’
LUK 23:30 Chikahi hechi bhandu bhitumbula kwipwaghi itombi, ‘Mtuhabhukyaje!’ Na tutombi, ‘Mtuyekalyaje!’
LUK 23:31 Kwa ndandi ngati bhandu bhutende nkongu ubhehi ntundu agho, bho, kwibya bhole kwa nkongu ujomo?”
LUK 23:32 Bhakabhatohi kabheti bhahakau bhangi bhabhele, bhakapelakiki kukomakeka papamu na Yesu.
LUK 23:33 Pabhahiki pandu papalowakeka, “Lifuvu la Mmutu,” panihapa nde pabhunhwambiki Yesu punsalaba papamu na bhahenga mahakau bhala kila jumu punsalaba waki, jumu upambala wa kumalelelu na jongi upambala wa kumangeja ja msalaba waka Yesu.
LUK 23:34 Yesu akapwaghike, “Atati! Ubhalekakyaje mahoku ghabhu, maghambu ngachebhamanyi lebhalihenga.” Bhela bhakaghabhini ingobhu yaki kwa kwilapuli kula.
LUK 23:35 Bhandu bhakajemi panipala bhakalingalyaje. Na bhombi bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude bhakundongimi Yesu, “Akabhakengali bhandu bhangi, henu alikengalya mwene, anangati jombi nde Kristo, joahaghuliki na Chapanga!”
LUK 23:36 Manjolinjoli na bhombi bhakundongimi, bhakunjendili na kumpeke divai jejibhabha,
LUK 23:37 bhakumpwaghile, “Ana ngati chakaka wehapa nde Nkolongwa wa Bhayahude, ulikengalya wamwene!”
LUK 23:38 Na panani ja msalaba waki ghakalembakiki malobhi ghangane, “AJOJU NDE NKOLONGWA WA BHAYAHUDE.”
LUK 23:39 Mwihi jumu pachilanda ja bhabhawambakiki punsalaba bhala, akuntondwi Yesu, akapwagha, “Bho, nga chakaka le kubha wehapa nde Kristo? Bhela ulikengalya wamwete na utukengalya na tepani!”
LUK 23:40 Nambu mwihi jongi jola akundakali njaki akapwagha, “Bho, wehapa le ngacheunjoghopa Chapanga hata pachokope? Koni nanau utemuliwi bhelabhela.
LUK 23:41 Wenga na nepani tutemuliwi ngati mokupalakila, maghambu ghangani nde malepu gha ghala ghatuhengike. Nambu mundu ajoju ngacheahengiki chindu chokapi chihakau.”
LUK 23:42 Bhela akajonjuki kupwagha, “Wenga Yesu, ungombukaje chikahi pawihikaje mu Ukolongwa waku!”
LUK 23:43 Yesu akayangiki, “Chakaka nukupwaghi wehapa lalenu anana, wibya papamu na nepani ku Paladiso.”
LUK 23:44 Ikabhi ngati saa sita ja muhi, lubhendu lukayekiki inchi jokapi mbaka saa tisa,
LUK 23:45 na lipanzia lelakabhi libhekakiki mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga lakakachwiki ipandi ibhele.
LUK 23:46 Panihapa Yesu akajamali, akapwagha, “Atati! Mu mabhoku ghaku nijibheka roho jangu.” Na paakajomwi kulongela ghanihagha, akahekiti roho.
LUK 23:47 Nkolongwa wa manjolinjoli mia moja wa ki Loma jola paakaweni mambu ghanihagha ghaghapitalile, akundumbali Chapanga, akapwagha, “Chakaka mundu ajoju akabhi wambone.”
LUK 23:48 Bhandu bhokapi bhabhalibhongini panipala kwa ndandi ja kulingali mambu ghanihagha, pabhaghaweni ghokapi ghaghapitalile, bhakakelawiki kumanyumba ghabhu koni bhakabya na huzuni ngolongwa.
LUK 23:49 Bhakochi bhaka Yesu papamu na akambomba bhabhunjengali kutumbu ku Galilaya, bhakajemiki cha kutali bhakalingalya mambu ghanihagha.
LUK 23:50 Kukabhi na mundu jumu, joalowakika Yusufu, ambaju akabhi mundu wa pachengu, akabhi mundu wamboni na wa kutopela.
LUK 23:51 Akabhi mundu wa ku Alimataya, na akabhi alendale kuhika kwa Ukolongwa waka Chapanga. Papamu na kubha akabhi jumu wabhu wa Pachengo Pakolongwa pa Bhayahude, ngacheakajetangani nabhu kwa ghokapi ghabhahengiki bhajake.
LUK 23:52 Bhela Yusufu akapiti kwaka Pilato, akajopiki ampekya hyegha jaka Yesu.
LUK 23:53 Bhela akajiheli hyegha jaka Yesu kuhuma punsalaba, akajiyongalwi sanda, na kujibheka hyegha jaka Yesu mulitengele lelalenganakiki mu liganga, lelakabhi likona nga kutaghakika mundu.
LUK 23:54 Lichobha heli lakabhi Ijumaa, na Lichobha la Sabato lakabhi litumbula.
LUK 23:55 Akambomba bhala bhabhakunjengali Yesu kutumbu ku Galilaya bhakunjengali Yusufu, bhakaliweni litengeli na ntundu hyegha jaka Yesu mobhakajibhekile.
LUK 23:56 Bhela bhakakelawiki kunyumba, na kulenganakela manungilu na mahuta gha kujipaka hyegha jaka Yesu. Na Lichobha la Sabato bhakapomulili, ngati mojilaghalaki Shelia.
LUK 24:1 Jumapili lukela pachibhombu, akambomba bhala bhakapiti kulitengeli, koni bhatoghwi manungilu ghabhalenganakile.
LUK 24:2 Bhakalihimani liganga la kuyekalela litengeli lela likangakiki kutali na litengele.
LUK 24:3 Bhela bhakajingi mulitengeli, nambu ngachebhajiweni hyegha jaka Bambo Yesu.
LUK 24:4 Pabhakabhi bhaholale panani ja lilobhi leniheli, palapala bhandu bhabhele bhabhaweti ingobhu ihuhu kupukupu bhakajemiki pambipi nabhu.
LUK 24:5 Akambomba bhala bhakajowipi namaa na kujinama mbaka pahi. Nambu bhandu bhala bhakabhapwaghile, “Bho, magambu kiki mundonda joayokiki pachilanda ja bhabhawile?
LUK 24:6 Yesu ngacheabhi pambane, ahyokike! Nkombuka moakampwaghile chikahi paakabhi ku Galilaya.
LUK 24:7 Akumpwaghi kubha, ‘Mwana waka Mundu anabhumpelaka mu mabhoku gha bhana mahoku, na kuwambakika punsalaba, nambu lichobha la katatu ayiyokaje.’ ”
LUK 24:8 Panihapa akambomba bhala bhakakombwiki malobhi ghaka Yesu.
LUK 24:9 Bhakakelawiki kuhuma kulitengeli, na bhakabhapwaghi mambu ghanihagha bhabhulwa bhaki komi na jumu bhala, na kwa bhahemba bhangi bhokapi bhaka Yesu.
LUK 24:10 Akambomba bhabhapwaghika mambu ghanihagha kwa mitumi bhaka Yesu bhakabhi nde, Malia Magidalena, na Yoana, na Malia mabhu waka Yakobo, na akambomba bhangi bhabhakabhi papamu nabhu.
LUK 24:11 Nambu mitumi bhaka Yesu bhakaghatohi mambu ghanihagha kubha ngati gha upuhe, na bhela ngachebhahobhalile.
LUK 24:12 Nambu Petulu akajemiki, na kukembela imbelu mbaka kulitengeli. Paakahikiki, akajinimi na kulingali mkati, akaiweni pe sanda. Bhela akabhujiki kunyumba koni akangacha kwa ndandi ja mambu ghaghapitalile.
LUK 24:13 Lichobha lelalela, bhabhulwa bhabhele bhaka Yesu bhakabhi bhajenda ku chijiji chimu chekilowakeka Emau, chechikabhi utali wa kilometa komi na moja kuhuma ku Yelusalemu.
LUK 24:14 Bhakabhi bhalongale panani ja mambu ghokapi ghaghapitalile.
LUK 24:15 Pabhakabhi bhalongale na kulaluwana, Yesu mweni akabhaheghali pambipi na kulongana nabhu.
LUK 24:16 Bhakumbweni nambu ngachebhumanye.
LUK 24:17 Yesu akabhalalukile, “Bho, ndongale kiki koni njenda?” Na bhombi bhakajemiki na kutumbala chinunu, koni bhakalangiya pamihu jabhu kubha bhabhi na huzuni.
LUK 24:18 Jumu wabhu pachilanda ja bhandu bhanihabha, joalowakika Kileopa, akamuyangike, “Bho, wehapa le ungeni kanjika jaku ku Yelusalemu, wangakumanya mambu ghaghapitali konihoku machobha ghane?”
LUK 24:19 Jombi akabhalalukile, “Mambu bhole?” Bhombi bhakamuyangiki, “Mambu ghaghumpitali Yesu wa ku Nazaleti. Mundu hoju akabhi mlota waka Chapanga joakabhi na uwezu wa kuhenga na kubhola palongi jaka Chapanga na palongi ja bhandu bhokapi.
LUK 24:20 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhatawala bhitu bhakumbohiki nahuli atemuliwa kupotela, na bhombi bhakunhwambiki punsalaba.
LUK 24:21 Tepani tukahobhali kubha jombi nde joabhakombulaje bhandu bha Izilaeli. Nambu lalenu nde lichobha la katatu kutumbu mambu ghanihagha paghahengakike.
LUK 24:22 Bhelabhela akambomba bhangi kuhuma mulipogha litu bhatehi kutukangacha. Bhakapiti kulitengeli lukela pachibhombu,
LUK 24:23 nambu ngachebhakajiweni hyegha jaki. Bhela bhakakelawiki na kutupwaghi kubha bhakapitaliwi na bhatumika bha kunani kwaka Chapanga na kubhapwaghi kubha Yesu abhi mwome.
LUK 24:24 Bhakumu bhitu bhakapiti kulitengeli, na kughahimani mambu ghokapi chakaka ngati mobhapwaghila akambomba bhala, nambu jombi ngachebhumbwene.”
LUK 24:25 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mbona mbi mwang'ang'a bhenibhela, na mitima jinu jinonwopi kuhobhalela malobhi ghokapi ghaghalongaliki na bhalota bhaka Chapanga?
LUK 24:26 Bho, ngachekumpaliki Kristo kung'ahakika, na bhela kujingi mu ulumbalilu waki?”
LUK 24:27 Akabhapwaghi mambu ghokapi ghaghumpalika jombi mu Malembu Mahuhu ghokapi, kutumbu itabu yokapi yaka Musa na kujendale mu itabhu yokapi ya bhalota bhokapi bhaka Chapanga.
LUK 24:28 Pabhakaheghali pambipi na chijiji chebhapita chela, Yesu akalengiki kubha ngati ajendale na mwanja,
LUK 24:29 nambu bhombi bhakumpembali namaa, bhakapwaghaje, “Utama papamu na tepani, maghambu kutenda kupilila, na ikilu kuheghalela.” Bhela akapiti na kutama papamu nabhu.
LUK 24:30 Paakatami kula chilebhi papamu nabhu, akatoliki libumunda, akalipengalili, akalihekiti, na kubhapekeha.
LUK 24:31 Palapala mihu ghabhu ghakahoghuliwi, bhakummanye, nambu jombi akahobhiki pamihu jabhu.
LUK 24:32 Bhela bhakapwaghanile, “Bho, mitima jitu le ngachejibhelala mkati jitu paakabhi atuyekulila Malembu Mahuhu kwindela kola?”
LUK 24:33 Palapala bhakabhokiki na kukelabhuka ku Yelusalemu. Konikola bhakabhaketani mitumi komi na jumu bhala bhalibhongini papamu, bhakabya na bhandu bhangi bhabhakabhili papamu nabhu,
LUK 24:34 bhakapwaghaje, “Chakaka Bambo ayokike, na akumpitali Simoni.”
LUK 24:35 Bhela bhabhulwa bhabheli bhala bhakabhalandi mambu ghala ghaghapatiki mwindela, na ntundu mobhakummanyi paakabhi aheketa libumunda.
LUK 24:36 Pabhakabhi bhapwaghanila ghanihagha, palapala Yesu mweni akajemiki pachilanda jabhu, na kubhapwaghila, “Lukwali lukubha na mwehapa.”
LUK 24:37 Bhakakenyamwiki na kujoghopa namaa, bhakaholakya pangi bhaweni lihoka.
LUK 24:38 Nambu jombi akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mbona mlagha? Bho, mbona nkubha na choghohi mu mitima jinu?
LUK 24:39 Ndingalya mabhoku na magholu ghangu, kubha nde nepani namwete. Mbapiya mbonaje, maghambu lihoka ngachelibhi na hyegha wala ihupa ngati mommone nepane.”
LUK 24:40 Paakajomwi kulonge ghanighala, akabhalangi mabhoku na magholu ghaki.
LUK 24:41 Bhombi pabhakabhi bhakona ngakuhobhalela, kwa ndandi ja chiheku na kukangacha, Yesu akabhalalukile, “Bho, mbi na chilebhi chokapi chela pambane?”
LUK 24:42 Bhakumpeki chipandi cha homba ja kujocha.
LUK 24:43 Akachitoliki, akalili koni bhokapi bhakabya bhumbona.
LUK 24:44 Bhela akabhapwaghile, “Aghagha nde mambu ghanakumpwaghili chikahi panakabhi nakona papamu na mwehapa: Kubha ipalika ghapitalya mambu ghokapi ghaghalembakiki panani jangu mu Shelia yaka Musa, na mu Malembu gha bhalota bhaka Chapanga na mu Chitabu cha Zabuli.”
LUK 24:45 Panihapa akabhayekwi malangu ghabhu nahuli bhapata kumanya Malembu Mahuhu.
LUK 24:46 Akabhapwaghile, “Ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu kubha Kristo aying'ahakika na kuyoka lichobha la katatu.
LUK 24:47 Bhandu bhokapi bhapalika kutangaziwa kwa lihina laki bhang'anambukaje na kughaleka mahoku ghabhu, na Chapanga anaabhalekakya mahoku ghabhu, kutumbula ku Yelusalemu na kwa inchi yokapi.
LUK 24:48 Mabhanganya nde momwapwaghila bhandu kubha mambu ghokapi ghaghapitalili hagha nde gha chakaka.
LUK 24:49 Nepani namweti ananundetila jola Atati wangu joapwaghiki anaantumaje. Nambu mwenga ndendalya moni mu Yelusalemu, mbaka pamwijopalya makili ghala ghaghahuma kunani kumahunde.”
LUK 24:50 Bhela akabhalongwi kunja ja muchi wa Yelusalemu mbaka ku Besania, akajinwi mabhoku ghaki na kubhapengalela.
LUK 24:51 Paakabhi abhapengalela, akabhalekiki, na kutolakeka kujenda kunani kumahunde.
LUK 24:52 Bhombi bhakunjojabhili, na panihapa bhakakelawiki ku Yelusalemu bhakabya na chiheku nakanopi.
LUK 24:53 Machobha ghokapi bhakajendali kutama pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga koni bhakundumbalya Chapanga. Amina.
JOH 1:1 Mangani ja hindu yokapi kubhombakeka, kukabhi na Lilobhi, na Lilobhi hoju akabhi na Chapanga, najombi Lilobhi akabhi Chapanga.
JOH 1:2 Pakutumbula hapa Lilobhi hoju akabhi kwaka Chapanga.
JOH 1:3 Kupetela jombi Chapanga akabhombiki hindu yokapi, wala panga jombi nga chindu chokapi chechabhombakiki ambachu chibhombakike.
JOH 1:4 Jombi akabhi nde kutumbula kwa womi, na womi hoghu uletiki unang'anu wa bhandu.
JOH 1:5 Unang'anu hoghu ung'anya mulwihi, nalombi lwihi ngapalwaweziki kuluchuchuha.
JOH 1:6 Chapanga akuntumiki mundu jumu, lihina laki Yohana.
JOH 1:7 Akahikiki kubhapwaghi bhandu panani ja Unang'anu hoghu, nahuli kwa kupetela jombi bhandu bhokapi bhapata kujowana ulandilu waki na kuhobhalela.
JOH 1:8 Yohana mweni ngacheakabhi Unang'anu hoghu, nambu akahikiki kubhalandi bhandu panani ja Unang'anu hoghu.
JOH 1:9 Aghoghu nde Unang'anu wa chakaka, Unang'anu ghouhika pani pundema na kubhamulaki bhandu bhokapi.
JOH 1:10 Bhela Lilobhi jola akabhi pani pundema, na kwa kupetela jombi Chapanga akabhombiki ndema, nambu bhandu bha pundema ngachebhummanye.
JOH 1:11 Akahikiki kwa bhandu bhaki mweni, nambu bhombi ngachebhunjopalile.
JOH 1:12 Nambu bhokapi bhabhunjopalile na kunhobhalela, akabhapeki uwezu wa kuhengakeka bhana bhaka Chapanga, nde bhala bhabhalihobhalela lihina lake,
JOH 1:13 bhahengakiki bhana bhaka Chapanga nga kwa kubhelakeka ngati mobhabhelakake bhandu, au kwa kupala kwaka mundu, nambu bhabhelakiki kubhokana na Chapanga mweni.
JOH 1:14 Lilobhi akabhi mundu, na akatami kwitu, na tepani tukauweni ulumbalilu waki, ulumbalilu ngati waka Mwana kanjika joahuma kwa Atati, atweli chihomu na chakaka.
JOH 1:15 Yohana akabhalandi bhandu malobhi ghake, akajamalili nakanopi, na kupwagha, “Hajoju nde jola jonumpwaghilaje, ‘Joahika munyuma jangu, nambu nde nkolongwa kumbeta nepane, ndandi jombi akabhi mangane ja kubhelekeka nepani.’ ”
JOH 1:16 Kubhokana na ukamilifu waki, tepani tabhokapi tujopali chihomu panani ja chihomu.
JOH 1:17 Maghambu Chapanga akabhohiki Shelia kwa indela jaka Musa, nambu chihomu chaka Chapanga na chakaka jikahikiki kwa indela jaka Yesu Kristo.
JOH 1:18 Nga mundu jokapi joambweni Chapanga mu chikahi chokapi chela ng'o, nambu Chapanga Mwana kanjika jaki, joabhi pachihimba cha Atati waki, jonihoju nde joatulangihe ntundu Chapanga moabhelile.
JOH 1:19 Haghoghu nde ulandilu waka Yohana, chikahi bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude pabhakabhatumiki bhapenganyambiku na Bhalawi kuhuma ku Yelusalemu nahuli bhakundalukyaje, “Bho, wehapa wa nane?”
JOH 1:20 Yohana akajetakili, wala ngacheakaniki, akapwaghike, “Nepani nga Kristo.”
JOH 1:21 Bhakundalukile, “Bho, henu wehapa wa nane? Bho, wehapa le wa Eliya?” Yohana akabhayangike, “Nga nepane.” Bhakundaluki kabhete, “Bho, wehapa le wa Mlota waka Chapanga jola?” Akabhayangike, “Nga nepane.”
JOH 1:22 Bhela bhakumpwaghile, “Bho, wehapa wa nane? Bho, ulilongale bhole panani jaku wamwete? Utupwaghilaje, nahuli tupata liyangu la kubhapelakela bhala bhabhatutumike.”
JOH 1:23 Yohana akabhayangiki na kupwagha, ngati moakapwaghi mlota Isaya, “Nepani nde sauti jaka mundu jejijamalila kulipololu, ‘Ndenganakyaje indela jaka Bambo!’ ”
JOH 1:24 Na bhandu bhala bhabhakatumakiki bhakabhi bhahumiki kwa Mafalisayo.
JOH 1:25 Bhakundaluki Yohana, “Ngati wehapa nga wa Kristo, au nga wa Eliya, wala nga wa Mlota waka Chapanga jola, bho, maghambu ki ubatiza?”
JOH 1:26 Yohana akabhayangiki, akapwaghaje, “Nepani numbatiza kwa machi, nambu pachilanda jinu ajemiki mundu jwanga mabhanganya kummanya.
JOH 1:27 Jombi nde joahika punyuma jangu, nepani ngachembalika hata kujibhopola mighoji ja magubasi ghake.”
JOH 1:28 Mambu aghagha ghokapi ghakahengakiki ku muchi wa Besania, kwihi ja nkoka Yoludani, koakabhi Yohana abatiza.
JOH 1:29 Chilabhu jaki, Yohana akumbweni Yesu akahikaje kwaki, akapwaghike, “Lingalyaje, hajoju nde Mwanalimbeleli waka Chapanga, joatola mahoku gha ndema!
JOH 1:30 Hajoju nde jola jonukupwaghili, ‘Anahika mundu punyuma jangu, joabhi nkolongwa kumbeta nepani, maghambu jombi akabhili mangane ja kubhelakeka nepane.’
JOH 1:31 Nepani namwete ngachenummanye, nambu nhikiki kubatiza kwa machi, nahuli bhandu bha Izilaeli bhapata kummanya jombi.”
JOH 1:32 Yohana akalandili ana, “Nakumbweni Roho Mhuhu akahelalaje kuhuma kunani kumahunde ngati ngunda, na kumetela panani jaki.
JOH 1:33 Nepani ngachenummanyike, nambu jola joandumiki kubatiza kwa machi, jonihoju akambwaghile, ‘Jola jowambonaje Roho akahelalaje na kutama panani jaki, jonihoju nde joabatiza kwa Roho Mhuhu.’
JOH 1:34 Yohana akapwaghiki, nepani mweni lijambu leniheli, na nandila chakaka kubha hajoju nde Mwana waka Chapanga.”
JOH 1:35 Chilabhu jaki kabhete, Yohana akabhi ajemiki papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhabhele.
JOH 1:36 Paakumbweni Yesu akapetaje, akapwaghike, “Lingalyaje, hajoju nde Mwanalimbeleli waka Chapanga!”
JOH 1:37 Bhabhulwa bhabheli bhala bhakunjowini Yohana akalongilaje, bhakunjengali Yesu.
JOH 1:38 Yesu akang'anambwiki, na paakabhaweni bhabhulwa habha bhakunjengalyaje, akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mpala kike?” Bhakamuyangike, “Labi,” ndandi jaki, “Mbola,” bho, utama kwako?
JOH 1:39 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Muhikaje, nanamu anambonaje. Bhabhulwa habha bhakunjengalile, na kupabhona paatama, na bhakatami kwaki lichobha lela. Ndandi kukabhi ngati saa kumi pakamihi.”
JOH 1:40 Andulea, ndongu waka Simoni Petulu, akabhi jumu wa bhabheli bhala bhabhakunjowini Yohana akalongilaje ghanihagha, na kunjengalela Yesu.
JOH 1:41 Jonihoju akumbweni hoti Simoni, ndongu waki mweni, na akumpwaghile, “Tumbweni Masihi.” Ndandi jaki, “Kristo.”
JOH 1:42 Najombi akumpeliki Simoni kwaka Yesu. Najombi Yesu akundingalili, na kumpwaghila, “Wehapa wa Simoni, mwana waka Yohana, nanau anaulowakika Kefa.” Ndandi jaki kwa Kigiliki nde Petulu, au Liganga.
JOH 1:43 Lichobha la kabheli laki Yesu akapaliki kujenda ku inchi ja Galilaya. Bhela akumbweni Filipo, na kumpwaghila, “Unyengalyaje!”
JOH 1:44 Filipo akabhi mundu wa kuhuma ku muchi wa Betisaida, mwenehi wa muchi ghobhatama Andulea na Petulu.
JOH 1:45 Filipo akumbweni Nathanaeli, na kumpwaghila, “Tumbweni jombi ambaju Musa akalembiki panani jaki mu chitabu cha Shelia, na ambaju bhalota bhaka Chapanga nabhombi bhakalembiki panani jaki. Nde Yesu, mwana waka Yusufu, kuhuma ku muchi wa Nazaleti.”
JOH 1:46 Nathanaeli akumpwaghi Filipo, “Bho, liwezikana bholi lilobhi lamboni lihuma ku Nazaleti?” Filipo akumpwaghile, “Uhika ulolaje.”
JOH 1:47 Bhela Yesu akumbweni Nathanaeli akahika kwaki, na kulongela malobhi ghaki, “Lingalyaje Mwizilaeli chakaka, ngacheabhi na upuhi mkati jake.”
JOH 1:48 Nathanaeli akumpwaghile, “Bho, upatiki bholi kumanya?” Yesu akamuyangiki, akapwaghaje, “Nakakuweni mangane Filipo ngacheakulohiki, paukabhi pahi ja nkongu wa mtini.”
JOH 1:49 Nathanaeli akamuyangike, “Mbola, wehapa wa Mwana waka Chapanga! Wehapa nde Unkolongwa wa Izilaeli!”
JOH 1:50 Yesu akamuyangiki, na kumpwaghila, “Bho, maghambu nakakupwaghi, nakakuweni pahi ja nkongu wa mtini, nde ndandi uhobhalela? Anaubhonaje mambu makolongwa nakanopi kupeta ghangane.”
JOH 1:51 Yesu akajendali kubhapwaghila, numpwaghila, “Chakaka, anambonaje kunani kumahunde kuhoghoka, na bhatumika bhaka Chapanga bhakahelalaje na kukwela panani jaka Mwana waka Mundu.”
JOH 2:1 Na lichobha la katatu kukabhi na ukwati ku muchi wa Kana, ja ku Galilaya. Na mabhu waka Yesu akabhi konikola,
JOH 2:2 Yesu najombi akabhi bhunkokiki paukwati ghola papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki.
JOH 2:3 Chikahi divai pajajomwiki, mabhu waka Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ngachebhabhi na divai.”
JOH 2:4 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Mbomba, bho, maghambu kiki umbwaghi malobhi aghagha nepane? Chenjenu nga chikahi chechipalika kwangu nepani kuhenga leniheli.”
JOH 2:5 Amabhu waka Yesu akabhapwaghi bhatumika, “Lokapi lenaampwaghilaje, mulihengaje.”
JOH 2:6 Bhela kukabhi na ihulu sita ya maganga, kila chimu chakabhi na ukolongwa wa kutama machi madebi ghabheli au ghatatu, nayombi ikabhekakiki konihoku ngati mowabheli ntetu wa Bhayahude wa kuligholola kwa ndandi ja kunjojabhe Chapanga.
JOH 2:7 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ntwelakya machi tuwe mwihulu heyi.” Nabhombi bhakatwelaki mbaka panani.
JOH 2:8 Akabhapwaghile, “Henu ntekaje, na mumpelakyaje nkolongwa wa ukwati.” Nabhombi bhakapeliki.
JOH 2:9 Najombi nkolongwa wa chilebhe cha ukwati paakaghaonjiki machi ghala ghakang'anambwiki kubha divai, panga na kumanya koghahumiki, nambu bhatumika bhakamanyiki, bhala bhabhatekiki machi ghala, nkolongwa wa ukwati jola akundohiki bambo ukwati,
JOH 2:10 akumpwaghile, “Kila mundu atumbu hoti kuandaa divai jambone, na bhandu anabhanywili nakanopi, bhaleta divai jangakunogha. Nambu wehapa ujibhekiki divai jamboni mbaka sajenu!”
JOH 2:11 Nginyulila jenjenu ja kutumbula akahengiki Yesu ku Kana ja ku Galilaya, na kulangiha ulumbalilu waki, na bhabhhulwa bhaki bhakunhobhalile.
JOH 2:12 Paghapetiki ghanigala Yesu akahelili mbaka ku Kapelenaumu, jombi na mabhu waki na bhalongu bhaki na bhabhulwa bhaki, bhakatemi konihoku kwa machobha machokope.
JOH 2:13 Pasaka ja Bhayahude jakabhi jiheghalile, najombi Yesu akakweliki mbaka ku Yelusalemu.
JOH 2:14 Akapaweni pala pa liwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga bhandu bhakahemalya ng'ombi, na mambeleli, na ngunda na bhabhang'anambu mbija bhatami pameza yabhu.
JOH 2:15 Akalokiki ntibhi kubha chiboku, akabhabhohiki bhokapi pa liwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na mambeleli na ng'ombi, akajitili mbija ya bhabhang'anambu mbija, na kuipendula meza yabhu,
JOH 2:16 akabhapwaghi bhala bhabhahemalela ngunda, “Muhibhoha hindu hayeyi pambane, na ngamwajitenda nyumba ja Atati wangu kubha pandu pa kuhemela na kulombasela!”
JOH 2:17 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakakombwiki kubha ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Wenga wa Chapanga, wihu wangu kwa nyumba jaku unyocha ngati moto!”
JOH 2:18 Henu Bhayahude bhakamuyangiki, na kumpwaghila, “Bho, anautulangiha nginyulila bholi, nahuli kutulangiha kubha ubhi na lujiniku lwa kuhenga mambu ghangane?”
JOH 2:19 Yesu akabhayangike, na kubhapwaghila, “Mjibhombulaje Nyumba jaka Chapanga hajeji, na nepani ananjengaje kwa machobha ghatatu.”
JOH 2:20 Bhela Bhayahude bhakapwaghike, “Nyumba jaka Chapanga hajeji jakachengakiki kwa hyaka alobaini na sita, bho, na wehapa anauchengaje kwa machobha ghatatu?”
JOH 2:21 Nambu jombi akapwagiki kwa nyumba ja hyegha jake.
JOH 2:22 Bhela Yesu paakayokiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa, bhabhulwa bhaki bhakakombwiki kubha akapwaghiki ghanihagha, bhakaghahobhalili Malembu Mahuhu ghala, na malobhi ghokapi ghaakalongi Yesu.
JOH 2:23 Yesu paakabhi ku Yelusalemu ku uwangalalu wa Pasaka, bhandu bhamaheli bhakunhobhali kubha jombi nde Masihi, pabhiweni nginyulila yaki yeakahengike.
JOH 2:24 Nambu Yesu ngacheabhahobhalile, kwa ndandi jombi akabhamanyiki bhokapi,
JOH 2:25 na ngacheakabhi na ndandi ja kupala mundu wa kundandila mambu gha bhandu, kwa ndandi jombi mweni akamanyiki ghaghabhi mkati ja mtima waka mundu.
JOH 3:1 Kukabhi na mundu jumu wa Mafalisayo, lihina laki Nikodemu, jumu wa ihongozi bha pachengu pa Bhayahude.
JOH 3:2 Lichobha limu ikilu Nikodemu akunjedi Yesu, na kumpwaghila, “Labi, tumanyi kubha wehapa nde wambola, uhumiki kwaka Chapanga, kwa ndandi nga mundu joaweza kutenda nginyulila hayeyi yewitenda wehapa, nambu Chapanga abhi papamu naku.”
JOH 3:3 Yesu akamuyangiki, na kumpwaghila, “Chakaka, nukupwaghila, mundu nangakubhelakeka mala ja kabhele, ngaawezi kuubhona Ukolongwa waka Chapanga.”
JOH 3:4 Nikodemu akampwaghile, “Bho, aweza bholi mundu kubhelakeka kabheti, koni asejike? Bho, aweza kujingi mulutumbu lwa mabhu waki mala ja kabheli na kubhelakeka?”
JOH 3:5 Yesu akayangike, “Nukupwaghi chakaka, mundu nangakubhelakeka kwa machi na kwa Roho Mhuhu, ngaawezi kujingila mu Ukolongwa waka Chapanga.
JOH 3:6 Mundu abhelakeka kihyegha kwa atati na mabhu, nambu chechibhelakiki kiroho nde Roho Mhuhu.
JOH 3:7 Ngawikangacha ndandi nukupwaghili, ‘Hipalika kubhelakeka mala ja kabhele.’
JOH 3:8 Mpongu upogha koupala, na kupogha kwaki ukujowana, nambu ngacheumanya kouhuma wala koujenda. Bhenibhela nde mokubhelela kwaka mundu jola joabhelakiki kwa Roho Mhuhu.”
JOH 3:9 Nikodemu akundaluki Yesu, “Bho, mambu haghagha ghawezikana bholi kubha?”
JOH 3:10 Yesu akamuyangiki, na kumpwaghila, “Bho, wehapa ubhi wambola wa ku Izilaeli, na mambu haghagha ngacheughamanye?
JOH 3:11 Nukupwaghi chakaka kubha, lela letulimanya tulipwagha, na lela letuliweni tulilandila, kabheti ulandilu witu ngachemujetakela.
JOH 3:12 Ngati numpwaghili mambu gha pani pundema, wala ngachemuhobhalela, bho, mwiweza bholi kuhobhalela, ananumpwaghi mambu gha kunani kumahunde?
JOH 3:13 Nga mundu joapiti kunani kumahunde, nambu jombi joaheli kuhuma kunani kumahunde, yani, Mwana waka Mundu joatama kunani kumahunde.”
JOH 3:14 Na ngati Musa moakalikwehi lijoka la shaba punkongu kulipololu kola, najombi Mwana waka Mundu anakwehakika bhelabhela,
JOH 3:15 nahuli kila mundu joanhobhalela akubhaje na womi wa mileli muka jombi.
JOH 3:16 Maghambu kwa ntundu aghoghu Chapanga akaupaliki ndema, hata akumbohiki Mwana waki wa kanjika, nahuli kila mundu joanhobhalela ngayihobha, nambu akubhaje na womi wa mileli.
JOH 3:17 Kwa ndandi Chapanga ngacheakuntumiki Mwana waki pani pundema nahuli kubhatemula bhandu bha pundema, nambu bhandu bha pundema bhapata kukengalewa kwa indela jaka jombi.
JOH 3:18 Joanhobhale Mwana waka Chapanga ngacheatemuliwa, nambu jwangakunhobhalela ajomwi kutemuliwa, maghambu ngachealihobhalili lihina laka Mwana wa kanjika waka Chapanga.
JOH 3:19 Na ghongoni nde utemuliku: Kubha unang'anu uhikiki kwa bhandu bha pundema, na bhandu bhakapaliki lwihi kuliku unang'anu, maghambu matendu ghabhu ghakabhi mahakau.
JOH 3:20 Ndandi kila mundu joatenda mahakau auhakalila unang'anu, wala ngacheahika mu unang'anu, nahuli matendu ghaki ngaghihika kulakaliwa.
JOH 3:21 Nambu jola joatenda gha chakaka ahika mu unang'anu, nahuli matendu ghaki ghabhonikanaje hotuhotu kubha ghahengakiki muka Chapanga.
JOH 3:22 Paghajomwiki ghanihagha Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakapiti mbaka ku inchi ja ku Yudea, akapilaki konihoku papamu nabhu, na kubatiza bhandu.
JOH 3:23 Yohana akabhi akabatiza bhandu ku Ainoni, pambipi na Salimu, kwa ndandi konihoku kukabhi na machi ghamaheli, na bhandu bhakunjendile, nabhombi bhakabatizwi.
JOH 3:24 Haghagha ghakahengakiki chikahi Yohana paakabhi akali ngacheabhekakiki muchifungo.
JOH 3:25 Bhela kukapitali kulochana kwa bhabhulwa bhaka Yohana na Myahude jumu panani ja ntetu wa kuligholola kwa ndandi ja kunjojabhe Chapanga.
JOH 3:26 Bhakunjendi Yohana, na kumpwaghila, “Mbola, jombi joakabhi papamu na wehapa kwihi ja Yoludani, jola joukamlandile malobhi ghaki, lingalyaje, sajenu atenda kubatiza, na bhandu bhokapi bhunjende jombi.”
JOH 3:27 Yohana akayangiki, na kupwagha, “Ngacheaweza mundu kujopalela lilobhi lokapi lela, pangakubha apatiki kuhuma kunani kwaka Chapanga.
JOH 3:28 Mabhanganya mabheni mwabhalandilu bhangu kubha nakapwaghiki, ‘Nepani nga Kristo, nambu ndumakiki palongi jaki.’
JOH 3:29 Joabhi naku mabhu ukwati nde bambo ukwati, nambu nkochi waki bambo ukwati, jombi joajema na kunjowanela, ahekalela paajowana malobhi akalongila bambo ukwati. Bhenibhela nde chiheku changu mochikamilikila.
JOH 3:30 Bhela Yesu ipalika atopila nakanopi, nambu nepani mbunguwaje.”
JOH 3:31 Jombi joahika kuhuma kunani kumahunde, nde nkolongwa kupeta bhokapi. Jombi joabhi wa pani pundema, nde wa pundema, najombi apwagha mambu gha pundema. Nambu joahika kuhuma kunani kumahunde atawala panani ja ghokapi.
JOH 3:32 Ghala ghaaghaweni na kughajowana, nde ghaaghalandila, na nga mundu joajetakela ulandilu waki.
JOH 3:33 Jombi joajetakili ulandilu waki ammanyakisha kubha Chapanga nde chakaka.
JOH 3:34 Kwa ndandi jombi joatumakiki na Chapanga aghalonge malobhi ghaka Chapanga, ndandi Chapanga antwelakela Roho Mhuhu waki panga na chipemu.
JOH 3:35 Atati ampala Mwana, najombi ampeki hindu yokapi mumabhoku ghaki.
JOH 3:36 Joanhobhalela Mwana abhi na womi wa mileli, na jwangakunhobhalela Mwana ngaubhoni womi, nambu inyela jaka Chapanga anajuntamilaje panani jaki.
JOH 4:1 Mafalisayo bhakajowini kubha Yesu abhapata bhabhulwa bhamaheli kupeta Yohana, na kubhabatiza bhandu.
JOH 4:2 Nambu nga Yesu mweni joakabhi abatiza bhandu, nambu bhabhulwa bhaki,
JOH 4:3 Bhela Yesu paakajowini mambu ghanihagha akabhokiki ku inchi ja Yudea, na akakelawiki kabheti mbaka ku Galilaya.
JOH 4:4 Pamwanja ghonihoghu ikampaliki kupeta ku muchi wa Samalia.
JOH 4:5 Bhela akahikiki ku muchi wa ku Samalia, ghoulowakeka Sikali, pambipi na ngonda ghola Yakobo ghoakumpeki Yusufu mwana waki.
JOH 4:6 Na panihapa pakabhi na chilibha chaka Yakobo. Bhela Yesu, kwa ndandi akatondiki na mwanja waki, akatami pambipi na pachilibha pala. Kukabhi ngati saa sita ja muhi.
JOH 4:7 Bhela akahikiki mbomba Msamalia kuteka machi. Yesu akumpwaghile, “Mbekya machi ngunywaje.”
JOH 4:8 Kwa ndandi chikahi hechi bhabhulwa bhaka Yesu bhakapiti kumbwani kuheme chilebhe.
JOH 4:9 Bhela mbomba Msamalia jola akumpwaghi Yesu, “Bho, kubhi bholi wehapa wa Myahude kupala machi kwangu nepani, koni nepani nu mbomba Msamalia?” Maghambu Bhayahude ngachebhajongana na Bhasamalia hata pachokope.
JOH 4:10 Yesu akamuyangiki, na kumpwaghila, “Ngati ukamanyiki chindu chela Chapanga cheapala kukupekeha, najombi nde nane joakupwaghila, ‘Mbekya machi ngunywaje,’ ukabya unjopiki jombi, najombi akabya akupekihi machi ghaghabhi ghomi.”
JOH 4:11 Mbomba jola akumpwaghile, “Bambo, ngacheubhi na chindu cha kutekela machi, na chilibha nde chilachu. Bho, ughapatiki kwaku machi ghanihagha ghaghabhi ghomi?
JOH 4:12 Bho, wehapa ubhi unkolongwa kupeta tati witu Yakobo, joakatupeki chilibha chenu, najombi akanywili machi ghaki, na bhana bhaki, na hinyama yaki?”
JOH 4:13 Yesu akamuyangiki, na kumpwaghila, “Kila joakunywa machi aghagha anaabhona nywita kabhete.
JOH 4:14 Nambu mundu jokapi joanakunywa machi ghala ghaananumpekya nepani ngaibhoni inywita mileli. Nambu machi ghala ghaananupekya anaghabya chemichemi ja machi mkati jaki, ghakajitikaje womi wa mileli.”
JOH 4:15 Mbomba jola akapwaghike, “Bambo, umbekya machi ghanihagha, nganibhona inywita kabhete, wala nganihika kabhete pambane kuteka machi.”
JOH 4:16 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Jendaje ukundoha ndomi waku, na uhika naku pambane.”
JOH 4:17 Mbomba jola akamuyangiki, na kupwagha, “Ngachemili na ndomi wangu.” Yesu akumpwaghile, “Uyangiki wichu, ngacheubhi na ndomi waku.
JOH 4:18 Kwa ndandi ubhi na akanalomi nhwanu, na mwanalomi joubhi naku sajenu nga ndomi wako, panihapa upwaghiki chakaka.”
JOH 4:19 Mbomba jola akumpwaghile, “Bambo, mona kubha wehepa wa mlota waka Chapanga.
JOH 4:20 Akahoko bhitu bhakabhi bhajojabhela pa chitombi achechi, nanamu mpwagha kubha ku Yelusalemu nde pandu pa chakaka pa kunjojabhela Chapanga.”
JOH 4:21 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Mbomba, unhobhalyaje chembwagha, machobha ghahika ambapu ngamwanjojabheli Atati pa chitombi achechi, wala ku Yelusalemu.
JOH 4:22 Mwenga Bhasamalia mkijojabhela changa kuchimanya, nambu tepani tujojabhela chetukimanya, maghambu ukengaleku uhuma kwa Bhayahude.
JOH 4:23 Nambu chikahi chihika, na chombi chihikike, ambapu bhajojabhela bha chakaka anabhunjojabya Atati mu Roho Mhuhu na mu chakaka. Kwa ndandi Atati abhalonda bhandu ngati bhanihaba bhunjojabyaje.
JOH 4:24 Chapanga nde Roho, na bhombi bhabhunjojabhe jombi ibhapalika kunjojabhela mu Roho Mhuhu na mu chakaka.”
JOH 4:25 Mbomba jola akumpwaghile, “Manyi kubha anahika Masihi, joalowakeka Kristo, najombi paanahikaje, jombi anaatuhyekulyaje mambu ghokapi.”
JOH 4:26 Yesu akamuyangike, “Nepani nenongela na wehapa, nde Masihi.”
JOH 4:27 Panihapa bhakahikiki bhabhulwa bhaki, bhakakangichi ndandi Yesu akabhi alongela na mbomba, nambu njeta hata jumu joakapwaghike, “Bho, ulonda kike?” Au, kundalukila, “Bho, mbona ulongela na mbomba?”
JOH 4:28 Bhela mbomba jola akachilekiki chihulu chaki, na kujenda kumbwane, na kubhapwaghi bhandu,
JOH 4:29 “Muhikaje, mumbona mundu joambwaghi mambu ghokapi ghanhengike. Bho, iwezekana le kubha hajoju nde Kristo?”
JOH 4:30 Bhela bhandu bhakahumiki kumbwani, na bhakunjendili Yesu.
JOH 4:31 Kunyuma kola bhabhulwa bhakabhi bhundobha, bhakapwaghaje, “Mbola, ukula chilebhe!”
JOH 4:32 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Nepani mi na chilebhe changa kuchimanya mwehapa.”
JOH 4:33 Bhela bhabhulwa bhaka Yesu bhakapwaghanile, “Bho, kubhi na mundu joandeti chilebhe?”
JOH 4:34 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Chilebhi changu nde achechi, naghatendaje mapalu ghaki jola joandumike, na kujomola lihengu laki.
JOH 4:35 Bho, mwehapa ngachempwagha, ‘Jikona myehi nchechi, nde paghihika mahunu?’ Lingalyaje, nepani numpwaghila, nkwehaje mihu ghinu mujilingalya mighonda, kubha chilebhi mungonda chijomwi kukoma, na chibhi tayali kwa mahunu.
JOH 4:36 Na jombi joahuna ajopalela malepu ghaki, na kubhongana mahunu kwa ndandi ja womi wa mileli, nahuli jola joapanda na jola joahuna bhapata kuhekalela papamu.
JOH 4:37 Kwa ndandi panihapa lilobhi leniheli likubha chakaka kubha, ‘Jumu apanda, na jongi kuhuna.’
JOH 4:38 Nenga nakuntumiki mughahuna ghala ghanga kughahangajakila, bhangi bhakahengiki lihengu lelinonwipe, nanamu mpatiki nyonjeka kubhokana na lihengu labhu lelinonwipe.”
JOH 4:39 Na ku muchi wa Bhasamalia ghola bhandu bhamaheli bhakunhobhali Yesu kwa ndandi ja kulandila kwaka mbomba jola, joakalandili kubha, “Akambwaghi mambu ghokapi ghanakahengike.”
JOH 4:40 Bhela Bhasamalia bhala pabhakunjendi Yesu, bhakundobhiki atama kwabhu, najombi akatami konikola machobha ghabhele.
JOH 4:41 Bhandu bhamaheli nakanopi bhakahobhalili kwa ndandi ja malobhi ghaka Yesu.
JOH 4:42 Bhakumpwaghi mbomba jola, “Henu tuhobhalela, wala nga kwa ndandi ja malobhi ghaku pela, maghambu tepani tujowini tabhete, na tumanyi kubha chakaka hajoju nde Kristo, Mkengalela wa ndema.”
JOH 4:43 Bhela paghapetiki machobha ghabheli hagha Yesu akabhokiki konihoku, na kujenda ku Galilaya.
JOH 4:44 Kwa ndandi Yesu mweni akapwaghiki, “Mlota waka Chapanga ngacheapata utopelu mu inchi jaki mwene.”
JOH 4:45 Bhela paakahikiki ku Galilaya, Bhagalilaya bhakunjopalili, kwa ndandi bhanganya habha na bhombi bhakapiti ku uwangalalu wa Pasaka, na bhakaghaweni mambu ghokapi Yesu ghaakahengiki ku Yelusalemu kola chikahi cha uwangalalu hoghu.
JOH 4:46 Bhela akahikiki kabheti ku Kana ja Galilaya, panihapa paakaghatendiki machi kubha divai. Panihapa pakabhi na ofisa jumu joakabhi na mwana waki mtamwa ku Kapelenaumu hoku.
JOH 4:47 Jombi paakajowini kubha Yesu ahikiki kuhuma ku Yudea mbaka ku Galilaya, akunjendili, akundobhiki ahelalaje na ajendaje kundamiha mwana waki joakabhi mtamwa, kwa ndandi akabhi pambipi kupotela.
JOH 4:48 Bhela Yesu akumpwaghile, “Nanga kubhona nginyulila na ngangachu, ngamwihobhaleli ng'o.”
JOH 4:49 Ofisa jola akumpwaghile, “Bambo, chondi uhelalaje mangani mwana wangu ngacheapotile.”
JOH 4:50 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ujendaje, mwana waku alamike.” Mundu jola akalihobhali lilobhi lela leakalongi Yesu, najombi akapiti.
JOH 4:51 Na paakabhi ahelela, bhatumika bhaki bhakunjopalile, bhakapwaghaje, “Mwana waku alamike!”
JOH 4:52 Bhela akabhalalukili lisaa paakatumbwi kubha wichu, na bhombi bhakumpwaghili, “Lichu, saa saba ja muhi, chitamu chakundekike.”
JOH 4:53 Bhela tati waki akamanyiki kubha lisaa lelalela leakumpwaghi Yesu, “Mwana waku alamike.” Jombi na bhokapi bha munyumba jaki bhakunhobhali Yesu.
JOH 4:54 Jeniheji nde nginyulila ja kabheli jeakahengiki Yesu, paakabhi ahuma ku Yudea kujenda ku Galilaya.
JOH 5:1 Paghapetiki ghanihagha kukabhi na uwangalalu ghongi wa Bhayahude, najombi Yesu akakweliki kujenda ku Yelusalemu.
JOH 5:2 Na ku Yelusalemu hoku pundyangu ukolongwa wa muchi ghoulowakeka Ndyangu wa Limbeleli, pambipi jaki pakabhi na litanda la machi lelilowakeka kwa Kiebulania Betizata, nalombi lakabhi na mabalaza nhwanu.
JOH 5:3 Mkati ja mabalaza hagha kukabhi na lipogha likolongwa la bhatamwa bhaghonile, akangalola, iwete, na bhabhatengwike, bhakabhi bhalendalela machi ghakilabhanwaje.
JOH 5:4 Kwa ndandi kubhi chikahi cheahele mtumika wa kunani kwaka Chapanga, na kujingi mkati ja machi, na kughakilabhana machi. Bhela jola joakubha wa kutumbula kujibhila chikahi machi paghakilabhanwa, alama chitamu chokapi cheakabhi apatike.
JOH 5:5 Na panihapa pakabhi na mundu jumu, joakabhi atengwike kwa hyaka selasini na nane.
JOH 5:6 Yesu paakumbweni jonihoju aghonile, najombi akamanya kubha jombi abhi mtamwa na hali jeniheji kwa chikahi chilachu, akundalukile, “Bho, upala kulama?”
JOH 5:7 Mtamwa jola akamuyangiki, “Bambo, nepani ngachemi na mundu wa kumbeleka mulitanda, machi paghakilabhanwa, nambu chikahi panhika nepani, mundu jongi ajingila mangani jangu.”
JOH 5:8 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Jemaje, utola uleli waku, na ujendaje.”
JOH 5:9 Palapala mundu jola akalamike, na akalitwekiki uleli waki, na kujenda. Na lichobha leniheli lakabhi Lichobha la Sabato.
JOH 5:10 Kwa ndandi jeniheji Bhayahude bhakumpwaghi mundu joakalamishwi jola, “Lalenu nde Lichobha la Sabato, shelia jikanakila kutotola uleli waku.”
JOH 5:11 Jombi akabhayangike, “Jombi joandendiki mya mwomi nde joambwaghile, ‘Utola uleli waku, na ujendaje.’ ”
JOH 5:12 Bhela bhakundalukile, “Bho, joakupwaghi wehapa ulitweka uleli waku, na ujendaje, nde nane?”
JOH 5:13 Nambu mundu joakalamiki jola ngacheamanyiki joandamihe, ndandi Yesu akabhi ajomwi kubhoka, kwa ndandi pakabhi na bhandu bhamaheli pandu panipala.
JOH 5:14 Paghapetiki ghanihagha Yesu akunketanili mundu jola joakundamihe mkati ja Nyumba jaka Chapanga, akumpwaghile, “Ulingalyaje, ubhi wa mwomi, ngawihenga mahoku kabhete, ngalihika kukupata lijambu lihakau nakanopi.”
JOH 5:15 Mundu jola akapiti, akabhapwaghi malobhi bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude kubha Yesu nde joandamihe.
JOH 5:16 Kwa ndandi jeniheji Bhayahude bhakatumbwi kung'aha Yesu, kwa ndandi akahengiki mambu ghanihagha mu Lichobha la Sabato.
JOH 5:17 Yesu akabhayangiki, “Atati wangu ahenga lihengu mbaka sajenu, na nepani bhelabhela nhenga lihengu.”
JOH 5:18 Bhela kwa ndandi jeniheji bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude bhakajendali kulonda mbekenyu ja kunkoma, nga kwa ndandi akahekiti shelia ja Lichobha la Sabato pela, nambu papamu na ghanihagha akundohiki Chapanga Atati waki, na bhela kulitenda jombi alengana na Chapanga.
JOH 5:19 Bhela Yesu akabhayangiki, na kubhapwaghila, “Chakaka, numpwaghila, Mwana ngacheaweza kuhenga lijambu lokapi lela kanjika jaki, nambu ahenga lijambu lela leambona Atati waki akahengaje, kwa ndandi ghokapi ghaahenga Atati, na Mwana najombi aghahenga ghaghagha.
JOH 5:20 Kwa ndandi Atati ampala Mwana, najombi andangiha ghokapi ghaahenga mweni. Hata mahengu makolongwa nakanopi kupeta ghanihagha anaandangihaje, nahuli mwehapa mpata kukangacha.
JOH 5:21 Ndandi ngati Atati moabhayoke bhakuwa na kubhapeke womi kabhete, bhelabhela na Mwana najombi abhapekeha womi bhala bhaabhapala.
JOH 5:22 Kabheti Atati ngacheantemu mundu jokapi, nambu ampeki Mwana lihengu la kubhatemula bhandu bhokapi,
JOH 5:23 nahuli bhandu bhokapi bhuntopila Mwana, ngati mobhuntopale Atati. Jokapi jwangakuntopela Mwana ngacheantopela Atati joantumike.”
JOH 5:24 Chakaka, numpwaghila, “Jombi joalijowana lilobhi langu na kunhobhalela jola joandumike abhi na womi wa mileli. Na wala ngaitemuliwe, nambu apetiki kuhuma mu kupotela na kujingila mu womi.
JOH 5:25 Chakaka, numpwaghila, lisaa lihika, na sajenu libhile, bhakuwa pabhijowanaje sauti jaka Mwana waka Chapanga, na bhala bhabhijowanaje anabhakubha bhome.
JOH 5:26 Ndandi ngati bhela Atati moabheli na womi mkati jaki, bhelabhela akumpeki na Mwana uwezu wa kubha na womi mkati jaki.
JOH 5:27 Na jombi akumpeki lujiniku lwa kutemula kwa ndandi jombi nde Mwana waka Mundu.
JOH 5:28 Ngamwikangacha malobhi ghanihagha, kwa ndandi lisaa lihika, ambalu bhokapi bhabhabhi mumatengeli anabhajowanaje sauti jaki.
JOH 5:29 Na bhombi anabhayokaje, bhala bhabhatehi manyahi kwa uyohakeku wa womi, na bhala bhabhatehi mahakau kwa uyohakeku wa utemulo.”
JOH 5:30 “Nepani ngachenhweza kuhenga lihengu namwete, ngati monyowanela kuhuma kwa Atati bhenibhela nde mondemulila, na utemulu wangu nde wa chakaka, kwa ndandi ngachenonda kuhenga ngati mombali nepane, nambu ngati moapali jola joandumike.”
JOH 5:31 Nepani ngati ananililandi namwete, ulilandilu wangu nga wa chakaka.
JOH 5:32 Abhi jongi joanandila nepani, nanatu manyi kubha ulandilu waki ghoanandila nepani nde wa chakaka.
JOH 5:33 Mabhanganya mkabhatumiki bhandu kwaka Yohana Mbatizaji, najombi akundandili chakaka.
JOH 5:34 Nepani nga ngati nujopalela ulandilu wa bhandu, nambu nongela mambu aghagha nahuli mwehapa mpata kukengalewa.
JOH 5:35 Yohana akabhi ngati taa jejibhelela na kung'anya, nanamu mkahawi kuuhekalela unang'anu waki kwa chikahi.
JOH 5:36 Nambu ulandilu ghominaku nepani nde ukolongwa kupeta ghola waka Yohana, kwa ndandi mahengu ghala ghaambeki Atati nahuli naghajomulaje, mahengu ghanihagha ghanaghahenga, ghanandila kubha Atati nde joandumike.
JOH 5:37 Atati joandumike bhelabhela anandila. Sauti jaki ngachemujijowine chikahi chokapi, wala ngachemumbweni pamihu jaki.
JOH 5:38 Wala lilobhi laki ngachembinalu likatama mkati jinu, kwa ndandi mabhanganya ngachemunhobhalela jola joatumakiki na jombe.
JOH 5:39 Mughachunguzaje Malembelu Mahuhu, maghambu kwa ghanihagha mwehapa muholakela kubha mkati jaki mbi na womi wa mileli, na Malembu ghanihagha nde ghaghanandila nepane.
JOH 5:40 Wala ngachempala kuhika kwangu nepane, nahuli mpata kubha na womi wa mileli.
JOH 5:41 “Nepani ngachenulonda ulumbalilu kuhuma kwa bhandu.
JOH 5:42 Nambu nummanyiki mabhanganya kubha ngachembi na upalu waka Chapanga mkati ja mitima jinu.
JOH 5:43 Nepani nhikiki kwa lujiniku lwa Atati wangu, wala mabhanganya ngachemnyopalela, jongi anahikiki kwa lihina laki mwene, anamunjopalya jonihoju.
JOH 5:44 Bho, muweza bhole kuhobhalela mabhanganya mwenjopalanela ulumbalilu mabheni kwa mabheni, na ulumbalilu ghola ghouhuma kwaka Chapanga joabhi wa kanjika ngachemulonda?
JOH 5:45 Ngamwiholake nepani ananuntakila kwa Atati. Musa jomunhobhalela mabhanganya nde joantakila.
JOH 5:46 Kwa ndandi ngati mkabhili munhobhalela Musa, mkabya mnihobhalili na nepane, maghambu Musa akalembiki malobhi ghangu nepane.
JOH 5:47 Nambu ngati ngachemughahobhalela malembu ghaka Musa, bho, anamughahobhalya bhole mabholu ghangu nepane?”
JOH 6:1 Paakajomwi ghanihagha Yesu akalombwiki kwihi ja Bahali ja Galilaya, au ghoulowakeka Bahali ja Tibelia.
JOH 6:2 Na lipgha likolongwa la bhandu lakunjengalile, kwa ndandi bhakaiweni ngangachu yeakabhahengi bhatamwa.
JOH 6:3 Bhela Yesu akakweliki kuchitombi, na akatami konihoku papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki.
JOH 6:4 Na chikahi cha uwangalalu wa Pasaka ja Bhayahude, chakabhi chiheghalile.
JOH 6:5 Bhela Yesu paakalingalili, na kulibhona lipogha likolongwa la bhandu lihika kwaki, akumpwaghi Filipo, “Bho, tuhemala kwaku mabumunda, nahuli bhandu abhabha bhapata kula?”
JOH 6:6 Na leniheli akalongi nahuli kundenga Filipo, kwa ndandi akamanyiki mweni leanahengaje.
JOH 6:7 Filipo akamuyangike, “Mabumunda gha ipandi mia mbili ya madini gha feza ngaghabhajaghanile, hata ngati kila jumu wabhu anaapatiki chipandi kichokope.”
JOH 6:8 Jumu wa bhabhulwa bhaki joalowakeka Andulea, ndongu waka Simoni Petulu, akumpwaghile,
JOH 6:9 “Pambani abhi nkombu jumu, joabhi na mabumunda nhwano gha shaili, na homba ibheli. Bho, nambu hayeyi anaijaghanya kiki kwa bhandu bhamaheli ngati abhabha?”
JOH 6:10 Yesu akapwaghike, “Mwatamika bhandu pahi.” Na pandu pala pakabhi na manyonyoli ghamaheli. Bhela akanalomi bhakatami, ngati bhandu elufu nhwano jumula jabhu.
JOH 6:11 Bhela Yesu akaghatoliki mabumunda ghala, akunchengwi Chapanga, na kubhapekeha bhabhulwa bhaki, na bhabhulwa bhakabhaghabhi bhandu bhabhakabhi bhatami, bhelabhela na homba yela kulengana na mobhapalilaje.
JOH 6:12 Na bhandu bhokapi pabhakatupile, akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Mbonganaje ipandi yeihighalile, ngachihobha chokapi.”
JOH 6:13 Bhela bhakaibhongini papamu, na kutwelakela itonga komi na ibhele kubhokana na mabumunda nhwanu gha shaili ghala, ghabhakahighakile bhandu bhala bhabhakulike.
JOH 6:14 Bhela bhandu bhala, pabhajiweni nginyulila jeakahengiki Yesu, bhakapwaghike, “Chakaka hajoju nde Mlota waka Chapanga jola joakapwaghiki anahika pani pundema.”
JOH 6:15 Bhela Yesu paakamanyiki kubha bhakapaliki kuhika kunkamula kwa makili, nahuli bhumbeka kubha Nkolongwa wabhu, akabhokiki kabhete, na kujenda kuchitombi jombi kanjika jaki.
JOH 6:16 Hata pakwabhi pakamihi bhabhulwa bhaka Yesu bhakahelili ku bahali,
JOH 6:17 bhakakweliki mu liboti, na kutumbula kulomboka bahali kujenda ku Kapelenaumu. Chikahi hechi kukabhi lwihi lujingile, na Yesu akabhi akali ngakubhahikila.
JOH 6:18 Bahali jakatumbwi kuhakula kwa kupogha mpongu ukolongwa.
JOH 6:19 Bhela pabhakabhi bhahughiki ingahe na kujenda utali wa kilometa nhwanu au sita, bhakumbweni Yesu akajendaje panani ja machi na kuliheghalela liboti, bhakajowipi namaa.
JOH 6:20 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Nde nepane, ngamwijoghopa!”
JOH 6:21 Bhela bhakapaliki kuntola Yesu mu liboti, na chikahi chelachela liboti lakahikiki mumaheku ja kobhakabhi bhajenda.
JOH 6:22 Chilabhu jaki lipogha la bhandu lelajemiki kwihi ja bahali bhakaweni kubha njeta liboti lengi konihoku nambu liboti limu pela, na bhakamanyiki kubha Yesu ngacheakajingi mu liboti lela papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki, nambu bhabhulwa bhaki bhakapiti kanjika jabhu.
JOH 6:23 Nambu ghakahikiki maboti ghangi kuhuma ku Tibelia mbaka pambipi na pandu pala lipogha likolongwa la bhandu pabhakulikaje mabumunda, chikahi Bambo paakunchengwi Chapanga.
JOH 6:24 Bhela lipogha la bhandu palaweni kubha Yesu ngacheabhi konihoku wala bhabhulwa bhaki, bhakajingili mu maboti ghangi bheni, na kujenda ku Kapelenaumu nahuli kundonda Yesu.
JOH 6:25 Hata pabhakunhimanili kwihi ja bahali, bhakundalukile, “Mbola, wehapa uhikiki lile pambane?”
JOH 6:26 Yesu akabhayangiki, na kubhapwaghila, “Chakaka, numpwaghila, mwenga mnonda nepani nga kwa ndandi mkaweni nginyulila, nambu maghambu mkakuliki mabumunda ghala, na kutupila.
JOH 6:27 Ngamwachihenge lihengu chilebhi chechiyonangeka, nambu chilebhi chechitamakila mbaka womi wa mileli, ambachu Mwana waka Mundu anaampekyaje, kwa ndandi jonihoju nde joajeghaliki muhuli na Chapanga Atati.”
JOH 6:28 Bhela bhakumpwaghile, “Bho, tutenda bholi nahuli tupata kughahenga mahengu ghaka Chapanga?”
JOH 6:29 Yesu akabhayangiki, na kubhapwaghila, “Haleli nde lihengu laka Chapanga, kubha munhobhalyaje jola joatumakiki najombi.”
JOH 6:30 Bhakumpwaghile, “Bho, anauhenga nginyulila bhole nahuli tujibhonaje na tupata kuhobhalela? Bho, anauhenga lihengu bhole?
JOH 6:31 Akahokolu bhitu bhakakuliki mana kulipololu ngati moilembakike mu Malembelu Mahuhu, ‘Akabhapeki mana kuhuma kunani kumahunde nahuli bhakulaje.’ ”
JOH 6:32 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Chakaka, numpwaghila, nga Musa joakumpeki mabumunda kuhuma kunani kumahunde, nambu Chapanga Atati wangu nde joampekeha mwehapa mabumunda gha chakaka kuhuma kunani kumahunde.
JOH 6:33 Kwa ndandi libumunda laka Chapanga nde jola joahelela kuhuma kunani kumahunde, na kuupekeha ndema womi.”
JOH 6:34 Bhela bhakumpwaghile, “Bambo, machobha ghokapi utupekyaje libumunda leniheli.”
JOH 6:35 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Nepani nde libumunda la womi. Jokapi joahika kwangu nepani ngayibhoni injala ng'o, na jola joanhobhale nepani ngayibhoni inywita ng'o.
JOH 6:36 Nambu numpwaghile kubha, njomwi kumona, nambu mwakali ngachemuhobhalela.
JOH 6:37 Bhokapi bhaambeke Atati anabhahika kwangu, kabheti jokapi joahika kwangu nganundekeli kunja ng'o.
JOH 6:38 Kwa ndandi ngachenheli kuhuma kunani kumahunde nahuli kuhenga ngati mombali nepani, nambu nhenga mapalu ghaka jola joandumike.
JOH 6:39 Na mapalu ghaka jola joandumike nde aghagha, ja kubha kwa bhokapi bhaambekihe nganunhoa hata jumu, nambu nimuyoha kabhete mu lichobha la kujomukela.
JOH 6:40 Kwa ndandi mapalu gha Atati wangu nde aghagha, ja kubha kila joandingalila Mwana na kunhobhalela jombi, akubhaje na womi wa mileli, na nepani ananimuyohaje mu lichobha la kujomukela.”
JOH 6:41 Bhela Bhayahude bhakutumbwi kung'ong'uteka, kwa ndandi akapwaghiki, “Nepani nde libumunda lelihelile kuhuma kunani kunahundi.”
JOH 6:42 Bhakapwaghike, “Bho, hajoju le nga Yesu, mwana waka Yusufu, jotummanyi atati waki na mabhu waki? Bho, henu apwagha bhole kubha, ‘Nhelili kuhuma kunani kumahunde?’ ”
JOH 6:43 Bhela Yesu akayangiki, na kubhapwaghila, “Ngamwing'ong'uteka mabheti kwa mabheti.”
JOH 6:44 Nga mundu joaweza kuhika kwangu nepani, nangakuhutwa na Atati joandumike, na nepani ananimuyohaje mu lichobha la kujomukela.
JOH 6:45 Ilembakiki mu Malembu gha bhalota bhaka Chapanga, “Bhandu bhokapi anabhabholakikaje na Chapanga.” Bhela kila mundu joanjowana Atati, na kulibhola kuhuma kwaki, jonihoju ahika kwangu nepani.
JOH 6:46 Njeta mundu joambweni Atati, nambu jombi joahuma kwaka Chapanga, jonihoju nde joambweni Atati.
JOH 6:47 Chakaka numpwaghila, jombi joanhobhalela nepani abhi na womi wa mileli.
JOH 6:48 Nepani nde libumunda la womi.
JOH 6:49 Akahokolu bhinu bhakakuliki mana kulipololu, na bhakapotile.
JOH 6:50 Nambu lendenu nde libumunda lelihelili kuhuma kunani kumahunde, na kubha mundu aweza kula, na wala ngayipotele.
JOH 6:51 Nepani nde libumunda lelihelili kuhuma kunani kumahunde, mundu anaakuliki libumunda lenu, anaatamaje mileli. Na libumunda lemoha nepani nde hyegha jangu, jenijibhoha kwa ndandi ja womi wa bhandu bha pundema.
JOH 6:52 Bhela Bhayahude bhakalochini bheni kwa bheni, bhakapwaghaje, “Bho, aweza bholi mundu ajoju kutupekeha tepani hyegha jaki nahuli tukulaje?”
JOH 6:53 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Chakaka, numpwaghila, ngati ngachemkula hyegha jaka Mwana waka Mundu, na kunywa mwahi waki, ngachembi na womi mkati jinu.
JOH 6:54 Joakula hyegha jangu, na kunywa mwahi wangu, abhi na womi wa mileli, na nepani ananimuyohaje mu lichobha la kujomukela.
JOH 6:55 Kwa ndandi hyegha jangu nde chilebhi cha chakaka, na mwahi wangu nde chakunywa cha chakaka.
JOH 6:56 Joakula hyegha jangu, na kunywa mwahi wangu, atama mkati jangu, na nepani ndama mkati jaki.
JOH 6:57 Ngati Atati joabhi mwome moandumi nepani, na nepani mili mwome kwa Atati, bhelabhela jola joangula nepani, anaakubha mwome kwangu nepani.
JOH 6:58 Lendenu nde libumunda lelihelile kuhuma kunani kumahunde, nga ngati akahokolu bhinu mobhakakuli mana, na kupotela, nambu jola joakula libumunda lendenu anaatamaje mileli.”
JOH 6:59 Yesu akapwaghiki malobhi ghanihagha paakabhi abhola mu nyumba ja kuhimanganila Bhayahude, ku Kapelenaumu hoku.
JOH 6:60 Bhela bhandu bhamaheli pachilanda ja bhabhulwa bhaki pabhakajowini lijambu leniheli, bhakapwaghike, “Mambu aghagha nde ghanonwipe, bho, mundu bholi joaweza kughajowanela?”
JOH 6:61 Najombi Yesu akamanyi muntima waki kubha bhabhulwa bhaki bhaling'ong'utakela lijambu leniheli, akabhapwaghile, “Bho, lijambu haleli le luntenda kuhakalila?
JOH 6:62 Bho, henu anakukubha bhole pamwambona Mwana waka Mundu akagholukaje kujenda kola koakabhi pakutumbula?
JOH 6:63 Roho Mhuhu nde joajeghela womi, hyegha jaka mundu ngachejibhi na chindu ndeka. Nambu malobhi ghanihagha ghanumpwaghile nde Roho, kabheti nde womi.
JOH 6:64 Nambu kubhi na bhangi pachilanda jinu bhangakuhobhalela.” Kwa ndandi Yesu akamanyiki kutumbu pa kutumbulila kubha nde bhangakuhobhalela, najombi nde nane joamung'anambukaje.
JOH 6:65 Akapwaghike, “Kwa ndandi jeniheji nukumpwaghili kubha nga mundu joaweza kuhika kwangu nepani, pangakujangatiwa na Atati wangu.”
JOH 6:66 Kwa ndandi ja ghanihagha bhamaheli pachilanda ja bhabhulwa bhaki bhakakelawiki kunyuma, na ngachebhalongini naku kabhete.
JOH 6:67 Bhela Yesu akabhalalukili bhabhulwa bhaki komi na bhabheli bhala, “Bho, mwehapa nanamu mpala kubhoka?”
JOH 6:68 Bhela Simoni Petulu akamuyangike, “Bombo, bho, tujenda kwaka nane? Wehapa ubhi na mabholu ghaghaleta womi wa mileli.
JOH 6:69 Na tepani tuhobhalela, kabheti tumanyi, ja kubha wehapa nde Kristo, Mhuhu waka Chapanga.”
JOH 6:70 Yesu akabhayangike, “Bho, nepani ngachenunhawili mwenga komi na bhabheli, na jumu winu nde Shetani?”
JOH 6:71 Panihapa Yesu akabhi andongalela Yuda, mwana waka Simoni Isikalioti, ndandi jonihoju nde joamung'anambukaje, najombi nde jumu wa bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli bhala.
JOH 7:1 Paghajomwiki ghanihagha Yesu akabhi ajenda mu Galilaya, ndandi ngacheapaliki kujenda mu Yudea, kwa ndandi bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude bhakabhi bhalonda kunkoma.
JOH 7:2 Na chikahi cha uwangalalu wa Bhayahude, Uwangalalu wa Indamba, chakabhi chiheghalile.
JOH 7:3 Bhela bhalongu bhaka Yesu bhakumpwaghile, “Ubhoka pambane, na ujenda ku Yudea, nahuli bhabhulwa bhaku nabhombi bhapata kughabhona mahengu ghaku ghaughahenga.
JOH 7:4 Nga mundu joatenda mambu kwa kulihiya, na koni mweni apala kumanyikana. Ngati anauhenga mambu aghagha, bhela ulilangihaje wamwete pundema wokapi.”
JOH 7:5 Kwa ndandi hata bhalongu bhaki ngachebhunhobhalile.
JOH 7:6 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Chenjenu nga chikahi changu chechipalika, nambu kwinu mwehapa chikahi chokapi chipalika.
JOH 7:7 Bhandu bha pundema ngabhawezi kunhakalila mwehapa, nambu bhanhakalila nepani, kwa ndandi nepani nabhalandila kubha matendu ghabhu nde mahakau.
JOH 7:8 Nkwelaje mwehapa njendanyaje mkakula uwangalalu. Nepani nga ngweli nakona kujenda kula uwangalalu hoghu, kwa ndandi chikahi changu chekimbalila chakali ngachechihikike.”
JOH 7:9 Paakajomwi kubhapwaghi malobhi ghanihagha, akajendali kutama mu Galilaya.
JOH 7:10 Hata bhalongu bhaki pabhajomwili kukwela kujenda ku Uwangalalu wa Indamba, na Yesu akakweliki kujenda ku uwangalalu, nga kwa kubhonikana, nambu ngati kwa kulihiya.
JOH 7:11 Bhela bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude bhakundondiki pa uwangalalu, bhakapwaghaje, “Bho, abhi kwako mundu jola?”
JOH 7:12 Kukabhi na kujojalanela kwamaheli pa lipogha la bhandu panani jaki jombi. Na bhangi bhakapwaghike, “Mundu hoju nde wambone.” Bhandu bhangi bhakapwaghike, “Ngabhela, nambu abhakolowa bhandu.”
JOH 7:13 Nambu nga mundu joakumpwaghiki Yesu palanga, kwa ndandi ja kubhajoghopa bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude.
JOH 7:14 Pajahika pakati ja uwangalalu Yesu akakweliki na kujingila mu liwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na kutumbula kubhola.
JOH 7:15 Bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude bhakakangichi bhakapwaghaje, “Bho, mundu ajoju apatiki bhole kumanya mambu aghagha, koni ngacheasomike?”
JOH 7:16 Bhela Yesu akabhayangiki, na kupwagha, “Mabholu ghangu nga ghangu namwete, nambu ghaka jombi joandumike.
JOH 7:17 Mundu anaapaliki kughahenga mapalu ghaka Chapanga, anaamanyaje kubha mabholu ghangu ghahuma kwaka Chapanga, au nepani nongela kwa ndandi jangu namwete.
JOH 7:18 Jola joalongela kwa ndandi jaki mweni pela alonda lujiniku lwaki mweni. Nambu jola joalonda lujiniku lwaka jola joantumiki, jonihoju nde wa chakaka, na wala mkati jaki njeta uhakau.
JOH 7:19 Bho, Musa ngacheakumpeki Shelia? Nambu njeta hata jumu winu joajikamula Shelia heji. Bho, maghambu kiki mpala kungoma?”
JOH 7:20 Bhandu bhakayangike, “Wehapa ubhi na majobhi! Bho, nane joapala kukukoma?”
JOH 7:21 Yesu akabhayangike, “Nepani nakahengiki ngangachu jimu, na mwehapa mabhokapi mkangacha.
JOH 7:22 Musa akumpeki malaghalakilu gha jando, nambu nga ngati ghahuma kwaka Musa, nambu kwa akahokolu, nanamu munheketa mundu jandu hata mu Lichobha la Sabato.
JOH 7:23 Bhela ngati anakubhi mundu aheketa jandu hata mu Lichobha la Sabato nahuli Shelia jaka Musa ngajihika kuhekateka, bho, mbona muhyomela nepani kwa ndandi nakundamihi mundu mu Lichobha la Sabato?
JOH 7:24 Nkotukaje kutemula mambu kwa kulingalila kwa kunja pela, nambu mughalingaje mambu na kutemula kwa chakaka.”
JOH 7:25 Bhela bhandu bhakumu bha ku Yelusalemu bhakapwaghike, “Bho, hajoju le nga mundu jola ambaju ihongozi bhundonda nahuli bhunkomaje?”
JOH 7:26 Lingalyaje, abhi pambane! Akalongilaje palanga, wala ngachebhumpwaghi lilobhi lokapi lela. Bho, iwezikana kubha chakaka ihongozi abhabha bhamanyi kubha hajoju nde Kristo?
JOH 7:27 Nambu hajoju tummanyi koahuma, nambu Kristo paanahikaje, nga mundu joamanya koahuma.
JOH 7:28 Bhela Yesu akajamalili sauti jaki mu liwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, akabholaje na kupwagha, “Bho, nepani mmanye, na konhuma hoku mkumanye? Wala nepani ngachenhikiki kwa ndandi ja lujiniku lwangu namwete, nambu jombi joandumike nde wa chakaka, jwangakummanya mwehapa.
JOH 7:29 Nambu nepani nummanyi jombi, kwa ndandi nhumiki kwaki, najombi nde joandumike.”
JOH 7:30 Bhela bhandu bhakalondiki kunkamula, nambu nga mundu joakahatambwili chiwoku chaki nahuli kunkamula, kwa ndandi lisaa laki lakabhi likali ngakuhika.
JOH 7:31 Bhandu bhamaheli pa uwangalalu pala bhakunhobhalile, na bhakapwaghike, “Bho, Kristo paanahikaje, anahenga nginyulila yamaheli nakanopi kupeta yeahengiki mundu ajojo?”
JOH 7:32 Mafalisayo bhakabhajowini bhandu bhakang'ong'utikaje malobhi ghanihagha panani jaka Yesu, bhela bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa papamu na Mafalisayo bhakabhatumiki bhalonda bha Nyumba jaka Chapanga nahuli bhakunkamulaje.
JOH 7:33 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Nakona mili na mwehapa kwa chikahi kichokopi pela, na bhela ananyendaje kwaka jola joandumike.
JOH 7:34 Mwinonda nepani, wala ngamwimone, na nepani pamile mwehapa ngachemuweza kuhika.”
JOH 7:35 Bhela bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude bhakapwaghanile, “Bho, hajoju anajenda kwaku, hata tepani ngatumbona? Bho, apala kujenda ku michi ja Bhagiliki kobhaghabhaniki Bhayahude, na kubhabhola Bhagiliki?
JOH 7:36 Bho, nde lilobhi bhole leniheli lealilongile, ‘Anamunonda nambu ngamwimone, wala nepani pamile mwehapa ngamuwezi kuhika?’ ”
JOH 7:37 Pa lichobha la kujomukela, lichobha lela likolongwa la uwangalalu, Yesu akajemiki, na kujamalila, akapwaghaje, “Mundu joabhona inywita, ahikaje kwangu nepani, na akunywaje.
JOH 7:38 Ngati moghapwaghi Malembu Mahuhu kubha, ‘Jola joanhobhalela nepani, mikoka ja machi ghaghabhi womi anajipitaje kuhuma mkati jaki.’ ”
JOH 7:39 Yesu akalilongi lilobhi leniheli kubhokana na Roho Mhuhu, ambaju bhala bhabhunhobhalela anabhunjopalyaje, kwa ndandi Roho Mhuhu akabhi akali ngakuhika, na maghambu Chapanga akabhi akali ngakuuyekula ulumbalilu waka Yesu.
JOH 7:40 Bhela bhandu bhangi pa uhangalalu pala pabhakajowini malobhi ghanihagha, bhakapwaghike, “Chakaka hajoju nde jola Mlota waka Chapanga.”
JOH 7:41 Bhangi bhakapwaghike, “Hajoju nde Kristo.” Nambu bhangi bhakapwaghike, “Bho, Kristo aweza bhole kuhuma ku Galilaya?
JOH 7:42 Bho, Malembu Mahuhu ngacheghapwagha, ‘Kristo anahikaje kuhuma mu lubheleku lwaka Nkolongwa Daude, na kuhuma ku Beselehemu, na muchi ghola ghoatamika Daude?’ ”
JOH 7:43 Bhela kukapitali na kulekangana pachilanda ja lipogha la bhandu kwa ndandi jaka Yesu.
JOH 7:44 Bhakumu bhabhu bhakapaliki kunkamula, nambu nga mundu joakalengiki kuhatambula chiwoku chaki nahuli kunkamula.
JOH 7:45 Bhela bhalonda bhala bhakabhajendili ihongozi bha bhapenganyambiku na Mafalisayo. Nabhombi bhakabhapwaghile, “Bho, mbona ngachemundetiki Yesu?”
JOH 7:46 Bhalonda bhala bhakabhayangike, “Nga mundu jokapi joalabhali kulongela ngati mundu hajoju!”
JOH 7:47 Bhela Mafalisayo bhakabhayangike, “Bho, mwehapa nanamu atehi kunkolowa?
JOH 7:48 Bho, ndabhali le kumbona chiongozi jokapi jola wa Bhayahude joanhobhalela, au pachilanda ja Mafalisayo?
JOH 7:49 Ngabhela! Nambu bhandu abhabha bhangakujimanya Shelia jaka Musa bhabhili na masolu!”
JOH 7:50 Panihapa Nikodemu, jola joakabhi anjendili Yesu lichobha limu ikilu, ambaju akabhi jumu wabhu, akabhapwaghile,
JOH 7:51 “Bho, Shelia jitu juntemu mundu panga na kunjowanela hote, na kumanya cheahengike?”
JOH 7:52 Bhakamuyangike, na kumpwaghila, “Bho, wehapa nanau uhumiki ku Galilaya? Ulondaje na anaubhonaje kubha nga mlota waka Chapanga joahuma ku Galilaya.”
JOH 7:53 Bhela, kila jumu akabhujiki kunyumba jaki.
JOH 8:1 Bhela Yesu akapiti mbaka ku Chitombi cha Mizeituni.
JOH 8:2 Lukela pakwachile akajingili kabheti mu liwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na bhandu bhokapi bhakunjendile, najombi akatami pahi, na kutumbula kubhabhola.
JOH 8:3 Bhabhola bha Shelia na Mafalisayo bhakundetili mbomba jumu joakamuliki akahenga ugone, na kunjemeka pachilanda jabhu,
JOH 8:4 bhakumpwaghi Yesu, “Mbola, mbomba hajoju akamuliki paakabhi ahenga ugone.
JOH 8:5 Bhela mu Shelia jitu, Musa akatulaghalakili kubhalapula kwa maganga mbaka bhapotilaje akambomba ngati abhabha. Nambu bho, wehapa upwagha bhole?”
JOH 8:6 Bhombi bhakapwaghiki lilobhi leniheli kwa kundenga Yesu, nahuli bhapataje ndandi ja kumtakila. Nambu Yesu akajinimi, na kulemba paluhombi, kwa lukonji lwaki.
JOH 8:7 Bhombi pabhakajendali kundalukila, akajinwiki, na kubhapwaghila, “Mundu jokapi jwangakubha na mahoku pachilanda jinu, na akubhaje wa kutumbula kundapula liganga.”
JOH 8:8 Akajinimi kabheti pahi na kulemba paluhombi.
JOH 8:9 Bhombi pabhajowini malobhi ghanihagha bhakatakilwi na zamili yabhu, na bhakabhokiki jumu jumu, bhakatumbula bhazee. Yesu akahighali kanjika jaki, na mbomba jola akabhi ajemiki palapala.
JOH 8:10 Yesu akajinwiki na kumpwaghila mbomba jola, “Mbomba, bho, bhabhi kwaku bhala bhabhakutakile? Bho, nga jumu joakutemwili kubha na lihoku?”
JOH 8:11 Mbomba jola akamuyangike, “Bambo, njeta hata mundu jumu.” Yesu akumpwaghile, “Wala nepani nganukutemule. Ujendaje, na kutumbu sajenu ngawihenga mahoku kabhete.”
JOH 8:12 Bhela Yesu akalongili na bhandu kabhete, akapwaghaje, “Nepani nde unang'anu wa ndema, jombi joanyengalela nepani ngaajendi mulwihi ng'o, nambu anakubhaje na unang'anu wa womi.”
JOH 8:13 Bhela Mafalisayo bhakumpwaghile, “Wehapa ulilandila wamwete, kulilandila kwaku nga kwa chakaka.”
JOH 8:14 Yesu akayangike, “Nepani hata ngati nililandila namwete, ulandilu wangu nde wa chakaka, kwa ndandi manyi konhuma, na kola konyenda. Nambu mwehapa ngachemmanyi kola konhuma, wala kola konyenda.
JOH 8:15 Mwehapa mtemula kwa kujengalela mambu gha hyegha, nambu nepani ngachenuntemula mundu jokapi jola.
JOH 8:16 Nepani hata ngati anandemwile, utemulu wangu nde chakaka. Kwa ndandi nepani ngachemi kanjika jangu, nambu mili nepani papamu na Atati joandumike.
JOH 8:17 Kabheti ilembakiki mu Shelia hinu kubha, ulandilu wa bhandu bhabeli nde wa chakaka.
JOH 8:18 Nepani nililandila namwete, najombi Atati joandumiki anandila bhelabhela.”
JOH 8:19 Bhela bhakumpwaghile, “Bho, abhi kwaku Atati wako?” Yesu akabhayangike, “Nepani ngachemmanye, wala Atati wangu ngachemummanye. Ngati mkamanyiki nepani, mkabya mummanyiki na Atati wangu.”
JOH 8:20 Yesu akaghalongili malobhi ghanihagha paakabhi abhola mu liwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, mu chumba cha kubheke masanduku gha nyambiko. Wala nga mundu joakunkamwile, kwa ndandi lisaa laki lakabhi likali ngakuhika.
JOH 8:21 Yesu akabhapwaghi kabhete, “Nepani ndenda kubhoka, nanamu anamnondaje, nanamu anampotilaje mu mahoku ghinu. Konyenda nepani, mwehapa ngamuwezi kuhika.”
JOH 8:22 Bhela ihongozi bha Bhayahude bhakapwaghike, “Bho, anaalikoma le mwene? Kwa ndandi apwagha, ‘Konyenda nepani, mwehapa ngamuwezi kuhika!’ ”
JOH 8:23 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mwehapa muhumiki pahi, nambu nepani nhumiki kunani kumahunde. Mwehapa nde bha pani pundema, nambu nepani nga wa pundema ghoni.
JOH 8:24 Bhela nakumpwaghi kubha anampotilaje mu mahoku ghinu, kwa ndandi nangakuhobhalela kubha, ‘Nepani nde Jombi,’ anampotilale mu mahoku ghinu.”
JOH 8:25 Bhela bhakumpwaghile, “Bho, wehapa wa nane?” Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Nepani nde jola jonakabhili nukumpwaghilaje kutumbu pakutumbula.
JOH 8:26 Mili naghu ghamaheli gha kulongela na kutemula panani jinu. Nambu jola joandumike nde chakaka, nanatu ghanaghajowini kwaki nde ghanongela kwa bhandu bha pundema.”
JOH 8:27 Wala ngachebhamanyi kubha akabhi abhapwaghila panani jaka Chapanga Atati wake.
JOH 8:28 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Pamwibya njomwili kunkweha panani Mwana waka Mundu, panihapa nde pamwimanyaje kubha ‘Nepani nde Jombi,’ na kubha ngachenhenga lilobhi lokapi lela ngati mombali namwete, nambu nongela chela pela ngati Atati wangu moamolile.
JOH 8:29 Jombi joandumike abhi papamu na nepani, Atati ngacheanekiki nepani kanjika jangu, kwa ndandi machobha ghokapi nhenga mambu ghala ghaghunyambiha.”
JOH 8:30 Yesu paakabhi alongela malobhi ghanihagha, bhandu bhamaheli bhakunhobhalile.
JOH 8:31 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghi Bhayahude bhabhunhobhali bhala kubha, “Mwehapa anamtamakili mu malobhi ghangu, anamkubhaje bhabhulwa bhangu bha chakaka.
JOH 8:32 Anamujimanya chakaka, na chakaka heji anajumbeka mwehapa kulijeka.”
JOH 8:33 Bhakamuyangike, “Tepani tubhi lubheleku lwaka Ibulahimu, wala ngachetubhi bhatumwa bhaka mundu jokapi jola. Bho, uweza bhole kupwagha kubha, ‘Anambya kulijeka?’ ”
JOH 8:34 Yesu akabhayangike, “Chakaka numpwaghila, kila mundu joahenga mahoku nde mtumwa wa mahoku.
JOH 8:35 Wala mtumwa ngacheatama panyumba machobha ghokape, nambu mwana atama mileli.
JOH 8:36 Bhela ngati Mwana anaambekiki kulijeka, anambya kulijeka chakaka.
JOH 8:37 Manyi kubha mwehapa nde lubheleku lwaka Ibulahimu, nambu mpala kungoma, maghambu lilobhi langu ngachelibhi mkati jinu.
JOH 8:38 Ghanaghaweni kwa Atati wangu nde ghanaghalongela, nanamu bhelabhela ghamughajowini kwa atati winu nde ghamughahenga.”
JOH 8:39 Bhakayangike, “Atati witu nde Ibulahimu!” Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ngati mkabhi bhana bhaka Ibulahimu, mkabya mughahengiki mahengu ghala ghaakahengiki Ibulahimu.”
JOH 8:40 Nambu sajenu mpala kungoma nepani, nenumpwaghili jejibhi chakaka jenyowini kwaka Chapanga. Ibulahimu ngacheahengiki bhenibhela.
JOH 8:41 Mwehapa mughahenga mahengu gha atati winu. Bhombi bhakamuyangike, “Tepani ngachetwabhelakiki kwa ukemi, tepani tubhi na Atati jumu, yani, Chapanga.”
JOH 8:42 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ngati Chapanga akabhi Atati winu, mkabya mbaliki nepani, kwa ndandi nakahumiki kwaka Chapanga, na sajenu mili pambane, wala ngachenahikiki kwa kupala namwete, nambu jombi nde joandumike.
JOH 8:43 Bho, mbona ngachemughamanya aghagha ghanumpwaghila? Nde kwa kubha mwehapa ngachempala kughajowanela mabholu ghangu.
JOH 8:44 Mwehapa nde mabhana bha atati winu Shetani, na mpala pe kuhenga matokulelu gha atati winu. Jombi akabhi wa kukoma bhandu kutumbu pamwandi, na wala ngacheakajemi mu upambala wa chakaka, na chakaka ngachejibhili mkati jake. Paalonge upuhe, alongela ghaghabhi ghaki mweni, kwa ndandi jombi nde mpuhe, na atati wa upuhe.
JOH 8:45 Kwa ndandi nepani numpwaghi chakaka, nambu mwehapa ngachemnihobhalela.
JOH 8:46 Bho, mundu bholi pachilanda jinu joaweza kulangiha kubha nepani mili na mahoku? Na ngati nongela chakaka, bho, mbona ngachemnihobhalela?
JOH 8:47 Jombi joabhi waka Chapanga aghajowana malobhi ghaka Chapanga, bhela mwehapa ngachenjowanela kwa ndandi mwehapa nga mabhandu bhaka Chapanga.”
JOH 8:48 Bhayahude bhakamuyangiki Yesu, “Bho, tepani ngachetupwagha chakaka kubha wehapa nde Msamalia, na kabheti ubhi na lijobhe?”
JOH 8:49 Yesu akayangike, “Nepani ngachemi na lijobhe. Nepani nuntopela Atati wangu, na mwehapa muheketa utopelu wangu.
JOH 8:50 Nepani ngachenonda ulumbalilu wangu, nambu abhi jumu joanondela ulumbalilu wango.
JOH 8:51 Chakaka numpwaghila, mundu anaalikamwili lilobhi langu, ngayipoteli mileli.”
JOH 8:52 Bhela Bhayahude bhakumpwaghile, “Sajenu tumanyi kubha wehapa ubhi na lijobhe. Ibulahimu apotile, na bhalota bhaka Chapanga bhapotile, na wehapa upwagha kubha, ‘Mundu anaalikamwi lilobhi langu, ngayipoteli mileli.’
JOH 8:53 Bho, wehapa le unkolongwa kupeta atati witu Ibulahimu, ambaju apotile? Nabhombi bhalota bhaka Chapanga bhapotile. Bho, wehapa ulitenda kubha wa nane?”
JOH 8:54 Yesu akayangike, “Ananililumbalili namwete ulumbalilu wangu nga chindu. Joanumbali nepani nde Atati wangu, ambaju mwehapa mpwagha kubha nde Chapanga winu.
JOH 8:55 Wala mwehapa ngachemummanye, nambu nepani nummanye. Ngati anambwaghiki ngachenummanye, anangubha numpuhe ngati mwehapa. Nambu nummanye, na lilobhi laki nilikamula.
JOH 8:56 Atati winu, Ibulahimu, akahekalili kulibhona lichobha la kuhika kwangu, najombi akaliweni, na akahekalile.”
JOH 8:57 Bhela Bhayahude bhakumpwaghile, “Wehapa wakali ngacheuhikiki hyaka hamsini, bho, upwagha bhole kubha umbweni Ibulahimu?”
