JOH 8:58 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Chakaka, numpwaghila, mangani jaka Ibulahimu kubhelakeka, ‘Nepani mile.’ ”
JOH 8:59 Bhela bhakatondwili maganga nahuli kundapula, nambu Yesu akalihiiki, na kupita pa Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na kubhoka.
JOH 9:1 Yesu paakabhi apeta, akumbweni mundu joakabhi ngalola kutumbu kubhelakeka.
JOH 9:2 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakundalukili bhakapwaghaje, “Mbola, bho, nane joatendiki mahoku, mundu ajoju au bhabheleka bhaki, mbaka abhelakika ngalola?”
JOH 9:3 Yesu akayangike, “Hajoju ngacheatendiki mahoku, wala bhabheleka bhaki, nambu akabhelakiki ngalola nahuli makili ghaka Chapanga ghabhonikanaje ghahenga lihengu mkati jaki.
JOH 9:4 Imbalika kuhenga mahengu ghaki jombi joandumike. Koni kwakali muhi, ikilu jihika, kwanga kuweza mundu kutenda lihengu.
JOH 9:5 Chikahi chemili pundema, nepani nde unang'anu wa ndema.”
JOH 9:6 Paakajomwi kulongela ghanihagha, Yesu akahuniki imata pahi, akatendiki litopi kwa imata ghala, na kumpaka ngalola jola litopi mumihu,
JOH 9:7 na kumpwaghila, “Ujendaje ukachamba machi ku litanda la Siloamu. Silohamu ndandi jaki joatumakike.” Bhela akapiti, na kuchamba machi, na kukelabhuka koni akabya alola.
JOH 9:8 Bhela bhandu bha pambipi jaki, na bhala bhabhakumbweni mwandi kubha akabhi njopajopa, bhakapwaghike, “Bho, hajoju le nga jola joakabhi akatamaje na kujopajopa?”
JOH 9:9 Bhangi bhakapwaghike, “Nde jombe.” Bhangi bhakapwaghike, “Nga jombe! Nambu atehi pe kulengana naku.” Jombi mweni akapwaghike, “Nepani nde jombi.”
JOH 9:10 Bhela bhakundalukile, “Bho, mihu ghaku ghayekuliwi bhole?”
JOH 9:11 Jombi akabhayangike, “Mundu jola joalowakeka Yesu akatendiki litopi, akambakiki mumihu, na kumbwaghila, ‘Ujenda ku litanda la Siloamu, ukachamba machi kumihu.’ Bhela nakapiti, na kuchamba, na nakapatiki kulola.”
JOH 9:12 Bhakumpwaghile, “Bho, abhi kwaku jonihojo?” Akayangike, “Nepani ngachemanye!”
JOH 9:13 Bhela bhakumpeliki kwa Mafalisayo mundu jola joakabhi ngalola pamwandi.
JOH 9:14 Bhela lichobha heli Yesu paakalenganaki litopi na kughayekula mihu ghaka mundu hoju, lakabhi Lichobha la Sabato.
JOH 9:15 Bhela Mafalisayo bhakundaluki kabhete mundu jola ntundu bholi moapati kulola. Akabhapwaghile, “Akanyeghi litopi panani ja mihu, na nepani nakachambiki machi, na sajenu nola.”
JOH 9:16 Bhela Mafalisayo bhakumu bhakapwaghike, “Mundu hoju ngacheakahumiki kwaka Chapanga, kwa ndandi ngacheakamula Lichobha la Sabato.” Bhangi bhakapwaghike, “Bho, aweza bholi mundu mwana mahoku kutenda nginyulila ngati yeniheye?” Kukabhi na kulekana pachilanda jabhu.
JOH 9:17 Bhela bhakundaluki mundu jola joakabhi ngalola mala ja kabheli, “Bho, wehapa upwagha bholi malobhi ghaki kubhokana na moakuyekuli mihu ghako?” Jombi akapwaghike, “Jombi nde mlota waka Chapanga.”
JOH 9:18 Bhela ihongozi bha Bhayahude ngachebhahobhali malobhi ghaki, gha kubha akabhi ngalola, na akapatiki kulola, mbaka pabhakabhalohiki bhabheleka bhaki mundu jola joakapatiki kulola.
JOH 9:19 Bhakabhalalukili bhabheleka bhaki, “Bho, hajoju le mwana winu, jompwagha kubha akabhelakiki ngalola? Bho, henu apatiki bholi kulola?”
JOH 9:20 Bhabheleka bhaki bhakayangike, “Tumanya kubha hajoju nde mwana witu, na kabheti akabhelakiki ngalola.
JOH 9:21 Nambu ntundu moalole sajenu ngachetumanyi, jombi nde akolike, mundalukya jombi, anaalilongalya mwene!”
JOH 9:22 Bhabheleka bhaki bhakalongi ghanihagha kwa ndandi bhakabhi bhabhajoghopa Bhayahude, maghambu Bhayahude bhakabhi bhajomwi kujetanganela kubha mundu anaanjetakili kubha Yesu nde Kristo, anaatopuliwa kunja ja nyumba ja kuhimanganila.
JOH 9:23 Nde ndandi bhabheleka bhaki bhakapwaghiki, “Hajoju akolike, mundalukya jombe!”
JOH 9:24 Bhela bhakundohiki kabhete mala ja kabheli mundu jola joakabhelakiki ngalola, na kumpwaghila, “Umpekya Chapanga ulumbalilu! Tepani tumanyi kubha mundu hajoju joakulamihe nde mwana mahoku.”
JOH 9:25 Bhela mundu jola akayangike, “Kubha jombi nde mwana mahoku au nga mwana mahoku, ngachemanya. Nambu chindu chimu chemanya, kubha nakabhi ngalola, na sajenu nola.”
JOH 9:26 Bhela bhakumpwaghile, “Bho, akuhengi kike? Bho, akuyekwi mihu kwa indela bhole?”
JOH 9:27 Akabhapwaghile, “Nyomwi kumpwaghila, wala ngachenjowine. Bho, mbona mpala kujowana kabhete? Bho, Mabhanganya nanamu mpala kubha bhabhulwa bhake?”
JOH 9:28 Bhela bhakuntondwili, bhakapwaghaje, “Wehapa nde wa mbulwa waka mundu jola, nambu tepani nde bhabhulwa bhaka Musa.
JOH 9:29 Tepani tumanyi kubha Chapanga akalongili na Musa, nambu mundu jonijola ngachetumanyi koahumike!”
JOH 9:30 Mundu jola akayangike, “Haleli nde lijambu la kukangacha! Kubha mwehapa ngachemmanya koahuma, najombi akaniyekwi mihu!
JOH 9:31 Tumanya kubha Chapanga ngacheajowanela bhana mahoku, nambu mundu joanjoghopa Chapanga, na kughahenga mapalu ghaka Chapanga, anjowanela jonihoju.
JOH 9:32 Kutumbula kubhombakeka kwa ndema ngachetujowini kubha mundu andamihi jokapi jola joabhelakiki ngalola.
JOH 9:33 Ngati mundu hajoju ngacheakahumiki kwa Chapanga, ngaakaweziki kuhenga lihengu lokapi lela.”
JOH 9:34 Bhombi bhakayangike, “Wehapa ukabhelakiki na kukolela mu mahoku pela, bho, nanau utubhola tepani?” Bhakumpihiki kunja ja nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude.
JOH 9:35 Yesu akajowini kubha bhumpihiki kunja ja nyumba ja kuhimangani Bhayahude, najombi paakumbweni akumpwaghile, “Bho, wehapa le unhobhalela Mwana waka Chapanga?”
JOH 9:36 Mundu hoju akayangike, “Jombi nde nane, Bambo, nahuli mbata kunhobhalela?”
JOH 9:37 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ujomwi kumbona, najombi nde joalongela na wehapa sajeno.”
JOH 9:38 Akapwaghike, “Bambo, nhobhalela.” Najombi akunjojabhile.
JOH 9:39 Yesu akapwaghike, “Nepani nhikiki pundema ghongone kubhatemula bhandu, nahuli bhala bhangakulola bhalolaje, na bhala bhabhalola bhabya akangalola.”
JOH 9:40 Mafalisayo bhakumu bhabhakabhi papamu naku bhakajowini ghanighala, bhakumpwaghile, “Bho, tepani natatu tubhi le akangalola?”
JOH 9:41 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ngati mwakabhi akangalola, ngamwakabhonakini kubha mbi na mahoku, nambu mwehapa mpwagha kubha ‘Tulola,’ bhela mbonikana kubha mbi na mahoku.”
JOH 10:1 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Chakaka, numpwaghila, jola jwangakujingila pundyangu mu libheghi la mambeleli, nambu akwela kwa kupetela pandu pangi, jonihoju nde mwihe najombi nde mnyaghula.
JOH 10:2 Nambu joajingila pundyangu, jonihoju nde mdima wa mambelele.
JOH 10:3 Mlonda wa pundyangu anhoghulela jonihoju, na mambeleli ghajowana sauti jake, najombi aghaloha mambeleli kwa mahina ghabhu, na kughapeleka kunja.
JOH 10:4 Najombi paaghapiha kunja mambeleli ghaki ghokapi, aghalongulela, na mambeleli ghala ghunjengalela, maghambu bhajimanya sauti jake.
JOH 10:5 Mambeleli hagha ngaghawezi kunjengalela ngeni ng'o, nambu anaghuntilaje, maghambu ngachebhajimanyi sauti jaka ngeni.”
JOH 10:6 Yesu akabhapwaghi ulenganesu aghoghu, nambu bhombi ngachebhamanyi mambu ghaakabhi abhapwaghila.
JOH 10:7 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghi kabhete, “Chakaka, numpwaghila nepani nde ndyangu wa mambelele.
JOH 10:8 Bhokapi bhabhanongulile nde bhihe na bhanyaghula, nambu mambeleli ngacheghajowanile.
JOH 10:9 Nepani nde ndyangu. Mundu anaajingi kwangu nepani, anaakengalikaje, anaajingala na kupita, najombi anaapata malelelo.
JOH 10:10 Mwihi ahika pe kwa ndandi ja kujibha, kukoma, na kuyonanga. Nepani nakahikiki nahuli bhabya na womi, kabheti bhabya naku womi wamaheli.”
JOH 10:11 “Nepani nde mdima wambone. Mdima wambone aubhoha womi waki kwa ndandi ja mambelele.
JOH 10:12 Nambu mundu wa malepu, wala nga mdima wa mambelele, ambaju mambeleli nga ghake, paalibhona libweha lihika, aghaleka mambelele na mweni kutila. Na libweha lighakamula na kughapechangana.
JOH 10:13 Mundu hoju atila, wala ngacheaghajali mambelele, kwa ndandi abhi mundu wa malepu pela.
JOH 10:14 Nepani nde mdima wambone, na naghamanya mambelele ghangu, na mambelele ghangu ghamanye.
JOH 10:15 Ngati bhela Atati moamanyi nepani, na nepani monimmanyi Atati. Na nepani niubhoha womi wangu kwa ndandi ja mambelele.
JOH 10:16 Na mili kabheti na mambeleli ghangi, ghaghu nga gha libheghi lendeno, na ghanihagha naghombe imbalika kughaleta, na sauti jangu anabhajowanaje, na bhela anakukubhaje na lipogha limu na mdima jumu.”
JOH 10:17 “Atati wangu ambala nepani, maghambu nubhoha womi wangu, nahuli nupataje kabhete.
JOH 10:18 Nga mundu joamokela womi wangu, nambu nepani nubhoha namwete. Mili na lujiniku lwa kuubhoha, na mili na lujiniku lwa kuukelebhuha kabhete. Anana nde Atati wangu moanaghalakile nhengaje.”
JOH 10:19 Kukabhi kabheti na ughabhaniku wa Bhayahude, kwa ndandi ja malobhi ghanihagha.
JOH 10:20 Bhamaheli bhabhu bhakapwaghike, “Hajoju abhi na lijobhe, na kabheti mwanamangongo! Bho, maghambu kiki munjowanela?”
JOH 10:21 Bhangi bhakapwaghike, “Malobhi ghanihagha nga ghaka mundu joabhi na lijobhe. Bho, lijobhi liweza kaghayeku mihu ghaka ngalola?”
JOH 10:22 Bhela ku Yelusalemu hoku kukabhili na Uwangalalu wa kubheka wakifu Nyumba jaka Chapanga, na chikahi hechi chakabhi chikahi cha imbepu.
JOH 10:23 Yesu akabhi akajendajenda mu Nyumba jaka Chapanga, mu liwangala laka Solomoni.
JOH 10:24 Bhela Bhayahude bhakamuyongalwiti, na kumpwaghila, “Bho, mbaka lile anautung'ahaje mitima jitu? Ngati wehapa nde wa Kristo, utupwaghila hotuhotu.”
JOH 10:25 Yesu akabhayangike, “Numpwaghile, nambu mwehapa ngachemuhobhalela. Mahengu ghangani ghanihenga kwa lihina la Atati wangu, nde ghaghanandila.
JOH 10:26 Nambu mwehapa ngachemuhobhalela, maghambu mwehapa ngachembili mu mambeleli ghangu.
JOH 10:27 Mambeleli ghangu ghajowana sauti jangu. Nanatu naghamanye, naghombi ghanyengalela.
JOH 10:28 Nanatu naghapekeha womi wa mileli, wala ngaghapoteli ng'o. Kabheti nga mundu joaweza kubhanyaghula kuhuma mu mabhoku ghangu.
JOH 10:29 Atati wangu, joambeki bhanihabha, nde nkolongwa kupeta bhokapi, kabheti nga mundu joaweza kubhanyaghula kuhuma mumabhoku gha Atati wangu.
JOH 10:30 Nepani na Atati wangu tubhi jumu.”
JOH 10:31 Bhela Bhayahude bhakatondwi maganga kabheti nahuli bhundapulaje.
JOH 10:32 Yesu akabhayangike, “Mahengu ghamboni ghamaheli nundangihe, ghaghahuma kwa Atati wangu, bho, kwa ndandi ja lihengu bhole pamahengu ghanihagha mpala kunapula kwa maganga?”
JOH 10:33 Bhayahude bhakamuyangike, “Ngechetukulapu maganga kwa ndandi ja mahengu ghambone, nambu kwa ndandi ja kutondola, na kwa ndandi wehapa weubhi wa mundu, ulitenda wamwete kubha nde Chapanga.”
JOH 10:34 Yesu akabhayangike, “Bho, ngacheilembakiki mu Shelia hinu kubha, ‘Nepani nakapwaghiki, kubha mwehapa nde ichapanga?’
JOH 10:35 Ngati akabhalohiki ichapanga, bhala bhalakabhahiki Lilobhi laka Chapanga, naghombi Malembu Mahuhu ghapwagha chakaka machobha ghokapi,
JOH 10:36 henu jola ambaju Atati akungolwili na kuntuma pundema, maghambu kiki mbwaghi kubha nuntondola Chapanga, pambwagha, ‘Nepani nde Mwana waka Chapanga?’
JOH 10:37 Ngati ngachenhenga mahengu gha Atati wangu, ngamwinhobhalela.
JOH 10:38 Nambu ananaghahenga, hata ngati ngachemunihobhalela nepani, mughahobhalyaje mahengu ghanihagha nahuli mpataje kumanya, na kuhobhalela, kubha Atati abhi mkati jangu, na nepani mili mkati ja Atati.”
JOH 10:39 Bhela bhakapaliki kabheti kunkamula, nambu Yesu akabhokiki mu mabhoku ghabhu.
JOH 10:40 Yesu akapiti kabhete kwihi ja nkoka Yoludani, pandu Yohana Mbatizaje paakabhi abatiza pakutumbula hapa, na kutama konihoku.
JOH 10:41 Bhandu bhamaheli bhakunjendi Yesu, na kupwagha, “Yohana ngacheakatendiki ngangachu jokapi jela, nambu mambu ghokapi Yohana ghaakalongili panani jaka mundu hajoju ghakabhi gha chakaka.”
JOH 10:42 Bhandu bhamaheli konihoku bhakunhobhali Yesu.
JOH 11:1 Bhela mundu jumu joakalowakiki Lazalo akabhi mtamwa. Jombi akabhi atama ku Besania, mwenehi wa chijiji cheatamika Malia na ndombu waki Masa.
JOH 11:2 Jonihoju akabhi nde Malia jola joakampakiki Bambo mahuta gha kunungila wichu, na kughahungula magholu ghaki kwa majunju ghaki. Lazalo mbeli waka Malia akabhi mtamwa.
JOH 11:3 Bhela bhalombu bhaki bhabheli bhala bhakatumiki ubholu kwaka Yesu, na kumpwaghila, “Bambo, nkochi waku joumpala jola atenda kulwala.”
JOH 11:4 Yesu paakajowini ghanihagha, akapwaghike, “Chitamu achechi nga cha kupotela, nambu kwa ndandi ja ulumbalilu waka Chapanga, nahuli Mwana waka Chapanga alumbalikaje mu chitamu chenihechi.”
JOH 11:5 Bhela Yesu akumpaliki Masa, Malia, na Lazalo.
JOH 11:6 Yesu paakajowini kubha Lazalo nde mtamwa, akajendali kutama pandu panipala kwa machobha ghabheli nakanopi.
JOH 11:7 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhaki, “Tujendaje kabhete ku Yudea!”
JOH 11:8 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakumpwaghile, “Mbola, kwichu kwichu pela Bhayahude bhakapaliki kukulapula kwa maganga, bho, nanau upala kujenda kabheti konihoko?”
JOH 11:9 Yesu akabhayangike, “Bho, Masaa gha muhi nga komi na ghabhele? Mundu anaajenda muhi ngachealikobhandola, maghambu aubhona unang'anu wa ndema ghone.
JOH 11:10 Nambu anaajendiki ikilu alikobhandola, maghambu unang'anu ngacheubhi mkati jake.”
JOH 11:11 Yesu paakajomwi kupwagha malobhi ghanihagha, akabhapwaghile, “Nkochi witu Lazalo aghonile, nambu nepani ananyenda kunjumuwa.”
JOH 11:12 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakumpwaghile, “Bambo, anangati aghoni lughonu pela, anaalamaje.”
JOH 11:13 Yesu akabhi alongalela mambu gha kupotela kwaka Lazalo, nambu bhombi bhaholakya apwagha kubha Lazalo aghoni lughonu pela.
JOH 11:14 Bela Yesu akabhapwaghi hotuhotu, “Lazalo apotile.
JOH 11:15 Nambu kwa ndandi jinu nhekalela kwa kubha ngachenakabhi konihoko, nahuli mpata kuhobhalela, nambu sajenu tujendaje kwake.”
JOH 11:16 Bhela Tomaso, joalowakika Mapaha, akabhapwaghi bhabhulwa bhajaki, “Tujendaje na tepani, nahuli tukapotilaje papamu na Yesu!”
JOH 11:17 Bhela Yesu paakahikiki konihoku, akunketani Lazalo kubha ajomwi kutaghakika mulitengeli kwa machobha ncheche.
JOH 11:18 Na chijiji cha Besania chakabhi pambipi na Yelusalemu, utali waki ukabhi ngati kilometa itatu.
JOH 11:19 Bhayahude bhamaheli bhakabhi bhahikike kwaka Masa na Malia, nahuli kubhajeghe mtima kwa ndandi jaka mbeli wabhu.
JOH 11:20 Bhela Masa paakajowini kubha Yesu atenda kuhika, akapiti kunjopalela, nambu Malia akahighali atami kunyumba.
JOH 11:21 Masa akumpwaghi Yesu, “Bambo, ngati wehapa ukabhi pambane, mbeli wangu ngaakapotile.
JOH 11:22 Nambu hata sajenu manyi kubha, chokapi chewandobhaje Chapanga, Chapanga anaakupekyaje.”
JOH 11:23 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Mbeli waku anahyokaje kabhete.”
JOH 11:24 Masa akumpwaghile, “Manyi kubha anaayokaje pa uyohakeku wa bhakuwa mu lichobha la kujomukela.”
JOH 11:25 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Nepani nde uyohakeku hoghu, na nde nenabhapekeha bhandu womi. Mundu jokapi joanhobhale nepani, hata ngati anaapotile, anaakubha atama,
JOH 11:26 na kila mundu joatama na kunhobhalela nepani ngaapoteli mileli. Bho, uhobhalela ghanihagha?”
JOH 11:27 Masa akumpwaghile, “Ena, Bambo, nepani nhobhalela kubha wehapa nde wa Kristo, Mwana waka Chapanga, jola joahika pani pundema.”
JOH 11:28 Yesu paakajomwi kulongela ghanihagha, Masa akapiti kundoha Malia ndombu waki pandu pa kanjika, na kumpwaghila, “Mbola ahikike, na akulowa.”
JOH 11:29 Malia paakajowini, akajemiki manyata, na kujenda mbaka paakabhi Yesu.
JOH 11:30 Yesu akabhi ngacheahikiki mkati ja chijiji, nambu akabhi akali pandu pala Masa paakunjopalile.
JOH 11:31 Bhela Bhayahude bhabhabhi panyumba pala na Malia, bhakunjeghala mtima, pabhakumbweni Malia ntundu moakajemi manyata na kubhoka, bhakunjengalile. Koni bhakaholakya kubha ajenda kumatengeli nahuli alela konihoku.
JOH 11:32 Bhela Malia paakahikiki pandu pala paakabhi Yesu, na kumbona, akachikimi pamagholu ghaka Yesu, na kumpwaghila, “Bambo, ngati ukabhi pambane, mbeli wangu ngaakapotile!”
JOH 11:33 Yesu paakumbweni Malia alela, na Bhayahude bhaakalongini naku bhala nabhombi bhalela, Yesu ukambiniki mtima waki, na kung'ahakika muntima waki,
JOH 11:34 akapwaghike, “Bho, mumbekiki kwako?” Bhakumpwaghile, “Bambo, uhika ulingaje.”
JOH 11:35 Yesu akaleliki mahole.
JOH 11:36 Bhela Bhayahude bhakapwaghike, “Ndingalyaje ntundu moakumpali Lazalo!”
JOH 11:37 Nambu bhangi bhabhu bhakapwaghike, “Bho, hajoju joakamuyekwi mihu ngalola, ngacheakaweziki kuntenda na Lazalo ngayipotela?”
JOH 11:38 Bhela Yesu akabya kabhete umbina mtima waki, akahikiki palitengeli. Litengeli heli lakabhi likolo, na liganga lakabhi libhekakiki panani jaki.
JOH 11:39 Yesu akapwaghike, “Mulibhoha liganga!” Masa ndombu waka jola joapotile, akumpwaghile, “Bambo, kwa sajenu atumbwi kununga, kwa ndandi abhi ntuhi kwa machobha ncheche!”
JOH 11:40 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Bho, nepani ngachenukupwaghile kubha ngati anauhobhalela, anaubhona ulumbalilu waka Chapanga?”
JOH 11:41 Bhela bhakalibhohiki liganga lela. Na Yesu akalingalili kunani kumahunde, na kupwagha, “Atati, nukuchengula kwa ndandi unyowine.
JOH 11:42 Nanatu nakamanyi kubha wehapa unyowana machobha ghokapi, nambu kwa ndandi ja bhandu bhabhajemiki pambani nakapwaghiki ghanihagha, nahuli bhandu bhabhabhi pambane, bhapata kuhobhalela kubha wehapa nde weundumike.”
JOH 11:43 Najombi paakajomwili kulongela ghanihagha, Yesu akaleliki kwa sauti ngolongwa, “Lazalo, uhikaje koni kunja!”
JOH 11:44 Na jola joakapotile akapitiki kunja, koni akabya akongakiki sanda mumagholu na mumabhoku, na pamihu jaki. Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mumbopulaje, na mundekaje ajendaje.”
JOH 11:45 Bhela Bhayahude bhamaheli bhabhakabhi bhahikiki kwaka Malia, na kughabhona mambu ghala ghaakahengiki Yesu, bhakunhobhalile.
JOH 11:46 Nambu bhakumu bhabhu bhakapiti kwa Mafalisayo, na kubhapwaghila mambu ghokapi ghaakahengiki Yesu.
JOH 11:47 Bhela ihongozi bha bhapenganyambiku papamu na Mafalisayo bhakahengiki uhimanganu wa Pachengu Pakolongwa pa Bhayahude, na kupwagha, “Bho, tuhenga kike? Maghambu mundu hajoju ahenga nginyulila yamaheli nakanopi!
JOH 11:48 Ngati anatundekiki ajendalya kuhenga bhenibhela, bhandu bhokapi anabhunhobhalyaje, na bhakolongwa bha Bhaloma anabhahikaje na kutubhokela pandu pitu na litaifa litu.”
JOH 11:49 Mundu jumu pachilanda jabhu, joalowakika Kayafa, joakabhi Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa chaka chela, akabhapwaghile, “Mabhanganya ngachemulimanyi lilobhi lokapi lela!
JOH 11:50 Bho, ngachemuholalela kubha nde mbanga mundu jumu kupotela kwa ndandi ja bhandu bhokapi, kuliku bhandu bhokapi bha litaifa litu kuyonangeka?”
JOH 11:51 Ngacheakalongili ghanihagha kwa maholalelu ghaki mweni, nambu kwa ndandi akabhi Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa chaka chela, akalotiki kubha Yesu anaapotilaje kwa ndandi ja litaifa la Bhayahude.
JOH 11:52 Wala nga kwa ndandi ja Bhayahude pela, nambu papamu na hagha abhabhonganaje bhana bhaka Chapanga bhabhapechangine, nahuli bhabya bhamu.
JOH 11:53 Bhela kutumbula lichobha lela ihongozi bha Bhayahude bhakajongini kunkoma Yesu.
JOH 11:54 Bhela Yesu ngacheakajendiki kabhete kwa palanga pachilanda ja Bhayahude, nambu akabhokiki konihoku, na kujenda pandu pambipi na lipololu, mbaka ku muchi ghoulowakeka Efulaimu, na kutama konihoku papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki.
JOH 11:55 Chikahi cha Uwangalalu wa Pasaka ja Bhayahude jakabhi jiheghalile, na bhandu bhamaheli bhakabhi bhakwela kuhuma kumighonda na kujenda ku Yelusalemu, nahuli kuligholola kwa ndandi ja kunjojabhela Chapanga mangani ja kuhika Pasaka.
JOH 11:56 Bhela bhakabhi bhundonda Yesu, bhakalaluhini koni bhakabya bhajemanile mu liwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, “Bho, mbona bhole? Bho, ibhonikana kubha ngaahiki ng'o pauhangalalu ghone?”
JOH 11:57 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa papanu na Mafalisayo bhakabhi bhabhohiki amuli ja kubha anangati mundu amanyi paabhi Yesu, aleta ubholu, nahuli bhapata kunkamula.
JOH 12:1 Machobha sita mangani ja Uwangalalu wa Pasaka, Yesu akapiti ku Besania, koatamika Lazalo ambaju Yesu akamuhyohiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa.
JOH 12:2 Konihoku bhakumbeki chilebhi cha chimihi, najombi Masa akabhi abhatumakila. Lazalo akabhi jumu wa bhala bhabhakabhi bhakula papamu na Yesu.
JOH 12:3 Bhela Malia akatoliki nusu lita ja mahuta ghaghanungila wichu ghaghalenganakiki kwa nkongu wa nalido ja mbiya yamaheli, na kumpaka mumagholu ghaka Yesu na kunhungula kwa majunju ghaki. Nyumba jokapi jakatweli unungilu wa mahuta ghanihagha.
JOH 12:4 Henu Yuda Isikalioti, jumu wa bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli, jonihoju nde joanaang'anambuka Yesu, akapwaghike,
JOH 12:5 “Bho, maghambu kiki manungilu ghanihagha ngacheghakahemaliwi kwa ipandi mia tatu yeilenganakiki kwa madini gha feza, na mbija yene kubhapekeha bhahocho?”
JOH 12:6 Yuda akapwaghiki bhenibhela, nga kwa ndandi ja kubhabhonela chiha bhahocho, nambu kwa ndandi akabhi mwihi. Maghambu jombi nde joakabhi abheka mfuku wa mbija, najombi akabhi ajibha yela yeyabhekakiki monihomu.
JOH 12:7 Nambu Yesu akapwaghike, “Ngamung'aha mabhu hoju! Mundekaje aghabhekaje kwa ndandi ja lichobha la kutaghakika kwangu.
JOH 12:8 Kwa ndandi bhahocho mbinabhu machobha ghokapi, nambu ngankubhi na nepani machobha ghokapi.”
JOH 12:9 Bhayahude bhamaheli bhakajowini kubha Yesu akabhi ku Besania. Henu, bhakahikiki konihoku nga kwa ndandi ja kumbona Yesu pela, nambu bhumbona kabheti na Lazalo, ambaju Yesu akamuhyohiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa.
JOH 12:10 Nambu ihongozi bha bhapenganyambiku bhakatendiki njama ja kunkoma kabhete Lazalo,
JOH 12:11 maghambu kwa ndandi jaki Bhayahude bhamaheli bhakabhakaniki ihongozi bhabhu, na kunhobhale Yesu.
JOH 12:12 Chilabhu jaki lipogha la bhandu bhabhakahikiki kwa ndandi ja Uwangalalu wa Pasaka, bhakajowini kubha Yesu abhi mwindela kuhika ku Yelusalemu.
JOH 12:13 Bhela bhakatoliki mambandi gha mikongu ja mitende, na kujenda kumpengana, na kujamalila bhakapwaghaje, “Chapanga apengalikaje! Apengalika jonihoju joahika kwa lihina laka Bambo! Apengalikaje Nkolongwa wa Izilaeli!”
JOH 12:14 Yesu akapatiki mwanaliponda jumu, na kukwela na kutama panani jaki, ngati moghalembakike mu Malembelu Mahuhu,
JOH 12:15 “Ngamwijoghopa bhandu bha muchi wa Sayuni! Lingalyaje, Nkolongwa waku ahika, akweliki mwanaliponda.”
JOH 12:16 Bhabhulwa bhaka Yesu ngachebhakamanyi mambu ghanihagha hoti, nambu Yesu paakahyokike kuhuma kwa bhakuwa na paakalumbaliki, panihapa nde bhabhulwa bhaki bhakakombwiki kubha mambu ghanihagha ghakabhi ghalembakiki kwa ndandi jaki, na kubha bhakuntendi jombi.
JOH 12:17 Lipogha la bhandu bhala bhabhakabhi papamu na Yesu chikahi paandohika Lazalo kuhuma mulitengeli, na kumuhyoha kuhuma kwa bhakuwa, bhakabhalandi bhandu mambu ghala ghaghapitalile.
JOH 12:18 Kwa ndandi jeniheji lipogha la bhandu lakapiti kumpengana, maghambu bhakajowini kubha Yesu akahengiki ngangachu jeniheji.
JOH 12:19 Bhela Mafalisayo pabhakaghaweni ghanihagha bhakapwaghanile, “Mbona? Bho, ngatuwezi kutenda chokapi? Lingalyaje, bhandu bhokapi pundema bhunjengale jombi.”
JOH 12:20 Kukabhi na Bhagiliki bhakumu pachilanda ja bhala bhabhahikiki ku Yelusalemu kujojabhela chikahi cha Uwangalalu wa Pasaka.
JOH 12:21 Bhanihabha bhakunjendi Filipo, mwenehi wa ku Betisaida ja inchi ja ku Galilaya, na kundobha, bhakapwaghaje, “Nkolongwa, tepani tupala kumbona Yesu.”
JOH 12:22 Filipo akapiti kumpwaghi Andulea, kabheti Andulea na Filipo bhakumpwaghi Yesu.
JOH 12:23 Yesu akabhayangike, “Lisaa la kulumbalika kwaka Mwana waka Mundu lihikike!
JOH 12:24 Numpwaghi chakaka, imbeju ya ingano nangakuhabhuka paluhombi na kuwa, ihighalila ngati imbeju kanjika jaki. Nambu ngati anaihawiki pahi na kuwa, jibheleka imbeju yamaheli.
JOH 12:25 Mundu jokapi joaghapala matamu ghaki anaaghahobhihaje, na mundu jokapi joaghahobheha matamu ghaki mu ndema ghoni anaaghakengalyaje hata womi wa mileli.
JOH 12:26 Mundu jokapi joapala kundumakila, impalika anyengalyaje, na nepani pamili, panihapa nde na mtumika wangu payibyaje. Kabheti mundu jokapi joandumakila nepani, Atati wangu anaampekya utopelu.
JOH 12:27 “Sajenu roho jangu jing'ahika, bho, henu mbwagha kike? ‘Atati, ungengalyaje mu chikahi chenu!’ Nambu nde kwa ndandi ja ghanihagha nakahikiki nahuli naghapetilaje mang'ahiku gha chikahi chenu.
JOH 12:28 Atati ulilumbalyaje lihina laku!” Panihapa sauti kuhuma kunani kumahunde jakapwaghike, “Nililumbalile, na ananililumbalya kabhete.”
JOH 12:29 Lipogha la bhandu bhabhakabhi pandu pala bhakajowini sauti jela, na bhakumu bhabhu bhakapwaghike, “Jeniheji nde sauti ja kulundamila kwa chitobhi.” Nambu bhangi bhakapwaghiki, “Mtumika wa kunani kwaka Chapanga atehi kulongela naku!”
JOH 12:30 Nambu Yesu akabhayangiki, “Sauti jeniheji ngachejabhili kwa ndandi jangu nepani, nambu kwa ndandi jinu mwehapa.
JOH 12:31 Sajenu nde chikahi cha kutemuliwa kwa ndema ghoni, henu Shetani, nkolongwa wa ndema ghoni anaalekalikaje kunja.
JOH 12:32 Nambu nepani panikwehakikaje kunani kuhuma pundema, ananabhahutaje bhandu bhokapi bhahikaje kwangu.”
JOH 12:33 Yesu akapwaghiki ghanihagha akalangiya kubha anapotilaje kwa ntundu bhole.
JOH 12:34 Bhela lipogha la bhandu lela lakalapwili njobhela lakapwaghaje, “Tujowini mu Shelia jitu kubha Kristo anatama mileli. Bho, uweza bholi henu kupwagha kubha impalika Mwana waka Mundu kujinuliwa kunani? Bho, henu Mwana waka Mundu nde nane?”
JOH 12:35 Yesu akapwaghike, “Unang'anu wakona ubhi na mwehapa kwa chikahi kichokope. Njendaje koni mbili na unang'anu, nahuli lwihi ngalwampata, maghambu joajenda mulwihi ngacheamanya koajenda.
JOH 12:36 Bhela kwa ndandi mbili na unang'anu, muuhobhalyaje unang'anu hoghu, nahuli mpata kubha mabhana bha unang'anu.” Paakajomwi kulonge ghanihagha, Yesu akabhokike, na kulihiya nahuli ngabhumbona.
JOH 12:37 Nambu Yesu papamu na kutenda ngangachu hayeyi yokapi palongi jabhu, bhombi ngachebhunhobhalile.
JOH 12:38 Nahuli ghapata kupitalila malobhi ghaakapwaghiki mlota Isaya, “Bambo, bho, nde nane joakauhobhalile ubholu wito? Na bho, nde nane joayekuliwi makili ghaka Bambo?”
JOH 12:39 Ndemana bhombi ngachebhahobhalile, kwa ndandi Isaya akapwaghiki kabhete,
JOH 12:40 “Chapanga abhatendiki akangalola, ajitendiki kunonopa mitima jabhu, ngabhilola kwa mihu ghabhu, ngabhimanya kwa mitima jabhu, wala ngabhing'anambuka, nahuli mbata kubhalamiha, apwagha Bambo.”
JOH 12:41 Mlota Isaya akapwaghiki malobhi ghanihagha kwa ndandi akauweni ulumbalilu waka Yesu, na akapwaghiki malobhi ghaki.
JOH 12:42 Hata bhela, bhamaheli pachilanda ja ihongozi bha Bhayahude bhakunhobhali Yesu. Nambu kwa ndandi ja Mafalisayo, ngachebhakapwaghiki palanga, kwa kujoghopa kubhatopola mu nyumba ya kuhimangani Bhayahude.
JOH 12:43 Kwa ndandi bhombi bhakapaliki ulumbalilu wa bhandu kuliku ulumbalilu waka Chapanga.
JOH 12:44 Yesu akajamalila kwa sauti ngolongwa, akapwaghaje, “Mundu joanhobhalela nepani, ngacheanhobhale nepani pela, nambu bhelabhela anhobhalela jola joandumike.
JOH 12:45 Na jola joaningali nepani andingali jola joandumike.
JOH 12:46 Nepani nhikiki nahuli mya unang'anu wa pundema, nahuli kila mundu joanhobhale nepani ngayitama mulwihi.
JOH 12:47 Na ngati mundu anaaghajowini malobhi ghangu, nambu ngacheaghakamula, nepani ngachenuntemula. Maghambu ngachenhikiki kuutemula ndema, nambu kuukengalela ndema.
JOH 12:48 Mundu joangana nepani, jwangakughahobhalela malobhi ghangu, abhi na wa kuntemula. Lilobhi heli lenilipwaghiki nde lelantemulaje mu lichobha la kujomukela.
JOH 12:49 Maghambu nepani ngachenapwaghiki kwa ndandi ja lujiniku lwangu, nambu Atati joandumiki, nde joanaghalakili cha kupwagha na ntundu monipwaghilaje.
JOH 12:50 Nanatu manyi kubha amuli yaki ileta womi wa mileli. Bhela nepani nongela malobhi ghala pela ghaanaghalakili Atati.”
JOH 13:1 Bhela, mangani ja lichobha la Uwangalalu wa Pasaka. Yesu akamanyi kubha chikahi chaki cha kubhoka pundema na kujenda kwa Atati waki chakabhi chihikike, akabhi abhapaliki bhandu bhaki bhabhabhi pundema, akabhapaliki mbaka pakujomukela.
JOH 13:2 Henu Yesu na bhabhulwa bhaki bhakabhi bhatemi kula chilebhi cha chimihi. Shetani akajomwi kunjeghela Yuda, mwana waka Simoni Isikalioti, maholalelu gha kung'anambuka Yesu.
JOH 13:3 Yesu akamanyi kubha Atati abhekiki hindu yokapi mu makili ghaki, na kubha jombi akahumiki kwaka Chapanga, na akelabhuka kwaka Chapanga,
JOH 13:4 akabhokiki pachilebhi, na kubhoha ingobhu jaki ja kunja na kubheka punkeghi, akatoliki chitambala, na kulikonga muchibhunu.
JOH 13:5 Panihapa akajeghi machi mu likalahi, na kutumbu kubhagholola bhabhulwa bhaki magholu, na kughahungula kwa chitambala chela cheakakongiki muchihunu.
JOH 13:6 Paakahikiki kwaka Simoni Petulu, Petulu akapwaghike, “Bambo, bho, wehapa anaung'olula nepani magholu?”
JOH 13:7 Yesu akamuyangiki, “Chendenda sajenu ngauchimanye, nambu anauchimanya palonge.”
JOH 13:8 Petulu akumpwaghile, “Wehapa ngaung'ololi nepani magholu ng'o!” Yesu akamuyangike, “Ngati nganukughololi magholu, wehapa ngaukubhi wa mbulwa wangu.”
JOH 13:9 Simoni Petulu akamuyangike, “Bambo, ung'olulaje, nga magholu pela, nambu papamu na mabhoku ghangu na mmutu wangu bhelabhela!”
JOH 13:10 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Mundu joajomwi kujogha hyegha jokapi apalika kugholola magholu pela, maghambu ajomwi kunyamba hyegha jokapi. Mwehapa mnyambike, nambu nga mabhokape.”
JOH 13:11 Yesu akamanyi jola joanaang'anambukaje, nde ndandi akapwaghiki, “Mwehapa mnyambike, nambu nga mabhokape.”
JOH 13:12 Yesu paakajomwi kubhagholola magholu bhabhulwa bhaki, akawatiki kabhete ingobhu jaki ja kunja na kukelabhuka na kutama kabhete, na kubhalalukila, “Bho, mmanyi ghanuntendile?”
JOH 13:13 “Mwehapa mnoha Mbola na Bambo, nanamu mpwagha wichu, maghambu nde momelile.
JOH 13:14 Henu anakubhi nepani, nemi Bambo winu na Mbola winu, nungolwili mwehapa magholu, impalika na mwehapa kugholulana magholu mabheti kwa mabheti.
JOH 13:15 Kwa ndandi nepani numpeki ulenganesu, nahuli na mwehapa mtendaje ngati nepani monuntendile.
JOH 13:16 Numpwaghi Chakaka, mtumika nga nkolongwa kumpeta bambo waki, wala mtumi nga nkolongwa kumpeta jola joantumike.
JOH 13:17 Anamughamanyi mambu ghanihagha, mbanga kwinu mwehapa ngati anamughatendike.
JOH 13:18 “Ngachembwagha kwinu mwehapa mabhokapi. Nepani nabhamanyi bhala bhanabhahawile. Nambu nahuli ghapitalyaje Malembu Mahuhu ghaghapwagha, ‘Jola joakuliki chilebhi changu, atehi kuning'anambuka.’
JOH 13:19 Nepani numpwaghili mambu ghanihagha sajenu mangani ngacheghapitalile, nahuli paghipitalyaje, mpata kuhobhalela kubha ‘Nepani nde Jombi.’
JOH 13:20 Numpwaghi Chakaka, mundu jokapi joanjopalela mundu jola jonumtumiki, anyopalela nepane. Na mundu jokapi joanyopalela nepane, anjopalela jombi joandumiki nepane.”
JOH 13:21 Yesu paakajomwili kupwagha ghanihagha, akang'ahakiki mu roho jaki, akalandili hotuhotu, “Chakaka numpwaghila, jumu winu anaang'anambukaje.”
JOH 13:22 Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakalingalanili bheni kwa bheni, koni ngachebhamanyi kubha nde nane joandongalela.
JOH 13:23 Jumu wa bhabhulwa bhaki, ambaju Yesu akabhi ampala nakanopi, akabhi ajeghamakili pachihimba chaka Yesu.
JOH 13:24 Bhela Simoni Petulu akumpongi mbulwa jola chiwoku chaki, na kumpwaghila, “Undalukyaje, bho, ampwagha nane?”
JOH 13:25 Mbulwa hoju koni akabya ajeghamaki pachihimba chaka Yesu, akundalukile, “Bambo, bho, nde nane?”
JOH 13:26 Yesu akayangike, “Nde mundu jola jonampekyaje chipandi cha libumunda. Akatobhalili libumunda heli mumbale, na kumpekeha Yuda, mwana waka Simoni Isikalioti.”
JOH 13:27 Yuda paakajomwi kujopa chipandi cha libumunda heli, Shetani akunjingile. Bhela Yesu akumpwaghile, “Cheupala kuchihenga, uchihenga manyata!”
JOH 13:28 Wala nga mundu hata jumu wa bhala bhabhakabhi bhatemi pachilebhi joakamanyi ndandi kiki Yesu akumpwaghi bhenibhela.
JOH 13:29 Kwa kubha Yuda akabhi mbeka mbija, bhangi bhakaholali kubha Yesu akabhi ampwaghi akahemalaje hindu yeipalika kwa ndandi ja Uwangalalu wa Pasaka, au abhapekya bhahocho chokapi.
JOH 13:30 Yuda paakajomwi kujopa chipandi cha libumunda chela, palapala akapitiki kunja. Chikahi hechi kukabhi ikilu.
JOH 13:31 Bhela Yuda paakajomwi kupita kunja, Yesu akapwaghike, “Sajenu Mwana waka Mundu alumbalike, najombi Chapanga alumbaliki mkati jaki.
JOH 13:32 Ngati Chapanga alumbaliki mkati jaka Mwana, Chapanga anaandumbalyaje Mwana mkati jaki mweni bhelabhela, najombi ngaakabhakile kundumbalila henu kateki.
JOH 13:33 Bhana bhango, chakona chikahi kichokopi mili na mwehapa. Anamunondaje nepani, na ngati monakabhapwaghile ihongozi bha Bhayahude kubha, ‘Nepani konyenda mwehapa ngamuwezi kuhika, bhelabhela sajenu numpwaghi mwehapa.’
JOH 13:34 Amuli jahenu numpekeha: Mpalanaje. Mpalanaje ngati nepani monumpali mwehapa.
JOH 13:35 Ngati anampalana mabheti kwa mabheti, bhandu bhokapi anabhamanyaje kubha mwehapa nde bhabhulwa bhangu.”
JOH 13:36 Simoni Petulu akundalukile, “Bambo, bho, ujenda kwako?” Yesu akamuyangike, “Konyenda ngauwezi kunyengale sajenu, nambu anaunyengalyaje palongi.”
JOH 13:37 Petulu akundalukili kabhete, “Bambo, bho, maghambu kiki nepani nganiweza kukujengale sajenu? Nepani mi tayali kuubhoha womi wangu kwa ndandi jaku!”
JOH 13:38 Yesu akayangike, “Bho, chakaka le kubha wehapa anaubhoha womi waku kwa ndandi jangu? Chakaka nukupwaghila, mangani ja likongobhi ngachelibhekiki anaunganaje mala patatu.”
JOH 14:1 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ngamwikubha na choghohi mumitima jinu, munhobhale Chapanga, mnihobhalya na nepani bhelabhela.
JOH 14:2 Munyumba ja Atati wangu kubhi na matamu ghamaheli, ikabhi ngabhela, nakabya numpwaghile. Ndandi nyenda kunhandalila matamu.
JOH 14:3 Ngati anambiti na kunhandalila matamu, ananhika kabhete, na kuntola mwehapa kwangu, nahuli pandu pamili nepani, na mwehapa mbyaje.
JOH 14:4 Konyenda mukumanye, na indela mujimanye.”
JOH 14:5 Tomaso akundalukile, “Bambo, tepani ngachetumanyi koujenda, bho, anatuweza bhole kujimanya indela?”
JOH 14:6 Yesu akayangike, “Nepani nde indela, chakaka na womi. Mundu ngacheaweza kuhika kwa Atati, nambu kwa kupetela kwangu nepani.
JOH 14:7 Ngati mkabhili mmanyi nepani, mkabya mummanyi na Atati wangu. Kutumbula sajenu mummanye, na kabhete mumbwene.”
JOH 14:8 Filipo akumpwaghile, “Bambo, utulangihaje Atati, chenihechi nde chetukipala.”
JOH 14:9 Yesu akayangike, “Filipo, ndemi na mwehapa kwa machobha ghamaheli, bho, nanau ngacheunimanye? Mundu jokapi joamweni nepani, ambweni Atati. Bho, henu wehapa uweza bhole kupwagha, ‘Utulangihaje Atati?’
JOH 14:10 Bho, ngacheuhobhalela kubha nepani mi mkati ja Atati, na Atati abhi mkati jangu nepane? Malobhi ghanumpwaghila ngachembwagha kwa ndandi jangu namwete, nambu Atati joatama mkati jangu, aghatenda mahengu ghake.
JOH 14:11 Mnihobhalyaje pambwagha kubha nepani mi mkati ja Atati, na Atati abhi mkati jangu nepani! Nangabhela muhobhalyaje kwa ndandi ja mahengu ghala ghanaghatenda.
JOH 14:12 Numpwaghila Chakaka, jokapi joanhobhalela nepani, mahengu ghanaghahenga nepani, najombi anaaghahengaje. Ena, na mahengu makolongwa nakanopi kupeta ghanihagha anahengaje, kwa ndandi nepani nyenda kwa Atati.
JOH 14:13 Chokapi chemwilobhaje kwa lihina langu, anandendaje, nahuli Atati alumbalikaje mkati jaka Mwana.
JOH 14:14 Anandobhiki chindu chokapi kupetela lihina langu, anandendaje.
JOH 14:15 “Ngati anambala nepani, anankamulaje amuli yangu.
JOH 14:16 Nanatu ananundobhaje Atati, najombi anaampekyaje Mjangatila najongi, nahuli atamaje na mwehapa mileli.
JOH 14:17 Jombi nde Roho wa chakaka. Ambaju bhandu bha pundema ngabhawezi kunjopalela, kwa ndandi ngachebhumbona, wala ngachebhummanye. Nambu mwehapa anamummanyaje, kwa ndandi atama kwinu, najombi anaakubhaje mkati jinu.
JOH 14:18 “Nganundeki mwehapa ngati bhakebha, ananhika kabheti kwinu.
JOH 14:19 Chakona chikahi kichokopi, bhandu bha pundema ngabhimoni kabhete, nambu mwehapa anammonaje. Kwa ndandi nepani mi mwomi, na mwehapa anamkubha bhomi.
JOH 14:20 Lichobha lela palihikaje, mwehapa anammanyaje kubha nepani mi mkati ja Atati wangu, na mwehapa mkati jangu, na nepani mkati jinu.
JOH 14:21 “Mundu jola joabhi na amuli yangu na kuikamula, jonihoju nde joambala nepani. Najombi joambala nepani, anaapalakikaje na Atati wangu, na nepani ananumpalaje, na kulilangiha kwaki.”
JOH 14:22 Panihapa Yuda, nga jola Yuda Isikalioti, akumpwaghile, “Bambo, bho, kubhi bhole wehapa upala kulilangiha kwitu, na wala nga kwa bhandu bha pundema?”
JOH 14:23 Yesu akayangike, “Mundu jokapi joambala nepani, anaakamulaje malobhi ghangu, na Atati wangu anaampalaje, nepani na Atati wangu anatuhikaje kwaki, na kuhenga matamu kwaki.
JOH 14:24 Mundu jokapi jwangakumbala nepani, ngacheaghakamula malobhi ghangu. Na malobhi ghamughajowana nga ghangu, nambu ghahumiki kwa Atati joandumike.”
JOH 14:25 “Mambu ghanihagha nde ghanakumpwaghile, chikahi panakabhi ndama papamu na mwehapa.
JOH 14:26 Mjangatila hoju, nde Roho Mhuhu, ambaju Atati anaantumaje kupetela lihina langu, anaambolaje mambu ghokapi, na kunkombosha mambu ghokapi ghanumpwaghile.”
JOH 14:27 “Lukwale nundekela, lukwale lwangu numpekeha. Monumpeke nepani, nga ngati bhandu bha pundema mobhumpekeha. Ngamwing'ahika mumitima jinu, wala ngamwijoghopa.
JOH 14:28 Mkajowini kubha nepani nakumpwaghile, ‘Nyenda, na ananhika kabheti kwinu.’ Ngati mkabhi mbala, mkabya muhekalile, kwa ndandi nyenda kwa Atati, maghambu Atati nde nkolongwa kupeta nepani.
JOH 14:29 Numpwaghi mambu ghanihagha sajenu mangani ngacheghapitalile, nahuli paghipitalyaje mpata kuhobhalela.
JOH 14:30 Nepani nganongeli na mwehapa malobhi ghamaheli kabhete, maghambu Shetani, nkolongwa wa ndema ghoni ahika, nambu jonihoju ngacheabhi na chindu kwangu,
JOH 14:31 nambu bhandu bha pundema bhapata kumanya kubha numpala Atati. Ngati bhela Atati moanaghalakile, bhenibhela nde monhengela.” Haya njemanyaje, na tujendaje.
JOH 15:1 “Nepani nde mzabibu wa chakaka, na Atati wangu nde ndeme.
JOH 15:2 Kila limbandi mkati jangu langakupambika mapambiku, Atati wangu aliheketa. Na kila limbandi lelipambika mapambiku, Atati wangu alikulaghalila, nahuli lipambikaje mapambiku nakanopi.
JOH 15:3 Sajenu mwehapa njomwi kubha mwanyahi kwa ndandi ja malobhi ghala ghanakumpwaghile.
JOH 15:4 Mtamaje mkati jangu, na nepani mkati jinu. Ngati bhela limbandi molilepalela kupambika mapambiku kanjika jaki, nangakutama mkati ja mzabibu, bhelabhela na mwehapa ngamuwezi kupambika mapambiku, nangakutama mkati jangu.”
JOH 15:5 “Nepani nde mzabibu, na mwehapa nde mambandi. Joatama mkati jangu, na nepani mkati jaki, jonihoju apambika mapambiku nakanopi. Maghambu panga kubha nepani, mwehapa ngamuwezi kutenda chindu chokapi.
JOH 15:6 Mundu jokapi jwangakutama mkati jangu, anaalekalikaje kunja ngati limbandi na kunyala. Na bhandu anabhabhonganaje, na kughalekela pamoto, na kutinyika.
JOH 15:7 Ngati mwehapa anantami mkati jangu, na malobhi ghangu anaghatemi mkati jinu, ndobhaje chokapi chemchipala nanamu anampataje.
JOH 15:8 Bhela alumbalikaje Atati wangu, kwa bhela mompambaki mapambiku nakanopi, na kwa indela jeniheji anambya bhabhulwa bhangu.
JOH 15:9 Ngati Atati moambali nepani, nanatu monumpali mwehapa. Njendalyaje kutama mu upalu wangu.
JOH 15:10 Ngati anamkamwili amuli yangu, anamtamaje mu upalu wangu, ngati bhela nepani monikamulile amuli ya Atati wangu, na kutama mu upalu waki.
JOH 15:11 “Numpwaghili mambu ghanihagha, nahuli chiheku changu chibya mkati jinu, na chiheku chinu chikubhaje kamili.
JOH 15:12 Amuli jangu nde ajeji: Mpalanaye ngati nepani monumpali mwehapa.
JOH 15:13 Njeta mundu joabhi na upalu ukolongwa kupeta ghongone, mundu kuubhoha womi waki kwa ndandi ja bhakochi bhaki.
JOH 15:14 Mwehapa mbi bhakochi bhangu, ngati anantendiki ghanundaghalakile.
JOH 15:15 Nganundohi bhatumika kabhete, kwa ndandi mtumika ngacheamanya cheatenda bambo waki. Nambu mwehapa nundohiki bhakochi bhangu, maghambu numpwaghi mambu ghokapi ghanyowini kwa Atati wangu.
JOH 15:16 Nga mwehapa mwemunhawili nepani, nambu nepani nde nenunhawili mwehapa, nanatu numbekiki njenda mkapambikaje mapambiku, na mapambiku ghinu ghapataje kutamakila, nahuli lokapi lemundobha Atati kupetela lihina langu, ampekyaje.
JOH 15:17 Haghagha nundaghalaki mwehapa, nahuli mpalanaje.”
JOH 15:18 “Ngati bhandu bha pundema anabhunhakali mwehapa, mmanyi kubha bhakanhakali nepani mangane ja kunhakali mwehapa.
JOH 15:19 Ngati mkabhi bhandu bha pundema, ndema ukabya umpaliki bhabhabhi bhaki. Nambu kwa kubha mwehapa nga mabhandu bha pundema, nambu nepani nakunhawili kuhuma pundema, kwa ndandi jeniheji bhandu bha pundema bhunhakalila.
JOH 15:20 Nkombukaje malobhi ghangu ghanakumpwaghile, ‘Mtumika nga nkolongwa kupeta bambo waki. Ngati bhakang'ahiki nepani, anabhung'aha na mwehapa bhelabhela, na ngati bhakakamwi malobhi ghangu, anabhakamulaje na malobhi ghinu bhelabhela.’
JOH 15:21 Nambu ghanihagha ghokapi anabhuntendilaje mwehapa kwa ndandi ja lihina langu, maghambu ngachebhummanyi jombi joandumike.
JOH 15:22 Ngati nganakahikiki na kupwagha nabhu, ngabhakabhi na mahoku, nambu sajenu ngachebhabhili na cha kukopunganela kwa mahoku ghabhu.
JOH 15:23 Jola joanhakali nepani, anhakalila na Atati wangu bhelabhela.
JOH 15:24 Ngati nganakatendiki kwabhu mahengu ghangakughatenda mundu jongi jokapi, ngabhakabhi na mahoku. Nambu sajenu bhaweni ngangachu yenu na bhakali kutuhakalila nepani papamu na Atati wangu.
JOH 15:25 Nambu bhatendiki bhenibhela nahuli malobhi ghala ghaghalembakiki mu Shelia jabhu ghapitalyaje, ghaghapwagha, ‘Bhakanhakali waka.’ ”
JOH 15:26 “Nambu paanahikaje Mjangatila hoju, joananuntumaje kwinu kuhuma kwa Atati, yani, Roho Mhuhu wa chakaka joahuma kwa Atati, najombi anaanandilaje nepane.
JOH 15:27 Mwehapa nanamu mnandila, kwa ndandi mkabhi papamu na nepani kutumbu pakutumbula.”
JOH 16:1 “Numpwaghi mambu ghanihagha ghokapi, nahuli ngamwauleka uhobhalelu winu.
JOH 16:2 Bhandu anabhuntopula mwenga mu nyumba ya kuhimangani Bhayahude, na chikahi chihika kila mundu joanaankomaje akahambukya kubha antende Chapanga ibada.
JOH 16:3 Anabhuntendila mambu ghanihagha, kwa ndandi ngachebhummanyi Atati, wala nepani.
JOH 16:4 Nambu numpwaghili mambu ghanihagha, nahuli chikahi chela pachihikaje, mpata kukomboka kubha nyomwi kumpwaghila. “Ngachenumpwaghili mambu ghanihagha kutumbu pakutumbula, maghambu nakabhi papamu na mwehapa.”
JOH 16:5 Nambu sajenu nyenda kwaka jombi joandumike, na wala ngajoanalukila, “Bho, ujenda kwako?”
JOH 16:6 Nambu kwa ndandi numpwaghi mambu ghanihagha, mitima jinu jitwelili huzuni.
JOH 16:7 Nambu nepani numpwaghi chakaka, impalika mwehapa nepani mokaje, maghambu nangakubhoka nepani, Mjangatila hoju ngaahiki kwinu. Nambu nepani anambiti, ananuntuma kwinu.
JOH 16:8 Jombi paanahikaje, jonihoju anaabhalangiha bhandu bha pundema kubha maholalelu ghabhu nga manyahi panani ja mahoku, panani ja kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga, na panani ja utemulu waka Chapanga.
JOH 16:9 Kwa malobhi gha mahoku, maghambu ngachebhanhobhali nepani.
JOH 16:10 Kwa malobhi gha kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga, maghambu nyenda kwa Atati, na mwehapa ngamwimoni kabhete.
JOH 16:11 Kwa malobhi gha utemulu waka Chapanga, maghambu Shetani, nkolongwa wa ndema ghoni ajomwi kutemuliwa.
JOH 16:12 “Mi naghu mambu ghamaheli gha kumpwaghila, nambu kwa sajenu ngamuwezi kughakamula.
JOH 16:13 Nambu jombi paanahikaje, Roho Mhuhu wa chakaka, anaandonguha mwehapa mu chakaka jokapi. Maghambu ngayipwaghi kwa ndandi jaki mweni, nambu ghokapi ghayijowanaje kuhuma kwaka Chapanga anaaghapwaghaje, na mambu ghaghahika anaampwaghila malobhi ghaki.
JOH 16:14 Jombi anaanumbalyaje nepani, kwa ndandi anaatola ghaghabhi ghangu, na kumpwaghi mwehapa.
JOH 16:15 Ghokapi ghaabhi naghu Atati nde ghangu, nde ndandi nakapwaghiki Roho Mhuhu anaatola ghaghabhi ghangu, na kumpwaghi mwehapa.”
JOH 16:16 “Chihighali chikahi kichokopi, mwehapa ngamwimone, na kabhete, chihighali chikahi kichokopi, mwehapa anammonaje, maghambu nyenda kwa Atati.”
JOH 16:17 Panihapa bhakumu bha bhabhulwa bhaki bhakalaluhini, “Bho, lilobhi bhole leapwagha heli, paatupwaghi, ‘Chihighali chikahi kichokopi, mwehapa ngamwimone, na kabhete, chihighali chikahi kichokopi, mwehapa anammonaje?’ Na paapwagha, ‘Maghambu nyenda kwa Atati?’ ”
JOH 16:18 Bhela bhakapwaghike, “Bho, lilobhi bhole leniheli leapwagha, ‘Chihighali chikahi kichokopi?’ Ngachetumanyi alongale panani ja kike!”
JOH 16:19 Yesu akamanyi kubha bhapala kundalukila, bhela akabhapwaghile, “Bho, mlaluhana panani ja ghala ghanapwaghiki, ‘Chihighali chikahi kichokopi, mwehapa ngamwimone, na kabhete, chihighali chikahi kichokopi, mwehapa anammonaje?’
JOH 16:20 Chakaka numpwaghila, mwehapa anamlelaje na kuombuleza, nambu bhandu bha pundema anabhahekalyaje. Na mwehapa anajumbina mitima jinu, nambu mabhinilu ghinu anaghang'anambuka na kubha chiheku.
JOH 16:21 Mbomba paalibhopola, lumbina lipyanda kwa ndandi chikahi chaki chihikike. Nambu anaajomwi kulibhopo mwana, ngacheakomboka kabhete mabhinilu ghala, kwa ndandi ja chiheku cha kubhelakeka mwana pundema.
JOH 16:22 Sajenu mwehapa mbi na mabhinilu, nambu nepani ananumbona kabhete, na mitima jinu anajihekalyaje, na chiheku chinu njeta mundu wa kumbokeha.
JOH 16:23 “Mu lichobha lela ngamwilalukile lilobhi lokapi. Numpwaghi Chakaka, ngati anamundobhiki Atati chindu chokapi kwa lihina langu, jombi anaampekyaje.
JOH 16:24 Mbaka sajenu ngachendobhiki chindu chokapi kwa lihina langu. Ndobhaje, na mwehapa anampataje, nahuli chiheku chinu chikamilikaje.
JOH 16:25 “Numpwaghi mambu ghanihagha kwa ulenganesu. Nambu chikahi chihika ambapu nganipwaghi na mwehapa kabhete kwa ulenganesu, nambu ananumpwaghilaje hotuhotu malobhi gha Atati.
JOH 16:26 Mu lichobha lela mwilobhaje kwa lihina langu, na wala ngachenumpwaghila kubha nepani ananundobhila kwa Atati,
JOH 16:27 kwa ndandi Atati mwene ampala mwehapa. Maghambu mwehapa mumbaliki nepani, na kuhobhalela kubha nepani nakahumiki kwaka Chapanga.”
JOH 16:28 Nepani nakahumiki kwa Atati, nanatu nhikiki pani pundema, na kabhete nuleka ndema, na kujenda kwa Atati.
JOH 16:29 Bhela bhabhulwa bhaki bhakapwaghike, “Lingalyaje, sajenu upwagha hotuhotu, wala ngacheupwagha kwa malenganesu ghokapi ghala.
JOH 16:30 Sajenu tumanyi kubha wehapa umanyi mambu ghokapi, na wala ngachekubhi na ndandi jaka mundu kukulalukila, bhela tuhobhalela kubha ukahumiki kwaka Chapanga.”
JOH 16:31 Yesu akabhayangike, “Bho, sajenu le muhobhalela?
JOH 16:32 Lingalyaje, chikahi chihika, ena, chijomwi kuhika, pamwipechanganaje kila mundu kwaki, na kuneka nepani kanjika jangu. Nambu nepani ngachemi kanjika jangu, kwa ndandi Atati abhi papamu na nepani.
JOH 16:33 Numpwaghili mambu ghanihagha nahuli mpata kubha na lukwale mkati jangu. Pundema anampata ulale, nambu mulipekya mtima, kwa ndandi nepani niuweziki ndema!”
JOH 17:1 Yesu paakajomwi kulongela malobhi ghanihagha, akalingali kunani kumahunde, na kupwagha, “Atati, lisaa lihikike. Undumbalyaje Mwana waku, nahuli najombi Mwana waku akulumbalyaje wehapa.
JOH 17:2 Ngati moumpeki lujiniku panani ja bhandu bhokapi, nahuli kwa bhokapi bhaumpekihe abhapekya womi wa mileli.
JOH 17:3 Na womi wa mileli nde ghongone, bhandu bhakumanya wehapa wa Chapanga wa kanjika wa chakaka, na Yesu Kristo joukantumike.
JOH 17:4 Nepani nukulumbalili pundema, nakabya nyomwile lihengu lela leukambekihe nilihengaje.
JOH 17:5 Sajenu Atati! Unumbalyaje nepani papamu na wehapa, kwa ulumbalilu ghola ghonakabhi naghu papamu na wehapa mangane ja kubhombakeka kwa ndema.”
JOH 17:6 “Nukutendiki umanyikanaje kwa bhandu bhala bhawambekihe pundema. Bhakabhi bhaku, ukambekihi nepani, na Lilobhi laku bhalijowine.
JOH 17:7 Sajenu bhamanyi kubha yokapi yewambekihe ihumiki kwaku.
JOH 17:8 Magambu malobhi ghala ghawambekihe nabhapekihi bhombi, na bhombi bhakaghajopalile. Na bhakamanyi chakaka kubha nakahumiki kwaku, na bhakahobhalili kubha wehapa nde wewandumike.”
JOH 17:9 Nepani nabhalobhela bhombi. Nepani ngachenulobhela ndema, nambu bhala bhaumbekihe, maghambu bhanihabha nde bhaku.
JOH 17:10 Bhokapi bhabhabhi bhangu nde bhaku, na bhabhabhi bhaku nde bhangu, nanatu numbaliwi mkati jabhu.
JOH 17:11 Nepani sajenu ngangubhi kabheti pundema, nambu bhombi bhakali bhabhi pundema, nanatu nhika kwaku. Atati Mhuhu, kwa makili gha lihina laku lewambekihe ubhalenda bhombi, nahuli bhabya chindu chimu ngati tepani motubhelile.
JOH 17:12 Panakabhi papamu nabhu pundema, nakabhalendiki kwa makili gha lihina laku lewambekihe, wala njeta jumu wabhu joakahobhike, nambu jola mwana wa kuhobha, nahuli Malembu Mahuhu ghatimilaje.
JOH 17:13 Na sajenu nhika kwaku, na malobhi ghangani naghalongela pundema, nahuli bhabya na chiheku changu chakabya chikamilike mkati jabhu.
JOH 17:14 Nepani nabhapeki lilobhi laku, na bhandu bha pundema bhatenda kubhahakalila, maghambu bhombi nga bha pundema ghoni, ngati nepani momeli nga wa pundema ghoni.
JOH 17:15 Nepani ngachenobha kubha ubhabhoha pundema, nambu ubhalenda na Mhakau jola.
JOH 17:16 Bhombi nga bha pundema ghoni, ngati nepani momeli nga wa pundema ghoni.
JOH 17:17 Ubhagholulaje kwa chakaka jela, lilobhi laku nde chakaka.
JOH 17:18 Ngati bhela mowandumi nepani pundema, nanatu bhelabhela nakabhatumiki bhombi pundema.
JOH 17:19 Na kwa ndandi jabhu niligholola namwete, nahuli nabhombi bhagholulikaje mu chakaka jela.
JOH 17:20 Wala nga bhanihabha pela bhanabhalobhela, nambu na bhala bhabhinhobhalyaje kwa ndandi ja lilobhi labhu.
JOH 17:21 Nobha nahuli bhokapi bhabya chindu chimu, ngati wehapa, Atati, moubheli mkati jangu, nanatu mkati jaku, bhanganya habha nabhombi bhabya mkati jitu. Nahuli bhandu bha pundema bhapata kuhobhalela kubha wehapa nde wewandumike.
JOH 17:22 Na ulumbalilu ghola ghowambeki nepani nabhapeki bhombi, nahuli bhabya chindu chimu ngati tepani motubheli chindu chimu.
JOH 17:23 Nepani mkati jabhu, na wehapa mkati jangu. Nahuli bhabya bhakamiliki mu chindu chimu. Nahuli bhandu bha pundema bhamanya kubha wehapa nde wewandumike, ubhapala bhombi ngati mowambali nepani.
JOH 17:24 “Atati, bhanihabha bhaumbekihe mbala bhabya papamu na nepani pokapi pamile, bhapata kuulinga ulumbalilu wangu ghoumbekihe. Maghambu ukambaliki mangani ja kutumbula kubhombakeka ndema.
JOH 17:25 Atati Wambone! Bhandu bha pundema ngachebhukumanye, nambu nepani nakakumanyi, nabhombi bhamanyiki kubha wehapa nde wewandumike.
JOH 17:26 Nanatu nilitendiki lihina laku limanyikanaje kwabhu, kabheti ananyendalyaje kulitenda limanyikanaje, nahuli upalu ghola ghowambaliki nepani ubya mkati jabhu, na nepani mya mkati jabhu.”
JOH 18:1 Yesu paakajomwi kundobha Chapanga, akabhokiki na bhabhulwa bhaki na kujenda kwihi ja kikoka Keduloni, pakukabhi na chijongu, akajingi jombi papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki.
JOH 18:2 Bhela Yuda, jola joapalikaje kung'anambuka Yesu, akapamanyi pandu pala. Maghambu Yesu akabhi ajenda konihoku pamaheli papamu na bhabhulwa bhaki.
JOH 18:3 Bhela Yuda, akabya atoliki lipogha la manjolinjoli bha Kiloma na bhalonda bha Nyumba jaka Chapanga bhabhakahumiki kwa ihongozi bha bhapenganyambiku na Mafalisayo, bhakapiti konihoku bhakabya bhatotwi taa, na myengi, na mikoha na ndonga.
JOH 18:4 Yesu akabya amanyi ghala ghaghumpataje, akapiti palongi jabhu na kubhalalukila, “Bho, mundonda nane?”
JOH 18:5 Bhombi bhakamuyangike, “Yesu wa ku Nazaleti.” Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Nde nepani.” Najombi Yuda, jola joakang'anambwiki Yesu, akabhi ajemiki papamu nabhu.
JOH 18:6 Yesu paakabhapwaghi, “Nde nepani,” bhakakelawiki chihanganyuma, na kuhabhuka pahi.
JOH 18:7 Bhela Yesu akabhalaluki kabhete, “Bho, mundonda nane?” Bhakamuyangike, “Yesu wa ku Nazaleti.”
JOH 18:8 Yesu akabhayangike, “Nyomwi kumpwaghila kubha nde nepani. Bhela ngati mnonda nepani, mwabhaleka bhanganya abhabha bhajendaje.”
JOH 18:9 Nahuli litimiaje lilobhi lela leakapwaghiki, “Atati, bhala bhawambekihe ngachenunhoiki hata jumu wabhu.”
JOH 18:10 Bhela Simoni Petulu akabhi na lipanga, akalihungwili na kunheketa likutu la kumalelelu laka mtumika waka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa. Mtumika hoju lihina laki alowakika Maliko.
JOH 18:11 Bhela Yesu akumpwaghi Petulu, “Ukelabhuwa lipanga laku mu ala jaki. Bho, chikombi cha mang'ahiku cheambeki Atati le nganinywelela?”
JOH 18:12 Bhela manjolinjoli bha Kiloma bhala na nkolongwa wabhu wa manjolinjoli papamu na ihongozi bha Bhayahude bhakunkamwili Yesu, na kunkonga.
JOH 18:13 Kutumbula bhakumpeliki kwaka Anasi. Nkohanu waka Kayafa, joakabhi Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa chaka chela.
JOH 18:14 Kayafa nde jola joakabhapeki bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude lilobhi lela la kubha impalika mundu jumu kupotela kwa ndandi ja bhandu bhokapi.
JOH 18:15 Simoni Petulu papamu na mbulwa njaki bhakabhi bhunjengalela Yesu. Mbulwa jongi hoju akabhi amanyikana kwaka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa, akajingili papamu na Yesu mu liwangala laka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa.
JOH 18:16 Nambu Petulu akajemiki kunja ja ndyangu. Bhela mbulwa jongi joakamanyakini kwaka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa jola, akapitiki kunja, na kulongela na mwali joalendika pundyangu jola, na kundeta Petulu mkati.
JOH 18:17 Bhela mwali joakabhi alenda ndyangu jola akundaluki Petulu, “Bho, wehapa le nga jumu wa bhabhulwa bhaka mundu ajojo?” Petulu akayangike, “Nga nepane.”
JOH 18:18 Bhatumika bhala papamu na manjolinjoli bhakabhi bhajemiki, bhakanyatukya moto wa makalakala, maghambu kukabhi na imbepu. Petulu najombi akabhi ajemi papamu nabhu, akanyatukya moto.
JOH 18:19 Bhela Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa akundaluki Yesu panani ja bhabhulwa bhaki, na panani ja mabholu ghaki.
JOH 18:20 Yesu akayangike, “Nepani nongili hotuhotu pundema wokapi. Machobha ghokapi molika mu nyumba ya kuhimanganila Bhayahude, na paliwangala la Nyumba jaka Chapanga, pabhalibhongana Bhayahude bhokapi. Na ngachenalongi lilobhi lokapi lela kwa kulihiya.
JOH 18:21 Bho, maghambu ki unalukila nepani? Ubhalalukya bhala bhabhajowini ghala ghanabhapwaghile. Kwa ndandi bhombi bhamanyi ghanakapwaghike.”
JOH 18:22 Bhela paakapwaghiki ghanihagha, jumu wa manjolinjoli joakabhi ajemiki pambipi naku, akundapwi Yesu lighanja la kumihu, na kupwagha, “Bho, bhenibhela nde moumuyangi Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa?”
JOH 18:23 Yesu akamuyangike, “Anangati nongili lijambu lihakau, ulandilaje uhakau ghonongile palongi ja bhandu. Nambu anangati nongili chakaka, bho, maghambu kiki unapula?”
JOH 18:24 Bhela Anasi akumpeliki Yesu kwaka Kayafa Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa, koni akabya akongakiki.
JOH 18:25 Chikahi hechi Simoni Petulu akabhi akali ajemiki akanyatukya moto. Bhakumu bha bhabhakabhi panipala bhakundaluki Petulu, “Bho, wehapa le nga wa jumu wa bhabhulwa bhake?” Petulu akakaniki, akapwaghaje, “Nga nepani.”
JOH 18:26 Jumu wa bhatumika bhaka Mpenganyambiku Nkolongwa, ndongu waka mundu jola Petulu joakunchekwi likutu, akundalukile, “Bho, nepani le ngachenukuweni kuchijongu kola ukabya papamu na Yesu?”
JOH 18:27 Bhela Petulu akakaniki kabhete, na palapala likongobhi lakabhekike.
JOH 18:28 Bhela bhakuntoliki Yesu kuhuma kwaka Kayafa na kumpeleka panyumba jaka mtawala wa Kiloma. Kukabhi lukela, nambu bheni ngachebhajingili mkati ja nyumba jaka Gavana, ngabhihika kubha bhahakau, nahuli bhapata kula Pasaka.
JOH 18:29 Bhela Pilato akapitiki kunja ja nyumba jaki, na kubhalalukila, “Bho, ndetiki matakilu bhole panani jaka mundu ajojo?”
JOH 18:30 Bhakamuyangike, “Ngati kukabhi mundu ajojo ngacheahengiki mahakau, ngatukundetiki kwaku.”
JOH 18:31 Pilato akabhapwaghile, “Haya muntola mwehapa mukuntemulaje kwa kulengana na shelia hinu.” Bhayahude bhakumpwaghile, “Tepani ngachetubhi na lujiniku lwa kuntemula mundu kupotela.”
JOH 18:32 Bhakalongi bhenibhela nahuli malobhi ghaakalongi Yesu, panani ja ntundu wa nyiwa jeayikuwaje ghapata kutimia.
JOH 18:33 Bhela Pilato akajingi kabhete munyumba jaki, akundohiki Yesu, na kundalukila, “Bho, wehapa le nde Unkolongwa wa Bhayahude?”
JOH 18:34 Yesu akamuyangike, “Bho, unalukila lilalukilu lendenu kubhokana na maholalelu ghaku au bhakakupwaghi bhandu bhangi malobhi panani jangu?”
JOH 18:35 Pilato akamuyangike, “Bho, nepani le nu Myahude?” Bhandu bhaku na ihongozi bha bhapenganyambiku nde bhabhukuletiki kwangu. Bho, uhengiki kike?
JOH 18:36 Yesu akamuyangike, “Ukolongwa wangu nga wa ndema ghoni. Ngati ukolongwa wangu ukabhi wa ndema ghoni, bhatumika bhangu bhakabya bhangomanile, nahuli nganikamulika na bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude. Nambu ukolongwa wangu nga wa pani pundema!”
JOH 18:37 Bhela Pilato akumpwaghile, “Bho, henu wehapa le unkolongwa?” Yesu akamuyangike, “Wehapa upwaghike kubha nepani nunkolongwa. Nepani melakiki kwa ndandi ja ghangane, na kwa ndandi ja ghangane nakahiki pundema, nahuli nandila chakaka. Mundu jokapi joabhi wa chakaka anyowanela sauti jango.”
JOH 18:38 Pilato akalalukile, “Bho, chakaka nde kike?” Pilato paakalongi malobhi ghanihagha, akapitiki kabheti kunja na kubhapwaghila bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude bhabhakuntakili Yesu, “Nepani ngachemona lihoku lokapi lela kwaka mundu ajojo.
JOH 18:39 Nambu mabhanganya mbi na ntetu winu kubha chikahi cha Pasaka numbopulya mkongeka jumu jomumpala. Bho, mpala le numbopulya Nkolongwa wa Bhayahude ajojo?”
JOH 18:40 Bhombi bhakajamali kabhete, bhakapwaghaje, “Nga mundu hoju, nambu utubhopulya Balaba!” Bhela Balaba akabhi mnyaghula wa hindu ya bhandu.
JOH 19:1 Bhela Pilato akalaghalakili bhuntola Yesu, na kundapu iboku.
JOH 19:2 Nabhombi manjolinjoli bhakalokiki litaji la miha, na kunhwatika Yesu kumutu, na bhakunhwatiki ingobhu ja zambalau.
JOH 19:3 Bhakabhi bhunjendela na kumpwaghila, “Monile! Nkolongwa wa Bhayahude!” Na bhakundapwi maghanja kumihu.
JOH 19:4 Bhela Pilato akapitiki kabheti kunja, na kubhapwaghila, “Ndingalyaje! Nundeta Yesu kwinu, mpata kumanya kubha nepani ngachemweni lihakau lokapi lela la kuntemula kwaki.”
JOH 19:5 Panihapa Yesu akapitiki kunja, akabya awatiki litaji la miha lela, na ingobhu ja zambalau jela. Pilato akabhapwaghile, “Ndingalyaje! Mundu wene jopambane!”
JOH 19:6 Bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na bhalonda bha Nyumba jaka Chapanga pabhakumbweni, bhakajamalili, bhakapwaghaje, “Unhwamba punsalaba! Unhwamba punsalaba!” Pilato akabhapwaghile, “Muntola mabhete, mukunhwambaje. Maghambu nepani ngachemona lihakau la kuntemula kwaki.”
JOH 19:7 Bhayahude bhakamuyangike, “Tepani tubhi na shelia, na kubhokana na shelia heji, impalika kupotela, maghambu akalitendiki kubha Mwana waka Chapanga.”
JOH 19:8 Pilato paakajowini malobhi ghanihagha, akajowipi nakanopi.
JOH 19:9 Akajingi kabhete munyumba jaki ja kikolongwa jela na kundaluki Yesu, “Bho, wehapa uhumiki kwako?” Nambu Yesu ngacheakayangiki lilobhi lokapi lela.
JOH 19:10 Pilato akumpwaghile, “Bho, ngacheulonge na nepane? Bho, ngacheumanyi kubha nepani mi na lujiniku lwa kukubhopola au lujiniku lwa kukuwamba?”
JOH 19:11 Yesu akamuyangike, “Wehapa ngaukabhi na lujiniku lwokapi lola panani jangu, ngati ngaukajopali kuhuma kwaka Chapanga. Kwa ndandi jeniheji, jola joanetiki kwaku abhi na lihoku likolongwa nakanopi.”
JOH 19:12 Kutumbula panihapa Pilato akalondiki indela ja kumbopola Yesu. Nambu Bhayahude bhakajamalili, bhakapwaghaje, “Anaumbopuli mundu ajoju, wehapa nga unkochi waka Kaisali. Maghambu kila mundu joalitenda kubha nkolongwa ampenga Kaisali!”
JOH 19:13 Bhela, Pilato paakajowini malobhi ghanihagha, akundetiki Yesu kunja, akatami pachitehu chaki cha utemulu, pandu papalowakeka, “Lubhanja lwa Liganga,” au kwa Kiebulania, “Gabata.”
JOH 19:14 Na ghakabhi maandalilu gha Pasaka, ngati saa sita ja muhi. Pilato akabhapwaghi Bhayahude, “Ndingalyaje, nkolongwa winu!”
JOH 19:15 Nambu bhombi bhakajamalili, bhakapwaghaje, “Unkomaje! Unkomaje! Unhwamba punsalaba!” Pilato akabhapwaghile, “Bho, nunhwamba nkolongwa wino?” Ihongozi bha bhapenganyambiku bhakamuyangiki, “Tepani ngachetubhi na nkolongwa nambu Kaisali!”
JOH 19:16 Bhela Pilato akabhapeki Yesu kwabhu nahuli bhunhwambaje. Nabhombi bhakuntoliki Yesu.
JOH 19:17 Yesu akabya autotwili msalaba waki, akapitiki na kujenda pandu papalowakeka, “Lifuvu la Mmutu,” au kwa Kiebulania, “Goligota.”
JOH 19:18 Bhakamuwambiki konihoku, na bhangi bhabheli papamu naku, jumu upambala wa kumalelelu, na jongi upambala wa kumangeja, na Yesu akabya pachilanda jabhu.
JOH 19:19 Pilato akalembiki anuwane, na kujibheka panani ja msalaba waka Yesu. Na jakalembakiki, “Yesu wa ku Nazaleti, Nkolongwa wa Bhayahude.”
JOH 19:20 Bhela anuwani jeniheji bhakajisomiki Bhayahude bhamaheli. Maghambu pandu pala paakawambakiki Yesu pakabhi pambipi na muchi. Na jakalembakiki kwa Kiebulania, na Kilumi, na Kigiliki.
JOH 19:21 Nambu bhapenganyambiku bhakolongwa na Bhayahude bhakumpwaghi Pilato, “Ngawilemba, ‘Nkolongwa wa Bhayahude,’ nambu ulemba, ‘Mundu ajoju akapwaghiki kubha, Nepani nde Nkolongwa wa Bhayahude.’ ”
JOH 19:22 Pilato akayangike, “Chenyomwi kulemba, nembike.”
JOH 19:23 Bhela manjolinjoli pabhakajomwi kunhwamba Yesu, bhakaitoliki ingobhu yaki, na kuighabha mapogha ncheche, kwa kila linjolinjoli lipogha laki. Nambu bhakajetangani likanzu laki lela ngabhalikachula, maghambu lakabhi nga mshonu, nambu lilokakiki kutumbu kunani mbaka pahi.
JOH 19:24 Bhela bhakapwaghani bheni kwa bheni, “Ngatujikachula, nambu tujilapulya kula, jibya jaka nane.” Nahuli ghatimiaje Malembu Mahuhu ghaghapwagha, “Bhakaghabhini ingobhu yangu, na kanzu jangu bhakajilapuli kula.” Bhenibhela nde mobhakahengi manjolinjoli bhala.
JOH 19:25 Na pambipi na msalaba waka Yesu akabhi ajemiki mabhu waka Yesu, na ndombu wa mabhu waki, na Malia nhwanu waka Kileopa, na Malia Magidalena.
JOH 19:26 Bhela Yesu paakumbweni mabhu waki, na mbulwa joakumpaliki jola ajemiki pambipi, akumpwaghi mabhu waki, “Amabhu, hajoju nde mwana waku.”
JOH 19:27 Kebhete akumpwaghi mbulwa jola, “Lingalyaje, hajoju nde mabhu waku.” Na kutumbu chikahi chela mbulwa jola akuntoliki mabhu waka Yesu kunyumba jaki.
JOH 19:28 Paghajomwiki ghanihagha, Yesu akamanyi kubha ghokapi ghajomwike. Nahuli ghapitalyaje Malembu Mahuhu, akapwaghike, “Mona inywita.”
JOH 19:29 Panihapa pakabhi na mbale jejitweli siki. Bhela bhakatobhali siponji mu siki jela, na kujibheka mu ufito wa nkongu wa hisopo, na kumpelakela mundomu.
JOH 19:30 Yesu paakayomwi kujionja siki heji, akapwaghike, “Ghajomwike!” Akajinamishi mmutu waki, na kuheketa roho.
JOH 19:31 Bhela bhakolongwa bha Bhayahude kwa kubha lakabhi nde lichobha la Ijumaa, yani, lichobha la Maandalio mangani ja Lichobha la Sabato na hyegha ngaitama punsalaba Lichobha la Sabato, maghambu Lichobha la Sabato lakabhi lichobha likolongwa, bhakundobhiki Pilato bhahekata magholu gha bhala bhabhawambakike, na bhakabhohakikaje.
JOH 19:32 Bhela manjolinjoli bhakapiti, bhakunhekiti magholu wa kutumbula, na wa kabheli, joakawambakiki punsalaba papamu na Yesu.
JOH 19:33 Nambu pabhakunhiki Yesu, na kumbona ajomwi kupotela, ngachebhunhekiti magholu.
JOH 19:34 Nambu linjolinjoli jumu akunhomiki mwindeta jaka Yesu kwa nkoha, na palapala ukapitiki mwahi na machi.
JOH 19:35 Mundu joakaweni mambu ghanihagha nde joabhohika ulandilu, na ulandilu waki nde wa chakaka. Najombi amanyi kubha alongela chakaka, nahuli nanamu mpata kuhobhalela.
JOH 19:36 Mambu ghanihagha ghakahengakiki nahuli Malembu Mahuhu ghapata kupitalila, “Njeta hata chihupa chaki chimu chechihekatwaje.”
JOH 19:37 Na kabheti Malembu ghangi ghapwagha, “Anabhundinga jola jobhunhotwile.”
JOH 19:38 Paghapetiki mambu ghanihagha, Yusufu mundu wa ku Alimataya, akunjopiki Pilato anjetakalya kujiheleha hyegha jaka Yesu punsalaba. Yusufu akabhi nde mbulwa waka Yesu, nambu kwa kulihiya, kwa choghohi ja Bhayahude, na Pilato akunjetakalile. Bhela Yusufu akapiti, na kujitola hyegha jaka Yesu.
JOH 19:39 Yusufu akalongini na Nikodemu jola ambaju pakutumbula akunjendi Yesu ikilu, akaletiki mahangaghanu gha manungilu ghaghalowakeka manemane na ubani, ngati kilo selasini.
JOH 19:40 Bhokapi bhabeli bhakajitoliki hyegha jaka Yesu, bhakajikongiki sanda ja ingobhu jinyahi jihuhu papamu na manungilu ghala, ngati moubheli ntetu wa Bhayahude wa kutagha.
JOH 19:41 Na palapala paakawambakiki Yesu pala, pakabhi na chijongu, na mkati ja chijongu chela kukabhi na litengeli lahenu, lelu ngachealabhali kutaghakika mundu.
JOH 19:42 Bhela maghambu lakabhi lichobha la Bhayahude la Maandalio gha Lichobha la Sabato na litengeli lakabhi pambipi, bhakajibhekiki hyegha jaka Yesu mulitengele.
JOH 20:1 Lukela pachibhombu lichobha la Jumapili, kukabya kukali na lwihi, Malia Magidalena akapiti kulitengeli, na akaliweni liganga lela libhohakiki pundyangu wa litengeli.
JOH 20:2 Bhela akakembili imbelu mbaka kwaka Simoni Petulu na mbulwa jongi jola ambaju Yesu akumpaliki, na kubhapwaghila, “Bhumbohiki Bambo mulitengeli, wala ngachetumanyi kobhumbekike.”
JOH 20:3 Bhela Petulu papamu na mbulwa jongi jola, bhakabhokiki na kujenda kulitengeli.
JOH 20:4 Bhakakembili imbelu bhokapi bhabheli, nambu mbulwa jongi jola akakembili nakanopi kumpeta Petulu, na kubha wa kutumbula kuhika kulitengeli.
JOH 20:5 Akajinimi na kulingalila mulitengeli mola, akaiweni itambala ya sanda mkati mola, nambu ngacheajingile.
JOH 20:6 Simoni Petulu najombi akajengalile, akajingili mkati ja litengeli, na akaiweni itambala ya sanda yela mkati ja litengele,
JOH 20:7 na chitambala chechakabhi bhahyongalwi pamutu jaka Yesu. Ngachechaghonili papamu na itambala ya sanda yela, nambu chakabhi chikunjakiki na kubhekakeka kutali pandu pa kanjika jaki.
JOH 20:8 Bhela mbulwa jongi joakalonguli kuhika palitengeli jola, najombi akajingili mkati, akaweni, na kuhobhalela.
JOH 20:9 Maghambu mbaka chikahi chenihechi bhakabhi bhakali ngakumanya Malembu Mahuhu ghala kubha, ikabhi impalika Yesu ayokaje kabhete kuhuma kwa bhakuwa.
JOH 20:10 Bhela bhabhulwa bhala bhakakelawiki kabhete kunyumba jabhu.
JOH 20:11 Nambu Malia akabhi ajemiki pambipi na litengeli akalelaje. Chikahi paakabhi alela, akajinimi na kulingalila mkati ja litengeli.
JOH 20:12 Akabhaweni bhatumika bhabheli bha kunani kwaka Chapanga, bhawati ingobhu ihuhu kupukupu, bhatami pala pabhajighoniki hyegha jaka Yesu, jumu kumutu, na jongi kumagholu.
JOH 20:13 Bhombi bhakumpwaghi Malia, “Mbomba, bho, mbona ulela?” Malia akabhayangike, “Bhumbohiki Bambo wangu, wala nepani ngachemanyi kobhumbekike!”
JOH 20:14 Malia paakajomwi kulonge ghanihagha, akang'anambwiki kunyuma, na kumbona Yesu ajemiki, koni akabya ngakumanya kubha nde Yesu.
JOH 20:15 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Mbomba, bho, ulela kike?” Bho, undonda nane? Jombi koni akaholakya kubha nde mlonda wa chijongu, akumpwaghile, “Nkolongwa, anangati untoliki wehapa, umbwaghilaje paumbekike, nanatu ananuntolaje.”
JOH 20:16 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Malia.” Malia akang'anambwiki, na kumpwaghila kwa Kiebulania, “Laboni!” Yani, “Mbola!”
JOH 20:17 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ngawingamula, maghambu nakali ngachembiti kwa Atati wangu.” Nambu ujenda kwa bhalongu bhangu ukabhapwaghilaje, “Ng'oloka kujenda kwa Atati wangu, najombi nde Atati winu, na kwaka Chapanga wangu, najombi nde Chapanga winu.”
JOH 20:18 Malia Magidalena akapiti na kubhapwaghila bhabhulwa malobhi, “Numbweni Bambo!” Na kubha ampwaghi mambu ghanihagha.
JOH 20:19 Kukabhi pakamihi, lichobha lela la kutumbula la juma la Jumapile. Bhabhulwa bhaki bhakabhi bhalibhongini papamu, milyangu jakabya jijighaliki kwa ndandi ja kubhajoghopa ihongozi bha Bhayahude. Yesu akahikike, akajemiki pachilanda jabhu, na kubhapwaghila, “Lukwali lubya na mwenga!”
JOH 20:20 Na paakapwaghiki ghanihagha, akabhalangi mabhoku ghaki na indeta jaki. Bhela bhabhulwa bhala bhakahekalili namaa, pabhakumbweni Bambo.
JOH 20:21 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghi kabhete, “Lukwali lubya na mwenga, ngati Atati moandumi nepani, nepani nanatu nuntuma mwehapa.”
JOH 20:22 Paakajomwi kulonge ghanihagha, akabhapulali na kubhapwaghila, “Njopalyaje Roho Mhuhu.
JOH 20:23 Bhokapi bhamwabhokia mahoku, bhabhohakike, na bhokapi bhamwakongila mahoku, bhakongakike.”
JOH 20:24 Nambu Tomaso, jumu wa bhabhulwa komi na bhabheli bhala, joalowakika Mabhela, ngacheakabhi papamu nabhu chikahi pahikika Yesu.
JOH 20:25 Bhela bhabhulwa bhangi bhakumpwaghile, “Tumbweni Bambo.” Tomaso akabhapwaghile, “Nepani nangakughabhona makumba gha misumali mumabhoku ghaki, na kubheka lukonji lwangu pa likumba la misumali, na kubheka lukonji lwangu pa indeta jaki, nganhobhaleli hata pachokope.”
JOH 20:26 Paghapetiki machobha nane, bhabhulwa bhaki bhakabhi mkati kabhete, na Tomaso akabya papamu nabhu. Bhela Yesu akahikike, na milyangu jijighalike, akajemiki pachilanda jabhu, na kupwagha, “Lukwali lubya na mwenga.”
JOH 20:27 Bhela akumpwaghi Tomaso, “Uletaje pambani lukonji lwaku, na ughalinga mabhoku ghangu, uletaje na chiwoku chaku ukamulaje mu indeta jangu, wala ngawikubha na choghohi, nambu uhobhalyaje.”
JOH 20:28 Tomaso akayangiki, na kumpwaghila, “Bambo wangu na Chapanga wangu!”
JOH 20:29 Yesu akumpwaghi Tomaso, “Bho, wehapa le uhobhalili maghambu utehi kumona? Bhapengaliki bhala bhanga kumona, nambu bhahobhalela.”
JOH 20:30 Bhela kubhi kabhete na nginyulila yengi yamaheli yeakahengiki Yesu palongi ja bhabhulwa bhaki, yangakulembakeka mu chitabu chenu.
JOH 20:31 Nambu yenjenu ilembakiki nahuli mmanya kubha Yesu nde Kristo, Mwana waka Chapanga, na kwa kunhobhalela jombi mbya na womi wa chakaka kwa kupetela lihina laki.
JOH 21:1 Paghapetiki mambu ghanihagha Yesu akalilangi kabhete kwa bhabhulwa bhaki, pamaheku ja Bahali ja Tibelia, najombi akabhonakini ana:
JOH 21:2 Simoni Petulu, na Tomaso joalowakeka Mabhela, na Nathanaeli wa ku Kana ja ku Galilaya, na bhana bhabheli bhaka Zebedayo, na bhabhulwa bhangi bhabheli, bhakabhi papamu.
JOH 21:3 Simoni Petulu akabhapwaghi bhajaki, “Nyenda kulobha homba.” Nabhombi bhakumpwaghile, “Natatu anatujenda papamu na wehapa.” Bhela bhakabhokiki, bhakakweliki mu liboti, nambu ikilu jela ngachebhapatiki chindu.
JOH 21:4 Lukela pakwachile, Yesu akajemiki mumaheku, nambu bhabhulwa ngachebhamanyi kubha akabhi nde Yesu.
JOH 21:5 Bhela Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Bhanango, bho, mbi na homba?” Bhakamuyangiki, “Njeta.”
JOH 21:6 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Mpendakya nkwabhu upambala wa kumalelelu wa liboti linu, nanamu anampata homba.” Bhela bhakapendakili, wala sajenu ngachebhaweziki kuhuta kabhete kwa ndandi ja kujoloka kwa homba.
JOH 21:7 Bhela mbulwa joakapalakiki na Yesu jola akumpwaghi Petulu, “Nde Bambo!” Najombi Simoni Petulu paakajowini kubha nde Bambo, akalikongiki ingobhu jaki, maghambu akahuliki ingobhu ja kunja, na kulilekela mubahali.
JOH 21:8 Bhabhulwa bhangi bhala bhakahikiki na liboti heli, maghambu bhakabhi nga kutali na kumaheku, nambu bhakabhi ngati utali wa mita mia moja kuhuma kundema, koni bhakahuta nkwabhu wana homba.
JOH 21:9 Bhela pabhaheli kumaheku, bhakauweni moto wa makalakala, na panani jaki bhajochiki homba, na libumunda.
JOH 21:10 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Ndeta pambani homba yakumu yendobhiki sajeno.”
JOH 21:11 Simoni Petulu akakweliki mu liboti, akauhutiki nkwawu kumaheku, utweli homba ikoluikolu, mia moja hamsini na tatu. Hata koni homba ikabhi yamaheli ntundu ghonihoghu, nambu nkwabhu ngachewakachwike.
JOH 21:12 Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Nhwika nkula chilebhi cha lukela.” Wala nga mundu pachilanda ja bhabhulwa bhala joakalengiki kundalukila kubha wehapa wa nane, maghambu bhakamanyi kubha nde Bambo.
JOH 21:13 Yesu akahikiki, na kutola libumunda, na kubhapekeha, na homba akahengiki bhelabhela.
JOH 21:14 Haje jakabhi mala ja katatu kwaka Yesu kubhapitalila bhabhulwa bhaki, kutumbula paakahyokiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa.
JOH 21:15 Bhela pabhakajomwi kula, Yesu akumpwaghi Simoni Petulu, “Simoni mwana waka Yohana! Bho, umbala nepani kuliku bhanganya abhabha?” Petulu akayangiki, “Ena, Bambo, wehapa umanyi kubha nukupala.” Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ulehaje mambelele ghangu!”
JOH 21:16 Akumpwaghi kabhete pakabheli, “Simoni mwana waka Yohana! Bho, umbala nepani?” Petulu akayangiki, “Ena, Bambo, wehapa umanyi kubha nukupala!” Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ulehaje mambelele ghangu!”
JOH 21:17 Yesu akundaluki kabhete pakatatu, “Simoni mwana waka Yohana! Bho, umbala nepani?” Petulu akayomike maghambu akundaluki pakatatu, “Bho, umbala nepani?” Bhela akumpwaghile, “Bambo, wehapa umanyi ghokapi, wehapa umanyi kubha nukupala.” Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ulehaje mambelele ghangu!”
JOH 21:18 Nukupwaghi chakaka, paukabhi unkombo, ukabhi ulikonga wamwete na kujenda koupala. Nambu pawibya ukongapile, wihatambula mabhoku ghaku, na jongi anaakukongaje na kukupeleka kwanga kupala wehapa kujenda.
JOH 21:19 Kwa kupwagha malobhi ghanihagha, Yesu akalangi kubha kwa ntundu bhole Petulu anakuwaje nahuli kundumbali Chapanga. Bhela paakalongi ghanihagha, Yesu akumpwaghi Petulu, “Unyengalyaje!”
JOH 21:20 Petulu akang'anambwiki na kumbona mbulwa jola joakapalakiki na Yesu. Jonihoju nde mbulwa jola joakajeghamaki pachihimba chaka Yesu chikahi cha kula chilebhi cha pakamihi, na kulalukila, “Bambo, bho, nane joakung'anambukaje?”
JOH 21:21 Bhela Petulu paakumbweni jonihoju, akumpwaghi Yesu, “Bambo, na ajoju anaatenda kike?”
JOH 21:22 Yesu akumpwaghile, “Ngati anambaliki ajoju atama mbaka panihikaje, bho, wehapa upala kike? Wehapa unyengalya nepani.”
JOH 21:23 Bhela lilobhi leniheli lakajaghani pachilanda ja bhahobhalela kubha mbulwa jola ngaakuwe. Nambu Yesu ngacheakumpwaghi kubha ngaakuwe, nambu, “Ngati anambaliki ajoju atama mbaka panihikaje, bho, wehapa upala kike?”
JOH 21:24 Hajoju nde mbulwa jola joaghalandila mambu ghanihagha, na nde joaghalembiki mambu ghanihagha. Natatu tumanyi kubha ghaaghapwaghiki nde gha chakaka.
JOH 21:25 Kubhi kabhete na mambu ghangi ghamaheli ghaakahengiki Yesu. Ghaghu anangati ghakalembakiki limu limu, nholake hata ndema wokapi ngaukajaghanile kwa itabu yela yeikalembakikaje. Amina.
ACT 1:1 Unkolongwa Teofile: Mu chitabu changu cha kutumbula, nakakulembi kubhokana na mambu ghokapi Yesu ghaakatumbwi kuhenga na kubhola kutumbu chikahi paatumbulaje lihengu laki,
ACT 1:2 mbaka lichobha leatolakikaje kujenda kunani kumahunde. Mangani ja kubhoka kwaki, kwa makili ghaka Roho Mhuhu, Yesu akabhalaghalaki bhandu bhaakahawile kubha mitumi bhaki.
ACT 1:3 Kwa machobha alobaini baada ja kupotela akabhapitali mala jamahele kwa ntundu ghoulangia chakaka kubha jombi akabhi mwome. Bhakumbweni, najombi akalongi nabhu panani ja Ukolongwa waka Chapanga.
ACT 1:4 Chikahi chimu Yesu paakahimangini nabhu akabhalaghalaki anana: “Ngamwibhoka mu Yelusalemu, nambu mlendalyaje nhupu ghoakapwaghiki Atati wangu, ambau mwanyowini nakalongalyaje panani jake.
ACT 1:5 Kabheti Yohana abatiza kwa machi, nambu pa machobha machokopi ghaghahika, mabhanganya anambatizwaje kwa Roho Mhuhu.”
ACT 1:6 Bhela, mitumi bhaki pabhakabhi bhalibhongini papamu, bhakundaluki Yesu, “Bambo, bho, chikahi chenje le nde paukelabhuha ukolongwa ghola kwa bhandu bha ku Izilaeli?”
ACT 1:7 Nambu Yesu akabhapwaghile, “Chikahi chenihechi chibhi pahi ja lujiniku lwa Atati wangu, kabheti nga lihengu linu kumanya ghibya lile.
ACT 1:8 Nambu chikahi Roho Mhuhu paanhelalya mwehapa, mwijopalya makili kabheti mwibya bhalandilu bhangu ku Yelusalemu, na ku muchi wokapi wa ku Yudea na ku Samalia, kabheti mbaka kumajomukanelu gha ndema wokapi.”
ACT 1:9 Paakajomwili kulonge ghanihagha, koni bhokapi bhundingalila, Yesu akatolakiki kujenda kunani kumahunde, na lihundi lakunhiiki ngabhumbona kabhete.
ACT 1:10 Pabhakabhi bhakali kulingalila kunani kumahunde, paakabhi ajenda jake, palapala bhandu bhabheli bhabhawati ingobhu ihuhu kupukupu bhakajemiki pambipi nabhu,
ACT 1:11 bhakapwaghike, “Mwe mabhandu bha ku Galilaya! Bho, mbona njemane mwakalingalya kunani kumahunde? Yesu ajo joatolakiki kwinu kujenda kunani kumahunde, anahika kabheti ngati bhelabhela momumbonile akajenda kunani kumahunde.”
ACT 1:12 Panihapa mitumi bhala bhakakelawiki ku Yelusalemu kuhumi ku Chitombi cha Mizeituni chekibhi pambipi kilometa jimu kuhuma ku muchi.
ACT 1:13 Pabhakahiki mu muchi bhakajingi mu chumba cha kugholofa mobhatamikaje, nabhombi bhakabhi Petulu, Yohana, Yakobo, Andulea, Filipo na Tomaso, Batolomayo na Matayo, Yakobo mwana waka Alufayo, Simoni Zelote na Yuda mwana waka Yakobo.
ACT 1:14 Bhanganya habha bhokapi bhakalibhongini papamu bhakundobha Chapanga, papamu na akamabhu bhamahele, na Malia mabhu waka Yesu, na bhalongu bhaki.
ACT 1:15 Lichobha limu la palongolo, Petulu akajemiki pachilanda ja bhalongu bhaki bhahobhalela bhabhakabhi bhalibhongine, bhokapi bhakabhi ngati bhandu mia moja na ishilini.
ACT 1:16 Petulu akapwaghiki, “Bhalongu bhango, jakabhi lazima pandu pa Malembu Mahuhu ghatimiaje, kwa malobhi ghaka Roho Mhuhu kupetela kwaka Daude, akalotiki malobhi ghaka Yuda jola joabhalongua bhandu bhabhunkamula Yesu.
ACT 1:17 Yuda akabhi jumu wa lipogha litu, ndandi najombi akahaghuliki akamulaje lihengu litu.”
ACT 1:18 Jombi akahemi ngonda kwa mbija yela yeakapatiki kubhokana na lihengu lihakau, akabya kungonda hoku akaawiki pahi puu, akapojwiki na matumbu ghaki ghakajitiki kunja.
ACT 1:19 Bhandu bhokapi bhabhatamika ku Yelusalemu bhakajowini malobhi ghanihagha na bhela, kwa lugha jabhu, bhakaulohiki ngonda ghola Akelidama, ndandi jaki, “Ngonda wa Mwahi.”
ACT 1:20 “Henu, ngati moilembakike mu chitabu cha Zabuli, ‘Matamu ghaki anaghahighalya ukebha, mundu jokapi ngaitama mkati jake.’ Kabheti ilembakiki, ‘Mundu jongi atola pandu paki pa lihengu.’
ACT 1:21 “Henu mundu jumu joakabhi alongana papamu na tepani chikahi chokapi Bambo Yesu pajendika mwanja waki papamu na tepani ahaghulikaje kulongana na tepani.
ACT 1:22 Jonihoju, apalika abya jumu pachilanda ja bhandu bhabhalonganaje na tepani kutumbu Yohana paakabhi abatiza mbaka lichobha Yesu paatolakikaje kuhuma kwitu kujenda kunani kumahunde. Jonihoju anabyaje mlandilu papamu na tepani kuhenga lihengu la kubhatangazi bhandu kuhyoka kwaka Yesu.”
ACT 1:23 Panihapa, bhakalowi mahina gha bhandu bhabhele, wa kutumbula Yusufu joalowakika Basaba au Yusto na wa kabhele akabhi Matia.
ACT 1:24 Panihapa bhakundobhiki Chapanga, na kupwagha, “Bambo, wehapa ujimanyi mitima ja bhandu bhokapi, henu utulangiaje unhawi jwaku pachilanda ja bhandu bhabheli abhabha,
ACT 1:25 nahuli atola pandu pa lihengu la utumi waku ghoaulekiki Yuda akajenda pandu paki mwene.”
ACT 1:26 Bhakalapwi kura, na kura jakumpatiki Matia, najombi akajonjukiki kwa mitumi bhangi komi na jumu.
ACT 2:1 Lichobha la Pentekoste palahikile, bhahobhalela bhokapi bhakalibhongini pandu pamo.
ACT 2:2 Chikahi chelachela, saute jakajowaniki kuhuma kunani kumahunde, saute jejabhi ngati ja kupogha kwa mpongu ukale, na kujitwelakela nyumba jokapi mobhatami mola.
ACT 2:3 Kabheti ikapitali hindu yeyabhonakini ngati lulimi lwa moto, ikapechangini na kumetela panani jaka kila jumu wabhu.
ACT 2:4 Bhokapi bhakatwelakiki Roho Mhuhu, bhakatumbwi kulongela kwa lugha nayenge, ngati Roho Mhuhu moabhalongui kuloghola.
ACT 2:5 Bhela ku Yelusalemu hoku bhakabhi Bhayahude, bhandu bhabhunjojabhe Chapanga, bhabhahumiki ku kila inchi ja pundema pani.
ACT 2:6 Pabhajowini sauti jeniheje, lipogha likolongwa la bhandu bhakahimangini pamo. Bhokapi bhakakangichi namaa, maghambu kila jumu wabhu akabhajowini bhahobhalela habha bhakapwaghaje kwa lugha jaki mwene.
ACT 2:7 Bhakabya bhakangacha bhakalalukile, “Bho, bhanganya abhabha bhokapi bhatubhajowana bhakapwagha ana le nga bhenei bha ku Galilaya?
ACT 2:8 Bho, kubhi bholi henu, kubha kila jumu witu tubhajowana bhakapwaghaje kwa lugha jitu tabhete ja kubhelakeka nako?
ACT 2:9 Bhangi bhitu nde Bhapalasi, Bhaamedi na Bhaelami, bhangi bha ku Mesopotamia, ku Yudea, ku Kapodokia, ku Ponto na ku Asia,
ACT 2:10 kuhuma ku Filigia na ku Pamfilia, kuhuma ku Misili na ku pandu pa ku Libia pambipi na ku Kilene, bhangi bhitu bhagheni kuhuma ku Loma.
ACT 2:11 Bhayahude na bhandu bhangakubha Bhayahude bhabhajengalili dini ja Kiyahude na bhangi bha kuhumi ku Kilete na Bhaalabu. Tepani tabhokapi tubhajowana bhakapwaghaje kwa lugha hitu tabhete mambu makolongwa ghaka Chapanga.”
ACT 2:12 Bhokapi bhakakangichi na kuhangajika koni bhakalaluwanaje, “Bho, mambu aghagha ndandi jaki kike?”
ACT 2:13 Nambu bhangi bhakabhalongimi bhakapwaghaje, “Bhandu abhabha bhalobhi uwembe!”
ACT 2:14 Panihapa Petulu akajemiki papamu na mitumi komi na jumu bhala, akatumbwi kulitangazila lipogha la bhandu kwa kujamalila, akapwaghaje, “Mwenga mabhandu bha Yudea, na mabhandu mwentamani pani pa Yelusalemu, njowanyaje wichu malobhi ghanumpwaghila.
ACT 2:15 Bhandu abhabha ngachebhalobhi ngati monhwambukila, kwa ndandi sajenu nde saa tatu pela ja lukela!
ACT 2:16 Ngabhela, nambu lijambu lendenu nde lela leakalotiki mlota Yoeli, akapwaghaje:
ACT 2:17 ‘Mu machobha gha kujomukela, apwagha Chapanga, ananabhajitalya bhandu bhokapi Roho jangu. Bhana bhinu akakombu na akakamwali anabhalotaje, akakombu bhinu bhibhona mabhono, na bhazee bhinu anabhalota ndoto.
ACT 2:18 Ena, hata bhatumika bhangu bha chikambaku na bha chimbomba, ananabhajitalya Roho jangu machobha ghanihagha, na bhombi anabhalotaje.
ACT 2:19 Ananangia ngangachu kunani kumahunde, na nginyulila pahi pundema, kwibya na mwahi, moto na lyohi likolongwa.
ACT 2:20 Lyobha analijeghalika lwihi, na mwehi wibya ukeli ngati mwahi, mangane ja kuhika lichobha likolongwa na la ulumbalilu laka Bambo.
ACT 2:21 Panihapa, mundu jokapi joayilobhaje kwa lihina laka Bambo, anaakengaliwaje.’
ACT 2:22 “Mabhandu bha Izilaeli, njowanyaje malobhi ghangani ghanongela! Yesu wa ku Nazaleti akabhi mundu joakayekuliwi palanga na Chapanga palongi jinu kwa indela ja ngangachu, na nginyulila ambayu Chapanga akahengiki kupetela kwaki ngati mommanyi mabhete.
ACT 2:23 Kubhokana na mpangu waki mweni Chapanga akajomwi kumanya kubha Yesu anakamulikaje mu mabhoku ghinu, na mabhanganya unhwamulaje kunkoma kwa kubhalekela bhandu bhahakau bhunhwambaje punsalaba.
ACT 2:24 Nambu Chapanga akamuhyohiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa, akunkengalili kuhuma mu mabhinilu gha nyiwa kwa ndandi ngachekwawezakini jombi akamulikaje na makili gha nyiwa.
