ACT 28:28 Bhela Paulo akapwaghike, “Henu mmanyaje, kubha ubholu waka Chapanga panani ja kukengaleka upelakiki kwa bhandu bhangakubha Bhayahude. Nabhombi anabhajowanyaje!”
ACT 28:29 Paulo paakalongi ghanihagha, Bhayahude bhakabhokiki koni bhakalaluwana bheni kwa bheni.
ACT 28:30 Kwa hyaka ibhele Paulo akatami munyumba jejakabhi alilepe mwene, na konihoku akabhi abhajopalela bhandu bhokapi bhabhapita kumbona.
ACT 28:31 Bhela Paulo akatangizi malobhi gha Ukolongwa waka Chapanga na kubhabhola bhandu panani ja mambu ghaka Bambo Yesu Kristo panga choghohi, na njeta mundu joakunkanakile.
ROM 1:1 Nepani Paulo, mtumika waka Yesu Kristo, joakalowakiki kubha mtumi, na kutengakeka kwa ndandi ja kutangaza Malobhi Manyahi ghaka Chapanga.
ROM 1:2 Malobhi Manyahi ambaghu Chapanga akajomwi kughalaghila kwa indela ja bhalota bhaki mu Malembu Mahuhu,
ROM 1:3 yani malobhi panani jaka Mwana waki, joakabhelakiki mu lubheleku lwaka Daude kwa ntundu wa hyegha,
ROM 1:4 na ambaju kwa makili ghaki na Roho ja uhuhu akalangakiki kubha Mwana waka Chapanga, kwa kuhyohakeka kwaki kuhuma kwa bhabhapotile, yani Yesu Kristo Bambo witu.
ROM 1:5 Ambaju kwa kupetela kwaki na kwa ndandi ja lihina laki, tujopalili chihomu na utumi nahuli kubhalowa bhandu bha inchi yokapi bhapata kuhobhalela na kutii.
ROM 1:6 Mabhanganya bhelabhela nde papamu na bhandu bhanihabha, ambabhu mlowakiki kubha bhahaghulika bhaka Yesu Kristo.
ROM 1:7 Bhela, nundembela mabhokapi mwembi ku Loma, mwempalakiki na Chapanga, na kulowakeka kubha bhahuhu bhaki. Chihomu na chibya kwinu, na lukwali loluhuma kwaka Chapanga Atati witu, na kwaka Bambo Yesu Kristo.
ROM 1:8 Kutumbula, nunchengula Chapanga wangu kwa indela jaka Yesu Kristo kwa ndandi jinu mabhokapi, maghambu uhobhalelu winu utangazwa kundema wokapi.
ROM 1:9 Kwa ndandi Chapanga jonuntumakila kwa roho jangu jokapi kwa kutangaza Malobhi Manyahi ghaka Mwana waki, nde mlandilu wangu kubha nunkomboka namaa,
ROM 1:10 machobha ghokapi mu malobhu ghangu. Nundobha Chapanga ngati anaapalike, ambekya mbekenyu jinyahi ja kuhika kwinu hoku henu kateki.
ROM 1:11 Kwa ndandi ndokule namaa kumbona, nahuli nanamu muwezaje kupata nhupu ya kiroho na mpata kujema kwa ukangamalu.
ROM 1:12 Nde kupwagha kubha tupata kujeghaleka mtima: Uhobhalelu winu unyeghala mtima nepani, na uhobhalelu wangu unjeghala mtima mwehapa.
ROM 1:13 Bhalongu bhango, mbala mmanya kubha chikahi chamahele nakaholaki kuhika kwinu hoku, nambu nhibhalakiki mbaka sajenu. Nahuli nhwezaje kubhapata bhahobhalela pachilanda jinu ngati monakapati kwa mataifa ghangi.
ROM 1:14 Mi na lihengu kwa bhandu bhokapi, Bhagiliki na bhangakubha Bhagiliki, na bhabhabhi na mbulau na bhangakubha na mbulau.
ROM 1:15 Bhela, nepani bhelabhela ndokule namaa kutangaza Malobhi Manyahi kwinu mwenga mwentamani ku Loma.
ROM 1:16 Nepani ngachenaghabhone iyoni Malobhi Manyahi ghaka Kristo, kwa ndandi ghabhi na makili ghaka Chapanga gha kubhakengalela bhokapi bhabhunhobhalela, kutumbula na Myahude hoti, na kwaka Mgiliki bhelabhela.
ROM 1:17 Kwa ndandi Malobhi Manyahi ghalangiha palanga ntundu Chapanga moabhajetakalela bhandu kubha bhambone palongi jaki, kutumbu pakutumbula mbaka pakujomukela, ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Joajetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga anaatama kwa uhobhalelu.”
ROM 1:18 Kwa ndandi inyela jaka Chapanga jibhonakini kuhuma kunani kumahunde panani ja bhandu bhokapi bhangakuntii jombi, na uhakau wa bhandu bhabhahibhalakila chakaka kwa uhakau.
ROM 1:19 Maghambu mambu ghala ghaghuntenda Chapanga amanyikanaje kwabhu ghabhi palanga mkati jabhu, kwa ndandi Chapanga abhalangihi kwabhu hotuhotu.
ROM 1:20 Kutumbu Chapanga paakabhombiki ndema, makili ghaki gha mileli na Uchapanga waki, hata ngati ngacheibhonikana kwa mihu, imanyikana palanga. Bhandu bhaweza kughamanya makili ghanihagha kubhokana na hindu yeniheyi yeakabhombiki Chapanga. Bhela bhandu ngabhikubhi na indela jokapi jela ja kulikengalela.
ROM 1:21 Maghambu hata ngati bhakummanyi Chapanga, ngachebhundumbalili kubha nde Chapanga wala kunchengula, nambu maholalelu ghabhu ghakabhi gha king'ang'a na malangu ghabhu matopu ghatweli lwihi.
ROM 1:22 Bhalibhona kubha bhabhi na mbulau, koni bhang'ang'a.
ROM 1:23 Bhakotoka kunjojabhela Chapanga joatama mileli, nambu bhajojabhela imong'umong'u yeibhi ulenganesu waka mundu joapotela, ijuni, ulenganesu wa hinyama, na ihumbi yeikwabha.
ROM 1:24 Bhela, Chapanga akabhalekiki bhajengalya utokulelu uhakau wa mitima jabhu, bhaujengalya uhakau, na kuhenganela mambu gha iyoni kwa hyegha yabhu.
ROM 1:25 Maghambu bhakang'anambwili chakaka jaka Chapanga kubha upuhe, bhakachijojabhili chiumbi badala jaka Joabhombiki, joapalika kulumbalika mileli! Amina.
ROM 1:26 Bhela, Chapanga akabhalekiki bhajengalya utokulelu wabhu uhakau. Hata akambomba bhabhu bhakang'anambwili kutumika kwa asili kokupalika na hyegha yabhu, kwa kutumila kwangakupalika.
ROM 1:27 Hata akanalomi nabhombi bhelabhela bhakakulekiki kutumika kwa asili kwaka mwanalomi na mbomba, na kubhelalanela utokulelu bheni kwa bheni. Akanalomi bhehenganela mambu gha iyoni, na kwa kuhenga bhenibhela bhaliletela bheni mang'ahiku ghabhapalika kwa uhakau wabhu hoghu.
ROM 1:28 Maghambu nabhombi bhakakaniki uchakaka ghobhumanya panani jaka Chapanga, bhela Chapanga akabhalekiki bhajengalyaje malangu ghabhu mahakau, nahuli bhahenga mambu ghangakupalika kughahenga.
ROM 1:29 Bhatweliwi na kila ntundu wa uhakau, uhakau, ulohu, na kuponja. Bhatweli wihu, kukoma, milomu, kukolowa, maholalelu mahakau, na kughamba,
ROM 1:30 kukopunganela, bhabhunhakalila Chapanga, bhabhatondola, ing'omu na kulibhona, bhaholalela nakanopi kuhenga mahakau, bhangakubhatopela bhabheleka bhabhu,
ROM 1:31 bhang'ang'a, bhabhaheketa malaghilu, bhangakubhapala bhalongu bhabhu, na bhangakubha na chiha kwa bhangi.
ROM 1:32 Bhamanyi kubha Shelia yaka Chapanga ipwagha kubha bhandu bhabhahenga mambu ngati ghanihagha ibhapalika kupotela. Nambu hata bhenibhela, ngachebhajendale kughahenga mambu ghanihagha bheni pela, nambu hata kujetanganela na bhala bhabhaghahenga mambu ghanihagha.
ROM 2:1 Henu wehapa weubhatemula bhajaku, ngauwezi kulikengalela ng'o, hata ngati wehapa ukubhi wa nane. Maghambu kwa kubhatemula bhangi, ulipeke masolu wamwete ndandi na wamwete uhenga mambu ghalaghala ghautemula.
ROM 2:2 Tumanyi kubha utemulo waka Chapanga panani ja bhala bhabhahenga mambu ngati ghanihagha nde utemulo wa chakaka.
ROM 2:3 Bhela, wenga wa mundu weubhatemula bhala bhabhahenga mambu ngati ghanihagha koni wamwete ughahenga, bho, uholake le anaujepa utemulo waka Chapanga?
ROM 2:4 Au bho, ujojoha le kujoloka kwa wamboni waki na upoli waki na kuhinakila kwaki, panga kumanya kubha wamboni waka Chapanga hoghu ukuhuta nahuli upata kung'anambuka na kughaleka mahoku?
ROM 2:5 Nambu kubhokana na kunonopa kwaku, na mtima waku wangakung'anambuka na kughaleka mahoku, ulibhekela chikoku cha inyela kwa Lichobha lela la utemulo wa chakaka waka Chapanga palibhonikanaje.
ROM 2:6 Maghambu Chapanga anaandepa kila mundu kulengana na matendu ghaki.
ROM 2:7 Bhala bhabhahinakila kutenda matendu ghambone, kwa kulonda ulumbalilu na utopelu na kulepakupotela, Chapanga anaabhapekya womi wa mileli.
ROM 2:8 Nambu bhala bhabhalonda mambu ghabhu, bhangakujitii chakaka, na kujengalela uhakau, anajabhahabhukya ghazabu na inyela jaka Chapanga.
ROM 2:9 Ulale na mang'ahiku anayumpata kila mundu joahenga uhakau, kutumbu Myahude, na kwaka Mgiliki bhelabhela.
ROM 2:10 Nambu kila mundu joahenga ghambone anaapata ulumbalilu, utopelu na lukwale, kutumbula Myahude, na Mgiliki bhelabhela.
ROM 2:11 Kwa ndandi Chapanga ngacheabhi na upendeleu.
ROM 2:12 Bhandu bhala bhabhahenga mahakau panga kujimanya Shelia jaka Chapanga anabhahobha panga na Shelia. Na bhandu bhala bhabhahenga mahakau koni bhajimanyi Shelia, anabhatemulika kwa Shelia.
ROM 2:13 Maghambu nga bhala bhabhajowini Shelia yaka Chapanga nde bhabhajetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga, nambu bhala bhabhajitii Shelia nde bhabhijetakaliwaje palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 2:14 Kwa ndandi bhandu bhangakubha Bhayahude ngachebhabhi na Shelia, nambu kila pabhahenga kulengana na Shelia jela kubhokana na mitima jabhu, bhombi bhakubha Shelia kwa ndandi jabhu bhene, hata ngati ngachebhabhi na Shelia jela.
ROM 2:15 Maghambu bhalangi kubha malaghalakilu gha Shelia ghalembakiki mu mitima jabhu. Zamili yabhu na maholalelu ghabhu bhelabhela ibhatakila au kubhakengalela kwa mambu ghanihagha ghabhaholalela.
ROM 2:16 Bhela kubhokana na aleli Malobhi Manyahi ghandangaza, nde mokwibhelila Lichobha Chapanga payitemula mambu ghaghalihiiki gha bhandu kwa indela jaka Yesu Kristo.
ROM 2:17 Na wehapa bhole? Wehapa wamwete uliloha Myahude na kujihobhalela Shelia, na kulilumbalila kubha waka Chapanga,
ROM 2:18 kwa indela ja Shelia umanya ghaghapalika na Chapanga na uweza kuhaghula lijambu lambone,
ROM 2:19 wehapa ulibhona kubha chiongozi wa akangalola na unang'anu kwa bhala bhabhabhi mu lwihi,
ROM 2:20 ulibhona kubha ubhabhola bhang'ang'a na mbola wa bhala ambabhu mitima jabhu ngachejikangamili, kwa kubha umanyi uchakaka ghoubhi mu Shelia heji.
ROM 2:21 Bhela, wehapa wewabhola bhandu bhangi, bho, maghambu ki ngacheulibhola wamwete? Bho, ubhatangazi bhangi kubha, “Ngabhijibha,” koni wehapa wamwete ujibha?
ROM 2:22 Wehapa weupwagha kubha mundu, “Ngayihenga ugone,” koni wamwete uhenga ugone? Wehapa weuhakali imong'umong'u ya ichapanga, koni wamwete ujibha mu manyumba gha ichapanga?
ROM 2:23 Bho, ulilumbalila kubha ujimanyi Shelia, nambu umpoha lihamu Chapanga kwa kuheketa Shelia jaki?
ROM 2:24 Maghambu ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Bhandu bhangakubha Bhayahude anabhalitondula Lihina laka Chapanga, kwa ndandi jinu mwenga Bhayahude.”
ROM 2:25 Kwa ndandi kuheketa kwaku jando kubhi na nyonjeka ngati anautii Shelia. Nambu ngati anauheketa Shelia, mbanga wakabya uhighali panga kuheketa jando.
ROM 2:26 Bhela, ngati mundu wangakubha Myahude jwangakuheketa jando akamulaki malaghalakilu gha Shelia, bho, Chapanga ngaambalangi kubha ngati ahekiti jando?
ROM 2:27 Nde pala bhala bhangakuheketa jando kwa hyegha nambu bhajitii Shelia anabhuntemula mwenga Mwayahude, ambabhu muhekiti jando na kujimanya namaa Shelia, nambu ntenda kujiheketa.
ROM 2:28 Nde kupwagha kubha, nga kila joabhonikana kwa kunja kubha Myahude nde Myahude wa chakaka, na kabhete mundu ngacheakubha Myahude wa chakaka eti maghambu ahekiti jando kihyegha.
ROM 2:29 Nambu Myahude wa chakaka nde jola joabhi Myahude kwa mkati, yani jola joahekiti jando ja mtima, mu roho, nga mu lilembu, ambaju ulumbalilu waka mundu hoju ngacheuhuma kwa bhandu, nambu uhuma kwaka Chapanga.
ROM 3:1 Bho, Myahude abhi na chindu bhole kupeta bhandu bhange? Au bho, kuheketa jando kubhi na nyonjeka bhole?
ROM 3:2 Kubhi na nyonjeka ngolongwa kwa kila indela. Kutumbula, Chapanga akabhapekihi Bhayahude malobhi ghaki.
ROM 3:3 Nambu, bho, anakubya bhole anangati bhakumu bhabhu ngachebhahobhalile? Bho, kulepakuhobhalela kwabhu anakubhoha ulongwana waka Chapanga?
ROM 3:4 Ngabhela! Chapanga ahighalila kubha ndongwana chikahi chokapi, hata ngati kila mundu nde mpuhe, ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Kila paupwagha, malobhi ghaku nde chakaka, na mu utemulo wehapa ushinda.”
ROM 3:5 Nambu anakubhi uhakau ghotuhenga ulangi uchakaka waka Chapanga, bho, tupwagha kike? Bho, Chapanga le muhakau joaleta inyela? Pambani nongela kimundu.
ROM 3:6 Ngabhela! Kwa ndandi anangati bhenibhela nde mokubhelile, bho, Chapanga anaaweza bholi kuutemula ndema?
ROM 3:7 Nambu anakubhi chakaka jaka Chapanga jijonjukiki kulangiya ulumbalilu waki kwa ndandi ja upuhi wangu, bho, maghambu kiki nepani ndemulika kubha mwana mahoku?
ROM 3:8 Na tepani maghambu ki ngatwipwagha, ngati bhangi mobhatukopunganela kubha tupwagha, “Bho, tuhenga le mahakau nahuli ghambone ghapata kuhika?” Bhombi anabhatemulikaje ngati moibhapalakila.
ROM 3:9 Bho, tupwagha bhole henu? Bho, tepani Bhayahude le twambone kupeta bhandu bhange? Ngabhela hata pachokope! Maghambu tujomwi kubhalangiya Bhayahude na Bhagiliki kubha na bhombi bhabhi pahi ja mahoku.
ROM 3:10 Ngati moilembakake mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Njeta hata mundu jumu joabhi wambone!
ROM 3:11 Njeta hata mundu jumu joabhi na mbulau, wala njeta hata jumu joandonda Chapanga.
ROM 3:12 Bhokapi bhahobhike, bhokapi kwa papamu bhabholiki, njeta joahenga ghambone, njeta hata jumu.
ROM 3:13 Milomu jabhu nde ngati matengele ghaghahoghuliki, kwa lulimi lwabhu bhatendiki kukolowa, mu milomu jabhu kupita malobhi ghaghabhi na chikau ngati chikau cha lijoka.
ROM 3:14 Milomu jabhu jitweli masolu na mabhinilu.
ROM 3:15 Magholu ghabhu ghakembalela kujitila mwahi.
ROM 3:16 Pokapi pabhajenda bhaleta uyonangeku na mang'ahiku.
ROM 3:17 Wala indela ja lukwale ngachebhajimanye.
ROM 3:18 Kunjojabhela Chapanga ngachekubhi pamihu jabhu.”
ROM 3:19 Henu tumanyi kubha mambu ghokapi ghaghapwagha mu Shelia, ghapwagha kwa bhala bhabhabhi pahi ja Shelia, nahuli kila ndomu ngawikubha na chakukopunganela, na kulangiha kubha ndema wokapi ubhi pahi ja utemulo waka Chapanga.
ROM 3:20 Maghambu njeta mundu hata jumu joanajetakaliwa palongi jaka Chapanga kwa matendu gha Shelia, kwa ndandi kumanya mahoku kuhika kwa indela ja Shelia.
ROM 3:21 Nambu sajenu, indela jaka Chapanga ja kubhajetakela bhandu kubha bhambone jijomwi kumanyikana, kabhete panga na Shelia. Na Shelia na bhalota bhaka Chapanga bhalandila lijambu leniheli.
ROM 3:22 Kubhalangika bhambone na Chapanga kupatikana kwa indela ja uhobhalelu kwaka Yesu Kristo kwa bhokapi bhabhahobhalela, kwa ndandi njeta tofauti jokapi jela:
ROM 3:23 maghambu bhokapi bhahengiki mahoku na kukepakewa na ulumbalilu waka Chapanga.
ROM 3:24 Bhandu bhokapi bhajetakalewa kubha bhambone waka, kwa chihomu chaka Chapanga, kwa indela ja ukombola ghoubhi muka Yesu Kristo.
ROM 3:25 Chapanga akumbohiki Yesu kubha nyambiku ja ujonganeshu, nahuli kwa mwahi waki, abya indela ja kubhabhokeha bhandu mahoku ghabhu kwa uhobhalelu wabhu kwaki. Chapanga akahengiki bhenibhela nahuli aweza kulangiha wamboni waki. Kwa ndandi pamwandi hapa Chapanga akabhi ahinakila panga kulolakela mahoku gha bhandu.
ROM 3:26 Nambu sajenu Chapanga ahengiki bhenibhela nahuli apata kulangi kubha nde umbone wa ntundu bhole ghoubhi na samani palongi jaki, nahuli abya wambone na joambalangi wambone mundu jola joanhobhalela Yesu.
ROM 3:27 Bhela, bho, kulilumbalila kubhi kwako? Njeta! Bho, kwa Shelia ja ntundu bhole? Bho, kwa Shelia ja matendu? Ngabhela! Nambu kwa Shelia ja uhobhalelu.
ROM 3:28 Bhela, sajenu tubhona kubha mundu ajetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga kwa uhobhalelu, panga na matendu gha Shelia.
ROM 3:29 Au bho? Chapanga le nde Chapanga wa Bhayahude kanjika jabho? Bho, jombi le nga Chapanga wa mataifa ghokapi? Ena, jombi nde Chapanga wa mataifa ghokapi bhelabhela.
ROM 3:30 Anangati chakaka kubhi na Chapanga jumu pela, joanabhabhalangya bhambone bhala bhabhahekiti jando kwa uhobhalelu, na bhala bhangakuheketa jando anaabhabhalangya bhambone kwa indela ja uhobhalelu bhelabhela.
ROM 3:31 Bho, tutumila uhobhalelu nahuli kujibhoha Shelia heji? Ngabhela hata pachokope! Nambu tujipekeha Shelia samani jaki kamili.
ROM 4:1 Bho, henu tupwagha bhole panani jaka Ibulahimu, atati witu kwa ntundu wa hyegha?
ROM 4:2 Maghambu anakubhi Ibulahimu akajetakaliwi palongi jaka Chapanga kwa ndandi ja matendu ghaki, abhi nalu la kulilumbalila, nambu nga palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 4:3 Kwa ndandi, bho, Malembu Mahuhu ghapwagha bhole? “Ibulahimu akunhobhali Chapanga, kwa bhenibhela ikabhalangiki kwaki kubha wambone.”
ROM 4:4 Nambu kwaka mundu joahenga lihengu, malepu ghaki ngacheghabhalangika kubha chihomu, nambu nde malepu ghaki ghaalipatile.
ROM 4:5 Nambu kwaka mundu jwangakutegamela matendu ghaki mweni, nambu anhobhale Chapanga ambaju abhalekakela bhahakau, bhela, Chapanga abhalanga uhobhalelu waka mundu hoju, na kunjetakela kubha wambone.
ROM 4:6 Ngati Daude moalongalela mbanga kwaki mundu jola ambaju Chapanga ambalangila kubha wambone panga matendu:
ROM 4:7 “Mbanga bhabhalekakiwi mahakau ghabhu, na bhabhayekaliwi mahoku ghabhu.
ROM 4:8 Mbanga mundu jola ambaju Chapanga ngacheambalangila mahoku ghaki.”
ROM 4:9 Bho, mbanga jeniheji le nde kwa bhala bhabhahekiti jando pela, au kabhete na kwa bhala bhangakuheketa jando? Maghambu tujomwi kupwagha kubha Ibulahimu akajetakaliwi palongi jaka Chapanga kwa indela ja uhobhalelu waki.
ROM 4:10 Bho, akabhalangiwi chikahi bhole? Paakahekiti jando, au paakabhi akali nga kuheketa jando? Nga paakahekiti jando, nambu paakabhi akali ngakuheketa jando.
ROM 4:11 Ibulahimu akahekiti jando pakalonge, na kuheketa jando hoku kukabhi nginyulila jejilangiya kubha Chapanga akunjetakili kubha wambone kwa ndandi ja uhobhalelu waki ghoakabhi naku paakabhi akali ngakuheketa jando. Bhela Ibulahimu abhi atati wa bhokapi, hata ngati ngachebhahekiti jando, nambu bhunhobhali Chapanga, nahuli na bhombi bhabhalangiwa kubha bhambone.
ROM 4:12 Bhelabhela jombi nde atati wa bhala bhabhahekiti jando, nambu nga kwa ndandi bhahekiti jando, nambu maghambu bhajengalela indela jela ja uhobhalelu ja atati witu Ibulahimu jeajengalile paakabhi akali ngakuheketa jando.
ROM 4:13 Chapanga akundaghi Ibulahimu na lubheleku lwaki kubha anaabhapekya ndema ubya wabhu. Chilanga hechi ngachechahengakiki kwa ndandi Ibulahimu akakamwi Shelia, nambu kwa kubha akatehi kuhobhalela, bhela akabhalangiki kubha wambone palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 4:14 Maghambu anangati bhala bhabhatama kwa Shelia nde bhapwelelu, uhobhalelu ngacheubhi na ndandi jokapi, na chilanga chaka Chapanga nga chindu.
ROM 4:15 Kwa ndandi Shelia jileta inyela, maghambu pangakubha Shelia, njeta mahoku.
ROM 4:16 Bhela chilanga hechi chihika kwa uhobhalelu, nahuli chikubhaje kwa indela ja chihomu chaka Chapanga, na kubha nde uchakaka chilanga hechi nde kwa bhokapi, nga kwa bhala bhabhakamu Shelia pela, nambu bhelabhela kwa bhala bhabhatama kwa uhobhalelu ngati Ibulahimu. Jombi nde atati witu tabhokapi.
ROM 4:17 Ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Nukubhekiki kubha atati wa mataifa ghamaheli.” Chilanga hechi nde chakaka palongi jaka Chapanga ambaju Ibulahimu akunhobhalile, Chapanga joabhapeke womi bhabhapotile, na kwa amuli jaki, hindu yangakubha ikubha.
ROM 4:18 Hata ngati ngachekwabhi na chindu chechakuntendiki Ibulahimu ategamya chilanga, Ibulahimu akunhobhali Chapanga na kuchitegamela chilanga, na bhela abhi atati wa mataifa ghamaheli, ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Bhabhelakeka bhaku anabhakubha bhamaheli ngati ndondwa.”
ROM 4:19 Akabhi mzee wa pambipi hyaka mia jimu, nambu uhobhalelu waki ngachewakepike hata ngati akamanyi kubha akabhi akongapile nakanopi na ngacheaweza kupata mwana, kabhete nhwanu waki Sala, akabhi apetike hyaka yaki ya kubheleka.
ROM 4:20 Nambu Ibulahimu ngacheakabhi na choghohi kubha chilanga chaka Chapanga ngachipitalile, akajeghaliki makili kwa uhobhalelu waki, na akundumbali Chapanga.
ROM 4:21 Akamanyi chakaka kubha Chapanga aweza kuhenga ghala ghaalaghile.
ROM 4:22 Bhela nde ndandi Chapanga akumbalangili kubha wambone.
ROM 4:23 Nambu paipwaghakika, “Akabhalangiki kubha wambone,” ngacheghapwagha kwa ndandi jaki kanjika pela,
ROM 4:24 nambu bhelabhela tepani tetujetakalewa na Chapanga jotunhobhalela joakamuhyohiki Yesu, Bambo witu, kuhuma kwa bhabhapotile.
ROM 4:25 Jombi akabhohakiki akomakikaje kwa ndandi ja mahoku ghitu, na akahyokiki nahuli tujetakaliwaje palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 5:1 Henu, kwa kubha tujetakaliwi palongi jaka Chapanga kwa uhobhalelu, bhela tubhi na lukwali na Chapanga kwa indela jaka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo.
ROM 5:2 Kwa uhobhalelu witu, Yesu atuletiki mu hali ajeji ja chihomu chaka Chapanga ambachu sajenu tujema mkati jaki. Bhela, tuhekalela lihobhalelu letubhi nalu la kushiliki ulumbalilu waka Chapanga.
ROM 5:3 Wala nga bhenibhela pela, nambu muhekalya kabheti mu mang'ahiku, mkamanya kubha kung'ahika kuleta uhinakilu,
ROM 5:4 na lihengu la uhinakilu nde ukangamalu wa mtima, na lihengu la ukangamalu wa mtima nde kuleta lihobhalelu,
ROM 5:5 wala lihobhalelu ngachelituheketa utokulelu, kwa ndandi Chapanga ajomwi kujeghela mu mitima jitu upalu waki kwa indela jaka Roho Mhuhu joatupekihe.
ROM 5:6 Kwa ndandi patukabhi tukali ngakubha na makili, chikahi pachahikiki, Kristo akapotile kwa ndandi jitu tepani bhahakau.
ROM 5:7 Kwa ndandi kunonwipi mundu kupotela kwa ndandi jaka mundu wambone, nambu iwezikana mundu kulenga kupotela kwa ndandi jaka mundu wambone.
ROM 5:8 Nambu Chapanga alangi upalu waki mweni kwitu tepani, kwa kubha Kristo akapotile kwa ndandi jitu, chikahi patukabhi tukali tubhi na mahoku!
ROM 5:9 Bhela, kwa kubha sajenu tujetakaliwi palongi jaka Chapanga kwa mwahi waka Kristo, nde chakaka anatukengaliwaje na inyela jaka Chapanga kwaka jombi.
ROM 5:10 Kwa ndandi patukabhi tukali maadui bhaki, Chapanga akatujonganishi naku kwa kupotela kwaka Mwana waki. Na kwa kubha sajenu tujonganishwi naku, nde hotuhotu nakanopi kubha anatukengaliwaje kwa womi waka Kristo.
ROM 5:11 Wala nga bhenibhela pela, nambu bhelabhela tuhekalela muka Chapanga kwa indela jaka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo, ambaju kwaka jombi sajenu tuujopalili ujonganeshu ghonihoghu.
ROM 5:12 Bhela kwa indela jaka mundu jumu lihoku lakajingi pundema, na kwa lihoku leniheli kupotela, na bhela kupotela kubhahikili bhandu bhokapi kwa ndandi bhokapi bhatendiki mahoku.
ROM 5:13 Kwa ndandi mangane ja Shelia lihoku lakabhi pundema, nambu lihoku ngachelibhalangika panga na Shelia.
ROM 5:14 Nambu kutumbula chikahi chaka Adamu mbaka Musa, nyiwa jakabhatawili hata bhala ambabhu ngachebhahengiki lihakau ngati lela laka Adamu, la kumpenga Chapanga. Adamu akabhi ulenganesu waka jola joanahikaje palongi.
ROM 5:15 Nambu lihakau laka Adamu ngacheliweza kulenganeshwa na chihomu chaka Chapanga. Kwa ndandi hata ngati lihakau laka mundu jumu likapelakili nyiwa kwa bhokapi, kwa wambone waka mundu jumu, yani Yesu Kristo, Chapanga abhajonjukili bhandu bhamaheli chihomu na nhupu waki.
ROM 5:16 Kubhi na tofauti pachilanda ja nhupu waka Chapanga na lihoku laka mundu jumu jola. Kwa ndandi kubhokana na lihoku laka mundu jumu, Chapanga akabhohiki utemulo, nambu kubhonakana na mahoku gha bhandu bhamaheli, Chapanga akabhohiki nhupu waki kwa kubhalekakela.
ROM 5:17 Chakaka, kwa lihoku laka mundu jumu, kupotela kukatumbwi kutawala kwa ndandi jaka mundu jumu hoju, nambu, nde chakaka nakanopi bhala bhabhajopale wamaheli wa chihomu chaka Chapanga, na nhupu wa kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga, anabhatawala mu womi kwaka jumu jola, yani Yesu Kristo!
ROM 5:18 Bhela, ngati bhela lihoku laka mundu jumu molileti utemulo kwa bhandu bhokapi, bhelabhela kwa kubha mundu jumu akatendiki ngati moipalikila kwaka Chapanga, bhandu bhokapi bhakajetakaliwi palongi jaka Chapanga na kubhatenda bhabya na womi.
ROM 5:19 Kwa ndandi ngati kwa kulepalela kwaki mundu jumu kujengalela Shelia yaka Chapanga bhandu bhamaheli bhahengakiki kubha bhana mahoku, bhelabhela kwa kujengalela Shelia yaka Chapanga kwaka mundu jumu bhandu bhamaheli bhatendakiki kubha bhambone palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 5:20 Nambu Shelia jakahikiki nahuli lihoku lela libya likolongwa nakanopi, na mahoku paghajonjukiki, chihomu chakajonjukiki nakanopi,
ROM 5:21 nahuli kubha, ngati bhela lihoku molatawali mu nyiwa, bhelabhela kwa indela ja kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga, chihomu chitawalaje na kuleta womi wa mileli kwa indela jaka Yesu Kristo Bambo witu.
ROM 6:1 Bho, henu tupwagha bhole? Bho, tujendalya kuhenga mahoku nahuli chihomu chijonjukikaje?
ROM 6:2 Ngabhela! Bho, tepani tetuliweli lihoku, anatuweza bhole kujendalela kutama kabhete mu mahoku?
ROM 6:3 Bho, ngachemmanyi kubha tepani tabhokapi tetubatizwi muka Kristo Yesu tukabatizwi mu nyiwa jaki?
ROM 6:4 Patukabatizwi tukalombini papamu naku mu nyiwa jaki, tukataghakiki papamu naku, nahuli ngati Kristo moakahyokile kuhuma kwa bhabhapotile kwa indela ja ulumbalilu wa Atati, bhelabhela na tepani tutamaje mu matamu ghahenu.
ROM 6:5 Kwa ndandi ngati tepani tulombini naku mu nyiwa ngati jombi, bhelabhela anatulombana naku kwa kuhyohakeka kuhuma kwa bhabhapotile ngati jombi.
ROM 6:6 Tumanyi kubha umundu witu wa mwandi ukawambakiki papamu na Kristo, nahuli hyegha ja mahoku jiyonangikaje, ngatwikubha kabhete bhatumwa bha mahoku.
ROM 6:7 Kwa ndandi mundu jola joapotile abhekakiki kulijeka kutali na mahoku.
ROM 6:8 Nambu anakubhi tukapotili papamu na Kristo, bhelabhela tuhobhalela kubha anatutama papamu naku.
ROM 6:9 Kwa ndandi tumanyi kubha Kristo ajomwi kuhyoka kuhuma kwa bhabhapotile na ngaapoteli kabhete, wala nyiwa ngajuntawali kabhete.
ROM 6:10 Kwa ndandi kwa kola kupotela kwaki, akaliweli lihoku mala nunkamu pela, nambu kwa kola kutama kwaki, atama mu ujumu na Chapanga.
ROM 6:11 Bhelabhela, na mwenga mulibhalangaje kubha bhabhapotile mu mahoku, na bhabhabhi bhomi kwaka Chapanga kwa indela jaka Bambo witu Kristo Yesu.
ROM 6:12 Bhela mahoku ngaghitawala kabhete hyegha hinu yeipotela, na hata kutii utokulelu waki uhakau.
ROM 6:13 Wala ngamwijendalela kubhoha hata chiungu chimu cha hyegha jinu kubha chindu cha kutendela mahoku. Nambu mulibhoha mabhete kwaka Chapanga ngati bhandu bhabhabhi bhomi badala ja kupotela, na ihungu hinu kwaka Chapanga kubha yombu ya kuhengela ghaghajetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 6:14 Kwa ndandi lihoku ngaluntawali kabhete mwehapa, maghambu ngachembi pahi ja Shelia, nambu pahi ja chihomu.
ROM 6:15 Bho, henu tupwagha kike? Bho, tuhenga mahoku maghambu ngachetubhi pahi ja Shelia nambu pahi ja chihomu? Ngabhela hata pachokope!
ROM 6:16 Bho, ngachemmanyi kubha kwaka jombi ambaju mulibhoha mabhete kubha bhatumwa bhaki mu kuntii, mkubha bhatumwa bhaki jola jomunjowanela, kubha nde utumika wa mahoku ghouleta kupotela au utumika wa kuntii Chapanga joatutenda tujetakalewa palongi jaki?
ROM 6:17 Nambu Chapanga na achengulikaje, kwa ndandi pakutumbula mkabhi bhatumwa bha mahoku, nambu sajenu mbi mwenjengalela kwa mitima jinu mabholu ghala ghampekiwe.
ROM 6:18 Mkakengaliki kuhuma mu utumwa wa mahoku, sajenu mbi bhatumwa bha mambu ghala ghaghajetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 6:19 Pambani nongela kwa ntundu wa kihyegha kwa ndandi ja uzaifu wa hyegha hinu. Kwa ndandi ngati mombokili ihungu hinu itumikaje kwa uhakau nahuli mtendaje mahakau ngati mompalila, bhelabhela sajenu mboha ihungu hinu itumikaje kwa mambu ghala ghaghajetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga nahuli mpata kubha bhahuhu.
ROM 6:20 Kwa ndandi pamukabhi bhatumwa bha mahoku, mkabhi mulijeka pangakutenda mambu ghala ghaaghapala Chapanga.
ROM 6:21 Bho, henu mkapatiki nyonjeka bholi machobha ghala kubhokana na mambu ghala ghamughabhone iyoni sajeno? Maghambu ujomukelu wa mambu ghanihagha nde kupotela.
ROM 6:22 Nambu sajenu njomwi kubhekakeka kulijeka, na kubha kutali na mahoku, na kuhengakeka kubha bhatumwa bhaka Chapanga, nyonjeka jembi naju sajenu nde uhuhu, na mapitalilu ghaki nde womi wa mileli.
ROM 6:23 Kwa ndandi malepu gha mahoku nde kupotela, nambu nhupu waka Chapanga nde womi wa mileli mu kulombana na Kristo Yesu Bambo witu.
ROM 7:1 Bhalongu bhangu, bho, ngachemmanyi ndandi nongela na bhala bhabhajimanyi shelia kubha shelia juntawala mundu chikahi paakubha mwome?
ROM 7:2 Kwa ndandi mbomba joabhi na ndomi akongakiki na shelia kwaka ndomi waki chikahi paakubha mwome, nambu ndomi anaapotili, abhopuliwi na shelia jaka ndomi jela.
ROM 7:3 Bhela chikahi ndomi paakubha mwome, ngati anaabhi na mwanalomi jongi alowakeka mgone. Nambu ndomi anapotile, mbomba akubha alijeka, ngacheakongakeka kabhete na shelia heji, na hata ngati anaatoghuliki na mwanalomi jongi, akubha nga mgone.
ROM 7:4 Bhelabhela bhalongu bhango, mwenga nanamu mpotili kubhokana na Shelia, kwa indela ja hyegha jaka Yesu Kristo, mpata kubha mali ghaka mundu jongi, jola joakahyokike kuhuma kwa bhabhawile, nahuli tubhaleta bhandu kwaka Chapanga.
ROM 7:5 Kwa ndandi patukabhi tutama kwa kulonguheka na hyegha, utokulelu kwa mahoku, ghoukabhi kwa ndandi ja Shelia, ukahengiki lihengu mu hyegha hitu na ghokapi ghatukahengiki ghakatupeliki mu kupotela.
ROM 7:6 Nambu sajenu tubhopuliki kuhuma mu Shelia, maghambu tupotili kubhokana na lijambu lela lelikatubhekiki tepani bhatumwa. Henu tutumakila kujengalanela na matamu ghahenu gha Roho, na nga kujengalanela na hali jela ja Shelia jejalembakike.
ROM 7:7 Bho, henu tupwaga bhole? Bho, Shelia nde mahoku? Ngabhela hata pachokope! Kwa ndandi nganakalimanyi lihoku nambu kwa Shelia, maghambu nganakamanyi kutokulela nde kike, ngati Shelia ngajakapwaghike, “Ngawitokulela.”
ROM 7:8 Nambu lihoku lakapatiki mbekenyu kwa amuli jela, jakahengiki mkati jangu kila ntundu wa utokulelu. Kwa ndandi lihoku panga na shelia lipotile.
ROM 7:9 Nanatu nakabhi mwomi pamwandi hapa panga shelia, nambu pajahikiki amuli jela, lihoku lakahyokiki, na nakapotile.
ROM 7:10 Nakaweni kubha amuli jejapalakiki kuleta womi jela, kwangu nepani jakaletiki kupotela.
ROM 7:11 Maghambu lihoku kwa kupata mbekenyu kwa amuli jela, jakatehi kungolowa, na bhela jakangomike kupetela amuli heji.
ROM 7:12 Bhela Shelia nde jihuhu, na amuli jela nde jihuhu, na ja chakaka, na kabhete nde jambone.
ROM 7:13 Henu, bho, jela jejibhi jambone jakabhi nyiwa kwangu nepani? Ngabhela hata pachokope! Nambu lihoku, nahuli libhonikana kubha nde lihoku chakaka, likahengiki nyiwa mkati jangu kwa indela ja chinyahi chela, nahuli kwa amuli jela lihoku lijonjukikaje kubha lihakau nakanopi.
ROM 7:14 Kwa ndandi tumanyi kubha Shelia nde ja kiroho, nambu nepani nde mundu wa kihyegha, nombasiki kubha mtumwa wa mahoku.
ROM 7:15 Ngachemanyi chenikihenga, maghambu lela lembalika kulihenga, ngachenilihenga, nambu lela lenilihakalila leniheli nde lenilihenga.
ROM 7:16 Nambu anangati nhenga lela langakulipala kuhenga, nde kubha nyetakela kubha Shelia nde jambone.
ROM 7:17 Bhela nga nepani kabhete nenhenga lela langakulipala kuhenga, nambu lihoku lela lelitama mkati jangu.
ROM 7:18 Kwa ndandi manyi kubha mkati jangu, yani, mkati ja hyegha jangu, ngachelitama lilobhi lambone, ndandi kupala mbala, nambu kuhenga lijambu lelibhi lambone ngachenhweza.
ROM 7:19 Maghambu lijambu lambone lenilipala lela, ngachenilihenga, nambu lijambu lihakau langakulipala lela nde lenilihenga.
ROM 7:20 Bhela anangati lela langakulipala nde lenilihenga, nga nepani nenilihenga, nambu lihoku lela lelitama mkati jangu.
ROM 7:21 Bhela nijiweni shelia ajeji, kubha kwangu nepani pambala kuhenga lelibhi lambone, lela lelibhi lihakau nde lenilihaghula.
ROM 7:22 Kwa ndandi nijihekalela Shelia jaka Chapanga kwa mtima wa mkati.
ROM 7:23 Nambu mona kubhi na shelia jengi jejihenga lihengu mu hyegha jangu, shelia jejipengana na jela jejijetakalewa na malangu ghangu. Na bhela jimeka mya mkongeka wa shelia ja mahoku jejihenga lihengu mu hyegha jangu.
ROM 7:24 Kahochu nenga! Bho, nde nane joanangengalyaje kuhuma mu hyegha jenjenu jejimbeleka mu kupotela?
ROM 7:25 Nunchengu Chapanga, kwa indela jaka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo! Bhela, aje nde hali jangu, nepani kwa malangu ghangu, nijitumakila Shelia jaka Chapanga, nambu kwa hyegha jangu nijitumakila shelia ja mahoku.
ROM 8:1 Henu nde, njeta utemulo wa azabu kwa bhala bhabhabhi mkati jaka Yesu Kristo.
ROM 8:2 Kwa ndandi Shelia ja Roho jejileta womi ghola ghoubhi mkati jaka Kristo Yesu jinekiki kulijeka, kuhuma mu shelia ja mahoku na kupotela.
ROM 8:3 Kwa ndandi ghala ghangakuwezikana na Shelia, kwa mola mojabheli zaifu kwa ndandi ja hyegha, Chapanga akuntumiki Mwana waki mwene mu ulenganesu wa hyegha jejibhi na mahoku, na kwa ndandi ja mahoku, akatemuliwi mahoku mu hyegha.
ROM 8:4 Chapanga akahengiki bhenibhela nahuli malaghalakilu gha haki gha Shelia ghahengakikaje ngati moghapalakila mkati jitu tetubhi tabhomi, nga kwa makili gha kimundu, nambu kwa makili ghaka Roho Mhuhu.
ROM 8:5 Kwa ndandi bhala bhabhajengalela hyegha bhaholale mambu gha hyegha, nambu bhala bhabhajengalela Roho Mhuhu bhaholale mambu ghaka Roho Mhuhu.
ROM 8:6 Kwa kubha maholalelu ghaghalonguheka na hyegha nde kupotela, nambu maholalelu ghaghalonguheka na Roho Mhuhu nde womi na lukwale.
ROM 8:7 Kwa ndandi jola joatawaliwa na maholalelu gha hyegha nde adui waka Chapanga, ndandi ngacheajikamula Shelia jaka Chapanga, wala ngacheaweza kujitii.
ROM 8:8 Bhandu bhala bhabhatawaliwa na hyegha, ngachebhaweza kunyambiha Chapanga.
ROM 8:9 Nambu anakubhi Roho waka Chapanga atama mkati jinu, mwenga ngachenjengale kabhete hyegha, nambu munjengale Roho Mhuhu. Nambu mundu jokapi jwangakubha na Roho waka Kristo, jonihoju nga waka Kristo.
ROM 8:10 Na Kristo anaabhi mkati jinu, hyegha jinu jipotile kwa ndandi ja mahoku, nambu Roho nde womi kwinu, kwa ndandi ja wambone.
ROM 8:11 Nambu anakubhi Roho jaki jola joakamuhyohiki Yesu kuhuma kwa bhabhawili atama mkati jinu, bhela jola joakamuhyohiki Kristo Yesu kuhuma kwa bhabhawile anaayipekya womi hyegha hinu yeibhi na ntundu wa kupotela, anahenga bhenibhela kwa indela jaka Roho waki joatama mkati jinu.
ROM 8:12 Bhela, bhalongu bhango, tubhi na lihengu la kuhenga, nambu nga kutama kwa kujengalela mambu gha hyegha.
ROM 8:13 Maghambu anantama kwa kujengalela mambu gha hyegha, mpala kupotela, nambu ngati anamughakomiki matendu gha hyegha kwa Roho, anamkubha mabhomi.
ROM 8:14 Kwa ndandi bhokapi bhabhalonguheka na Roho waka Chapanga, bhanihabha nde bhana bhaka Chapanga.
ROM 8:15 Kwa ndandi ngachemwajopali kabhete Roho wa kuntenda mwehapa bhatumwa kabhete na kunjeghe choghohi, nambu munjopalili Roho joantenda mwehapa kubha bhana bhaka Chapanga, na kwa Roho hoju, jotundelela tepani, “Aba,” yani, “Atati!”
ROM 8:16 Roho mwene alandila papamu na roho hitu, kubha tepani nde tabhana bhaka Chapanga.
ROM 8:17 Bhela kwa kubha tepani nde tabhana bhaka Chapanga, henu tubhi bhapwelelu, bhapwelelu bhaka Chapanga, bhabhapwelela papamu na Kristo, ena, tung'ahakika papamu naku nahuli tupata kulumbaliwa papamu naku.
ROM 8:18 Kwa ndandi naghabhalanga mang'ahiku gha chikahi cha sajenu kubha nga chindu ngati ulumbalilu ghola ghowihyekuliwa kwitu.
ROM 8:19 Kwa ndandi ihumbi yokapi nayombi ilendalela kwa kutokulela kwamaheli kuhyekuliwa kwa bhana bhaka Chapanga.
ROM 8:20 Kwa ndandi ihumbi yokapi nayombi ikabhekakiki mu hali ja kubhonikana ngati nga chindu, nga kwa kupala kwabhu, nambu kwa ndandi ja kupala kwaki Chapanga. Hata bhela kubhi na lihobhalelu,
ROM 8:21 ndandi ihumbi heyi nayombi anaikengaliwaje kuhuma mu utumwa wa kuyonangeka, na hata kujingila mu lujeku lwa ulumbalilu wa bhana bhaka Chapanga.
ROM 8:22 Kwa ndandi tepani tumanyi kubha mbaka sajenu, ihumbi yokapi nayombi ilela kwa mabhinilu ngati ghaka mbomba joapala kulibhopo mwana.
ROM 8:23 Wala nga ihumbi heyi kanjika jaki, nambu na tepani tetubhi na malimbuko ghaka Roho Mhuhu, tepani natatu tulwala mu mitima jitu, tukalendalya kuhengakeka bhana bhaka Chapanga, yani, ukombola wa hyegha hitu.
ROM 8:24 Kwa ndandi tukakengaliwi kwa lihobhalelu, nambu chindu chechahobhaliki anatuchiweni, ngachekikubha kabhete lihobhalelu. Kwa ndandi bho, nde nane joachihobhalela chela cheachibhona?
ROM 8:25 Nambu anatuchihobhali chindu changakuchibhona, tukilendalela kwa kuhinakalila.
ROM 8:26 Bhelabhela Roho najombi anaatujangatya mu mazaifu ghitu, maghambu ngachetumanyi kulobha ngati moitupalakila, nambu Roho mwene atulobhela kwaka Chapanga kwa mabhinilu makolongwa ghangakuweza kulongaleka.
ROM 8:27 Na Chapanga joabhona mbaka mkati ja mitima ja bhandu, amanyi maholalelu ghaka Roho hoju, kwa kubha Roho hoju abhalobhela bhahuhu kulengana na mapalu ghaka Chapanga.
ROM 8:28 Na tepani tumanyi kubha, kubhokana na mambu ghanihagha ghokapi, Chapanga ahenga lihengu papamu na bhala bhabhumpala, mu kubhapekeha mambu ghambone, yani, bhala bhabhalowakiki kwa ndandi jaki.
ROM 8:29 Kwa ndandi bhala bhaakabhamanyi kutumbu pakutumbula, nde bhaabhalowiki bhapata kulengana na Mwana waki, nahuli Mwana abya mbelakeka wa kutumbula pachilanda ja bhalongu bhamaheli.
ROM 8:30 Na bhala bhaakahawili kutumbu pakutumbula, nde bhala bhaakalohike, na bhala bhaakalohike, bhanihabha nde bhaakabhatendiki bhajetakaliwaje palongi jaki, na bhala bhaakabhajetakili palongi jaki, bhanihabha nde bhaakabhalumbalile.
ROM 8:31 Bho, henu tupwagha kiki panani ja ghanihagha? Ngati Chapanga anaabhi upambala witu, bho, nde nane joaweza kutupenga?
ROM 8:32 Chapanga ngacheakumboni chiha Mwana waki wa kanjika, nambu akumbohiki kwa ndandi jitu tepani tabhokapi, bho, anaakotuka bholi kutupeke waka kabhete ghambone ghokapi papamu naku?
ROM 8:33 Bho, nde nane joaweza kubhatakila bhahaghulika bhaka Chapanga? Chapanga mwene nde joabhatenda bhajetakalewaje palongi jaki.
ROM 8:34 Bho, nde nane joabhatemulaje? Njeta! Maghambu Kristo Yesu nde joakapotili, ena, na nakanopi ja ghanihagha, akahyokiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa, najombi atami upambala wa kumalelelu wa chiwoku chaka Chapanga, kabhete jombi nde joatulobhela.
ROM 8:35 Bho, nde nane joaweza kutulombola tepani na upalu waka Kristo? Bho, ulale au kulagha, au mang'ahiku, au injala, au kukosa ingobhu, au hatali, au lipanga?
ROM 8:36 Ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Kwa ndandi jaku tukomakeka chikahi chokapi, tubhalangiwi kubha ngati mambelele gha kuchinjakika.”
ROM 8:37 Nambu kubhokana na mambu ghanihagha ghokapi tepani nde nakanopi ja bhashindi, kupetela kwaki jombi joakatupalike.
ROM 8:38 Kwa ndandi manyi chakaka kubha njeta chindu chechiweza kutulombola tepani na upalu waki, nga nyiwa, wala womi, wala bhatumika bha kunani bhaka Chapanga, wala majobhi, wala ghaghabhile, wala ghaghibyaje, wala bhabhabhi na lujiniku,
ROM 8:39 wala ghaghabhi kunani, wala ghaghabhi pahi. Njeta kiumbi chokapi chela chechiweza kutulombola tepani na upalu waka Chapanga ghoubhi muka Kristo Yesu Bambo witu.
ROM 9:1 Nongela chakaka muka Kristo, na kwa kulonguheka na Roho Mhuhu, na zamili jangu jinandila kubha ngachembwagha upuhi,
ROM 9:2 mili na huzuni jamaheli na mabhinilu ghangakujomoka muntima wangu.
ROM 9:3 Kwa ndandi nakabya mweziki kulobha namwete kubha mbata masolu na kutengakeka na Kristo kwa ndandi ja bhalongu bhangu bha mwahi,
ROM 9:4 ambabhu nde Bhaizilaeli, bhabhatendakiki kubha bhana, yani bhana bhaka Chapanga, na kubhalangi ulumbalilu ghola, na akatendiki nabhu malaghilu, na akabhapeki Shelia jaki, na ibada ja chakaka jaka Chapanga na chilanga yaki.
ROM 9:5 Bhombi nde bhachokolu bha akahokolu. Na mu bhanihabha akapitiki Kristo kwa ntundu wa hyegha. Chapanga joatawala panani ja mambu ghokapi, na alumbalikaje mileli! Amina.
ROM 9:6 Ngachembwagha kubha chilanga yaka Chapanga itendiki kulepalela. Maghambu nga Bhaizilaeli bhokapi bhabhabhi bhandu bhaka Chapanga.
ROM 9:7 Wala nga bhana bhokapi bhaka Ibulahimu nde bhana bhaki bha chakaka, nambu ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Bhabhelakeka bhaku anabhabhokanaje na Isaka.”
ROM 9:8 Nde kupwagha kubha, nga bhala bhabhabhelakiki kwa ntundu wa hyegha nde bhana bhaka Chapanga, nambu bhana bhala bhabhabhelakiki kubhokana na chilanga chaka Chapanga nde bhabhabhalangika kubha bhabhelakeka bhaki bha chakaka.
ROM 9:9 Maghambu lilobhi la chilanga nde lendenu, “Kwa chikahi ngati chenjenu, ananhika kabhete, na Sala anaapata mwana wa chikambaku.”
ROM 9:10 Wala nga bhenibhela pela, nambu najombi Labeka akapatiki bhana mapaa kwa atati jumu, yani Isaka, ahokolu witu.
ROM 9:11 Bhana mapaa bhala pabhakabhi bhakali nga kubhelakeka, wala bhakali nga kuhenga lijambu lokapi lela linyahi au lihakau, nahuli lijema lengu laka Chapanga la kuhaghula: Nga kwa ndandi ja matendu gha bhandu, nambu kwa ndandi ja kupala kwaki mwene,
ROM 9:12 Chapanga akumpwaghi Labeka ana, “Nkolongwa anaantumakya nchoku.”
ROM 9:13 Ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Nukumpaliki Yakobo, nambu nukunhakali Esau.”
ROM 9:14 Bho, henu tupwagha bhole? Bho, Chapanga le muhakau? Ngabhela!
ROM 9:15 Maghambu Chapanga akumpwaghi Musa, “Ananunjangatya mundu jola jombala kunjangatila, na ananumbonila chiha mundu jola jombala kumbone chiha.”
ROM 9:16 Henu anangati bhenibhela, nga kupetela uwezu waka jola joapala, wala jola joakembela, nambu waka jola joabhi na chiha, yani Chapanga.
ROM 9:17 Maghambu Malembu Mahuhu ghapwagha ana kwaka Falao, “Nakakujemiki kubha nkolongwa nahuli kwa indela jaku, nangiha makili ghangu kwaku, na lihina langu likatangazika pundema pokapi.”
ROM 9:18 Henu ana bhenibhela, Chapanga ambone chiha jokapi joapala kumbone chiha, na joapala kumbeka abya na ing'omu, ambeka abya bhenibhela.
ROM 9:19 Bhela anaumbwaghila, “Anangati mambu ghanihagha ghabhi bhenibhela, bho, Chapanga le aweza kundaumu mundu? Kwa ndandi bho, nde nane joaweza kughapenga mapalu ghaki?”
ROM 9:20 Nambu wehapa wa mundu, bho, wehapa wa nane weuyangana na Chapanga? Bho, chindu chechibhombakiki le chiweza kundaluki joakibhombiki, “Bho, maghambu kiki umombiki anana?”
ROM 9:21 Bho, joabhomba ibhegha le ngacheaweza kulutumi lutopi ngati moapalila na kubhomba ihulu ibheli kwa lutopi lolalola, chimu kwa kutumika kwa kutopela, na chengi kutumika kwa kawaida?
ROM 9:22 Bhenibhela nde mokubhelile kwaka Chapanga. Akapaliki kulangiha inyela jaki na kughamanyiha makili ghaki. Bhela, akahinakili namaa, koni akabhahinakyaje bhandu bhala ambabhu bhakabhi nde lengu la inyela jaki, ambabhu ikabhapaliki kuyonangeka.
ROM 9:23 Akapaliki kabhete kulangiha wamaheli wa ulumbalilu waki ambahu akatujitalili tepani tetubhi lengu la chiha chaki, tepani ambabhu akajomwili kutubheka wichu kwa kuujopalela ulumbalilu waki.
ROM 9:24 Kwa ndandi nde tepani tetulowakiki, nga kuhuma pachilanda ja Bhayahude pela, nambu na kuhuma kwa mataifa ghangi.
ROM 9:25 Ngati Chapanga moapwaghila mu chitabu chaka mlota Hosea: “Ananabhaloha ‘Bhandu bhangu,’ bhala bhangakubha bhandu bhangu! Na kundoha ‘Mpalu wangu,’ jola jwangakubha mpalu wangu!
ROM 9:26 Na kabhete anaikubha pandu pala panakabhapwaghile ‘Mwehapa nga bhandu bhangu,’ bhombi anabhalowakika ‘Bhana bhaka Chapanga joabhi mwomi!’ ”
ROM 9:27 Mlota Isaya najombi ajamalila panani ja Izilaeli akapwagha, “Hata ngati ubhalangiku wa bhana bha Izilaeli utehi kujoloka, ngati luhanga lwa mumaheku ja bahali, mahighalilu ghabhu pela nde bhabhikengaliwaje.
ROM 9:28 Kwa ndandi Bambo anaahenga utemulo waki manyata, na kwa ukamilifu panani ja ndema wokapi.”
ROM 9:29 Na kabhete ngati mlota Isaya moakalongulili kupwagha, “Ngati Bambo wa Manjolinjoli ngaakatulekili lubheleku, tukabya tubhi ngati Sodoma, na kulenganeswa na Gomola.”
ROM 9:30 Bho, henu tupwagha bhole? Ja kubha bhandu bha mataifa ghangi, ambabhu ngachebhakabhi bhalonda kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga, bhakajetakaliwi palongi jaka Chapanga kwa indela ja uhobhalelu.
ROM 9:31 Nambu Bhaizilaeli bhabhakazini kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga kwa indela ja Shelia, bhakalepalile.
ROM 9:32 Bho, maghambu kike? Kwa ndandi bhakategamili matendu ghabhu badala ja kutegamela uhobhalelu. Bhela bhakalikobhandwile, “Paliganga lela la kulikobhandola,”
ROM 9:33 ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Lingalya, meka ku Sayuni liganga la kulikobhandola, na liganga la kuhabhuha. Na kila mundu joanhobhalela jombi, ngayipowakeki lihamo!”
ROM 10:1 Bhalongu bhangu, ghambala nakanopi muntima jangu, na malobhu ghangu ghanundobha Chapanga, nde kwa ndandi ja Bhaizilaeli, nahuli bhakengaliwaje!
ROM 10:2 Kwa ndandi nabhamanyihi kubha bhabhi na ukangamalu namaa kwa ndandi jaka Chapanga, nambu ukangamalu wabhu ngacheuchengakiki panani ja umanyi wa chakaka.
ROM 10:3 Kwa ndandi ngachebhamanyi ntundu Chapanga moabhatendela bhandu bhajetakaliwaje palongi jaki, na bhalengiki kutumbulila ntetu wabhu bheni na bhela ngachebhajetakile indela jaka Chapanga heji ja kubhatenda bhandu bhajetakaliwaje palongi jaki.
ROM 10:4 Kwa ndandi Kristo nde ujomukelu wa Shelia, nahuli kila mundu joahobhalela ajetakaliwaje palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 10:5 Kwa ndandi Musa akalembiki panani ja kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga kukobhokana na Shelia, ja kubha, “Mundu joahenga mambu ghokapi ghaghapalika na Shelia anaabya mwome kwa ghanihagha.”
ROM 10:6 Nambu kujetakalewa hoku palongi jaka Chapanga kokubhokana na uhobhalelu kukubha ana, “Ngawipwagha muntima waku, ‘Bho, nde nane joanakwela kunani kumahunde?’ ” Yani kundeta Kristo pahi.
ROM 10:7 Au “Bho, nde nane joanahelala kujenda kuwawa?” Yani kundeta Kristo panani kuhuma kwa bhakuwa.
ROM 10:8 Bho, nambu kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga kwa indela ja uhobhalelu kupwagha bhole? “Lilobhi lela libhi pambipi na wehapa, mundomu waku, na muntima waku,” nde lilobhi lela la uhobhalelu letulitangaza.
ROM 10:9 Maghambu anaujetakili kwa ndomu waku kubha Yesu nde Bambo, na kuhobhalela muntima waku ja kubha Chapanga akamuhyohiki kuhuma kwa bhakuwa, anaukengaliwaje.
ROM 10:10 Kwa ndandi kwa mtima mundu ahobhalela mbaka kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga, na kwa ndomu mundu ajetakela uhobhalelu mbaka kupata ukengaleku.
ROM 10:11 Maghambu Malembu Mahuhu ghapwagha, “Kila mundu joanhobhale jombi ngayipowakeki lihamu ng'o.”
ROM 10:12 Kwa ndandi njeta kulekana pachilanda jaka Myahude na Mgiliki, maghambu jombi jola nde Bambo wa bhokapi, mwene hindu yamaheli kwa bhokapi bhabhundobha jombi.
ROM 10:13 Kwa kubha Malembelu Mahuhu ghapwagha, “Kila mundu joanaalobhaje kwa Lihina laka Bambo, anakengaliwaje.”
ROM 10:14 Bhela bho, anabhundobha bhole jombi wangakunhobhalela? Na bho, anabhunhobhalya bhole jombi jwangakunjowana malobhi ghake? Na kabhete bho, anabhunjowana bhole jombi panga mundu wa kubhatangazila?
ROM 10:15 Na kabhete bho, anabhatangaza bhole, pangakubhapeleka? Ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Kunyambiki namaa magholu gha bhala bhabhatangaza Malobhi Manyahi gha lukwale, na kuleta malobhi ghambone.”
ROM 10:16 Nambu nga bhokapi bhabhajetakile Malobhi Manyahi hagha. Kwa ndandi mlota Isaya apwagha, “Bambo, bho, nde nane joahobhalile ubholu wito?”
ROM 10:17 Bhela kuhobhalela kubhonakana na kujowana ubholu, na kujowana kuhika kwa Lilobhi laka Kristo.
ROM 10:18 Nambu nalukila, bho, bhombi ngachebhajowine? Ena, bhajowine, kwa ndandi, “Sauti jabhu jijaghani pundema wokapi, na malobhi ghabhu ghahikiki mbaka mu majomukanelu gha ndema.”
ROM 10:19 Nambu nalukila, bho, Bhaizilaeli ngachebhajowine? Kutumbula Musa mwene apwagha: “Ananuntenda mwabhonila wihu bhandu ambabhu nga bha litaifa litu ananuntendaje mbya na wihu, kwa bhandu bhangakubha na umanyi.”
ROM 10:20 Na mlota Isaya kwa ukangamalu wamaheli, apwagha, “Nakapatakini nabhu bhandu bhala bhangakunonda, na nakalilangihi kwabhu bhala bhangakunalukila.”
ROM 10:21 Nambu kubhokana na Izilaeli apwagha, “Muhi jokapi nakabhahatambuli mabhoku ghangu bhandu bhangakutii na bhandu bhabhabhi na ing'omu.”
ROM 11:1 Bhela nalukila, bho, Chapanga le abhakangiki kutali bhandu bhake? Ngabhela! Kwa kubha nepani nanatu nde Mwizilaeli, jumu wa bhabhelakeka bhaka Ibulahimu, mundu wa likabila laka Benyamini.
ROM 11:2 Chapanga ngacheakabhakangili kutali bhandu bhaki bhaakabhamanyi kutumbu pakutumbula. Au bho, ngachemmanyi ghala ghaghalongaliki na Malembu Mahuhu panani jaka Eliya? Ntundu moabhatakali Bhaizilaeli palongi jaka Chapanga, akapwaghaje,
ROM 11:3 “Bambo, bhabhakomiki bhalota bhaku, bhaiyoningi ihanja yaku ya nyambiku ya kujochakeka, nanatu nhighalili kanjika jangu, na bhombi bhapala kungoma nepani!”
ROM 11:4 Bho, Chapanga akamuyangiki bhole? Akumpwaghili, “Nilihighakili bhandu elufu saba, bhangakuchikama na kunjojabhela kichapanga Baali.”
ROM 11:5 Bhelabhela kwa chikahi cha sajenu, bhabhili mahighalilu bhabhahaghuliki kwa chihomu chaka Chapanga.
ROM 11:6 Nambu anakubhili kwa chihomu, ngachekukubha kwa matendu kabhete. Kwa ndandi kukabhi bhenibhela, chihomu ngachakabhi chihomu kabhete.
ROM 11:7 Bho, henu tupwagha bhole? Chindu chela ambachu bhandu bha Izilaeli bhakabhi bhachilonda ngachebhakachipatike, nambu bhala bhabhahaghuliki na Chapanga bhakachipatike, na bhangi bhakajeghaliki ing'omu.
ROM 11:8 Ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Chapanga akabhapeki roho ja lughono, mihu ghangakuweza kulola, na makutu ghangakuweza kujowana, mbaka lichobha la lalenu.”
ROM 11:9 Na Daude apwagha, “Uwangalalu wabhu na ubya chimbenda cha kubhakamula, na chindu cha kubhahabhuha, na malepu kwabhu.
ROM 11:10 Mihu ghabhu ghajeghalika lwihi, nahuli ngabhilola, na mighongu jabhu jipendikaje kwa mang'ahiku machobha ghokapi.”
ROM 11:11 Bhela naluki kabhete, bho, Bhaizilaeli bhalikobhandwi mbaka kuhabhuka nakanope? Ngabhela! Nambu kubhokana na lihoku labhu ukengaleku ubhahikili bhandu bha mataifa ghangi, nahuli Bhaizilaeli bhapata kubhabhone wihu.
ROM 11:12 Bhela anangati lihoku la Bhaizilaeli liletiki nhupu yamaheli kwa ndema, na kukepakewa kwabhu kiroho kuletiki nhupu yamaheli kwa bhandu bha mataifa ghangi, bho, kukelabhuka kwabhu ngakwileti nhupu yamaheli nakanope?
ROM 11:13 Sajenu nongela na mwehapa mabhandu bha mataifa ghangi. Bhela, kwa kubha nepani nde mtumi wa bhandu bha mataifa ghangi, nililumbalila lihengu langu,
ROM 11:14 nahuli nabhajeghala wihu bhombi bhabhabhi mwahi ghumu na nepani, na kubhakengalela bhakumu bhabhu.
ROM 11:15 Kwa ndandi anakubhi kukanakika kwabhu Bhayahude kuletiki ujonganeshu kwa ndema, bho, kujetakalewa kwabhu anakubya kike ngati nga womi baada ja kupotela?
ROM 11:16 Anangati chipandi cha kutumbula cha libumunda chibhohakiki kwaka Chapanga, na libumunda lokapi bhelabhela, na anangati mikegha ja mikongu nde jambone, na mambandi ghaki ghakubha ghamboni bhelabhela.
ROM 11:17 Nambu anangati mambandi ghangi ghatehi kuheketwa, na wehapa mzeituni wa muchitengu, ukapandakiki pachilanda jabhu, na kulombana na punhina pa mzeituni na kunenepa kwaki,
ROM 11:18 bhela ngawalilumbalila kwa ndandi ja mambandi ghala. Nambu anangati ulilumbalila, nga wehapa weutola mikegha, nambu mikegha nde jejukutola wehapa.
ROM 11:19 Bhela anaupwaghaje, “Mambandi ghanighala ghakahekitwi, nahuli mbandakika nepani.”
ROM 11:20 Ena! Ghakahekitwi kwa kulepalela kuhobhalela kwabhu, na wehapa ujema kwa uhobhalelu waku. Ngawalilumbalila, nambu ujoghupaje.
ROM 11:21 Kwa ndandi anangati Chapanga ngacheakabhalekiki Bhayahude ambabhu nde ngati mambandi gha kutumbula, wala Chapanga ngaakulekakeli wehapa.
ROM 11:22 Lingalya, henu ntundu Chapanga moabheli wambone na mkali. Jombi nde mkali kwa bhala bhabhahawike, na nde wambone kwaku wehapa anangati wijendalya kutama mu wambone waki. Nangabhela, wehapa nanau anauheketwaje.
ROM 11:23 Bhayahude bhelabhela, ngati anabhakotwiki kulepa kuhobhalela kwabhu, anabhajokakiwa kabhete. Maghambu Chapanga abhi na uwezu wa kubhajokakela kabhete.
ROM 11:24 Mwehapa bhandu bha mataifa ghangi, mwenga kwa utumbulilu nde ngati limbandi la mzeituni wa muchitengu, nambu mbohakiki konihoku, na kujokakewa mu mzeituni muchijongu pandu ambapu kwa utumbulilu nga pinu. Nambu Bhayahude kwa utumbulilu nde ngati mzeituni muchijongu, na anakubya lijambu lelipepwiki nakanopi kwabhu kujokakewa kabhete munkongu ghoghoghu wabhu.
ROM 11:25 Bhalongu bhangu, mbala mmanyaje sili jenjenu, nahuli ngamwalibhona kubha mbi na malangu: Ja kubha kwa pandu kunonopa kubhapatiki bhandu bha Izilaeli, mbaka utimilifu wa bhandu bha mataifa ghangi pabhibya bhunhikili Chapanga.
ROM 11:26 Panihapa nde Izilaeli jokapi pajikengaliwaje, ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Mkengalela anaahika kuhuma ku Sayuni na anaabhoha uhakau kuhuma kwa lubheleku lwaka Yakobo.
ROM 11:27 Londoni nde Lulaghilu lwangu na bhombi, panibhohaje mahoku ghabhu.”
ROM 11:28 Maghambu kwa Malobhi Manyahi, Bhayahude bhabhi maadui bhaka Chapanga kwa ndandi jinu, nambu kwa malobhi gha kuhaghulika kola, bhombi bhabhi bhakochi kwa ndandi ja akahoko bhitu.
ROM 11:29 Kwa ndandi Chapanga ngacheang'anambula maholalelu ghaki kwaka jola joanhawile na kumpengalela.
ROM 11:30 Maghambu pamwandi hapa mwehapa mkabhili mkana kuntii Chapanga, nambu sajenu mpatiki chiha kwa kukana kwabhu kuntii Chapanga,
ROM 11:31 bhelabhela na bhombi Bhaizilaeli bhakaniki kuntii Chapanga sajenu, nahuli kwa kupata chiha kwinu na bhombi bhapata chiha chaka Chapanga.
ROM 11:32 Maghambu Chapanga abhakongiki bhandu bhokapi papamu mu kukana kuntii jombi, nahuli abhabhonila chiha bhokapi.
ROM 11:33 Lingalyaje, ntundu moubheli umaheli wa hindu, na mbulau na malangu ghaka Chapanga! Bho, nde nane joaumanyi utemulu waki? Au bho, nde nane joaimanyi indela yake?
ROM 11:34 Ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Maghambu bho, nde nane joaweza kughamanya maholalelu ghaka Bambo? Au bho, nde nane joaweza kunjangatila kumanya la kutenda?
ROM 11:35 Au bho, nde nane joampeki Bambo chindu hoti, nahuli najombi aweza kundepa kabheti chindu chenihechi?”
ROM 11:36 Kwa ndandi hindu yokapi ihuma kwaki, ibhi kwa uwezu waki, na kwa ndandi jaki. Ulumbalilu ubhi najombi hata mileli! Amina.
ROM 12:1 Bhela, bhalongu bhangu, numpwaghila, kwa chiha yaki Chapanga, muibhoha hyegha hinu ibya nyambiku yeibhi yomi, ihuhu, na ya kunyambiha Chapanga, jeniheji nde ibada jinu jejipalika.
ROM 12:2 Wala ngamwijengalela ulenganesu wa ndema ghoni, nambu mng'anambuliwaje na kuhengakeka bhahenu maholalelu ghinu, mpata kumanya chakaka mapalu ghaka Chapanga ghaghabhi ghambone, ghakunyambiha, na ukamilifu.
ROM 12:3 Maghambu kwa chihomu cheambeki Chapanga, numpwaghi kila mundu joabhi kwinu, ngaaliholalela kubha nkolongwa nakanopi kupeta moimpalaki kubha, nambu abya na maholalelu gha kiasi, ngati Chapanga moangabhile kila mundu kiasi cha uhobhalelu.
ROM 12:4 Kwa kubha ngati bhela mu hyegha jimu tubhi na ihungu yamaheli, wala ihungu yokapi ngacheihenga lihengu limu.
ROM 12:5 Bhelabhela na tepani tetubhi bhamaheli, tubhi hyegha jimu muka Kristo, na ihungu kila jumu kwaka njaki.
ROM 12:6 Kwa kubha tubhi na nhupu yangakulengana, kubhokana na chihomu cheatupekihe, anakubhi ulota, tubhoha ulota kwa chipemu cha uhobhalelu ghotupekiwe.
ROM 12:7 Anakubhi utumika, tubya mu utumika witu, au anakubhi joabhola, abya mu kubhola kwaki,
ROM 12:8 anakubhi kujeghe mtima, abya mu kujeghela mtima, joabhaghabhila bhajaki cheabhi nachu, ahenga bhenibhela kwa mtima wambone, joajemalela, ajemalyaje kwa mtima wokapi, na joahenga lijambu la chiha, ahenga bhenibhela kwa mtima wa chiheku.
ROM 12:9 Upalu ngawikubha na undumila kubheli. Mulihakalya lijambu lokapi lelibhi lihakau, na mkamula lijambu lelibhi lambone.
ROM 12:10 Kwa upalu wa chilongu, mpalanaje mabheni kwa mabheni, kwa utopelu koni mkabhalongukya bhajino,
ROM 12:11 ngamwikubha na chitondu, nambu mbya na ukangamalu mu roho hinu, mbyaje na chilolu cha kuntumaki Bambo.
ROM 12:12 Lihobhalelu linu lumbeka chikahi chokapi mbya na chiheku, na kulendalela mu mang'ahiku, na njendalya kundobha Chapanga chikahi chokapi.
ROM 12:13 Mubhajangatya bhandu bhaka Chapanga kwa ghala ghaghapalika kwabhu, na njendalya kubhajopalela bhagheni kwa upalu.
ROM 12:14 Mubhapengalya bhabhung'aha mwehapa, mpengalyaje, wala ngamwibhoha masolu.
ROM 12:15 Muhekalyaje papamu nabhu bhabhahekalela, na ndelaje papamu nabhu bhabhalela.
ROM 12:16 Njonganaje maholalelu ghinu mabheti kwa mabheti. Ngamwipala mambu makolongwa, nambu mbya tayale kujangatila mu mambu machoku machoku. Wala ngamwikubha bhandu wa kulibhona kwa malangu ghinu.
ROM 12:17 Ngamwandepa mundu lihakau kwa lihakau. Ndingalyaje nahuli mtendaje mambu ghaghabhi ghambone pamihu ja bhandu bhokapi.
ROM 12:18 Ngati anaiwezikana, kwa upambala winu, mtamaje mu lukwali na bhandu bhokapi.
ROM 12:19 Bhalongu bhangu, ngamwilepa uhakau kwaka mundu joantendi uhakau, nambu njepaje inyela jaka Chapanga, kwa ndandi ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Kukelabhukila uhakau nde panani jangu nepani, nepani ananepaje, apwagha Bambo.”
ROM 12:20 Nambu ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Adui waku anaabhi na injala, umpekya chilebhe, ngati anaabhi na inywita, umpekya machi, kwa ndandi pauhenga bhenibhela anaunhenga apata ihoni ngolongwa ngati makalakala gha moto panani ja mmutu waki.”
ROM 12:21 Ngawilepalela na uhakau, nambu uwezaje uhakau kwa kutenda ghambone.
ROM 13:1 Kila mundu apalika kubha pahi ja lujiniku lolutawala. Kwa ndandi njeta lujiniku lwangakuhuma kwaka Chapanga, na jela jejibhile jibhekakiki na Chapanga.
ROM 13:2 Bhela jola joapenga lujiniku lolutawala, apengana na lilaghalakilu laka Chapanga, na bhandu bhala bhabhapenga anabhajopalya utemulu panani jabhu bhene.
ROM 13:3 Kwa ndandi bhatawala ngachebhajoghoha bhandu bhala bhabhahenga mambu ghambone, nambu kwa bhandu bhabhahenga mambu mahakau. Bho, upala ngawanjoghopa joabhi na lujiniku? Uhenga mambu gambone, najombi anaakulumbalyaje,
ROM 13:4 maghambu jombi nde mtumika waka Chapanga kwaku kwa ndandi ja kukuhengela mambu ghambone. Nambu pauhenga mahakau, ujoghupaje, kwa ndandi ngacheatola lipanga waka, kwa kubha jombi nde mtumika waka Chapanga, joabhoha utemulu waki kwa bhala bhabhahenga mahakau.
ROM 13:5 Bhela, ipalika kubha pahi ja lujiniku, kabheti nga kwa ndandi ja kujoghopa inyela jaka Chapanga pela, nambu kwa ndandi ja zamili nayombi yutupala tutenda bhenibhela.
ROM 13:6 Bhenibhela nde ndandi mwehapa mlepa kode, kwa kubha bhombi nde bhatumika bhaka Chapanga, bhakajendalya kuhenga lihengu lenihele.
ROM 13:7 Mwapekya bhokapi ghaghapalika kwabhu, mundu wa kode, kode, na mundu wa malepu, malepu, na joapalika choghohi, choghohi, na joapalika kuntopela, muntopilaje.
ROM 13:8 Ngamwidaiwa chindu na mundu jokapi, nambu pe lideni la kupalana, maghambu joampala njaki ajitimizi Shelia.
ROM 13:9 Kwa ndandi amuli ayeyi, “Ngawihenga ugoni, ngawikoma, ngawijibha, ngawitokulela,” na anakubhi amuli yengi yokapi, ibhi mu amuli jimu aje, “Umpala njaku ngati moulipali wamwete.”
ROM 13:10 Upalu ngacheunhengela njaku lilobhi lihakau. Bhela, upalu nde utimilifu wa Shelia yokapi.
ROM 13:11 Muhengaje anana, koni tukachimanya chikahi, kubha lisaa la kujumuka mu lughonu lijomwi kuheghalela, kwa ndandi sajenu ukengaleku witu ubhi pambipi na tepani kupeta patutumbula kuhobhalela.
ROM 13:12 Ikilu uheghali kujomoka, muhi kuheghalile, bhela na tughahula matendu ghokapi gha lwihi, na kuiwata silaha ya unang'anu.
ROM 13:13 Bhela na tujendaye kwa utopelu ngati moipalakila chikahi cha muhi, nga kwa ulohu na kulobhela, nga kwa uhakau na chijaka, nga kwa milomu na wihu.
ROM 13:14 Nambu munhwataje Bambo witu Yesu Kristo, wala ngamwajilingalila hyegha, hata kubhelela utokulelu kwaki.
ROM 14:1 Munjopalya mundu jola ambaju uhobhalelu waki nde uchoku, nambu nga kwa kulochana panani ja maholalelu ghaki.
ROM 14:2 Mundu jumu uhobhalelu waki unjetakela kula kila chindu, nambu mundu jongi ambaju uhobhalelu waki nde uchoku, akula likolu pela.
ROM 14:3 Mundu jola joakula ngaanjojoha jola jwangakula. Wala jola jwangakula ngaantemula jola joakula kila chindu. Kwa ndandi Chapanga anjetakile.
ROM 14:4 Bho, wehapa wa nane weuntemula mtumika waka njako? Kwaka bambo waki pela ajema au ahabhuka. Najombi anaajemaje kwa ndandi Bambo aweza kunjemeka.
ROM 14:5 Mundu jumu alilumbalila lichobha limu kubha nde likolongwa kupeta lichobha lengi, na mundu jongi abhona kubha machobha ghokapi ghalengana. Bhela kila mundu abya na uchakaka mu malangu ghaki mweni.
ROM 14:6 Jola joabhalanga lichobha limu kubha lihuhu kupeta machobha ghangi, ahenga bhenibhela kwa kuntopela Bambo. Na jola jwangakubhalanga lichobha limu kubha lihuhu, kwaka Bambo ngacheakamula. Na jola joakula, akula kwaka Bambo, kwa ndandi anchengu Chapanga, kabheti jola jwangakula, ngacheakula kwaka Bambo, najombi anchengula Chapanga.
ROM 14:7 Maghambu njeta mundu pachilanda jitu joatama kwa ndandi jaki mweni, wala njeta joapotela kwa ndandi jaki mweni.
ROM 14:8 Kwa ndandi anangati tutama, tutama kwaka Bambo, na ngati anatupotile, tupotela kwaka Bambo. Bhela anangati tutama, au ngati tupotela, tepani nde mali ghaka Bambo.
ROM 14:9 Kwa ndandi Kristo akapotili, na kuhyoka kubha mwome nahuli abya Bambo wa bhokapi bhabhapotili na bhabhabhi bhome.
ROM 14:10 Nambu bho, maghambu kiki wehapa untemula ndongu waku? Au bho, maghambu kiki unyakila ndongu waku? Tepani tabhokapi anatujemaje palongi ja chitehu cha utemulu chaka Chapanga.
ROM 14:11 Kwa ndandi ilembakiki mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Ngati mondamila, apwagha Bambo, kila mundu anaachikamaje palongi jangu, na kila mundu anaajetakyaje kubha nepani nde Chapanga.”
ROM 14:12 Bhela, kila mundu pachilanda jitu anaabhoha malobhi ghaki mweni palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 14:13 Bhela ngatwijendalela kutemulana tabheti kwa tabheti, nambu muhamulaje kubha kila mundu ngayitenda chindu cha kuntenda njaki kulikobhandola na kunhabhuha mu mahoku.
ROM 14:14 Nepani nenombini na Bambo Yesu, mi na uchakaka kubha njeta chindu chokapi chekibhi chihakau kwa utumbulilu waki, nambu kwaki jombi joachibhona chindu hechi kubha nde chihakau, kwaka jonihoju chindu hechi chikubha nde chihakau.
ROM 14:15 Nambu anangati ndongu waku ahakalila chilebhi chela cheukula, bhela ukotwiki kujenda mu upalu. Kwa chilebhi chaku ngawamuyonanga mundu jola ambaju Kristo akapotili kwa ndandi jaki.
ROM 14:16 Bhela, ngawijetakela chela ambachu ukibhona kubha chambone chilohakikaje kubha nde chihakau.
ROM 14:17 Kwa ndandi Ukolongwa waka Chapanga nga lijambu la kula wala kunywa, nambu nde kujetakalewa palongi jaka Chapanga, na lukwali na chiheku muka Roho Mhuhu.
ROM 14:18 Kwa kubha mundu joantumakila Kristo kwa mambu ghanihagha anyambiha Chapanga, na kabheti ajetakalewa na bhandu.
ROM 14:19 Bhela anangati nde bhenibhela, na tujengalyaje mambu gha lukwali, na mambu ghaghapalika kwa kuchengana tabheti kwa tabheti.
ROM 14:20 Ngawiyonanga lihengu laka Chapanga kwa ndandi ja ing'omu panani ja chilebhi. Chakaka kila chindu nde chinyahi, nambu ngacheipalika kula chilebhi ambachu anachuntenda mundu jongi kuhabhuka mu mahoku.
ROM 14:21 Nde mbanga kukotoka kula inyama, wala kunywa divai, wala chindu chokapi chechiweza kuntenda ndongu waku kuhabhuka.
ROM 14:22 Bho, wehapa le ubhi na uhobhalelu? Uhobhalelu ghoubhi naku ubya naku wamwete palongi jaka Chapanga. Mbanga mundu jola jwangakulitemula roho jaki kwa lilobhi lela lealijetakela.
ROM 14:23 Nambu mundu joabhi na choghoi, ngati anaakuliki, Chapanga antemwili kubha abhi na mahoku, maghambu ngacheakakuliki kwa uhobhalelu. Na kila lihengu lelihengakeka panga uhobalelu nde lihoku.
ROM 15:1 Bhela itupalika tepani tetubhi na makili kuutola uzaifu wabhu bhanga na makili, wala ngacheitupalika kulinyambiha tabhete.
ROM 15:2 Kila mundu pachilanda jitu na anyambiha njaki kwa mambu ghambone, nahuli kunchenga mu uhobhalelu.
ROM 15:3 Kwa ndandi Kristo najombi ngacheakalinyambihi mweni. Nambu ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Matondu ghabhu ghabhukutondwi wehapa ghakambatiki nepani.”
ROM 15:4 Kwa kubha mambhu ghokapi ghaghalongulili kulembakeka ghakalembakiki kwa ndandi ja kutubhola tepani, nahuli kwa ulendalelu na kwa chiheku cha Malembu Mahuhu tupata kubha na lihobhalelu.
ROM 15:5 Chapanga joabhi utumbula wa ulendalelu na chiheku, anjangatya mwenga kuholalela chindu chimu mabheti kwa mabheti, kwa kujengalela ulenganesu waka Kristo Yesu,
ROM 15:6 nahuli kwa mtima ghumu na ndomu ghumu mpata kundumbalila Chapanga, Atati waka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo.
ROM 15:7 Bhela njetanganya mabheti kwa mabheti, ngati najombi Kristo moatujetakalile, nahuli Chapanga alumbalikaje.
ROM 15:8 Kwa ndandi numpwaghi kubha, Kristo abhi mtumika kwa Bhayahude nahuli kulangiha chakaka jaka Chapanga, na kuilangiha ilanga yela Chapanga yeakabhapekihi akahoko bhitu bha mwande ipata kupitalila.
ROM 15:9 Kabhete nahuli bhandu bha mataifa ghangi bhundumbalya Chapanga kwa ndandi ja chiha yaki. Ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Bhela ananukulumbalya pachilanda ja bhandu bha mataifa ghangi, nanatu ananilijembila lihina laku.”
ROM 15:10 Kabhete Malembu Mahuhu ghapwagha, “Muhekalyaje, mwenga bhandu bha mataifa ghangi, muhekalyaje papamu na bhandu bhaka Chapanga.”
ROM 15:11 Kabhete, “Munjembila Bambo, mwehapa mabhandu bha mataifa ghangi, mabhandu bhokapi, mundumbalya jombe.”
ROM 15:12 Kabhete, mlota Isaya apwagha, “Litundulila la Yese analipitalyaje, jombi joanapitalya na kubhatawala bhandu bha mataifa ghangi, bhandu bha mataifa ghangi anabhunhobhalyaje.”
ROM 15:13 Bhela Chapanga wa lihobhalelu antwelakya mwehapa mabhokapi chiheku mu uhobhalelu, mpata kujonjukeka nakanopi kubha na lihobhalelu, kupetela kwa makili ghaka Roho Mhuhu.
ROM 15:14 Bhalongu bhangu, nepani namwete mi na uchakaka kubha, mwehapa mtwelili wambone, na mtwelakiki umanyi wokapi, kabhete muweza kulakalanila.
ROM 15:15 Nambu nundembela, kwa makakala nakanopi pandu pa baluwa jenjenu, ngati kunkombukela kabhete, kwa chihomu chela cheambeki Chapanga,
ROM 15:16 nahuli mya mtumika waka Yesu Kristo pachilanda ja bhandu bha mataifa ghangi. Naghahengilaje lihengu Malobhi Manyahi ghaka Chapanga lihengu la upenganyambiku, nahuli bhandu bha mataifa ghangi bhapata kubha nyambiku jejijetakalewa na Chapanga, jakabya jigholuliki kwa Roho Mhuhu.
ROM 15:17 Bhela nililumbalila muka Yesu Kristo, kwa utumika wangu palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 15:18 Kwa ndandi nganengi kulongela chindu chengi chokapi kupeta chela Kristo cheahengiki kwa kundumila nepani, nahuli bhandu bha mataifa ghangi bhapata kutii, kwa malobhi ghanalongili na kughahenga,
ROM 15:19 kwa makili gha nginyulila na ngangachu, na kwa makili ghaka Roho Mhuhu. Na kwa kujenda mwanja kila pandu, kutumbula ku Yelusalemu mbaka ku Iluliko, ndangizi wichu Malobhi Manyahi ghaka Kristo.
ROM 15:20 Bhela chembala nde kutangaza Malobhi Manyahi, nambu nga pala ambapu Kristo ajomwi kumanyikana, nahuli nganihika kuchenga panani ja luhuli lwaka mundu najonge.
ROM 15:21 Nambu ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Bhala bhangakutangaziwa malobhi ghaki, anabhabhonaje, na bhala bhangakujowana malobhi ghaki, anabhamanyaje.”
ROM 15:22 Anana nde ndandi nakahibhalakiki mala pamaheli nganiweza kuhika kwinu.
ROM 15:23 Nambu kwa kubha sajenu nyomwili lihengu langu upambala ghongone, na kubha kwa hyaka yamaheli mi na chilolu chikolongwa cha kuhika kwinu hoku,
ROM 15:24 nhobhalela kuhenga bhenibhela sajenu. Nakapaliki kumbona nakabya mumwanja kujenda ku Spania na kupata ujangatilu winu kwa mwanja ghonihoghu ananyomwi kuhekalela kutama kwa chikahi chijipi papamu na mwehapa.
ROM 15:25 Nambu sajenu nyenda ku Yelusalemu kubhatumakila bhahuhu.
ROM 15:26 Kwa ndandi ibhanyambihi bhandu bha ku Makedonia na Akaya kubhoha ujangatilu kwa ndandi ja bhahuhu bhabhabhi bhahochu ku Yelusalemu hoku.
ROM 15:27 Bhombi bheni bhaholali kuhenga bhenibhela, nambu kwa chakaka, leniheli nde lihengu labhu kwa bhanihabha. Kwa ndandi anangati bhandu bha mataifa ghangi bhashiliki nhupu ya kiroho ya Bhayahude, ibhapalika na bhombi kubhajangatila Bhayahude kwa mambu ghabhu gha kihyegha.
ROM 15:28 Ananyomwi kuhenga lihengu leniheli na kubhapekeha ujangatilu hoghu ghoubhonginwi kwa ndandi jabhu, anambetila kwinu, nakabya mu mwanja kujenda ku Spania.
ROM 15:29 Nanatu manyi chakaka kubha, panihika kwinu hoku, ananhikaje na mbengalelu jaka Kristo.
ROM 15:30 Bhela, bhalongu bhangu, numpwaghila kwa lihina laka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo, na kwa upalu waka Roho Mhuhu, mkangamalaje papamu na nepani mu malobhu ghinu kwa ndandi jangu palongi jaka Chapanga.
ROM 15:31 Mulobhaje mbata kubhoka lukwali kwa bhala bhangakuhobhalela bhabhabhi ku Yudea, na lihengu langu ku Yelusalemu hoku lipata kujetakalewa na bhahuhu bhabhabhi konihoku.
ROM 15:32 Bhela, Chapanga anaapalike, ananhweza kuhika kwinu hoku kwa mtima wa chiheku, na kupata kupomulela papamu na mwehapa.
ROM 15:33 Chapanga wa lukwali abya papamu na mwehapa mabhokapi. Amina.
ROM 16:1 Mbala kummanyiha kwinu ndombu witu Foibe, joabhi mtumika wa likanisa lelibhi ku Kenkilea,
ROM 16:2 nahuli munjopalya kwa lihina laka Bambo, ngati moibhapalaki bhandu bhaka Chapanga. Munjangatyaje kwa lilobhi lokapi lela leanapala kuhuma kwinu, maghambu najombi abhi njangatila kwa bhandu bhamaheli, na kwangu nepani.
ROM 16:3 Mwalamukya Pulisila na Akila, bhahenga lihengu papamu na nepani mu utumika waka Kristo Yesu.
ROM 16:4 Bhombi bhakabhi tayali hata kuhobheha womi wabhu kwa ndandi jangu, ambabhu nabhachengula, kabheti nga nepani pela, nambu na makanisa ghokapi gha bhandu bha mataifa ghangi.
ROM 16:5 Mulilamukya kabheti likanisa lelihimangana mu nyumba jabhu. Mundamukya nkochi wangu mpalu Epaineto, joabhi wa kutumbula ku mkoa wa Asia kunhobhalela Kristo.
ROM 16:6 Mundamukya Malia, joakahengiki lihengu namaa kwa ndandi jinu.
ROM 16:7 Mwalamukya Andiloniko na Yunia, Bhayahude bhajangu bhabhakongakiki muchifungo papamu na nepani, bhombi bhamanyikana namaa pachilanda ja mitumi, na bhombi bhakabhi muka Kristo mangane jangu nepani.
ROM 16:8 Mundamukya Ampiliato, nkochi wangu mpalu mu kulombana na Bambo.
ROM 16:9 Mundamukya Ulubano, muhenga lihengu njangu mu utumika waka Kristo, bhelabhela nundamukila Stakisi, nkochi wangu mpalu.
ROM 16:10 Mundamukya Apele joakabhi ndongwana kwaka Kristo. Mwalamukya bhokapi bhabhabhi munyumba jaka Alistobulo.
ROM 16:11 Mundamukya Helodioni, Myahude njangu. Mwalamukya bhandu bhabhabhi munyumba jaka Nalikiso, bhabhunhobhale Bambo.
ROM 16:12 Mwalamukya Tilifaina na Tilifosa, akambomba bhabhahenga lihengu laka Bambo. Mundamukya Pelisisi, mbomba jongi joakahengiki mambu ghamaheli kwa ndandi jaka Bambo.
ROM 16:13 Mundamukya Lufo, muhaghulika waka Bambo, na mabhu waki, joabhi mabhu wangu bhelabhela.
ROM 16:14 Mundamukya Asinkilito, na Filegoni, na Helime, na Patiloba, na Helima, na bhalongu bhabhabhi papamu nabhu.
ROM 16:15 Mundamukya Filologo na Yulia, Nelea na ndombu waki, Olimpa na bhahuhu bhokapi bhabhabhi papamu nabhu.
ROM 16:16 Ndamukanyaje kwa nginyulila ja upalu. Makanisa ghokapi ghaka Kristo ghundamukila.
ROM 16:17 Bhalongu bhangu, numpwaghila, mubhalingalya bhandu bhala bhabhaleta ulekanganu na kubheka mambu gha ihibhalakilu kihanganyuma cha mabholu ghamulibholike, na mlijepa nabhu.
ROM 16:18 Kwa ndandi bhandu bhabhabhi bhenibhela ngachebhuntumakila Bambo witu Kristo, nambu matumbu ghabhu bhene, na kwa malobhi ghaghanogha na malobhi gha kupembalakela bhajikoloha mitima ja bhandu bhambone.
ROM 16:19 Kwa ndandi kila mundu ajowini panani ja kutii kwinu kwa kutenda mambu ghambone. Bhela nanatu nhekalela kwa ndandi jinu, nambu mbala mwehapa mbya na mbulau kwa mambu manyahi, na bhanga na hatia kwa mambu mahakau.
ROM 16:20 Najombi Chapanga wa lukwali anaantimba Shetani pahi ja magholu ghinu manyata. Chihomu chaka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo chibya papamu na mwehapa. Amina.
ROM 16:21 Timoseo, muhenga lihengu papamu na nepani andamukila, andamukila na Lukio, na Yasoni, na Sosipatilo, bhalongu bhangu, bhundamukila.
ROM 16:22 Nepani nde Tetio, nenembiki baluwa jenu, nundamukila kwa lihina laka Bambo.
ROM 16:23 Gayo, mwenehi wangu, papamu na likanisa lelihimangana panyumba jaki, andamukila. Elasto, joatunza mbija ya muchi, na Kwalito, ndongu witu, bhundamukila.
ROM 16:24 Chihomu chaka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo chibya papamu na mwehapa mabhokapi. Amina.
ROM 16:25 Henu na alumbalikaje Chapanga, joaweza kunhenga kukangamala kupetela Malobhi Manyahi ghandangaza panani jaka Yesu Kristo, kulengana na sili jejiyekuliwi na ambaju jakabhi jihiyakiki kutumbu pamwandi hapa.
ROM 16:26 Nambu sajenu chakaka heji jiyekuliwi kwa indela ja Malembu gha bhalota bhaka Chapanga, na kwa amuli jaka Chapanga wa mileli, imanyakini kwa inchi yokapi nahuli bhokapi bhaweza kuhobhalela na kutii.
ROM 16:27 Kwaki Chapanga joabhi na mbulau kanjika jaki. Ulumbalilu ubya najombi kupetela kwaka Yesu Kristo mileli na mileli! Amina.
1CO 1:1 Nepani Paulo, nengemakiki kubha mtumi waka Yesu Kristo kwa mapalu ghaka Chapanga, na Sositene ndongu witu,
1CO 1:2 tundembela mwehapa likanisa laka Chapanga lelibhi ku muchi wa ku Kolinso, bhala bhabhalowakiki kubha bhahuhu kwa kulombana na Kristo Yesu, papamu na bhandu bhokapi pokapi bhabhundobha Bambo witu Yesu Kristo joabhi Bambo wabhu na witu bhelabhela.
1CO 1:3 Chihomu na chibya kwinu na lukwali, yeihuma kwaka Chapanga Atati witu, na kwaka Bambo Yesu Kristo.
1CO 1:4 Nunchengu Chapanga wangu machobha ghokapi kwa ndandi jinu maghambu ampekihi chihomu chaki kwa indela jaka Kristo Yesu.
1CO 1:5 Kwa ndandi kwa kulombana kwinu na Kristo mtajilishwi kwa kila chindu, mu malobhi ghinu na umanyi winu wokapi.
1CO 1:6 Kwa ndandi ulandilu witu panani jaka Kristo ubhonakini wichu mkati jinu,
1CO 1:7 hata ngachemkepakiwi na nhupu jokapi ja kiroho pandendalela kuhika kwaka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo.
1CO 1:8 Jombi anaampekya ukangamalu mkati jinu mbaka pakujomukela, nahuli mpata kubhonikana kubha ngachembi na mahoku lichobha lela laka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo.
1CO 1:9 Chapanga nde ndongwana, ambaju akundohiki mlilombaje na Mwana waki Yesu Kristo, Bambo witu.
1CO 1:10 Nundobha bhalongu bhangu, kwa lihina laka Bambo witu Yesu Kristo, kubha njonganaje maholalelu ghinu mabheti kwa mabheti, nahuli ngakwikubha na ulekanganu pachilanda jinu na kubha mbya na ukamulano kichakaka mu liholalelu limu na lengu limu.
1CO 1:11 Kwa ndandi mwalongu bhangu, mbatiki malobhi ghinu kuhuma kwa bhandu bhakumu bhabhatama kunyumba jaka Kiloe kubha kubhi na kulepa kujongana pachilanda jinu.
1CO 1:12 Bhela chembala kolongela nde achechi: Kubha kila mundu pachilanda jinu alongela chaki. Jumu apwagha, “Nepani nunjengalela Paulo,” na jongi apwagha, “Nepani nunjengalela Apolo,” na jongi apwagha, “Nepani nunjengalela Kefa,” na jongi apwaga, “Nepani nunjengalela Kristo.”
1CO 1:13 Bho, Kristo atehi le kughabhanika? Bho, Paulo le akawambakiki punsalaba kwa ndandi jinu? Au Bho, mkabatizwi kwa lihina laka Paulo?
1CO 1:14 Nuchengula Chapanga kubha ngachenumbatizi mundu jokapi pachilanda jinu nambu pela Krispo na Gayo.
1CO 1:15 Bhela, nga mundu jokapi joaweza kupwagha akabatizwi kwa lihina langu.
1CO 1:16 Ena kabhete nakumbatizi Stefana papamu na bhandu bha munyumba jaki, nambu nyonjeka ja bhanihabha, ngachengomboka ngati nakumbatizi mundu jongi jokapi.
1CO 1:17 Kwa ndandi Kristo ngacheandumike kubatiza, nambu kutangaza Malobhi Manyahi, wala nga kwa mbulau ya malobhi, nahuli kupotela kwaka Kristo punsalaba ngakwikubha kwa waka.
1CO 1:18 Kwa ndandi ubholu kubhokana na kupotela kwaka Kristo punsalaba nde lijambu la king'ang'a kwa bhala bhabhabhi munkumbu wa kuhobha, nambu kwitu tepani tetubhi mu indela ja ukengaleku, ubholu ghonihoghu nde makili ghaka Chapanga.
1CO 1:19 Malembu Mahuhu ghapwagha, “Ananiyonangaje mbulau jabhu bhabhabhi na mbulau na malangu ghabhu bhabhabhi na malangu ananaghakanaje.”
1CO 1:20 Bho, abhi kwaku joabhi na mbulau? Bho, abhi kwaku mlemba? Bho, abhi kwaku joalongela malobhi gha mbulau wa machobha ghane? Bho, Chapanga le ngacheajitei mbulau ja ndema ghoni kubha ung'ang'a?
1CO 1:21 Kwa ndandi kwa mbulau jaka Chapanga, akabhatendiki bhandu ngabhummanya jombi kwa mbulau yabhu bhene. Badala jaki ikamnyambihi Chapanga kubhakengalela bhala bhabhahobhalela kwa indela ja chela ambachu bhabhabhi na mbulau bhachibhona kubha nde ung'ang'a, yani lilobhi lela letulitangize.
1CO 1:22 Kwa ndandi Bhayahude bhapala nginyulila, na Bhagiliki bhalonda mbulau.
1CO 1:23 Nambu tepani tuntangaza Kristo, joakawambakike punsalaba. Kwa Bhayahude nde kihibhalakilu, na kwa Bhagiliki nde ung'ang'a,
1CO 1:24 nambu kwa bhandu bhala bhabhalowakiki na Chapanga, Bhayahude na Bhagiliki, Kristo nde makili ghaka Chapanga na mbulau jaka Chapanga.
1CO 1:25 Kwa ndandi ung'ang'a waka Chapanga ubhi na mbulau nakanopi kupeta mbulau ja bhandu, na uzaifu waka Chapanga ubhi na makili nakanopi kupeta wa bhandu.
1CO 1:26 Bhalongu bhangu, mkombukaje chikahi pamukalowakiki, bhamaheli bhinu bhakabhi nga mbulau hata kwa maholalelu gha bhandu, bhamaheli bhakabhi nga bhandu bhabhabhi na makili au bhandu bhabhabhi na yeu bhabhalowakike.
1CO 1:27 Nambu Chapanga akaihawili hindu ing'ang'a ya ndema nahuli iwezaje kuipoha lihamu yeibhi na mbulau, na Chapanga akaihawili hindu zaifu ya ndema ghoni nahuli iwezaje kuipoha lihamu yeibhi na makili.
1CO 1:28 Kabheti Chapanga akaihawili hindu yeizalauliwa na kukanakika na yeibhonikana kubha ngacheibhi na chindu, nahuli kuitenda hindu yela yeibhonikana na bhandu kubha nde yeipalika ibya nga chindu chokapi mu maholalelu gha bhandu.
1CO 1:29 Bhela mundu jokapi ngaalilumbalila chindu chokapi chela palongi jaka Chapanga.
1CO 1:30 Nambu Chapanga andombanishi mwehapa na Kristo Yesu, na Chapanga antendiki Kristo abya mbulau jitu. Kwa indela jaki tepani tujetakalewa na Chapanga, tukubha bhahuhu na kukombulewa.
1CO 1:31 Bhela, ngati moilembakike mu Malembu Mahuhu, “Jola joalilumbalila na alilumbalya kwa ndandi ja chela cheatendiki Bambo.”
1CO 2:1 Bhalongu bhangu, nepani panahikiki kwinu hoku, ngachenahikiki kuntangazila sili jaka Chapanga kwa kunyamba kwa malobhi, wala kwa mbulau ja bhandu.
1CO 2:2 Panabhi kwinu nakapaliki nganimanya lilobhi lokapi kwinu, nambu pe kummanya Yesu Kristo, na kupotela kwaki punsalaba.
1CO 2:3 Panabhi kwinu nakabhi zaifu, na kubhaghaja kwa lujoghopu lukolongwa.
1CO 2:4 Malobhi ghangu na kutangaza kwangu ngachekwabhi kwa malobhi gha mbulau ja kughahuta malangu gha bhandu, nambu kwa nginyulila ja makili ghaka Roho Mhuhu.
1CO 2:5 Nakatendiki bhenibhela nahuli uhobhalelu winu ngawikubha mu mbulau ja bhandu, nambu mu makili ghaka Chapanga.
1CO 2:6 Hata bhela, tepani tutumi lugha ja mbulau kwa bhala bhabhakolike kiroho, nambu mbulau heji nga ja pani pundema, wala nga ja bhajemalela bha ndema ghoni bhabhabhili munkumbu wa kuhobha.
1CO 2:7 Nambu tepani tuntangazila mbulau jaka Chapanga jejihiyakike, ambaju Chapanga akabhi ajomwili kujihaghula kwa ndandi ja ulumbalilu witu, hata mangani ja kubhombakeka kwa ndema ghoni.
1CO 2:8 Nde mbulau ambaju bhajemalela bha ndema ghoni ngachebhakajieliwe, maghambu ngati bhakabhi bhatehi kujielewa, ngachebhakamuwambiki punsalaba Bambo wa ulumbalilu.
1CO 2:9 Nambu, nde ngati moghapwaghi Malembu Mahuhu, “Mambu ambaghu lihu ngachelighaweni wala likutu kughajowana, mambu ambaghu mundu ngachealabhali kughaholalela muntima waki, ghanihagha nde Chapanga ghaabhekile bhandu bhala bhabhumpala.”
1CO 2:10 Nambu Chapanga atuyekulili tepani mambu ghanihagha kwa Roho waki. Ndandi Roho Mhuhu alingalila kila chindu, hata mambu gha mkati nakanopi jaka Chapanga.
1CO 2:11 Bho, nde nane pachilanda ja bhandu joaweza kughamanya mambu ghaka mundu jongi nambu pe roho jejibhi mkati jaka mundu hoju? Bhelabhela na mambu ghaka Chapanga ngajoaghamanya, nambu Roho waka Chapanga.
1CO 2:12 Nambu tepani ngachetwajopalili roho ja ndema ghoni, nambu Roho joahuma kwaka Chapanga, nahuli tuwezaje kughamanya ghokapi ghatupekiwi waka na Chapanga.
1CO 2:13 Naghombi tughalongela, nga kwa malobhi ghaghabholakeka kwa mbulau ja bhandu, nambu kwa malobhi ghaghabholakeka na Roho Mhuhu, koni tukaghayekulaje mambu gha kiroho kwa bhandu bha kiroho.
1CO 2:14 Bhela mundu jwangakubha na Roho waka Chapanga ngacheaweza kughajopalela mambu ghaka Roho waka Chapanga. Maghambu mambu ghanihagha kwaka mundu jonihoju nde ung'ang'a, wala ngacheaweza kughamanya, kwa ndandi ghamanyikana kwa kujangatiwa na Roho waka Chapanga.
1CO 2:15 Kwa ndandi mundu joabhi na Roho waka Chapanga aweza kughapema mambu ghokapi, nambu njeta mundu joaweza kuntemula.
1CO 2:16 Maghambu Malembu Mahuhu ghapwagha, “Bho, nde nane joaweza kughamanya malangu ghaka Bambo?” Bho, nde nane joaweza kundongoha? Nambu tepani tubhi na malangu ghaka Kristo.
1CO 3:1 Bhalongu bhangu, nepani ngachenaweziki kulongela na mwanganya ngati mabhandu mwembili na luhomu lwa kiroho, nambu ikambaliki kupwagha na mwanganya ngati bhandu bha pundema, ngati mwabhana bhang'eng'a mu kunhobhalela Kristo.
1CO 3:2 Ikambaliki kumpekeha mahibha, na wala nga kumpekeha chilebhi chekinonwipe, ndandi ngachemwabhi tayali kuchijopalela. Hata chikahi chenu ngachembi tayali.
1CO 3:3 Kwa ndandi mbaka sajenu mwanganya mwakali kutama ngati bhandu bha kihyegha. Anakubhi kwinu kubhi na wihu na ulekanganu pachilanda jinu, bho, mambu ghanihagha ngacheghalangi kubha chakaka mwanganya mwakali mabhandu bha kihyegha, na njendalela kutama kwa ntundu wa kiyegha?
1CO 3:4 Jumu winu paapwagha, “Nepani nunjengalela Paulo,” na jongi apwagha “Nepani nunjengalela Apolo,” bho, bhenibhela ngacheilangi kubha mwanganya mwakali kutama ngati bhandu bha kihyegha pela?
1CO 3:5 Bho, Apolo nde nane? Na bho, Paulo nde nane? Tepani nde bhatumika pela tetundeti mwanganya uhobhalelu. Kila jumu witu ahenga lihengu leapekiwi na Bambo.
1CO 3:6 Nepani nakapandiki imbeju, Apolo akajitali machi, nambu joajitendiki imbeju heji jimelaje nde Chapanga.
1CO 3:7 Bhela, joapanda imbeju nga chindu, wala joajitalila machi, nambu Chapanga joajitenda jikolaje.
1CO 3:8 Jola joapanda, na jola joajitali machi bhokapi bhalengana, nambu kila mundu anaajopalya malepu ghaki kulengana na lihengu laki.
1CO 3:9 Kwa ndandi tepani nde bhatumika papamu na Chapanga, mwehapa nde ngonda waka Chapanga. Na mwehapa nde lichengu laka Chapanga.
1CO 3:10 Kwa ndandi ja chihomu chaka Chapanga cheambeki nepani, ngati nunkolongwa wa bhachenga joabhi na mbulau, nakalubhekiki luhuli, na mundu jongi achenga panani jake. Nambu kila mundu na alingalya ntundu moachenge panani jake.
1CO 3:11 Kwa ndandi nga mundu joaweza kubheka luhuli nalonge, nambu pe luhuli lola lolwajomwi kubhekakeka, yani Yesu Kristo.
1CO 3:12 Nambu anangati mundu anachengiki panani ja luhuli loniholu, zahabu au madini gha feza au maganga gha mbija yamaheli au mikongu au mahamba au manyonyoli,
